story:
STRYDA has an extremely reputable track record for delivering to happy backers all over the world both on Kickstarter and beyond.  

Our latest innovation will change the way you carry your smartphone forever! 

Working out, walking, running or cycling can be uncomfortable and hazardous to your phone when you want to keep it on you.  

The large smartphones of today are not suitable for armbands due to discomfort, bulky or stiff construction and weights of over half a pound. Pockets can be loose or poorly positioned causing your phone and personal items to fall out or bounce around.  

With our vast experience in designing cutting edge athletic apparel and workout gear, it made absolute sense to design the perfect wearable. A secure, ergonomic and stylish solution whether you're in the gym, on the field or the streets!  

One of our most praised features on our best selling tights was our smartphone pocket. We felt this sophisticated solution needed to be independently upgraded.  

It had to be adaptable to the moving body at all levels of intensity. Comfortable yet durable materials that would mold to your form in motion. 

Two Velcro straps allows the holster to be adjusted to the perfect fit, whilst ultra slim grip zones provide extra hold.   

 There are multiple colors and designs to choose from to suit your style. An additional pocket provides storage for your personal essentials including cards, cash and keys. Even your sunglasses have a slot. Super easy access with a fast and smooth drawing and holstering action. The Holster looks good, feels good and makes perfect sense.

 

 

The Holster can be worn on your preferred leg either bare, underneath shorts or over tights. Your smart phone can seamlessly slide in and out of the HOLSTER compartment.

The device screen can still be accessed and touch sensitive for basic functions such as music, phone call or reading time whilst holstered. 

Two velcro straps allows the holster to be adjusted to the perfect fit, whilst ultra slim grip zones provide extra hold.

There is a separate compartment for your other personal items such as cash, cards or keys. There are 2 slits to securely holster your sunglasses too!

STRYDA is a brand that has been in operation since 2014 and strives to maintain the highest level of customer service and satisfaction. We are here to stay and every backer is our priority.  

STRYDA operates with a high standard of complete customer satisfaction. We totally fulfilled our 2015 campaign within 2-5 months of being funded.

STRYDA also fulfills orders to backers from around the world on a retail level with a 100% success rate and with an efficient delivery time frame of 3-7 business days on all international orders.

Every contribution allows us to continue our dream, designing product people love to wear. Having your support from around the world and seeing all of your pictures from a multitude of countries REALLY empowers us. 

We are driven to continue sharing our vision with men and women around the world. When we hear from those who spot our gear on the other side of the planet wearing STRYDA, it literally gives us the shakes! There is no better feeling..on that note, please send in your snaps to be shared on our social media! ll proceeds from our previous campaign have been reinvested to create our largest range of products yet, with your support we will be able to bring them to full production.  

 We ensure all of our products are ethically sourced and manufactured to a high standard by happy suppliers and their employees.  

We travel to meet them directly to maintain our partnership. We will also continue to grow and innovate new products into 2018 with this funding. STRYDA has been able to increase our team of staff and with your support, we will create more local jobs and collaborations in the global community.

We sincerely appreciate your wonderful ongoing support - it means the world to us! We pledge to honor every backer and their contribution, to deliver exceptional products and grow our legacy to bring you simply the greatest activewear. Quality. Beauty. Performance.

 

HOW SOON WILL I GET MY HOLSTER?  

 The Holster is a market ready product - once funded, our order will be immediately placed with a production time of 35 days. Fulfillment will take place as soon as products are completed.  

 

ACCOUNTABILITY  

STRYDA is a brand that has been in operation since 2014 and strives to maintain the highest level of customer service and satisfaction. We are here to stay and every backer is our priority.  

STRYDA operates with a high standard of complete customer satisfaction. We totally fulfilled our 2015 campaign within 2-5 months of being funded.  

STRYDA also fulfills orders to backers from around the world on a retail level with a 100% success rate and with an efficient delivery time frame of 3-7 business days on all international orders.

 

 

Want to feature the project on your blog, Facebook page or news site? No need to ask for permission, however we do ask that you place a link through to the campaign on your site.

Please find high res images along with the footage (without subtitles and voiceovers) on the link below.

story:
Please click on any Perk for full offer details

 

First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to check out our IndieGogo page. We truly appreciate all of the support!

We have spent the last year working with people in the industry to develop prototypes, tweaking those more times than you could imagine, and are now finally ready to present the first collection of Woodland Watch Company. Maple, Sandalwood, Walnut and Ebony - All of which will be offered exclusively on IndieGogo before anywhere else.

 

The Next Generation of Wooden Watches

 

The one thing we're most proud of with this first design is the fact we didn't have to sacrifice quality for style. We're one of the first to agree that the majority of wood watches on the market today are trendy and fashionable. However, the only problem is when you put it on your wrist. At that point it no longer has the feel of a real watch, as it's too lightweight and quite frankly feels cheap.

So, we set out to create a new wave of wooden watches...the next generation, with a design that would change the game. The result, was a hybrid design that combined 100% all natural wood and stainless steel. 

Here's the breakdown:

Bezel Material: 100% All-Natural Wood

Case Diameter: 45mm

Case Thickness: 10.5mm

Band Material: Stainless Steel with 100% All-Natural Wooden 

Band Width: 22mm

Band Length: 220-225mm with Adjustable Links

Clasp: Stainless Steel Butterfly Clasp

Movement: Japanese Miyota Quartz Movement

Display: Analog with Date and seconds Function

Water Resistance: Splash Proof



The Woodland Team

We are Father and Daughter team, Dan and Jasmin from Beautiful British Columbia, Canada known for its Lakes, Rivers and Wilderness, inspiration for this project came pretty naturally from where we live and helped us come up with our very first prototype which has turned out to be very rewarding, the wood symbolizes the nature of British Columbia and the stainless steel represents the cityscape of Vancouver, British Columbia.

 

What We Stand For

Woodland Watch Company is more then just a watch collection, We are a lifestyle brand focussed on building a community of amazing people that are value driven just like us,  we invite you on our journey and together we can create a movement of like minded people who believe that doing good by helping others is not a one time thing but is more of a way of life.

 

We Need Your Support

We want to be completely up front and candid about the fact that we need your help. Your support, and yes by support we mean your pledge (of course in exchange for something awesome),  The important thing to remember with our IndieGogo campaign is, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing. 

Our reach only goes so far beyond our networks. By simply liking or sharing our Facebook page, following us on Instagram, or sending a few quick emails to your friends and family goes a long way . But ultimately, our hope is that you will love our watches as much as we do and pledge your support in order to receive one of the very first from Woodland Watch Company.

 

Enter to Win 1 of up to 20 Watches!

Easy to enter

1) login to your Indiegogo.com account (sign in with Facebook for a quick process) this is a very important step as we can only track "sharing" if you are logged in .

2) simply share our campaign on Facebook or all :) with the social media icons near the top of this page (example here ->>

3) winners will be announced after the campaign on our Facebook Fan page shortly after our campaign is complete, granted our funding goals have been reached

4) 10 Watches will be up for Winning once our campaign reaches $10k and 20 Watches at $20k We are excited to see who the Winners are going to be :)

Thank you in advance and Best of Luck to everyone!

 

Where do the Funds Go?

All of the money raised during this campaign will go  towards the first official order of Woodland Watches. Of course the majority of that money will be used to cover any and all production costs (watches and packaging), while the rest will help us pay for shipping, cover platform transaction fees, marketing costs, 10% of profits will be donated to children in need, and of course successfully launching Woodland Watch Company. If there are any questions, please don't hesitate to drop us an email.

 

Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING: 
One of the primary challenges when dealing with any physical product like this is complications in manufacturing. Rest assured, as we have already found reputable and highly capable suppliers for producing our watches. Everything from where we source our wood to the movement of the watch to final assembly, we've got it all dialed in.

We work directly with our suppliers from start to finish and even conduct all quality control in-house. And the process will remain the same as we get ready to manufacture more units post-IndieGogo campaign.

LEAD TIME & DELIVERY: 
Knowing the exact timeline for production from start to finish is never an easy thing to judge. Thanks to the relationships we've built however, we're confident that we can finish all orders by Late October to mid November at the latest upon the conclusion of funds are released from IndieGogo from this campaign. In the case that any delays do arise all backers will be informed immediately and kept up to speed with all updates.

 

From all of us at Woodland Watch Company, We Thank you For Joining us on this Journey and Look Forward to all of you receiving these amazing Watches!

story:
The Kik clip is going to change your life... kinda.

The Kik Clip is the coolest shoe accessory you ever need to own. How many of us are guilty of shoving our feet into our shoes? How often have we seen our kids struggle putting on their shoes? The critics say that kids and adults should untie and tie their shoes. Really? When is the last time that happened? At the end of the day, sometimes it's just the little things we do that make our life easier and that is exactly what the Kik Clip is all about. I am a father of three and I want to say I have some experience as a parent and this product is for me as much as it is for my kids.

 

 

Now I asked myself would it be nice if all my kids have their shoes untied ready to put on and then fully tie them back on? Of course! Unfortunately this isn't my reality

 

 

and I know it isn't for a lot of other people. Through this whole process of designing the Kik Clip I realized what a useful product it could be for everyone. 

 

 

Seniors will love how easy it is to use the Kik clip. No more balancing and fidgeting to get the foot in, with the Kik Clip slips right in. I have also received feedback from Physical therapists who have said this would make many of their patients life much easier. The bottom line: This products works, and more importantly, you and everyone who uses it will benefit. My hope and wish is to get this to market and share this with the world.

I need your support to make this a reality. Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign! Hopefully we can bring this product to reality! Just FYI the two colors we are providing will be Red and Yellow.

Risks and challenges

The budget is the biggest obstacle. I need to be able to cover the mold cost which is the biggest cost of the project. The challenge of bringing in a new product is proving to the consumer that this is something they can use and benefit from.

story:
Short Summary

The SAFE SHORTS is a panty with the material of 85% Polyamide and 15 % Elastan, combined with cut- and tear resistant high tech materials and a special design. 

It follows every movement. 

The SAFE SHORTS is washable in the machine at 30°degrees and it dries quickly.

Here is the overview of the protection:

1. No one can pull down your SAFE SHORTS, when the cords are fixed

2. The cords are tear resistant and it is very, very difficult to cut them  

3. The connected 130 decibels alarm screams for you when it´s activated and the sound    catches people´s attention

We have started in 2016 with a single production. Therefore the production costs where quite high and the piece price for the customer was quite expensive. Now, we can start with a professional production to reduce our production costs and consequently the customer price, too. We can present the SAFE SHORTS in a high quality now and with new features.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 20.000€ to start the first big production in our new factory in Beijing and to enable the SAFE SHORTS underpants to a very good price. 

We have to pay an advance payment to the factory and they will start the production afterterwards. Before the produced SAFE SHORTS will reiceive our company we have to pay customs and shipment costs, too. 

Our supporters will get a high quality SAFE SHORTS underpants including all corresponding accessoires: the alarm, the lock, the cut- and tearresistant elements. 

You can select out of a several supporter packages. 

The Impact

In 2016 we bring the SAFE SHORTS system to the international patent and start with a production in Europe. We have opened our own online shop and have sold the SAFE SHORTS Underpants to customer in the whole world already. We are very familiar with the international shipment, now. Customer communication is very important for us. 

The international press was and is very interested in reporting about our product SAFE SHORTS. A lot of TV- and radio stations, newspaper and magazines have reported in the past.

And we are very proud, that we have received feedbacks, from several customer who where protected by the SAFE SHORTS in a dangerous situation already.

But we have learned from the customer feedbacks, that the price 89,00€ is to expensive. The single production has made the price rising.  Before these background, we have started the search for a production in Asia, which can produce a high quantity to reduce the piece price, while keeping the familiar quality. 

We have visited this factory personally and have a good and quick communication with the stuff. They are familiar with the production of cut- and tearresistant materials and work for a lot of sportbrands for more than 20 years. 

 

Risks & Challenges

We want to make this product available to a lot of people, who want protection against raids when they move outside alone. 

The SAFE SHORTS model has a lot of features, that make this to a higher protection product. 

1. LOUDER

The 130 decibels alarm has a hole for the speaker now, that the alarm can scream unhindered.

 

2. MORE PROTECTION

The SAFE SHORTS underpants model 2019 has a thinner protector in the “Secreat Area” and it has a higher cut resistant level than the former model. 

3. SOFTER

We have worked with a new material mix with 85% Polyamide and 15 % Elastan.

4.  DESIGN

The cords can be pulled easier in the tunnel than before and the SAFE SHORTS Underpants feels soft now.

Overview SAFE SHORTS Underpants

Material: 85% Polyamide and 15 % Elastan

Color: black 

Sizes: XS/S, M/L, XL/XXL

Measurements:

Sizes                          Waist (cm)             Hips (cm)

XS/S 34/38                              61-74                       84-98

M/L 40/44                               75-87                       99-108

XL/XXL 46/52                         88-116                    109-126

Box size: 23 cm x 14 cm x 5,5 cm Quality: very high with high-tech materials 

Washing: in the machine at 30° dregrees - without softener -Don´t dry in the sun!

Now, we will take the chance to bring our world novelty SAFE SHORTS to our international supporter. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share these campaign to your community. We will reach the goal together, when your friends and family will get to know teh SAFE SHORTS, too. This can be done very easy, when you will use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Can we ask you to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign?
  • Do you have another idea, to support our campaign? Please contact us. We are open for news!

And that's all there is to it.

Please share these campaign to your community. We will reach the goal together, when your friends and family will get to know teh SAFE SHORTS, too. This can be done very easy, when you will use the Indiegogo share tools!
Can we ask you to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign?
Do you have another idea, to support our campaign? Please contact us. We are open for news!
And that's all there is to it.

story:
Style meets practicality

Timeless, stylish and super lightweight travel bags in Danish design with room for everything you need for you travels!

The bags are designed to fit as much as possible on your trip, while being easy to carry. The durable, lightweight fabric is easy to clean and water repellent.

We have thoughtfully selected two classic colors that will stay in style and go with everything in your closet.

When traveling practicality often wins over fashion or style. With this line of travel bags, we merge the two. The bags are designed in Denmark and has the Danish simplicity shine through in every product. We have an attention to detail and have removed anything needless, so you're left with a classic bag in a great quality that will last for many years both in style and function.

 

The products

The London bag

This is the first bag we designed and it's your go to travel bag. It is created to fit most airlines cabin measurements being 55cm x 35cm x 20cm. We wanted to make it as large as possible within the cabin restrictions, so you can bring everything you need on your trip.

The bag is padded to protect your items and has a strong YKK zipper.

In the front, we have kept it super simple and just added the Lemon Suite logo in a tone-in-tone color.

On the back, you will find a pocket where you can easily store magazines and items you want to be able to reach quickly. We have also added a sleek strap to place the bag on your suitcase.

Inside there is a padded space for your laptop. On the other side, we have placed a fanny pack for your important items. It serves as a pocket inside the bag and is easily removed and doubles as an extra bag. You can take it out if you want to have your important belongings on you during the flight or use the fanny pack on your trip.

You can get the London bag in green or black.

Measurements: Length 55cm, height 35cm, width 20cm. The shoulder straps are 67cm.

The Berlin bag 

The Berlin bag is perfect for those who prefer to travel with a trolley. Most airlines allow a small bag to accompany your trolley - this is what we aimed for. It is also a perfect size bag to use on trips and in everyday life. Besides all your important items like wallet, keys and phone, it also holds a water bottle and a light sweater or scarf.

The soft shoulder strap is adjustable so you can wear it exactly as you prefer.  

It has the Lemon Suite logo on the front and the back features a pocket held together with magnets. This is great for items you want to have within quick reach, like your phone or keys. 

Inside the bag, you will find a pocket with a zipper for your smaller items. The bag is padded to protect your items and to keep its shape even if you havn’t filled it up.

You can get the Berlin bag in black or green.

Measurements: Length 26cm, height 19cm, width 8cm. The adjustable shoulder strap can be 68-113cm.

The Paris bag

The Paris bag is an even more simplified version of the London bag. We have created this for those of you, who want the bag to take up as little space as possible.

Completely basic, it has the Lemon Suite logo on the front, is securely closed with a sturdy zipper and features one zippered pocket on the inside. It is unlike the large travel bag not padded, but it is created in the same durable material.

The Paris bag is available in black and green.

Measurements: Length 55cm, height 35cm. The shoulder straps are 65cm. 

The Copenhagen tote

The Copenhagen tote is the perfect companion on trips - and in life. It takes up no space and when you have been shopping or want to take off your jacket, you can pack it into the tote and have your hands free. We have created this in a super cool see-through fabric, which is durable and soft.

We chose to create the tote in white because of the different effect in the material. You can also go with the black version, as seen here. 

The Copenhagen tote is larger than the average tote bag, measuring: Length 48cm, height 49 cm and the shoulder straps are 55cm.

The Amsterdam pouches

The Amsterdam pouches come in a set of 3 different sizes. They are brilliant to pack loose items or toiletries into. They can be used alone and with any of the bags. We especially love to use it with the see-through small tote, because it hides the items you don’t want people to see - and you get to show off the pouch. The pouches are only available in black with white logo. 

The pouch features a large Lemon Suite logo going around both sides of the pouch.

Measurements: Small: 21cm x 15cm. Medium: 26cm x 20cm. Large: 35cm x 27cm.

The Tokyo packing cubes

The Tokyo packing cubes come in a set of 3 different sizes. They are great for the organized packer and make everything easy to find in the large travel bag, the large tote and in any suitcase. We have added the logo and a see-though net, so you don’t have to open it to locate which items is in which organizer. The packing cubes only come in black.

Measurements: Small: 24cm x 17cm x 10cm. Medium: 32cm x 27cm x 10cm. Large: 39cm x 32cm x 10cm.

 

Time line

February 2019: Prototyping development

September 2019: Launch Indiegogo campaign

October 2019: End of Indiegogo campaign

October 2019: Gather information from backers about color choices and shipping information 

November 2019: Production begins

February/March 2020: Shipping of products to the backers

 

Future goals

In Lemon Suite, our dream is to expand the collection of simple and stylish products, that make life easier on the go. We are looking to create the bags in the colors of the season and to expand with a well-designed backpack  - of course without compromising neither style nor practicality. 

 

Shipping & customs information

We do not have control over international shipping charges. International shipping rates may vary depending on your delivery location and the product you select due to the difference in size and weight. This fee will be calculated based on the shipping country you’ve selected.

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you’re not there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us), it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

Backers may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

All products are being shipped from Denmark.

 

Risks & challenges

Although many crowdfunding projects have come up with their best, there are always variables. Depending on how many backers support our product, the situation for manufacturing and transportation may vary. We have prepared a number of plans for that situation, and we will choose to ensure that our products arrive in a stable manner as soon as possible.

If we don’t reach our goal of sales for a product, we may have to find a different factory, which might slightly change the denier in the fabric or the colors. We have a very strong attention to detail and quality and we will make sure that the end product lives up to expectations before shipping it out. We will of course keep all our backers updated in every step we take.

story:
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.

As Italians, style is infused in our blood. We like to look good and feel amazing wearing clothes that fit well and are made well. Inspired by James Bond and the styles of the sixties and seventies, our premiere clothing line for Autumn/Winter was created for men who need staple items that are built to last and easily integrated into their wardrobe. Additionally, by using the highest-quality materials, instilling sustainable practices, and making our clothing available to everyone, we’re doing it the Italian way—with style and class.

 

For our pullovers, we chose a very unique and distinctive fabric made by the famed Filati Biagioli Modesto, who oversees the entire process of transformation from fiber to yarn—guaranteeing 100% Made in Italy quality. We also chose their company because they’re actively engaged in various projects aimed at reducing waste and its environmental impact.

 

This cable-knit, crewneck sweater is made of 70% superfine lambswool and 30% cashmere for the absolute softest, most comfortable sweater you’ll own. Beautifully matched with a long coat and scarf or worn for an elegant, more casual look with well-fitted jeans, this is going to be one of your favorite picks for Fall or Winter.

 

Made by a small workshop in Veneto, Italy, which has been making artisanal coats for three generations, this single-breasted, slim-fit coat is timeless. Made mostly of wool, which has natural water-repellent properties, this coat will keep you dry, warm, and comfortable even in damp weather. Lined viscose fabric, which feels amazing against the skin and helps the garment drape perfectly over your body, this luxury item is truly the centerpiece of your cold-weather wardrobe. You’ll never leave home without it.

 

 

Designed with a Pois pattern featuring a classic fringe and the Supernova monogram, this scarf is made of modal, wool, and silk, making it a warm, smooth scarf that lays beautifully over or under a coat.  Made to wear for function or fashion, it’s a smart addition for any cold-weather ensemble. 

This is an add-on and cannot be purchased separately.  Add it on to your order of the Como Pullover Sweater or Milano Overcoat for an amazing accessory to your Supernova style.

 

 

Men of style know that a suit just doesn’t have the same impact without a pocket square. Made with a Pois pattern to tie in with the scarf, this piece has a hand machine hem and the Supernova monogram for the classic finishing touch to your outfit.

This is an add-on and cannot be purchased separately.  Add it on to your order of the Como Pullover Sweater or Milano Overcoat for an amazing accessory to your Supernova style.

Available in Camel.
 

The San Marco Hat is handmade by a Venetian master whose craft has been passed down through the generations since the early twentieth century; this hat is a timeless classic. Made of 100% wool, it is also waterproof - ideal for cold weather that might include a touch of rain.  No one can deny the style of a gentleman in a hat, and this model is the perfect accessory to accentuate any outfit.

This is an add-on and cannot be purchased separately.  Add it on to your order of the Como Pullover Sweater or Milano Overcoat for an amazing accessory to your Supernova style.

 

 

Supernova’s products are proudly made in Italy by the best suppliers in the sector. Using high-quality materials, the Supernova line is designed by a creative studio with two decades of experience collaborating with brands like Fendi, Louis Vuitton, and more. And because our commitment to exceptional quality follows in the footsteps of all the great Italian fashion designers, each aspect of the Supernova line, from conception to production, is taken care of down to the last detail.

 

 

Once you purchase an item of Supernova clothing now and in the future, you have access to our wonderful clothing exchange program.

What that means is that you can trade-in your previously purchased, gently used clothing for a voucher that will give you a substantial discount on your next purchase. In turn, others will be able to purchase your previously worn clothing at a deeply discounted rate, giving it a second life and allowing everyone to experience the quality and feel of luxury clothing. 

 

After receiving used clothing from customers, our team carefully inspects and sanitizes every piece before putting it back on the shelves. If something isn’t eligible for resale, then we’ll donate them to charity!

 

With every purchase (whether new or used), you’ll be a part of Supernova’s incredible community. 

 

 

For us, it’s not just about fashion, it’s also about sustainability and accessibility. Supernova is committed to eliminating barriers to entry and instilling eco harm reduction practices so that everyone can feel good in their clothing.

In addition to adopting a clothing exchange model where we recycle garments to give them another life, our suppliers — from the production to the fabric — are selected not only for their quality but also for their sustainability values. Excellent fashion should not be exclusionary nor come at the expense of the Earth. Our hope is to lead the way in this space by delivering timeless pieces without compromising on sustainability.

 

 

 

Add-ons cannot be purchased separately. They can only be purchased with your order of a pullover sweater or overcoat.

 

 

Supernova is a brand that strives to make high-end quality clothing affordable and accessible to everyone all while maintaining our roots in sustainability and environmental impact. With various styles and options to choose from, Supernova aims to perfect the modern gentleman look. Introducing our clothing exchange program, Supernova customers are able to trade in their clothing for different ones, experiencing the quality and feel of luxury clothing. Using a revolutionary clothing exchange program, Supernova customers are able to trade in their clothing for a deep discount on new ones. If up to standards, the gently used clothing will be offered for sale at a reduced rate in the Supernova marketplace simultaneously giving one customer a discount on new fashion and allowing another customer to experience the quality and feel of luxury clothing without having to pay a higher price tag. This endeavor is better for the customer and better for the environment.

story:
I intend to establish a manufacturing workshop in Mombasa Kenya to produce The Schmutter Gutter, this is an innovative clothing accessory that will be hand made, therefore the production process is labour intensive. The work force will comprise of single mothers - a social group in sore need of support.

A minimum of £16000 will be required to locate and rent suitable workshop premises in Mombasa, the workshop will be equipped with benches, lockers, air conditioners, extractor fans, toilet and washing facilities, extra facilities will be installed as and when required. Creche accommodation will be provided near, or ideally, adjacent to the workshop. The creche will be a priority adjunct to the business and will be equipped and staffed accordingly.

All staff, both production and careers will be paid a good living wage (Ks360 per hour) enabling  them to rent good quality and secure accommodation, A one bedroom apartment costs Ks13/15 per month, A two bedroom apartment costs Ks15/20 per month, A three bedroom apartment costs Ks20/25 per month. Power, water and connectivity will be afforded by wages. A major concern for all parents is the education of their children, this will be one of my priorities also. Education, books, uniforms and school outings will be afforded by employees wages. The creche facilities, lunch and tea breaks for staff and children will be provided free.

I will arrange health insurance for each employee. A pension plan will be set up for each employee. Tax is factored in @ Ks2000 per week. These three items sum approximately Ks4000 and will deducted from the employees wages. I will install a bonus scheme based on productivity. The working day will be from 7.30am to 12 noon, 1pm to 5.30pm. with two 15 min. tea breaks. Five days per week with an option of working Saturday morning 8am to 1pm. The basic working week will be 45 hours, this x Ks360 = Ks16,200 per week. Regardless of any elevated costs re. tax etc. I will guarantee a minimum wage of  Ks12, 200 per week. This figure will provide a standard of living commensurate with  a Western middle class standard.

I intend to create a content, prosperous workforce as an exemplar.

story:
Lasilki Audio Earbuds provide unprecedented premium grade audio for Enthusiasts and Audiophiles  

Lasilki Earbuds equipped with the Largest Battery, Highest Waterproof rating, Longest Playtime and USB Type-C - provide an absolute NO compromise experience every single time

Beautiful Design with Breathing Illumination

The beautifully crafted easy to carry case blends seamlessly with its surroundings and your match perfectly with your other electronics while offering you quick and easy access to your buds at all times

 

Always Stay Ready! With the quick charging 3000 mAh Battery that doubles as a power bank.

Lasilki Audio's Earbuds will last up to 8 Hours on their own or up to 200 Hours(yes, 200 hours) of playback time with the case,  setting new standards for the industry

Future proof yourself with USB Type-C

Don't make the mistake of buying an older Micro-USB device, with Lasilki Audio's Earbuds you can be sure that your Earbuds will pass the test of time and offer years of high quality service to you

Forget your worries - IPX 8 Waterproofing

 

The IPX 8 is the highest waterproof rating achievable, leave your worries behind - go for a shower, go for a run, go for a swim, go and LIVE!

 

 

Highly Advanced Active Noise Cancellation with Ambient Sound Filter

The Advanced Active Noise Cancellation with ASF allows sounds that are important for you to be heard while blocking noise that you don't need - in real time

 

Bluetooth 5.0

Flawless instant pairing under 2 seconds 

 

The highly efficient and stable Bluetooth 5.0 technology used to provide uncompromising audio quality at long ranges while maximizing battery life for true long lasting premium wireless experience

Skip the worries and embrace Power On-The-Go

 

Never let your important devices die on you, with Lasilki Audio Earbuds you can charge any device thanks to it's internal 3000 mAh battery

 

Using the latest technology - hardware and software, it has become possible to provide long range connections up to 10 Meters/33 Feet without any loss in Audio Performance or functionality 

 

Now is your chance to get yourself the Lasilki Audio Earbuds for a special SUPER-EARLY BIRD discount at 

ONLY $59!! (from $140!)

story:
Hello, I am Jacky Wong, the CEO and founder of HEDONE. When I look back at my childhood, by far my favorite memories are of me spending each summer holiday, alongside my father, in his watch factory. It was the foundation of my future career in horology and the catalyst for my fascination for creating unique timepieces. With my father’s encouragement, after leaving education I joined the watch industry and have been immersed in it for over 15 years.

During this time, I observed that the affordable watch sector became very stale, and you could say way too conventional. Many existing brands release very similar designs, and there's far too much repetition of design content and features. End users often buy into a brand, or follow a designer label, and the actual aesthetics and function of the timepieces often becomes the secondary concern. The Logo on the watch, or the brands name in identifiable lettering can blind the purchaser to inferior quality products and mass produced movements. I want to correct that, and bring back affordable, beautiful watches that are truly a joy to own.

 

 

Watches should be works of art, both aesthetically and mechanically. The balance of these two factors and then the emotion they offer the wearer are the key factors that I truly want to bring to the market. I have therefore set a goal for myself and my team of horologists. We will offer an affordable, truly desirable, high quality, and inspirational timepiece to the market. It will instill in the wearer a sense of pride in wearing the product, and to balance this, it will reassure them of the mechanical accuracy, reliability and workmanship involved in its conception.

All HEDONE watches will be assembled, finished and quality assured by our own master watch makers. Every aspect of the production, from the initial concept and design stages right through to the final packaging and shipping to clients will be overseen by myself. I truly love my work, and I am very proud of the products we produce and the team I have assembled to create them.

 

 

 

 

COSMIC DUALITY - OUR INSPIRATION:

We have one philosophy that has inspired and governs everything we do at HEDONE. Yin and Yang are the basic factors of parity that govern natural law. It is the motive force of all life cycles that breed, develop, mature, decline and die. It Isn't just a philosophy though, it inhabits everything from Mathematics to Science, the Arts and Medicine. Yin and Yang do not exist on their own, both parties co-exist, because of the existence of the other. Yin and Yang shows us how seemingly opposite or even contrary forces may actually be complementary to each other and interconnected, The Yin-Yang philosophy says that the universe is composed of forces of dark and light, sun and moon, male and female.

Its concept and teachings are at least 3,500 years old, and it has been recorded they were discussed in the ninth-century BC text known as the 'I Ching' (or 'Book of Changes') and to this day influences the philosophies of Taoism and Confucianism. The iconic Yin-Yang symbol is related to the ancient method used to track the movements of the sun, moon, and stars. Yin is usually characterized as a feminine inward energy. It's still, dark, and negative. Yang is characterized as outward energy, masculine, hot, bright, and positive. Their co-existence and balance are what guide is in everything we do at HEDONE.

With Yin and Yang as our inspiration, we have created our PHILOSOPHE watch range, in initially just two designs, with both incorporating elements of Yin and Yang.

 

 

 

We created a two-layered movement design, with an upper escapement on the top of dial, and others mechanic parts are hidden in the right side and at the back of the movements. This allows the owner to view the beauty of movement both from top and bottom, and it’s fascinating, precision mechanism. The PHILOSPHE isn't just a watch, it's truly a work of art on many levels.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The motion of the Balance Wheel is the perfect representation of the interaction between Yin and Yang. For every tick of these timepieces, you can witness the Pallet Fork first enter, and then leave the wheel, and thus moving the hands forwards and perfectly representing the interconnection and interdependent between Yin, Yang and the passage of time.

 

 

 

When you consider the elements involved in creating these timepieces, and that each aspect of their manufacture is inspected for both quality and accuracy, we are sure you will embrace them with as much passion as we have. They are meant to be worn, meant to be enjoyed, meant to emote a feeling of balance and timekeeping. But most of all they are meant to be treasured.

 

 

 

 

Product Specification:

We only use the best materials, with cases machined from hypo allergenic 316L Stainless Steel and straps crafted from the finest responsibly sourced Leathers. The timepieces are also water resistant to 30M, 100 feet or 3 ATM. The quality of every part, from the scratch resistant Sapphire Crystal glass, to the Crown exudes quality way beyond the price point of the PHILOSOPHE range. They represent exceptional value for money considering the time and workmanship invested in creating each one. There is at last a balance to be found between quality and price without sacrificing reliability, or accuracy. We make timepieces that we are proud to wear ourselves, and that in turn we are sure you will be proud to own.

 

Watch Dimension:

Diameter : 44.0 mm

Lug width : 22.0 mm

Thickness : 12.5 mm

Length : 53.0 mm

Weight : 100 gram

 

Movement:

 Automatic movement 20 jewels

 Rotor decorated with Geneve pattern

 21,600 vibrations per hour

 Power reserve >36 hours

 Accuracy : - 15 ~ +30 s/d   

 

Watch case: 

316L Stainless Steel

See through case back

3 ATM water resistant

Top Scratch-Resistant Sapphire crystal

Back coloured mineral glass

 

Watch strap:

Genuine leather strap

Stainless steel pin buckle

 

 

Warranty :

We provide a period of two years warranty from the date of delivery. Our warranty covers manufacturing defects on the watch itself existing at the time of delivery of the purchased HEDONE watch.
NOTE: This manufacturer’s warranty DOES NOT cover:
Normal wear and tear or acceptable aging (e.g. alteration of the colour and/or material or non-metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber, etc.)
Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal or abusive use, misuse of crown, negligence and accidents resulting in scratches, dents, nicks, broken crystal, etc.

story:
Make Any Screen Drawable

Touch screen technology is a new interactive method of input. Compared to the traditional keyboard and mouse, the touchscreen is much more intuitive and easier to operate.

Hello X3 is a portable and smart device that turns any monitor into an interactive device and redefines any of your screens.

 

Hello X3 Early Look

 

 

 

Meet Hello X3

 

 

Precise Positioning of Fine Lines

The accuracy of the Hello X3 has increased from 3mm to 2mm, and the touch accuracy has increased by 50%, which means that you can select very small points and fine lines.

 

 

Smooth&Immediate Response

The data processing speed of Hello X3 has been upgraded from 60fps to 120fps, which is twice as fast as Hello X2. This fast data processing speed guarantees that the response is quick, smooth, and has no latency when drawing.

Smooth

Quick

No latency

 

Take Your Desk Into Graphics Tablet

Hello X3 can also turn your screen into a desk interactive touchscreen. You can control your screen on any table or other surface. Hello X3 makes screen sharing more convenient and limitless!

 

Simple Steps to Control The Screen on The Desk!

 

     

 

One Device for Any Size

Hello X3 has gotten rid of the complicated and troublesome debugging step.

It is easy to mount on monitors of all sizes from 10” to 27” and clip the device onto the upper left-hand corner.  Just calibrate a few points on the screen to begin touch screen control after installing the software.

*The clip can be adjusted from 1-25mm. It also comes with a removable soft grip which allows for a secure and scratchless attachment to your monitor.

YELANGAI Hello X3 works with any normal laptop or desktop and is super compatible with Mac or Windows OS.

 

Longer Working Time

Hello X3 can be used for up to 4 hours, and it only takes 30 minutes to fully charge. The different colored indicator lights remind you to charge the X-Pen before it runs out of battery.

 

Take Hello X3 Anywhere

Hello X3 uses infrared technology to turn your normal screen into a touch screen. The camera has been specially processed to recognize the infrared light from the tip of the X-Pen. It does not identify or store any content on the screen, which ensures the security of your information.

 

Electronic Signature

Hello X3, The Tactic For Successful Business Negotiation

Game

Hello X3, Enrich Your Gaming

 

 

Draw

Hello X3, Painting Let Your Mind Wander

Work

Hello X3, Inspire Your Creativity

 

Specification

 

 

 

What's in The Box

 

Perks&Add-on

 

 

Timeline

 

 

About YELANG Team

YELANG team is an intelligent interactive technology company that was established in 2017. It is committed to the research and application of a new generation of human interaction technology and has successively obtained multiple first-line investment institutions.

As of 2021, YELANG has won the honorary title of National High-tech Enterprise and has dozens of intellectual property rights, over ten invention patents, and has released a number of high-tech products. It is a member of the Virtual Reality Alliance and a member of the Software Association.

It is so glad to launch our upgrade product Hello X3 with Indeiegogo backers! Once the mass production begins right after the campaign is over, we will work closely with the factory to oversee the production is at full blast to minimize any possible risk of delay. Should any lapse occur, we will keep you abreast of the latest updates.

The Hello X3 team will try our best to control the shipping time and ensure the products are delivered on time and if you have any other problems, please feel free to contact us!

story:
The production is already started! 

HTD Horological Tools Department

We are based in Florence. The Heart of Italian Watchmaking, 

Take something to drink and a comfortable seat, we introduce ourselves and explain the history and the motivations driving the creation of Horological Tools. 

HTD was born as a small independent company in the watch-industry after Federico Del Guerra and Federico Zulian, two Italian designers met during their studies.

The common passion for watch-making brings them soon to deal with the recurrent idea of doing something in this branch, and to bring new turmoil in the watchmaking industry in Italy.

The parts are designed, assembled and serviced in the territory of Florence, thanks to experts and to the best hands that the workshops of the local artisans have to offer. This means that the quality remains at first place.

 

 

Hesagraph is the first official collection for HTD. This fills us up with pride, especially seeing how much hard work it has cost us and our partners

The inspiration is clearly that of motor racing from the '50s, '60s and '70s: dirty, rough, and reckless, but that have been able to give to the world the courage of precise and refined heroes.

Exactly as our watches, which cut the curve of time clean as razors. 

The PureSpeed

The Cannoli

The X-Ra

Hesagraph TECHSHEET

This project was born as an ultralimited edition, as an adventure companion for every situation, ready to carry out the operations on the ground, as to the maneuvers in the air or the sea. Whatever vehicle you use, this is your most faithful co-pilot.

To buy the bracelet add +50 Euros to the pledge of a Hesagraph or a Jungle,  Then we will ask you what type of bracelet you would like!

To buy the Open Caseback you can add +30 Euros at the pledge of a Hesagraph or a Jungle!

story:
ABOUT FIRLE 

“A powerful heritage design honouring traditional watchmaking. Painstakingly sculpted using the finest materials.” 

 

Firle Watches takes its name from the Old English word fierol, meaning oak-covered land - a name that carries strength and integrity and a name that embodies our British heritage and landscape. The coastline that surrounds us here can often be fierce and powerful. These are the days we most look forward to – they force us to escape, and they bring with them possibility.

The fine movements in our watches are every bit as rugged, powerful and beautiful as the ocean and landscape from which we draw our inspiration. Firle watches are for admirers of mechanical perfection, lovers of adventure - and lovers of life.

In much the same way, we believe our timepieces will come to embody the story of those who wear them. They are designed to be with you for the whole journey.  

 

OUR PROMISE 

 

At Firle, we are passionate about the Ocean, it's the source of our inspiration and it's a place that provides us with a huge amount of joy. We believe it is the responsibility of both consumers and companies to minimise our impact on the environment. Which is we have decided to donate £5 from the sale of every Firle timepiece to the charity Plastic Oceans. Plastic Oceans is a leading ocean clean-up initiative that aims to reduce the amount of plastic pollution in our oceans through science, sustainability and education. (More can be found on Plastic Oceans and our £5 promise at the bottom of our campaign).

 

 

INTRODUCING THE SENNEN AUTOMATIC  

 

A modern tribute to classic timepieces, offering a rich collision of design, with dials that embody the powerful colours of the mighty Cornish coast and a case honouring the elegance of vintage pocket watches.

 

 

ABOUT THE SENNEN AUTOMATIC

Firle's debut model, the Sennen Automatic, is a wristwatch that takes design inspiration from some of the best watchmakers in the world such as FP Journe, IWC, Cartier, Laurent Ferrier, and H. Moser.

The Sennen takes its name from the Cornish Cove located on mainland England’s most westerly point - Land's End. Exposed, it takes a battering from the most extreme conditions. The result is one of the most beautiful, contrasting landscapes in the world. Sennen and Cornwall have, in my eyes, always been a place of staggering beauty and power. A haven which as a surfer, or a nature lover, you can get completely lost in. Ultimately, it is a place of inspiration and reflection. This captivating coast provided me with a space to create the framework and design for the Sennen Watch by Firle. 

 

FEATURED ON 

 

THE DESIGN​  

The Sennen Automatic's design is entirely unique; every part of it designed with absolute intent to create an incomparable piece.  

 

THE CASE - The Sennen Automatic case features a beautifully rounded 41mm case, modelled after traditional pocket watches produced by watchmakers like Waltham and Breguet. 

Seeing rounded cases is rare nowadays, this could be due to the difficulties in trying to create a flawless transition between lug and case. This was a detail that took me many months to perfect -a seemingly impossible task but it was vital for me to do this as I believe rounded cases are the embodiment of exceptional design. Not only does a rounded case ensure comfort, but it is a wonderfully simple expression of nature.

The 41mm 316L stainless steel case could only be perfected if it were entirely polished.  Which I feel combined with its shape, exudes traditional watchmaking values and transports you back to the era of classic pocket watches.  

 

 

THE CRYSTAL - Committed to the utmost quality, the Sennen features an extremely high-grade scratch-resistant double-domed sapphire crystal, rather than the more common single-dome sapphire or mineral glass. This ensures that the watch can be viewed from any angle without creating any distortion of the dial. Furthermore, double-domed sapphire crystal increases the light luminosity on the dial, which creates a magnificent, radiant effect.  

 

 

THE CASE BACK - The Sennen features an open case-back revealing the beautiful STP1-11 movement through a flat high-grade sapphire crystal. The case-back is held in place via six titanium screws. Furthermore, the watch is water-resistant up to 10ATM - 100 Meters / 330 Feet.  

 

 

THE DIAL - I wanted the dials to reflect the deep, saturated colours of the rugged coastline that I’ve come to love. The eerie blacks of the rock formations, the deep blues of the Atlantic Ocean, the whites of the sea foam and sand, and the greens that cover the coastline.  

 

 

The only way to truly replicate the vivid depth of these tones was by using enamel on the dial surface. Not too dissimilar to the grand feu method of enamelling, the enamel used on the Sennen uses a mixture of enamel glaze and fine glass compounds, which are repeatedly applied, heated and polished to achieve a perfect finish. The enamel provides the rich colours and the glass provides a shine comparable to the sun reflecting off the ocean. All of these different elements, weighted and balanced to perfection, finish off the classic yet modern design of 'The Sennen'.  

 

 

This laborious project has taken me four years to complete, the necessary amount of time to create a watch in which every component is custom designed. From the unique case and lugs right down to the hand-placed indexes and Assegai inspired hands, every part of the Sennen was been pored over until it was perfect. 

 

 

You might find similar, but you will not find the same design features on any other watch. This is what truly makes the Sennen a special, unmatched timepiece.  

 

THE MOVEMENT 

The Sennen is powered by the Swiss-made calibre: STP1-11, an exquisite movement, specially selected for its thinness and quality. 

 

The STP1-11, at only 4.6mm, is one of the thinnest automatics on the market, allowing the Sennen to remain incredibly slim with a case thickness of 10.4mm, or 11.7mm with the double-domed sapphire crystal. This ensures it sits extremely well on the wrist, without being at all cumbersome.

The STP1-11 is a high precision movement that operates at 28'800 vibrations per hour, 4 Hz and offers a 44-hour power reserve. The movement has a Perlage finish, and the rotor has a Côte de Geneve finish engraved with the Firle logo.   

 

 

 

THE STRAPS   

 All of our Sennen Automatic watches come with either:

1. A faux crocodile print leather strap (genuine leather)  or 

2. A smooth Italian leather strap (genuine leather)

 

 

THINKING OF ADDITIONAL STRAPS?  

 

VINTAGE COWHIDE STRAPS (sold separately)

The Sennen Automatic can also be beautifully paired with our Vintage Cowhide Straps, which are designed to show signs of ageing and distress -perfect for giving your watch a rugged look and feel. A characteristic I am personally fond of. Please note these are not included with the watch but can be ordered separately.

Available in Cognac (pictured on the left) and Light Brown (pictured on the right).  

 

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

PACKAGING​ 

 

We believe the initial presentation of your watch is extremely important. We also felt if we built something well enough, you would want to keep it – which is a more sustainable approach.

Our presentation boxes are crafted from veneered Oak and MDF.  The inside of our boxes are lined using a luxury grey felt and are stamped with our gold foil Firle logo.

Firle watches come with a beautifully illustrated user guide and a 2 or 5 warranty card.

We wanted to take a more sustainable route with the rest of our packaging – our strap boxes, user guide, warranty card, shipping boxes, packaging tape and labels are all 100% recyclable.

Our promise to reduce as much plastic as possible is implemented all along the way: our watches don’t arrive with dust stickers and our packaging filler and label pouches are also all 100% biodegradable/compostable.     

 

 

 

WARRANTY

Firle watches are made to last long into the future.

The Sennen Automatic timepieces have been made using the highest quality components and materials by our rigorous and skilful manufacturers.

Firle Watches are guaranteed against any manufacturing defects for a period of 24 months from the date of purchase. Please note the warranty does not cover any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal use, lack of care, negligence, accidents, incorrect use of the watch and non-observance of the directions provided by Firle Watches.

No. 001 WARRANTY

No. 001 Sennen Automatics come with an exclusive 5-year warranty.

All Firle watches will be personally inspected before shipment and will be accompanied with a Firle warranty card.

 

 

OUR STORY 

 

“For four years I have been tirelessly working to make this dream a reality. I believe I have achieved my goal of an exquisite, expertly crafted watch and an honest brand.”

 

In recent years, the watch industry has become oversaturated with supposed minimalist, ‘Bauhaus’ inspired quartz watches featuring low-cost and low-quality components. Consumers are, understandably, drawn to these watches because of affordability -a factor not commonly found in the watch industry.

Many of these brands centre around extravagant marketing, which promotes affluent and idealistic lifestyles that are simply unattainable for the average consumer. The visions fed to customers do not match their brand offering.

I have to admit; I was fooled by this too. However, I soon realised there was a much more beautiful and honest way of doing things, which would honour the essence of watchmaking.

After taking a closer look at the watch industry, I realised there was a massive gap in the market between the low-cost, low-quality offerings and the exorbitantly priced, good-quality brands.

This pushed me to start thinking about the sort of watch that the industry was lacking.

I was inspired by the need to create an honest and timeless brand, incorporating world-class components of highly complex mechanics, yet which falls into an affordable price bracket.

Through my research, I became infatuated with mechanical movement. I firmly believe that mechanical watches are the only timepieces worth owning. A smooth sweeping second hand on the surface and an intricate marvel of interactions going on within the watch case that completely capture the imagination. I have dreamt about designing and creating a truly exceptional timepiece that does not represent a symbol of grandiosity but is a testament to the true art of watchmaking.

 

 

DELIVERY

READY TO SHIP - Quite uniquely to INDIEGOGO, our watches and straps are in stock and ready to ship once the campaign is completed and payment has been processed.

UK AND EUROPE

Orders to the UK and most European countries will be shipped using Royal Mail's Tracked and Signed service. Once posted, delivery should take between 2 to 10 days. Tracking numbers will be provided.

STRAPS - Individual straps will be shipped via Royal Mail. Once posted, delivery should take between 2 to 10 days

REST OF THE WORLD

Items with a value above £380 will be shipped via UPS Express Saver. Once posted, delivery should take between 3 to 10 days.  Tracking numbers will be provided.

STRAPS - Individual straps will be shipped via Royal Mail. Once posted, delivery should take between 5 to 15 days

Due to COVID-19, please note you may experience delays. Before ordering, please also check whether your country has any restrictions or suspensions currently in place.

CUSTOMS

Shipping does not necessarily include customs and taxes - this will be country-specific.  Please note that custom and duties are the buyer’s responsibility. 

 

 

REVIEWS 

 

You can find the Sennen Automatic reviewed on:

HANDS-ON REVIEWS

Just One More Watch

Monochrome Watches

Random Rob

Watch It All About  

ARTICLES

A Blog To Watch 

 

CONNECT WITH US 

Our Website - Our Instagram - Our Facebook

 

PLASTIC OCEANS - OUR COMMITMENT

OUR £5 PROMISE TO PLASTIC OCEANS    

 

Plastic Oceans is a  leading ocean clean-up initiative that aims to reduce the amount of plastic pollution in our oceans through science, sustainability and education.

The ocean is a critical source of life for the entire planet and all of us which call it home. Every day more than 8 million new pieces of plastic are working their way into our oceans, destroying not only its aesthetic beauty but also causing catastrophic damage to marine ecosystems. Furthermore, creating a domino effect which has tumbled into the entirety of the environment and its biodiversity.

It is the responsibility of both consumers and companies to minimise our impact on the environment. 

Which is why we have chosen to donate £5 from every sale of a Firle timepiece to the charity Plastic Oceans.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

As we have already mentioned, 500 pieces of the Sennen Automatic are in stock and ready to ship. We wanted to provide the fastest possible delivery to our customers and we wanted to limit any risk involved in this process.  

Don't worry if any of our in stock colourways are sold out - we will add an additional reward tier that will allow you to pre-order one of our pieces at a similar discount - the expected delivery of these pieces is very much like the Indiegogo norm and should take between 3 - 5 months.  
 
Due to COVID-19 - Please also be aware that there are currently certain shipping & postage restrictions in place for certain countries. There are likely to be delays, so please be patient.  
  
Please also check project updates regularly.
story_txt:
ABOUT FIRLE 
“A powerful heritage design honouring traditional watchmaking. Painstakingly sculpted using the finest materials.” 

 
Firle Watches takes its name from the Old English word fierol, meaning oak-covered land - a name that carries strength and integrity and a name that embodies our British heritage and landscape. The coastline that surrounds us here can often be fierce and powerful. These are the days we most look forward to – they force us to escape, and they bring with them possibility.
The fine movements in our watches are every bit as rugged, powerful and beautiful as the ocean and landscape from which we draw our inspiration. Firle watches are for admirers of mechanical perfection, lovers of adventure - and lovers of life.
In much the same way, we believe our timepieces will come to embody the story of those who wear them. They are designed to be with you for the whole journey.  
 
OUR PROMISE 

 
At Firle, we are passionate about the Ocean, it's the source of our inspiration and it's a place that provides us with a huge amount of joy. We believe it is the responsibility of both consumers and companies to minimise our impact on the environment. Which is we have decided to donate £5 from the sale of every Firle timepiece to the charity Plastic Oceans. Plastic Oceans is a leading ocean clean-up initiative that aims to reduce the amount of plastic pollution in our oceans through science, sustainability and education. (More can be found on Plastic Oceans and our £5 promise at the bottom of our campaign).
 
 
INTRODUCING THE SENNEN AUTOMATIC  

 
A modern tribute to classic timepieces, offering a rich collision of design, with dials that embody the powerful colours of the mighty Cornish coast and a case honouring the elegance of vintage pocket watches.
 

 
ABOUT THE SENNEN AUTOMATIC
Firle's debut model, the Sennen Automatic, is a wristwatch that takes design inspiration from some of the best watchmakers in the world such as FP Journe, IWC, Cartier, Laurent Ferrier, and H. Moser.
The Sennen takes its name from the Cornish Cove located on mainland England’s most westerly point - Land's End. Exposed, it takes a battering from the most extreme conditions. The result is one of the most beautiful, contrasting landscapes in the world. Sennen and Cornwall have, in my eyes, always been a place of staggering beauty and power. A haven which as a surfer, or a nature lover, you can get completely lost in. Ultimately, it is a place of inspiration and reflection. This captivating coast provided me with a space to create the framework and design for the Sennen Watch by Firle. 
 
FEATURED ON 

 
THE DESIGN​  
The Sennen Automatic's design is entirely unique; every part of it designed with absolute intent to create an incomparable piece.  

 
THE CASE - The Sennen Automatic case features a beautifully rounded 41mm case, modelled after traditional pocket watches produced by watchmakers like Waltham and Breguet. 
Seeing rounded cases is rare nowadays, this could be due to the difficulties in trying to create a flawless transition between lug and case. This was a detail that took me many months to perfect -a seemingly impossible task but it was vital for me to do this as I believe rounded cases are the embodiment of exceptional design. Not only does a rounded case ensure comfort, but it is a wonderfully simple expression of nature.
The 41mm 316L stainless steel case could only be perfected if it were entirely polished.  Which I feel combined with its shape, exudes traditional watchmaking values and transports you back to the era of classic pocket watches.  
 

 
THE CRYSTAL - Committed to the utmost quality, the Sennen features an extremely high-grade scratch-resistant double-domed sapphire crystal, rather than the more common single-dome sapphire or mineral glass. This ensures that the watch can be viewed from any angle without creating any distortion of the dial. Furthermore, double-domed sapphire crystal increases the light luminosity on the dial, which creates a magnificent, radiant effect.  
 

 
THE CASE BACK - The Sennen features an open case-back revealing the beautiful STP1-11 movement through a flat high-grade sapphire crystal. The case-back is held in place via six titanium screws. Furthermore, the watch is water-resistant up to 10ATM - 100 Meters / 330 Feet.  
 

 
THE DIAL - I wanted the dials to reflect the deep, saturated colours of the rugged coastline that I’ve come to love. The eerie blacks of the rock formations, the deep blues of the Atlantic Ocean, the whites of the sea foam and sand, and the greens that cover the coastline.  
 

 
The only way to truly replicate the vivid depth of these tones was by using enamel on the dial surface. Not too dissimilar to the grand feu method of enamelling, the enamel used on the Sennen uses a mixture of enamel glaze and fine glass compounds, which are repeatedly applied, heated and polished to achieve a perfect finish. The enamel provides the rich colours and the glass provides a shine comparable to the sun reflecting off the ocean. All of these different elements, weighted and balanced to perfection, finish off the classic yet modern design of 'The Sennen'.  
 


 
This laborious project has taken me four years to complete, the necessary amount of time to create a watch in which every component is custom designed. From the unique case and lugs right down to the hand-placed indexes and Assegai inspired hands, every part of the Sennen was been pored over until it was perfect. 
 


 
You might find similar, but you will not find the same design features on any other watch. This is what truly makes the Sennen a special, unmatched timepiece.  
 
THE MOVEMENT 
The Sennen is powered by the Swiss-made calibre: STP1-11, an exquisite movement, specially selected for its thinness and quality. 

 
The STP1-11, at only 4.6mm, is one of the thinnest automatics on the market, allowing the Sennen to remain incredibly slim with a case thickness of 10.4mm, or 11.7mm with the double-domed sapphire crystal. This ensures it sits extremely well on the wrist, without being at all cumbersome.
The STP1-11 is a high precision movement that operates at 28'800 vibrations per hour, 4 Hz and offers a 44-hour power reserve. The movement has a Perlage finish, and the rotor has a Côte de Geneve finish engraved with the Firle logo.   
 


 
 
THE STRAPS   
 All of our Sennen Automatic watches come with either:
1. A faux crocodile print leather strap (genuine leather)  or 
2. A smooth Italian leather strap (genuine leather)


 
 
THINKING OF ADDITIONAL STRAPS?   

 
VINTAGE COWHIDE STRAPS (sold separately)
The Sennen Automatic can also be beautifully paired with our Vintage Cowhide Straps, which are designed to show signs of ageing and distress -perfect for giving your watch a rugged look and feel. A characteristic I am personally fond of. Please note these are not included with the watch but can be ordered separately.
Available in Cognac (pictured on the left) and Light Brown (pictured on the right).  
 


 
 
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS


 
 
PACKAGING​ 

 
We believe the initial presentation of your watch is extremely important. We also felt if we built something well enough, you would want to keep it – which is a more sustainable approach.
Our presentation boxes are crafted from veneered Oak and MDF.  The inside of our boxes are lined using a luxury grey felt and are stamped with our gold foil Firle logo.
Firle watches come with a beautifully illustrated user guide and a 2 or 5 warranty card.
We wanted to take a more sustainable route with the rest of our packaging – our strap boxes, user guide, warranty card, shipping boxes, packaging tape and labels are all 100% recyclable.
Our promise to reduce as much plastic as possible is implemented all along the way: our watches don’t arrive with dust stickers and our packaging filler and label pouches are also all 100% biodegradable/compostable.     
 

 
 
WARRANTY
Firle watches are made to last long into the future.
The Sennen Automatic timepieces have been made using the highest quality components and materials by our rigorous and skilful manufacturers.
Firle Watches are guaranteed against any manufacturing defects for a period of 24 months from the date of purchase. Please note the warranty does not cover any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal use, lack of care, negligence, accidents, incorrect use of the watch and non-observance of the directions provided by Firle Watches.
No. 001 WARRANTY
No. 001 Sennen Automatics come with an exclusive 5-year warranty.
All Firle watches will be personally inspected before shipment and will be accompanied with a Firle warranty card.
 
 
OUR STORY 

 
“For four years I have been tirelessly working to make this dream a reality. I believe I have achieved my goal of an exquisite, expertly crafted watch and an honest brand.”
 
In recent years, the watch industry has become oversaturated with supposed minimalist, ‘Bauhaus’ inspired quartz watches featuring low-cost and low-quality components. Consumers are, understandably, drawn to these watches because of affordability -a factor not commonly found in the watch industry.
Many of these brands centre around extravagant marketing, which promotes affluent and idealistic lifestyles that are simply unattainable for the average consumer. The visions fed to customers do not match their brand offering.
I have to admit; I was fooled by this too. However, I soon realised there was a much more beautiful and honest way of doing things, which would honour the essence of watchmaking.
After taking a closer look at the watch industry, I realised there was a massive gap in the market between the low-cost, low-quality offerings and the exorbitantly priced, good-quality brands.
This pushed me to start thinking about the sort of watch that the industry was lacking.
I was inspired by the need to create an honest and timeless brand, incorporating world-class components of highly complex mechanics, yet which falls into an affordable price bracket.
Through my research, I became infatuated with mechanical movement. I firmly believe that mechanical watches are the only timepieces worth owning. A smooth sweeping second hand on the surface and an intricate marvel of interactions going on within the watch case that completely capture the imagination. I have dreamt about designing and creating a truly exceptional timepiece that does not represent a symbol of grandiosity but is a testament to the true art of watchmaking.

Orders to the UK and most European countries will be shipped using Royal Mail's Tracked and Signed service. Once posted, delivery should take between 2 to 10 days. Tracking numbers will be provided.
STRAPS - Individual straps will be shipped via Royal Mail. Once posted, delivery should take between 2 to 10 days
REST OF THE WORLD
Items with a value above £380 will be shipped via UPS Express Saver. Once posted, delivery should take between 3 to 10 days.  Tracking numbers will be provided.

Due to COVID-19, please note you may experience delays. Before ordering, please also check whether your country has any restrictions or suspensions currently in place.

story:
Road Safety Glasses.

Have you ever been on a long drive, perhaps in the dark.. Your eyelids getting heavy, you've opened a window, turned up the music, and still you've drifted over on to the rumble strip having dozed off at the wheel?
You are not alone! Research suggests that as much as 20% of the 268,527 road accidents on main roads in the U.K are sleep related, with 40% of those accidents involving commercial vehicles. The figures for the U.S.A are slightly more harrowing with 60% of adult drivers – about 168 million people – saying they have driven a vehicle while feeling drowsy in the past year, and more than one-third, (37% or 103 million people), actually falling asleep at the wheel! In fact, of those who have nodded off, 13% say they have done so at least once a month. Four percent – approximately 11,000,000 drivers – admit they have had an accident or near accident because they dozed off or were too tired to drive.
We are here to try and help those statistics, and if we all come together and back this project, we could potentially reduce the number of sleep related collisions making the roads not only safer for ourselves but for future generations.
Road Safety Glasses are the new and safe way to manage long drives giving you peace of mind in the knowledge that should you close those eyes, you'll hear an alarm to keep you alert and focused on your journey. Thus helping you to avoid becoming yet another sorrowful statistic.

What We Need & What You Get

We need you to help us by backing this project and encouraging your friends and family members to do so too.

This will allow us to further develop the product and pay for the design and production of plastic injection mould tools.

You will receive and be one of the first to own a set of Road Safety Glasses.


The Impact

We truly believe that this product could save hundreds of thousands of lives across the world.

Your pledge could make this product a reality and you would have contributed to saving those lives.


What's the Risk?

The technology involved in this product is relatively basic by today's standards and already well proven in many other applications.

We have selected 'Fixed funding' which means that if we don't reach our target goal then you don't part with a penny.

If we get enough pledges, we can make it happen!


What next?

Once we've got enough backers, we'll get your feedback on the design, colours and function. Then once we are happy and we've produced the design you all like the look of, we'll start production and ship out your set of Road Safety Glasses.
