story:
As we think, there is no one in the world, who figured out, what a smartwatch should be.

First of all, we have got an idea! We haven't made any prototype, yet. But we believe, that we can do it. You can check below, who we are.

We think, a true smartwatch should be still a WATCH. A watch with physical face, true hands and beautiful look. It should last years, and works at least couple of days. Classic look and couple of smart functions - this is the key. We don't need another device for browsing/gaming/writing/talking and consuming. It should be really extension, which should seamlessly connect with our other devices (phones/computers etc). We plan to create interfaces for iOS/Android/Windows and web interface to sync watch without the phone around.

We are starting this campaign to get funds to speed up our research and prototyping. If we will succeed with fully working prototype, we will start to raising funds for production start. 

We have called it be-watch, because it will BE a WATCH, in first place,


Below You can see some of first attempts to create a model.



Our Dream. 

Below You can see, what is our DREAM.

A Watch is a jewelery. There are some companies, that seems to understand this. Unfortunately most of smartwatches are simply ugly.

Creating hybrid watch face, with e-ink display below, extended by classic watch face materials, will allow to make extraordinary looking watch.

Maybe we can use many materials to create watch... 

 From the beginning we were excited to project a device, which will seamlessly integrate with Your life. 

Technology.

We want it to look like a watch. And most of all; we want it to show the hour! Instantly. A watch MUST provide its name function. And it should work as long as classic watch. 

Raising your wrist couple of times to see an hour? Blaaaah...

First, It MUST BE a watch! Second: it can do smart things.

Our smartwatch will last for years and will always look great, never geeky or childish. 

 Actual trend shows, that producers want to give us little smartphones on our wirsts. Fact is, that We need only limited information at such small screen. There is no need to change layout of watch hands, if there is a beautiful one. We be There is no need to display distracting information. We need classic look with smart extensions for Your smartphone.

 Our device will work with every smartphone... But, thanks to standards, it will also work with any Bluetooth enabled cellphone!!!

 Physical elements allow us to achieve extremly long battery time in non smartwatch mode. High resolution e-ink display allow us to achive up to 10 days with enabling full smartwatch capabilities. High resolution e-ink display will provide You extremely natural user experience.

In addition You can use built in physical compass and physical watch hands stopwatch.

 Incorporation of modern technologies allow to do it even more classic. Wireless charging and Bluetooth Low Energy Communications makes perfect combination with classic look.

Classic, elegant look.

We did some research, and we think, we can achieve constructing a device, which will be classic elegant and great functioning. The final price shouldn't be too high. We suppose it will be about 399USD

Standard look, standard compliant. 

 And of course, it should fit any standard watch band on the market (or almost any)

Watch extensions and crown controll.

We want You to see data most important for You. Using crown to steer the smartwatch is most classic way to interact with.

The main and only input device is crown. It has perceptible jumb (like in old fashion mouse wheel) and allow You to switch between face extensions and navigate within.

 Built in extensions contains calendar, incoming calls, last calls, e-mails, weather forecast, alarm and stopwatch. 

 The be-wat.ch will tell You, who is calling. It will vibrate and illuminate as You want. Around the watch face there will be a led circle, which can glow any color You want. 

 With one simple gesture You will be able to reject a call.

 More extensions.

Our idea is, that there will be extensions available through our open web API, which allow Your watch to to display any notifications You want.

Fitness.

What would be a smartwatch without fitness.

Our product can track Your walking, running and sleeping, and provides You great silent alarm, which synchronizes with Your sleep cycle.

Around the watch face there will be a led circle, which can glow any color You want.   With one simple gesture You will be able to reject a call.  More extensions.Our idea is, that there will be extensions available through our open web API, which allow Your watch to to display any notifications You want. Fitness.What would be a smartwatch without fitness. Our product can track Your walking, running and sleeping, and provides You great silent alarm, which synchronizes with Your sleep cycle.

story:
Packing and protecting valuables and travel necessities has never been so easy.

Hundreds of millions travel each year by air, rail, land and sea. Until now, packing and protecting valuables, toiletries and other travel necessities meant placing most (if not all) items into a bag where they are loose, can break, or are difficult to find.  Liquids spill and soil other articles, and sometimes, leak through the bag onto clothing and other travel items. Added to that, is the need for several bags because toiletries and other necessities won’t fit into just one bag or case.

Introducing the Travel Chest, a brand new way to pack, organize and protect valuables and necessities during travel and at home (a product of “My Favorite Things By K. Louise™.”).   With this innovative product category in the luggage industry there is:

  • No more wrapping bottles to keep them from breaking or cracking. 
  • No more travel items scattered inside the suitcase or lost in a bag.  
  • And most importantly, no more having to pack several bags to accommodate all needed toiletry, health, grooming, and beauty products.


The Travel Chest is built to last.

Its name, Travel Chest, infers that it's more than just a travel case or bag.  It’s a premier travel system that provides the space and convenience of organizing and packing important travel valuables and necessities for both long and short trips.  The Travel Chest makes the packing and travel experience easy and complete.

The Travel Chest prevents liquids from spilling, and all items from shifting, breaking, cracking or being crushed during every mode of travel.  Compared to existing travel cases or bags marketed today, the Travel Chest holds both trial/travel-sized items, as well as some full-sized items.  Deep compartments allow items to stack and stay secure during transport. 

The chest is made of a lightweight ethylene vinyl acetate (EVA) material, is durable, has waterproof properties, is stress-crack resistance, and when full, can weigh between only 3 and 7 pounds depending on contents.

The removable foam insert is made of an expanded polyethylene (EPE) material that is flexible, durable, cushioning and has a high-load capacity.  Other characteristics include impact, bacteria, mold, grease, chemical, oil and solvent resistance. It is soft enough to provide flexibility, but dense enough to provide cushion for even the heaviest of items.  It can also hold up to extended periods of moisture.


Attractive, stylish and can be custom designed

The Travel Chest currently comes in two sizes (large and small) which fit conveniently in any size luggage. 

There are nine popular colors and patterns that match most luggage sets sold in the world today.  However, corporations, organizations, schools, athletic teams and other institutions can order the Travel Chest in their custom colors and designs with quantities of 500 or more. 



The removable foam insert comes in six colors to accent the outer chest for added style and customization.

And for that extra special touch, personal monograms, corporate logos, school mascots, as well as family crests can be added for ultimate in customization.                   

               


Users and uses of the Travel Chest

The Travel Chest can be enjoyed by men, women and children of all ages who travel by air, rail, land or sea.  Some uses include:

  • Gifts for all holidays and special occasions
  • Dorm rooms and showers
  • Corporate giveaways
  • Purchase giveaways (e.g., RV sales, packaging for multiple-item gifts, etc.)
  • Professionals whose work requires overnight stays (e.g., firemen, medical)
  • Long-haul and short-haul truck drivers
  • Sleepovers
  • Gym, spa, pool, beach or park
  • Traveling athletic teams
  • Camping, boating, recreational vehicle trips
  • Daily use in home bathrooms
  • Home use to protect valuables

One of the greatest benefits of using the Travel Chest is that it is an amazing space saver. It takes up little space in a packed suitcase.  It can hang in an opened or closed position from any door handle, closet rod  or shower rod.  It can sit neatly on a bathroom countertop or shelf.  Or it can sit in a dorm room or in a tractor trailer sleeper in a small area.


Competitors of the Travel Chest

  A toiletry case or bag of some kind is used by passengers regardless of their mode of transport.  While travel cases and bags come in a wide variety of sizes, shapes, colors, and styles, their basic purpose is to hold toiletry and sundry items for everyday health, grooming and beauty needs.  The most common competitors of the Travel Chest include the:

                                                                 


Use of contributions to the Travel Chest campaign

Contributions to the Travel Chest campaign will provide funding for a product that gives travelers the best organization and protection of their packed valuables and necessities. There are many options on the market today for packing toiletries, however, they don’t provide the added protection and organization as the Travel Chest.

To bring the “My Favorite Things By K. Louise™” Travel Chest to market, I am seeking contributions totaling $150,000.00 USD (one hundred and fifty thousand dollars) to build inventory for sales via the company website, retail and Amazon.com, for licensing agreements, marketing, branding, as well as funding for packaging and distribution.  The Travel Chest has been issued a provisional utility patent by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO), and we will be applying for full patent protection in the U.S. and internationally.

Quantity discounts are the main perk of the Travel Chest.  This includes discounts for families who travel and carry individual luggage, traveling employees, and other groups and organizations.  As a bonus, every 100th Travel Chest ordered receives one free.  Customized MFT luggage tags and/or a MFT engraved nickel-plated key charm is added to each order.

Passenger travel in 2014 in the U.S. included over 640 million by air, 252 million by rail, 410 million by bus, 20.3 million by sea, and over 16.7 billion miles traveled by road.*  And according to trade group, Airlines America, air travel for the summer 2015 alone will reach over 222 million. For each passenger a bag or case was used.  (*Sources: U.S. Department of Transportation and Amtrak at September 2014)
 

Risks and challenges to consider

The Travel Chest is designed by Tetrafab Custom Cases in Floyd Knobs, Indiana and manufactured in China.  The foam insert is manufactured by Clark Foam Products Corporation in Bolingbrook, Illinois with a plant in Louisville, Kentucky.  The assembly and distribution are conducted in Bolingbrook, Illinois.  Foreseeable risks and challenges could include manufacturing or shipment delays.


Our promise to each contributor

U3I will go above and beyond the call to ensure that Travel Chests are received as promised.  One way to mitigate delays will be to have shipments made in smaller quantities in order to receive as many as possible in shorter time frames.  Also, if necessary, use air shipping.

With regard to quality control, Tetrafab’s promise:

“We pride ourselves on a 100% satisfied client base. Our impeccable quality control is a major contributor to our reputation as an industry leader in custom case design and production. Our QC team is on-site at the plants inspecting both the raw materials, and finished products to a military standard ensuring that zero defect products are delivered to our customers. If a single issue is found in an inspection sample, the entire production run gets checked by hand because we are fully committed to perfect quality.

Our average customer relationship is more than eight years, and we are proud of that. Our dedication to quality is one of the reasons why we enjoy such a high client retention rate. We 100% guarantee that you will be satisfied with our custom cases. That’s our promise, our mission statement, and our oath to each and every one of our customers.”

U3I will conduct an additional inspection on each Travel Chest to ensure that zippers open and close properly, the body has held its shape, foam insert fits securely, rubber feet are properly adhered, the handle, hook and inside pocket are secure, and all hardware is connected properly. 

In reference to Clark Foam Products Corporation:

"A company dedicated to fabricating foam products for many industries since 1951.  As then, Clark Foam is now a leader in new foam products, innovative cutting techniques, and computer designed foam products that are more efficient and at less cost to a wide spectrum of manufacturers.

We started this century at a new 80,000 square foot facility in Bolingbrook, Illinois and added 35,000 square foot facility in Louisville, Kentucky with state-of-the-art cutting equipment that can produce intricate shapes and sizes in a wide variety of foams, blended rubber and vinyls, natural sponge rubber, and synthetic fiber."


Other ways you can help

U3I understands that there are less expensive and viable solutions for transporting valuables and toiletries, and the Travel Chest (while appropriately priced) is slightly more expensive than the shower caddy or other toiletry bags.  If this is not a solution for you, please use your social media and other contacts to let your family, friends and associates know about the Travel Chest.  This could very well be the travel solution they’ve been looking for.  Indiegogo share tools can also be very helpful.


Thank you very much for your attention and interest in the “My Favorite Things By K. Louise TM”  Travel Chest.  Your contribution is greatly appreciated.  Also, please keep checking our website for new products coming soon.


About 

“My Favorite Things By K. Louise TM”

My name is Kimberly Johnson, owner of Universal. Innovative. Intelligent, Inc. (U3I – Universal), a marketing and management consulting firm and creator of the “My Favorite Things By K. Louise™” Travel Chest.  The Travel Chest is the only one of its kind for organizing and packing travel toiletries, health and grooming items. The Travel Chest is the first of many products to be created by U3I – Universal. 

I have over 25 years of business and marketing development expertise in both the public and private sectors.  I am a published author and an instructor in entrepreneurial training and workforce development.  My expertise includes the creation, implementation and institutionalization of programs and processes that have proved invaluable to corporations, government agencies, and individuals throughout the country that I’ve had the opportunity to serve.  My education includes a Master’s Degree in Strategic Communications, a Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, and an Associate’s Degree in Telecommunications.

I sincerely appreciate the opportunity to introduce the Travel Chest to the world, and look forward to providing the best service possible.  Please visit our website at www.myfavoritethings-u3i.com for more information.

story:
Time Line

                       FAQ

1.     I am not really a tech person, is it hard to set up heart rate watch  by myself ?
You don't need to worry about! Set your watch is a piece of cake! Only need according to our instruction set
2.   Can be used on rainy days?
Rest assured! Our heart rate and heart rate watches are waterproof
3.    We are doing what sports can use this heart rate watch and heart rate belt？
Our products can be used in various kinds of sports. (if you have a heart pacemaker, please do not wear our products)
4.   The battery can use how long?
Watch battery can use more than one year, the heart rate with battery can be used more than 6 months.
5.   Heart rate belt and heart rate watches with a connection to the stable?
Heart rate belt and heart rate watches the connection is to use the radio technology, it can save electricity, transmission and more stable
6.    What are the functions of each key
We have a manual, made a detailed description of the function of the us, can clear to understand the use function of products ………….
7.    Does product  come with a warranty?
Yes! watch and belt  comes with a one year free warranty starting from the date of shipping. Your watch and belt warranty covers all defects in material and workmanship, except the following:

- Damage caused by accident, misuse, abuse, disassembly, unauthorized modification or neglect.
- Damage resulting from failure to follow instructions contained in your instruction manual.
- Damage resulting from the performance of repairs by someone not authorized by our company.
8.     If I have other questions, who should I contact?
As a backer, we understand you may have questions and concerns for watch and belt, and we are happy to help answer them!

We are currently receiving a lot of inquiries, but we make sure to try our best to respond to you as fast as possible! Please contact kevin-manager@outlook.com  with any questions you might have.
9.     When can I get watch and belt ?
Dear backers, we know you are excited about receiving your  watch and belt, and so are we! Under the current manufacturing plan, we estimate the very first 2800 sets  watch and belt  will begin shipping in June and all others will roll out as quickly as possible after this initial shipment. Please stay tuned for any future updates. We will make sure to keep you in the loop!
10.      Does heart rate belt and heart rate watch ship worldwide?Need to freight?
 Yes! We ship heart rate  belt and  heart rate watch  globally. Shipping cost is free in the globally
11.    Can I get a refund?
During our live campaign on Indiegogo, you can modify, upgrade, or cancel your contribution at any time by going to the "My Contributions" tab of your Indiegogo account. To request a refund, please follow these steps ( https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367 ). Once the campaign has finished its initial live phase, all requests for modifications, upgrades, or cancellations to your contribution will be considered on a case-by-case basis and can be sent to kevin-manager@outlook.com
12.    Can I return or exchange the product after the purchase?
A: Sure thing! If you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, you will have 30 calendar days to return or exchange heart rate belt and heart rate  watch  from the date you received it. If you found defects in material and workmanship. Please contact kevin-manager@outlook.com

P.S.: Please note that our return or exchange policy does not cover the damages caused by accident, misuse, abuse, product modification or neglect.

story:
For the vertically gifted.




We're excited to announce we've been working hard developing a new range of wardrobe essentials for the vertically gifted. As always, fit is king. The entire range is designed specifically to fit a tall frame so you can feel comfortable, stand tall and look great. We've included all the essentials for any tall man's wardrobe and built them to last using the very best quality fabrics we can find. With no visible branding, each piece offers a smart casual look that can be worn casually, socially or even to the office.



Premium wardrobe staples for the vertically gifted.




Simply claim a perk.



You can claim as many as you like, including store credit for larger orders.


We'll email you back with your coupon code within 48 hours.



..and that's it!

You can use your coupon code at our website whenever you're ready.


Delivery is estimated for December 2016.








"Great tees:These are fantastic, super long just as described and the quality is all there. Would be great to see long sleeves (with extra length in the sleeves), more colours, maybe henleys or something. Looking forward to seeing what you guys produce in the future and a big thanks from Australia!" 
– Jordan W.


"Perfect for ladies, too: Finally found a slim tee with length! Great fit and super comfy. I'm 5'8" and the XS is perfect. For a baggier fit, I'd go up a size."
– Julia W.


"Certified dope: Love the Tallboys gear. I'm 6'9" with a muscle build. I like shirts that are a bit on the tight side so I went with a large button down. Fits perfectly!"
– Gregory G.


"Amazing: Fitted. tall. amazing."
– Marc H.


"Great Tshirt: This is a very nice length since I'm very tall."
– Richard B.


"Great: I have bought a few very comfy and good quality delivery took awhile but that might be because of uk delivery but definitely worth the wait would definitely recommend to friends and family."
– Andrew L.

"Perfect fit: Like the title states. I'm 6'6 about 195lbs and the large shirts fit perfect. Typically I'd wear an extra large shirt and It would be still to short and to wide. The tallboy t in large is nice and fitted and a perfect length." 

– Dean C.


"Glad I found Tallboys: I'm looking forward to my son's reaction to getting tshirts that actually will let him raise his arms without baring his belly button! That will fit him properly as opposed to an extra large tent. Also, I'm looking forward to seeing what you come up with for styles. Thanks Tallboys!"  
– Gavina L.


"Love the t-shirts: Go a large v-neck in white and black, and have 4 more of each on order. They fit great (6'4", 210 lbs), and I never have to tuck them in."
– Ken P.


"Mikey looks most handsome: Will not be the last Tallboys garment he will wear. Great gear."
– Tony D.



"Awesome Fit: Finally a shirt that fits me! I'm 6'3" 165 lbs. And shirts were always to short or to big everywhere I looked. Thanks for catering to the tall athletic people..."
– Andrew B.


"Gift Voucher: Perfect present - thank you. Gave it to the birthday boy just today. He was VERY happy. Not sure if he will buy straight away or wait for the new range."
– Gina C.









Available in Crew and V-Neck

The original Tallboy Tee offers the best fit for the tall man. Unlike regular T-shirts that are usually too short or too wide, they are specifically designed to complement a tall frame and encourage great posture. With long wear in mind, they are made with comfort stretch fabric designed to maintain shape wash after wash.


Fit
Made with extra body length, you can say goodbye to the awkward exposure of the male midriff for good. They also feature slim sleeves and a fitted chest, to keep you looking proportioned.


Fabric
The cotton fabric contains a small amount of spandex providing a 'comfort stretch'. This allows for a slim fit design with an unrestricted range of motion and avoids stretching out of shape after repetitive use and washing.


Design
Tallboy Tees are not only designed to fit, but complement a taller frame. The unique shape creates a proportioned look so you can feel comfortable, stand tall and look great. 

See further below for sizing and dimensions.




Tallboy Sweaters are specifically designed for a tall physique and built to last. The fabric is thick, soft and treated so it won't pill. Each section is tailored and shaped to fit in a way that feels comfortable and encourages great posture. With no visible branding, they layer well with jackets and coats.

Fit
Featuring longer length and longer sleeves, we just dare you to try and shrink this bad boy in the wash. The crew neck collar is made from durable rib fabric that will maintain shape after extensive use. The sleeves are slim fitting and comfortably hug the arms.

Fabric
We take durability seriously. Tallboy Hoodies and Sweaters are made with anti-pilling treated fabric. 'Pilling' is the formation of small balls of fibers that can gather on the surface after extensive use and washing. This treatment stops this from ever happening so your hoodie stays looking fresh wash after wash.

Design
The body length and neck opening are designed to pair seamlessly with a Tallboy Tee and the upper back panel is doubled to square off the shoulders. Free of any visible branding, they also layer well with coats and jackets.

See further below for sizing and dimensions.




Tallboy Hoodies are specifically designed for a tall physique and built to last. The fabric is thick, soft and anti-pill treated. Each section is measured and shaped to fit in a way that feels comfortable, looks fitting and encourages great posture. With no visible branding they layer well with jackets and coats.

Fit
Featuring longer length and longer sleeves, we just dare you to try and shrink this bad boy in the wash. The hood is larger and sits taller for an unrestricted range of motion. Sleeves are slim fitting and comfortably hug the arms.

Fabric
We take durability seriously. Tallboy Hoodies and Sweaters are made with anti-pilling treated fabric. 'Pilling' is the formation of small balls of fibers that can gather on the surface after extensive use and washing. This treatment stops this from ever happening so your hoodie stays looking fresh wash after wash.


Design
We take a different approach to design to create a look that complements a taller frame. The inner pocket is lifted, allowing the wearer to comfortably rest their hands while maintaining an upright posture. To create a proportioned look we have doubled the upper back panel to square off the shoulders. 

See further below for sizing and dimensions.




Tallboy Short Sleeves are the everyday versatile wardrobe staple. With no visible branding, they are suitable for formal settings or to be worn casually. Designed for durability, they are made with 100% cotton to ensure ultimate comfort and breathability. Featuring long length, slim sleeves and a fitted chest, Tallboy Short Sleeves fit like a glove and encourage great posture.

Fit
Say goodbye to ill-fitting shirts designed for the masses. Tallboy Short Sleeves are specifically designed for tall men. We take a different approach to design to create a look that complements a taller frame. The longer length and tall collar create a proportioned look. Sizes come in both slim and regular, because there's no such thing as one size fits tall. We want you to feel comfortable, stand tall and look great!

Fabric
Our shirts are made with pre-shrunk cotton so you don't get a nasty surprise after you wash it. Free of polyester, the shirts offer superior breathability so you can stay comfortable regardless of the season. We select our fabric with durability in mind to ensure it continues to look great wash after wash.

Design
The versatile, single pocket short sleeve shirt is a wardrobe essential. With no visible branding they are suitable for a professional setting, but equally as fitting with a pair of shorts for casual wear.

See further below for sizing and dimensions.




Tallboy Button Downs are the everyday versatile wardrobe staple. With no visible branding, they are suitable for formal settings or to be worn casually. Designed for durability, they are made with 100% cotton to ensure ultimate comfort and breathability. Featuring long sleeves, long length and a fitted chest, Tallboy Button Downs fit like a glove and encourage great posture.


Fit
Say goodbye to ill-fitting shirts designed for the masses. Tallboy Button Downs are specifically designed for tall men. We take a different approach to design to create a look that complements a taller frame. Featuring longer sleeves, longer length and a tall collar to creating a proportioned look. Sizes come in both slim and regular, because there's no such thing as one size fits tall. We want you to feel comfortable, stand tall and look great!

Fabric
Our shirts are made with pre-shrunk cotton so you don't get a nasty surprise after the first time you wash it. Free of polyester, the shirts offer superior breathability so you can stay comfortable regardless of the season. We select our fabric with durability in mind to ensure it continues to look great wash after wash.

Design
The timeless, single pocket button down shirt is a wardrobe essential. Stylistically cut for a casual look but long enough to be tucked in for formal occasions. They look great under a blazer, or simply with a pair of jeans. The buttoned down collars hold shape and eliminate the need for ironing. Bonus.

If after having a look at our sizing guide and dimensions you are still unsure about the right size for you, please do not hesitate to comment here or message us on Facebook. 




All perks are redeemable as store credit at www.TallboysApparel.com where you can select your size, colours, delivery method and delivery address.

If the crowdfunding goal is not reached, some styles and colors may not be available.

Discounts are rounded down to the nearest dollar.





Total: $39000

This is a simple breakdown of the funds required for production and delivery. A number of costs are not included such as storage and handling, as they will be covered by Tallboys Apparel.




This timeline shows entire project schedule. We are currently in the Indiegogo Campaign phase (pink), with final delivery estimated for December 2016 (green).



As a tall boy (6'3), finding clothes that fit is an ongoing problem. Tees are always too short, shirts are often too baggy and sleeves are never long enough.

In 2013 I launched 'Tallboys Apparel' with the aim of filling this void in the market and I developed my first product, the 'Tallboy Tee'. The t-shirt was longer in length, had a fitted chest and slim sleeves. A product that vertically gifted men across the globe now know and love because of its great fit and make quality.

This year I want to bring you more Tallboys gear! I’ve worked with some incredibly talented people to re-imagine a selection of wardrobe essentials, based on the reviews and feedback I’ve received over the years. With no compromise on fabric or make quality, each piece is designed to last so you can feel comfortable, stand tall and look great.In order to manufacture the complete range of styles and colors, I'm going to need your help. With your pre-orders, we can reach the manufacturer minimums and make the Tall Basics range a reality. In return for your support, I am offering exclusive discounts on the entire collection. 

A big thank you to everyone that has supported Tallboys over the years. I couldn’t have got this far without you.

Nick Tann | 6'3





We've been delivering to customers for over 3 years now, manufactured 6 times and now stock in the US, Canada and Australia to deliver faster than ever.

Timely order fulfillment is a huge priority. Our manufacturer is ready to start production as soon as we reach our goal. With freight and fulfillment already organised, items will start to ship in December. Unfortunately we can’t guarantee the items to arrive before Christmas but if you are buying it as a gift for that tall friend/family member, we can provide you with a voucher which is redeemable on the website  for their choice of color and style. 

Delays can happen from time to time. If for any reason there are hiccups with the production or delivery, you will be the first know. As a pledger, you can expect frequent updates regarding the campaign and our progress.




Why not order one for a tall friend or family member. If you're not sure what they would like or what size they are, each perk is redeemable as a voucher that make for great gift cards.

You can still help! A simple share on facebook, shout out on twitter or post on instagram can make a world of difference. Why not tag the tallest person you know? #TallBasics




Why do you need to run an Indiegogo campaign to launch?
Tallboys has grown slowly and steadily since 2013. This year we’re offering a larger range of styles and colors, however it is simply more than we can afford to produce. We need to lock in a number of pre-orders to cover manufacturer minimums. In return for your support we are offering exclusive discounts on the entire range.​

What happens if the goal is not reached?
If the full goal amount is not reached, production will still go ahead, however some styles and colors may not be available. Conversely, if the goal amount is exceeded, new styles and colors may become available.

How do I choose my color and size?
Once you have claimed your perk, you will be issued a unique coupon code redeemable at our website www.TallboysApparel.com. Simply place your desired items in to your cart and enter in your coupon code at checkout to redeem your perk. Your coupon code will never expire and you may place your order at any time.

Will it fit me?
We’ve provided added sizing and dimension information so you can be sure of your fit before ordering. If you find you ordered the wrong size by accident, we’re happy to exchange anything for a different size, but unfortunately we cannot offer a refund for a fitting issue. So please review the sizing and dimensions carefully and feel free to contact us if you need some help!

Where is the clothing made?
The Tall Basics range will be produced by an industry leading manufacturer in Shanghai. We know what you’re thinking, China means poor quality. On the contrary - it may have been the case 20 years ago, however as the industry’s quality brands have moved their production off-shore, the demand for quality production has had to be met. Our manufacturer is managed by an Australian based business and is very experienced in producing premium menswear, with quality that speaks for itself.

Where will your clothing ship from?
We have distribution centers in the United States, Canada and Australia. The stock will be delivered directly to the distribution center from our manufacturer. Your order will then be immediately processed and delivered to your designated address. We ship worldwide (every country) from our distribution center closest to you.

When will I get my order?
Pre-orders are scheduled to ship mid-late December from their respective distribution centers (USA, Canada, Australia). Exact delivery times will vary depending on your location. We will keep you updated on the production and delivery of your order and you will be the first to know if there are any delays.

Will this arrive in time for Christmas?
We can’t guarantee delivery before Christmas but perks are redeemable as coupons on the website. We’re happy to send you a gift card to give to your loved one on Christmas Day. This makes for a great gift as they can choose their preferred color and style.

For the vertically gifted.



We're excited to announce we've been working hard developing a new range of wardrobe essentials for the vertically gifted. As always, fit is king. The entire range is designed specifically to fit a tall frame so you can feel comfortable, stand tall and look great. We've included all the essentials for any tall man's wardrobe and built them to last using the very best quality fabrics we can find. With no visible branding, each piece offers a smart casual look that can be worn casually, socially or even to the office.








Premium wardrobe staples for the vertically gifted.












Simply claim a perk.





You can claim as many as you like, including store credit for larger orders.







We'll email you back with your coupon code within 48 hours.





..and that's it!
You can use your coupon code at our website whenever you're ready.


Delivery is estimated for December 2016.














"Great tees:These are fantastic, super long just as described and the quality is all there. Would be great to see long sleeves (with extra length in the sleeves), more colours, maybe henleys or something. Looking forward to seeing what you guys produce in the future and a big thanks from Australia!" – Jordan W.




"Perfect for ladies, too: Finally found a slim tee with length! Great fit and super comfy. I'm 5'8" and the XS is perfect. For a baggier fit, I'd go up a size." – Julia W.




"Certified dope: Love the Tallboys gear. I'm 6'9" with a muscle build. I like shirts that are a bit on the tight side so I went with a large button down. Fits perfectly!" – Gregory G.


"Amazing: Fitted. tall. amazing." – Marc H.



"Great Tshirt: This is a very nice length since I'm very tall." – Richard B.




"Great: I have bought a few very comfy and good quality delivery took awhile but that might be because of uk delivery but definitely worth the wait would definitely recommend to friends and family." – Andrew L.

"Perfect fit: Like the title states. I'm 6'6 about 195lbs and the large shirts fit perfect. Typically I'd wear an extra large shirt and It would be still to short and to wide. The tallboy t in large is nice and fitted and a perfect length." 
– Dean C.





"Glad I found Tallboys: I'm looking forward to my son's reaction to getting tshirts that actually will let him raise his arms without baring his belly button! That will fit him properly as opposed to an extra large tent. Also, I'm looking forward to seeing what you come up with for styles. Thanks Tallboys!"  – Gavina L.


"Love the t-shirts: Go a large v-neck in white and black, and have 4 more of each on order. They fit great (6'4", 210 lbs), and I never have to tuck them in." – Ken P.

"Mikey looks most handsome: Will not be the last Tallboys garment he will wear. Great gear." – Tony D.




"Awesome Fit: Finally a shirt that fits me! I'm 6'3" 165 lbs. And shirts were always to short or to big everywhere I looked. Thanks for catering to the tall athletic people..." – Andrew B.





"Gift Voucher: Perfect present - thank you. Gave it to the birthday boy just today. He was VERY happy. Not sure if he will buy straight away or wait for the new range."– Gina C.

story:
Women shouldn't be constrained by their clothes. 


We change venues, moods, and sizes. Why shouldn't our clothes change with us? 


We can help women declutter and lighten their closets in a tangible way, while lightening the psychic weight that 'stuff' can cause as well. 

Funding this campaign will put this magic little garment into production and start helping more women lighten their lives. 

It's important we think about what we consume and this little garment that can be worn 15 ways helps remind us that we can use things we already have and don't need to accumulate more. 


Why Karma Trik? 

Have you ever had a non-stop day that started at the gym/yoga studio, went straight to work and meetings, then to cocktails and dinner? 

Have you ever packed your suitcase to the gills and kicked yourself at the end of the trip because you barely wore 1/2 of what you packed? 

I'm no stranger to these scenarios but I found a way to fix them.

I am a mom, yoga teacher, fundraiser, amateur aerialist and I'm always looking for ways to reduce the amount of stuff I have. I love to express myself through fashion but most days can't be bothered to pick out new clothes. 

I love that the Karma Trik is 1 simple item that can be worn 15 ways, allowing us to express our mood and adjust to our surroundings in seconds. It lightens our closets, our suitcases, and our spirits. 

The Karma Trik has no buttons, zippers, or straps that would constrain us. It fits the body and mood we are in at any moment. We don't have to fit into the Karma Trik.

 It fits us. 




Funding this campaign will scale up Karma Trik production from a kitchen floor to an employee owned co-op manufacturer in North Carolina. This will allow Karma Trik's reach to grow into retail stores. It will also allow for production of more patterns/colors, and development of more versatile products. 




give your LOVE, You get Karma Trik

  • the supply chain is set up so you will receive your Karma Trik in two months after supporting, receiving your perks in time for MOTHER'S DAY
  • the $50K goal was arrived at by believing that if 1,000 people wanted a Karma Trik, the company would have traction, a working supply chain, and then the ability to move forward with confidence into the market. Your funding goes directly into the production of your Karma Trik.
  • $50 will get you one Karma Trik
  • More fun offers detailed in 'Perks'
  • If goal isn't reached, your money will be refunded





Who gets the LOVE?

Why have 15 things when we can have 1? Living simply has become the goal of many mindful, eco-conscious citizens of the world. 

Gandhi said, "Live simply so that others can simply live." The Karma Trik is made responsibly on a sustainable supply chain. The fabric is made using 15 recycled plastic bottles that were collected in Haiti. 

With child labor, sweat shops, and overseas production responsible for so much of the fashion industry, it is critical to me that the Karma Trik be made in America by adults being paid fairly. 

I took sustainability as a core mission right to the fabric source and partnered with Thread. A Certified B Corporation, Thread makes fabric from bottles collected from the streets and neighborhoods of Haiti and Honduras. Those bottles are collected, processed into flake, and then shipped to the US where it is made into fabric - supporting a network of over 3,500 income opportunities.



shake & kiss...

...the dice. 

This campaign will help clarify whether or not the product is right for market as is or whether I need to iterate. I'm ready to evaluate this objectively and move forward accordingly. If I learned anything at MIT, it was to listen to what users want and answer their needs. If the Karma Trik doesn't solve the problem of too much stuff by lightening your load with its versatility, I will reevaluate and listen to your feedback. 

I am totally confident in the supply chain and my partners. So I will listen to you to make Karma Trik the best it can be. 

you love this, but ....

you can't contribute now. That's cool, check out the perks and see that there's even a $3 option. You can still help by sharing this campaign with your friends. 


15 ways to ROCK your 

KARMA TRIK




We will contact you when campaign ends to collect your color and sizing choices.

Have you ever packed your suitcase to the gills and kicked yourself at the end of the trip because you barely wore 1/2 of what you packed? 
I'm no stranger to these scenarios but I found a way to fix them.
I am a mom, yoga teacher, fundraiser, amateur aerialist and I'm always looking for ways to reduce the amount of stuff I have. I love to express myself through fashion but most days can't be bothered to pick out new clothes. 
I love that the Karma Trik is 1 simple item that can be worn 15 ways, allowing us to express our mood and adjust to our surroundings in seconds. It lightens our closets, our suitcases, and our spirits. 
The Karma Trik has no buttons, zippers, or straps that would constrain us. It fits the body and mood we are in at any moment. We don't have to fit into the Karma Trik.
 It fits us. 






Funding this campaign will scale up Karma Trik production from a kitchen floor to an employee owned co-op manufacturer in North Carolina. This will allow Karma Trik's reach to grow into retail stores. It will also allow for production of more patterns/colors, and development of more versatile products. 






   give your LOVE, You get Karma Trik  the supply chain is set up so you will receive your Karma Trik in two months after supporting, receiving your perks in time for MOTHER'S DAY
the $50K goal was arrived at by believing that if 1,000 people wanted a Karma Trik, the company would have traction, a working supply chain, and then the ability to move forward with confidence into the market. Your funding goes directly into the production of your Karma Trik. $50 will get you one Karma Trik More fun offers detailed in 'Perks'
If goal isn't reached, your money will be refunded











Who gets the LOVE?
 
Why have 15 things when we can have 1? Living simply has become the goal of many mindful, eco-conscious citizens of the world. 
Gandhi said, "Live simply so that others can simply live." The Karma Trik is made responsibly on a sustainable supply chain. The fabric is made using 15 recycled plastic bottles that were collected in Haiti. 


With child labor, sweat shops, and overseas production responsible for so much of the fashion industry, it is critical to me that the Karma Trik be made in America by adults being paid fairly. 

I took sustainability as a core mission right to the fabric source and partnered with Thread. A Certified B Corporation, Thread makes fabric from bottles collected from the streets and neighborhoods of Haiti and Honduras. Those bottles are collected, processed into flake, and then shipped to the US where it is made into fabric - supporting a network of over 3,500 income opportunities.




   shake & kiss...
...the dice. 
This campaign will help clarify whether or not the product is right for market as is or whether I need to iterate. I'm ready to evaluate this objectively and move forward accordingly. If I learned anything at MIT, it was to listen to what users want and answer their needs. If the Karma Trik doesn't solve the problem of too much stuff by lightening your load with its versatility, I will reevaluate and listen to your feedback. 
I am totally confident in the supply chain and my partners. So I will listen to you to make Karma Trik the best it can be. 
   you love this, but ....

you can't contribute now. That's cool, check out the perks and see that there's even a $3 option. You can still help by sharing this campaign with your friends. 


15 ways to ROCK your 
KARMA TRIK






We will contact you when campaign ends to collect your color and sizing choices.

PAINTINGS you can wear / Personalised  Models

I will personally create your dream clothes painted with your favourite flowers, destinations, landscapes, your portrait or anything else from your imagination!

Available in:  

  • PERSONALISED clothing 1 (hand painted and embroidered dress) -  $545
  • PERSONALISED clothing 2 (hand painted and embroidered blouse) -  $344
  • PERSONALISED for kids 1  (hand painted and embroidered clothing for kids 8-12 years) -  $230

SIZE guide

When ordering please select your size and height in the drop down menus.

 

 

By the way, if you feel that the standard clothes size will not fit you perfectly, please add a sewing custom order perk ($25) and message me on Facebook  specifying your detailed body dimensions. My team will adjust your item with the highest precision.

______________________________________________________

 

CARE Instructions

Hand wash gently with cool water, and lay flat to dry. Gently iron using a protective cotton fabric at medium heat.

 

______________________________________________________

 

DELIVERY Dates

The first shipments of manual painted clothes will be in December 2016, when the printed models will be shipped starting March 2017.

______________________________________________________

Sooner you place your order, sooner I will start working on your unique clothing!

 

Irina MADAN

I'm a young fashion designer working on my dream... I continuously merge fashion with art painting and traditions by creating unique clothes full of passion, feelings and beauty. I call my creations "wearable paintings", because each created clothing is intended to host one of my paintings.

 

ART Technique

Each clothes starts from a white cotton canvas which is painted with special waterproof colours. Some clothes models are completely covered by my paintings. In order to guarantee the highest painting quality I use pre-coloured cotton tissues only if the customers require this.

 

The painted fabrics are manually sewed and decorated with natural laces, coloured buttons or pieces of synthetic leather, and some of them are manually embroidered.  All clothes have full or half lining with quality fabric. The dresses are completed with a zipper on the back and are extremely easy to dress up.  

 

 

BRAND's International Recognition

My collections are inspired from European art motifs and traditional embroideries. Those collections were highly appreciated at fashion events in Donetsk, Strasbourg, Paris and London, and those appreciations, combined with continuous happy customer’s feedback from overseas, drive my enthusiasm and dedication in dressing my paintings.

For more video and interviews visit my YouTube channel or Facebook page. 

 

Fashion and Art ATELIER

A big part of the raised funds from this campaign will go for opening an international fashion atelier. I dream to create a place where young talented artists and designers will meet and help me on designing your future personalized and handmade clothes. 

 

High Quality PRINTED MODELS

The creation of one complex hand painted clothes can take more than 2 weeks. It is why I would like  to create a high quality printed version of my models and make the wearable art more affordable. My paintings will be printed on cotton canvas which will be manually sewed and some of them hand embroidered after.

The second part of the raised funds will be for the development of those printed models and of the high quality printing technique.

 

Art and Fashion LOVERS

You would like to see more of new wearable art in the future, but you cannot order one of the models right now? You can support my campaign by buying an Art and Fashion Lover Voucher for 5$ or just by sharing this campaign on Facebook and Instagram.

I will offer you a $20 Voucher for your future orders if you share this campaign https://igg.me/at/WearArt with your friends!  

More than that, add the hashtags #WearArt and #IrinaMadan in your public post and get the chance to win this hand painted and embroidered blouse! 

______________________________________________________

©Irina Madan ​

_______________________________________________________ Accessory #7 Hand Painted Hat​Available in:  Hand PAINTED accessory 2 -  $58   _______________________________________________________ PAINTINGS you can wear / Personalised  ModelsWould you like to feel even more unique and dress in personalized and colourful clothes, painted manually by myself and signed with my artist initials? Then, you just need to add one of the personalised clothing orders and message me on Facebook  describing what the ideal painting and clothes look like for you.I will personally create your dream clothes painted with your favourite flowers, destinations, landscapes, your portrait or anything else from your imagination!Available in:  
PERSONALISED clothing 1 (hand painted and embroidered dress) -  $545 
PERSONALISED clothing 2 (hand painted and embroidered blouse) -  $344
PERSONALISED for kids 1  (hand painted and embroidered clothing for kids 8-12 years) -  $230 
PERSONALISED for kids 2  (hand painted and embroidered clothing for kids 0-7 years) -  $130 
                                                     _______________________________________________________ SIZE guideWhen ordering please select your size and height in the drop down menus.  By the way, if you feel that the standard clothes size will not fit you perfectly, please add a sewing custom order perk ($25) and message me on Facebook  specifying your detailed body dimensions. My team will adjust your item with the highest precision.______________________________________________________ CARE InstructionsHand wash gently with cool water, and lay flat to dry. Gently iron using a protective cotton fabric at medium heat. ______________________________________________________ DELIVERY DatesThe first shipments of manual painted clothes will be in December 2016, when the printed models will be shipped starting March 2017.______________________________________________________Sooner you place your order, sooner I will start working on your unique clothing! Irina MADANI'm a young fashion designer working on my dream... I continuously merge fashion with art painting and traditions by creating unique clothes full of passion, feelings and beauty. I call my creations "wearable paintings", because each created clothing is intended to host one of my paintings. 
ART Technique
Each clothes starts from a white cotton canvas which is painted with special waterproof colours. Some clothes models are completely covered by my paintings. In order to guarantee the highest painting quality I use pre-coloured cotton tissues only if the customers require this.
 
The painted fabrics are manually sewed and decorated with natural laces, coloured buttons or pieces of synthetic leather, and some of them are manually embroidered.  All clothes have full or half lining with quality fabric. The dresses are completed with a zipper on the back and are extremely easy to dress up.  
  BRAND's International RecognitionMy collections are inspired from European art motifs and traditional embroideries. Those collections were highly appreciated at fashion events in Donetsk, Strasbourg, Paris and London, and those appreciations, combined with continuous happy customer’s feedback from overseas, drive my enthusiasm and dedication in dressing my paintings.For more video and interviews visit my YouTube channel or Facebook page.  Fashion and Art ATELIERA big part of the raised funds from this campaign will go for opening an international fashion atelier. I dream to create a place where young talented artists and designers will meet and help me on designing your future personalized and handmade clothes.  High Quality PRINTED MODELSThe creation of one complex hand painted clothes can take more than 2 weeks. It is why I would like  to create a high quality printed version of my models and make the wearable art more affordable. My paintings will be printed on cotton canvas which will be manually sewed and some of them hand embroidered after.The second part of the raised funds will be for the development of those printed models and of the high quality printing technique. Art and Fashion LOVERSYou would like to see more of new wearable art in the future, but you cannot order one of the models right now? You can support my campaign by buying an Art and Fashion Lover Voucher for 5$ or just by sharing this campaign on Facebook and Instagram.I will offer you a $20 Voucher for your future orders if you share this campaign https://igg.me/at/WearArt with your friends!  More than that, add the hashtags #WearArt and #IrinaMadan in your public post and get the chance to win this hand painted and embroidered blouse! ______________________________________________________©Irina Madan ​

story:
Carabiner Eyewear 

We are looking for trend-setting, sporty, outdoorsy contributors like you to fund our Carabiner Sunglasses campaign. Please consider backing us -- and don't worry, we'll tell you why: 

  • Innovative, inventive, and useful product
  • Patented, sleek design
  • One-of-a-kind carabiner component
  • Quality lenses
  • Proven company track-record
  • Functional, purposeful, utilitarian, and fun
  • ... and we are the only carabiner shades allowed on the market, due to our exclusive patent!

Carabiner Eyewear presents Carabiner Sunglasses for the outdoor lifestyle.

Carabiner Eyewear presents our new Carabiner Sunglasses: perfect for the outdoor lifestyle!

The functional and innovative design is not only patented by our inventor and CEO Sam Shapiro — it’s already been implemented, licensed, and sold under the Columbia Sportswear  sporting goods brand.

The thing that makes Carabiner Sunglasses unique is literally in the name: a built-in carabiner.

"What’s a carabiner," you ask?

A carabiner is basically a D-shaped metal ring with a spring catch on one side. And our sunglasses have one built in to them, unlike any other sunglass on the market today!

We’ve all seen the carabiner keychains. And in their most common usages, carabiners are used for climbing, grappling, fishing, boating, and mountaineering. While you yourself can’t hang from our awesome built-in sunglass carabiners (duh!) — you can use our carabiner to hang your Carabiner Sunglasses just about anywhere they'll fit! 

Pretty amazing, if we do say so ourselves. And we do say so. 

So did Columbia Sportswear.

We hope you agree!

This patented clip design makes it easy for busy, active people everywhere to hang your sunglasses from your belt loop, fisherman's vest, beach bag, gym tote, duffle bag, laptop bag, bicycle, keychain, hunting gear, household hooks, shirt straps, or backpack. (Basically, just about anywhere!)

Our innovative carabiner design isn’t all we have to offer, either: the fit is great, and the lens technology is top-of-the-line in terms of glare reduction and polarization for your outdoor lifestyle. Our CEO Sam Shapiro has a proven track-record when it comes to leading successful brands like Eye Deals Eyewear and Paws N Claws Eyewear, among others. As we said: he even licensed this patent to Columbia Sportswear, an international sporting goods brand. You'll learn more about Sam, our company, and our product's quality, below.

We are currently offering three color choices in our unisex Carabiner Sunglasses: black on black, electric blue, black, and grey, and dark brown with gold accents. 

Sunglass Size: 64-17-125. 

Tough stuff for tough people.

Durable, lightweight, and high-quality. That just about sums up our Carabiner Sunglasses. The sleek wraparound design is a style staple in athleisure wear and it's a must-have for all sporty types whether you're camping, fishing, hunting, running, or taking photos. But the quality of the frames and lenses is top-notch, too.

Our lens technologies feature a hard coat, 100% UVA and UVB blocker, and the polycarbonate lenses come in multiple colors with more soon to come. They are polarized with anti-glare technology. These polarized lenses are also high-definition, enhancing color and contrast while protecting those precious eyeballs! 

The frames are awesome, too. We will feature double-injected molding with soft-rubbered temple tips and nice, strong nose padding for security and comfort during high-intensity activities. (Or just while lounging at the lake.)

Choose from three color combos: all black, black/grey/blue, or brown and gold.

Outdoor enthusiasts -- and those who just enjoy a good pair of sunglasses -- may love our wraparound style and quality lenses, but the key selling point is in our special, patented carabiner design (protected by US Patent #7,938,533.) The exclusive built-in carabiner permits men and women on the go to clip sunglasses just about anywhere for easy access and storage. 

Don't lose your sunglasses ever again!

It’s just that simple. Clip ‘em and go.

With Carabiner Eyewear, you won’t have to worry about misplacing those darned sunglasses anymore!

Whether you’re surfing the beaches of Malibu, hiking the Appalachian trail, camping in Yosemite, birdwatching in Pennsylvania, fishing at your local pond, or being a tourist in your own city, Carabiner Sunglasses utilize a mindful, purposeful design that is well-suited for people on-the-go. 

From photographers and rock climbers to campers, hunters, fishers, beachgoers, dog-owners, busy parents, absentminded teens, truck drivers, obstacle race competitors -- and even American Ninja Warriors like our friend and brand model Mike Shuck (pictured below,) Carabiner Sunglasses are a design you can cling to!

At the pool? Clip 'em to your tote bag. Need a break from snowboarding? Hang them while you enjoy a drink at the ski lodge. Clouds setting in while you fish? Clip 'em to your tackle box or your fishing vest. Busy people need useful things to help them stay organized while living everyday life -- whether that everyday life involves bouldering, book-worming, big game hunting, or beach-going.

There is a huge market out there just waiting to be served their next pair of quality-crafted, sensible sunglasses for the fit and functional, outdoorsy life.

There are about:

  • 50-million fishermen in the U.S.
  • 6 million climbers.
  • 12 million skiers.
  • 41 million campers.
  • 15 million boaters.
  • 331 million people who visit national parks each year.
  • 145 million Americans who participate in outdoor recreation each year.
  • Countless folks who misplace their shades.

And 37 different brands that sell carabiners for fishing and climbing.

We're just the first brand to do it for eyewear.

Listen, the outdoor industry is booming. We're going to be part of that and we want you to join us. Let's make the great outdoors great again!

Consumers spend about $887 billion annually for outdoor recreation. This has generated 7.6 million jobs in 2016, plus $65.3 billion in federal tax revenue in recent years, and $59.2 billion in state and local tax revenue -- and these figures are annual!

But ... full disclosure? You don't even *have* to be an active, outdoorsy person to love our shades ... you just have to be someone who is sick of misplacing your go-to sunnies! 

#Truth.

Do you really need another pair of sunglasses? Yes. You do.

People need sunglasses. People like sunglasses. (And, in fact, about 25% of Americans use the internet to purchase their sunglasses, just like we're urging you to do today!)

There's a solution for every need -- and losing these valuable sunglasses, well -- theres' a need there: a problem to be solved. Everyone loses their sunglasses now and then. Now, with Carabiner Sunglasses, it's much easier to keep track of them! 

And, well ... if you still worry you'll lose them, our consumer-friendly price point is low enough that you can purchase a backup pair or two. Or three. Just in case. 

(Hint: they also make great gifts!)

Please “hang” with us and support our campaign today!

Your donation will go towards finishing product design and development, helping with our marketing and fulfillment costs, continuing our website development, brand expansion, keeping up with inventory and production, and developing new products in the Carabiner Eyewear family, as well as new colors of Carabiner Sunglasses.

We already have a prototype and a patent (US Patent #7,938,533!)  — we just need YOUR help to bring the Carabiner Sunglass brand to new heights! Let's reach peak performance, together! Don't worry about hunting for your sunglasses anymore. We've got you covered.

Please back us today and be one of the inaugural trendsetters to own a pair of Carabiner Sunglasses.

Company background:

For more than 30 years, Eyewear Inventions/Eye Deals Eyewear, based out of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, has established a reputation of integrity, limitless creativity, energy, and the highest standards of quality, sales, and customer service in the eyewear and optical industry.

Founder and CEO Sam Shapiro is a longtime eyewear expert when it comes to product design and development. This particular (and unique!) style of eyewear was created after Sam noticed that his son would (somewhat annoyingly) seem to lose all of his belongings … including sometimes-pricey sunglasses.

Sam knew there could be a solution to this problem. Thus, Carabiner Eyewear was born with a goal to create affordable unisex eyewear with a catch: these well-crafted sunglasses are harder to misplace, and easier to store.

Also under the Eyewear Inventions and Eye Deals Eyewear family tree umbrella is the successful animal-loving sibling brand, Paws N Claws Eyewear. Paws N Claws' fashionable eyewear is created with animal-lovers and pet owners in mind. Paws N Claws Eyewear's  business-savvy and passion for animals shines through in its array of eyewear and accessory designs, including its new OptiPets eyewear holders. Their giving spirit, love for pets, and successes in sales are apparent in their charitable contributions to the ASPCA, which have totaled over $60,000 since the brand’s creation in 2011.

Carabiner Eyewear is the newest brand to join the Eyewear Inventions family and will launch with the presentation of Carabiner Sunglasses, with readers and safety glasses to follow, plus additional color choices for our sunglasses. So get your Carabiner Sunglasses today and be sure to stay tuned for more to come. 

Whodunit?

We have to give a big "thank you" to the team of dedicated folks on the Carabiner Eyewear team who helped to get this campaign off the ground. From the inception and patenting of the idea, to the design and development of the Carabiner Sunglass product, and now the cultivation and implementation of our inaugural Indiegogo campaign, it took a lot of time and effort to get this aspirational idea to finally be launched.

And so, we want to salute:

  • Head honcho:  CEO, President, and Inventor, Sam Shapiro
  • Queen bee: Owner and Office Manager,  Phyllis Shapiro
  • Wordsmith: Social Media Coordinator, Campaign Manager, and PR, Ashley Boynes-Shuck
  • Image wizard: Creative Director and Graphic Designer, Heather Herczak
  • Camera guy: Photographer, Matthew Shuck
  • Brand ambassador: Model, Mike Shuck 

Much gratitude goes out to you all for your tireless efforts in helping Carabiner Eyewear to reach new peaks with our first product, Carabiner Sunglasses. We hope that the public will join us in recognizing your hard work. It couldn't have been done alone!

Most of all, thank you all who have taken the time out to learn about Carabiner Eyewear, and thanks to our new trend-setting patrons who will be among the first to rock the awesomely amazing Carabiner Sunglasses.

PS: Our eyewear is Ninja Warrior approved. Mike Shuck from Seasons 8 & 9 on NBC's American Ninja Warrior enjoyed his Carabiner Sunglasses while staying active in Hilton Head Island, SC.

Learn More About Carabiner in this Quick Video: 

 
So easy to use!
 
 

PATENT INFORMATION:

Carabiner Eyewear™ is a registered and patent-protected product. US Patent #7,938,533

From photographers and rock climbers to campers, hunters, fishers, beachgoers, dog-owners, busy parents, absentminded teens, truck drivers, obstacle race competitors -- and even American Ninja Warriors like our friend and brand model Mike Shuck (pictured below,) Carabiner Sunglasses are a design you can cling to!
At the pool? Clip 'em to your tote bag. Need a break from snowboarding? Hang them while you enjoy a drink at the ski lodge. Clouds setting in while you fish? Clip 'em to your tackle box or your fishing vest. Busy people need useful things to help them stay organized while living everyday life -- whether that everyday life involves bouldering, book-worming, big game hunting, or beach-going.
There is a huge market out there just waiting to be served their next pair of quality-crafted, sensible sunglasses for the fit and functional, outdoorsy life.
There are about:

50-million fishermen in the U.S.
6 million climbers.
12 million skiers.
41 million campers.
15 million boaters.
331 million people who visit national parks each year.
145 million Americans who participate in outdoor recreation each year.
Countless folks who misplace their shades.

And 37 different brands that sell carabiners for fishing and climbing.
We're just the first brand to do it for eyewear.
Listen, the outdoor industry is booming. We're going to be part of that and we want you to join us. Let's make the great outdoors great again!
Consumers spend about $887 billion annually for outdoor recreation. This has generated 7.6 million jobs in 2016, plus $65.3 billion in federal tax revenue in recent years, and $59.2 billion in state and local tax revenue -- and these figures are annual!
But ... full disclosure? You don't even *have* to be an active, outdoorsy person to love our shades ... you just have to be someone who is sick of misplacing your go-to sunnies! 
#Truth.

Do you really need another pair of sunglasses? Yes. You do.
People need sunglasses. People like sunglasses. (And, in fact, about 25% of Americans use the internet to purchase their sunglasses, just like we're urging you to do today!)
There's a solution for every need -- and losing these valuable sunglasses, well -- theres' a need there: a problem to be solved. Everyone loses their sunglasses now and then. Now, with Carabiner Sunglasses, it's much easier to keep track of them! 
And, well ... if you still worry you'll lose them, our consumer-friendly price point is low enough that you can purchase a backup pair or two. Or three. Just in case. 
(Hint: they also make great gifts!)

Please “hang” with us and support our campaign today!
Your donation will go towards finishing product design and development, helping with our marketing and fulfillment costs, continuing our website development, brand expansion, keeping up with inventory and production, and developing new products in the Carabiner Eyewear family, as well as new colors of Carabiner Sunglasses.
We already have a prototype and a patent (US Patent #7,938,533!)  — we just need YOUR help to bring the Carabiner Sunglass brand to new heights! Let's reach peak performance, together! Don't worry about hunting for your sunglasses anymore. We've got you covered.
Please back us today and be one of the inaugural trendsetters to own a pair of Carabiner Sunglasses.


Company background:
For more than 30 years, Eyewear Inventions/Eye Deals Eyewear, based out of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, has established a reputation of integrity, limitless creativity, energy, and the highest standards of quality, sales, and customer service in the eyewear and optical industry.
Founder and CEO Sam Shapiro is a longtime eyewear expert when it comes to product design and development. This particular (and unique!) style of eyewear was created after Sam noticed that his son would (somewhat annoyingly) seem to lose all of his belongings … including sometimes-pricey sunglasses.
Sam knew there could be a solution to this problem. Thus, Carabiner Eyewear was born with a goal to create affordable unisex eyewear with a catch: these well-crafted sunglasses are harder to misplace, and easier to store.
Also under the Eyewear Inventions and Eye Deals Eyewear family tree umbrella is the successful animal-loving sibling brand, Paws N Claws Eyewear. Paws N Claws' fashionable eyewear is created with animal-lovers and pet owners in mind. Paws N Claws Eyewear's  business-savvy and passion for animals shines through in its array of eyewear and accessory designs, including its new OptiPets eyewear holders. Their giving spirit, love for pets, and successes in sales are apparent in their charitable contributions to the ASPCA, which have totaled over $60,000 since the brand’s creation in 2011.
Carabiner Eyewear is the newest brand to join the Eyewear Inventions family and will launch with the presentation of Carabiner Sunglasses, with readers and safety glasses to follow, plus additional color choices for our sunglasses. So get your Carabiner Sunglasses today and be sure to stay tuned for more to come. 

Whodunit?
We have to give a big "thank you" to the team of dedicated folks on the Carabiner Eyewear team who helped to get this campaign off the ground. From the inception and patenting of the idea, to the design and development of the Carabiner Sunglass product, and now the cultivation and implementation of our inaugural Indiegogo campaign, it took a lot of time and effort to get this aspirational idea to finally be launched.
And so, we want to salute:


Head honcho:  CEO, President, and Inventor, Sam Shapiro


Queen bee: Owner and Office Manager,  Phyllis Shapiro


Wordsmith: Social Media Coordinator, Campaign Manager, and PR, Ashley Boynes-Shuck


Image wizard: Creative Director and Graphic Designer, Heather Herczak


Camera guy: Photographer, Matthew Shuck


Brand ambassador: Model, Mike Shuck 


Much gratitude goes out to you all for your tireless efforts in helping Carabiner Eyewear to reach new peaks with our first product, Carabiner Sunglasses. We hope that the public will join us in recognizing your hard work. It couldn't have been done alone!
Most of all, thank you all who have taken the time out to learn about Carabiner Eyewear, and thanks to our new trend-setting patrons who will be among the first to rock the awesomely amazing Carabiner Sunglasses.
PS: Our eyewear is Ninja Warrior approved. Mike Shuck from Seasons 8 & 9 on NBC's American Ninja Warrior enjoyed his Carabiner Sunglasses while staying active in Hilton Head Island, SC.

Learn More About Carabiner in this Quick Video: 

 
So easy to use!
 









 

PATENT INFORMATION:
Carabiner Eyewear™ is a registered and patent-protected product. US Patent #7,938,533

story:
The fact that the best friends of the girls are diamonds, today everyone knows. Although in fact very few people really think about the benefits associated with the acquisition of diamonds. Thus, the most obvious advantage of such an acquisition is that you can not imagine a better gift than a diamond. Such a gift will win the heart of a loved one or make an impression on a business partner. And in any case, the presented diamonds will tell you about your taste, generosity and serious attitude. When buying diamonds, you get the opportunity to become the owner of exclusive jewelry and spend 2 or even 3 times less money than you have to pay when buying jewelry in the store. The quality of the diamond that you bought separately will exceed the quality of the stones displayed in the shop window in the form of jewelry. Finally, diamonds are long-term and reliable investments.  

Goals and opportunities.

We have assembled a professional team, have come a long way in acquiring knowledge and experience in this field. Thanks to your support, we will be able to organize a modern process for processing precious stones, improve technological processes.

 

Direct interaction with suppliers and buyers will allow us to reduce the cost of production and make diamonds affordable. Support our project and become the owner of a registered discount card with a 10% discount in our company.  

 

Costs for the implementation of this project.
1. Lease of manufacturing premises for a period of one year. -30000 $.
2. Acquisition of equipment for production. - 20000 $.
3. Wage fund for one year. 25000 $
4. Communal payments for one year. -3000 $
5. Development and promotion of web resources. - $ 5000
6. Purchase of raw materials. 30000 $
7. Travel expenses. $ 7000
Total: 120000 $.

Terms of implementation.
10/01/2017 - 10/10/2017.
Payment of equipment, conclusion of an agreement with landlords.
Beginning of the development of the Internet resource (boarding shop).
10/10/2017 - 25/10/2017.
Installation of equipment. trial run.
10/25/2017 - 10/11/2017.
Internet resource test.
Supplies of raw materials.
11/30/2017  100% production start.

About company.  

The company was registered in the UAE in a free trade area, the necessary documentation was obtained for the work. This allows you to reduce the tax burden, simplify the interaction with raw materials suppliers and buyers of our products (imports, exports), allows you to trade around the world, reducing costs.

 

About us:

 

 

Alexey Nikolaenkov, 34 years old. Work experience - 7 years. My powers and responsibilities: Fast, consultative, coordinating and financial work, management of administrative enterprises, management of all reporting functions, creation of effective organizational structure of the enterprise, management and contract work, budget planning.

Alexander Dobrin. 37 years. Work experience - 14 years. Main responsibilities: Methodological direction of the technological group, Management of a group of 50 people, Ensuring production of products in accordance with the requirements of the technical process, technical conditions and standards. Organization of the work of the technological group. Quality control of performance, determining the final result. Control technology of processing of rough diamonds, planning production volumes and consumption of raw materials, with a view to planning the volume of supplies.  

Natalia Stolz. 38 years. Experience 9 years. Main obligations: Realization of marketing policy development at the enterprise, analysis of consumer properties of products and forecasting of consumer demand for products, technical and other consumer qualities of competing production. Drawing up long-term and current plans for production and sales of products, identifying new markets. Coordination of the activities of all functional units for the collection and analysis of commercial and economic information, the creation of a data bank for the marketing of enterprise products (purchase orders, production contracts, availability of stocks, market capacity, etc.) .The study of consumers' opinions on products that are enterprise. Implementation of the management of the dealer service and its provision with all necessary technical and advertising documentation.

 

We appreciate all the help that we can get. For those who can not make a monetary contribution: Share our campaign with your social networks and in your social circles.

Thank you very much for taking the time to study our project.

story:
Hey Indiegogo! 

Meet Ace and Cup “The most unlikely friends”.  At last, the most beautiful, cutest, colourful unicorns created in a land far away called Mystiopolis, have combined with the softest, comfiest slipper design ever made! 

These Enchanting designs created for both Children and Adults combine to show everyone is beautiful in their own way. 

Ace an energetic, colourful, talkative soul is quite the opposite of his best friend Cup who is shy and a quiet sort of guy. Their opposite personalities and aesthetic look are pretty clear but one thing they both share is their undeniable cuteness in the form of slippers and Plush toys! 

DESIGN PROCESS  

Where do we start!? Our super cute designs started as simple pencil drawings and soon grew into colourful full sketches. We then spoke with a number of manufacturers to convey our designs (Conveying that cuteness is no easy task). We also shortlisted the companies we know can produce in a consistent manner and provide the necessary testing certificates such as CE.

 

Great for all Occasions

 

Sleeping

Chilling

Playing Around having fun 

 

The Magic is in all of us.

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

Size Guide

OUR PROMISE

We promise no matter how many emails we get we will reply to all of them within 72 working hours. I think this is very important to pledge to you guys/gals and for us to uphold because as a customer of Indiegogo I often got frustrated with the total lack of communication from projects.  

We do not just want to be a one-hit wonder as we have many more ideas that we truly believe you are going to love. As such we want to provide not only a five-star product but also a five star service .We promise to be totally transparent with everyone no matter if the news is negative or positive. Let’s make this magic come to life just before Christmas!

ALL SUPPORTERS PLEASE NOTE

We have so many more great photos but we didnt want to flood the page with to much unicorn magic because we dont think Indiegogo servers could Cope! Please follow our Facebook and Instagram page for more photos and love!

Instagram-https://www.instagram.com/aceandcup/

Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/AceandCup/

Also-All backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees.
