story:
What Is Jeenger

Jeenger is made of a diverse set of folks with curious mind. We are keen to use technology and simplicity to improve overall quality of life of people worldwide. 

 95% (~7 billon) of people in the world are effected by poor posture. Jeenger, a simple - yet technologically-advanced t-shirt - is designed to help gradually improve posture and resulting quality of life. Designed with ultra-light embedded sensors, Jeenger provides comfort and helps you enjoy your day while effortlessly enhancing your posture! 

With your support of our funding campaign - by ordering a Smart T-Shirt for yourself or those you care about, Jeenger will make an outsized impact on the human well-being!

 

How It Works

 

We developed our product with two goals in mind: efficiency and simplicity. The Smart T-shirt has embedded sensors and a smart chip. An intuitive application helps you track your progress and compete with friends.

Bluetooth connection allows you to easily setup the chip: a short tap on the chip turns it on and a 3-second tap will shut it down. Sensors and the chip are two parts of one solution and work together. The chip takes measurements of the posture (information from the sensors)  every 5 seconds. When you slouch, sensors are stretching out, sending the signal to the chip. If you do not come back to upright position within 10 minutes - the gentle vibe (supplemented by an app notification) will remind you to mind the posture. If you correct your posture before 10 minutes pass, the chip starts taking measurements in the normal regime. 

Yes, it is exactly that simple.

 

How It Is Better

Our solution is more advanced than that of our competitors. Most devices out there have an inbuilt two-axis accelerometer that measures deviation from correct posture in vertical dimension only. Jeenger Smart T-shirt has a reversed T-shaped panel of conductive ink sensors that measure deviation from correct posture in both vertical and horizontal dimensions.

This makes our technology  more precise and smarter: it catches more variations of bad posture than the available posture trackers. And visa versa - Jeenger will not disturb you when your posture is good even if you are not in vertical position, for example, when you are exercising. For better understanding, let’s take a look at these examples: 

Jeenger Smart T-shirt is more than a personalized high-precision posture correcting device. First and foremost, it is a comfortable t-shirt! Designed on material you'll love, our t-shirts are about to be essentials that you would want to wear everyday, with a focus on modern design, enduring style and top-notch quality. Jeenger has merged fashion and technology.  

 

Who We Are (Our Team)

We are a team of four. Together, we have all the expertise and experience to reach the project goals: engineering, marketing, fitness&health, business administration, finance, and entrepreneurship:

  • Tetiana: IESE MBA Class 2019, entrepreneur, lawyer, posture expert
  • Cedric: PhD, engineer, researcher, entrepreneur
  • Alexander: private equity investment manager
  • Owen: IESE MBA Class 2019, project director, business development and strategy manager

Clearly, it is not only four of us, but many other talented and passionate people who have helped and us during this journey. No one succeeds alone. And as a Thank-You, we imprinted names of Jeenger supporters on our logo. All two hundred sixty names. We thank each&everyone of you!

 

Where We Are & What We Need

After two years of product development, three prototypes, and fifty beta-testers, we are ready to finalise our Smart Posture T-shirt design and go into production! An early stage hardware startup is an existing yet costly journey, and to bring Jeenger to life we need your help.

With this Indiegogo campaign, we aim to raise EUR 35,000. We will use these funds to finalise the smart chip design and manufacture the first batch of the Smart T-shirts for our backers. 

 

Get Yours Now 

1. Click Back this Project: Select the available reward you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click on the pictures below. You can also make a donation of ANY amount without claiming the perk!

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment won't be effective until the very end of this campaign.

3. Select your size, style and indicate your shipping information.

 

Why We Do What We Do

About a year ago, we were asked by one of our colleagues: What would we want Forbes magazine to feature about our startup in a few years? Our answer was - and still is: We want it to write that we helped millions of people become healthier and happier. Yes, at Jeenger, we are aggressive about our ambition. 

 

Risks & Challenges

As with any venture, and especially true for a Indiegogo campaign, there is always a risk. We are committed to keeping you informed of our progress during the campaign and after it. With your support and our skills, commitment and enthusiasm, we're very confident that we'll get to the finish line and deliver your Smart T-shirt to your doorstep. As with all Indiegogo projects, some risks are inherent to the process. Please follow our updates here, and read the Indiegogo guideline.

Sharing is Caring

Thank you for being a part of our incredible journey to bring Jeenger to life! Please help us to make some noise about Jeenger campaign and tell your friends about us (you can use Indiegogo sharing tools in the top right corner of this page). Together we can make a difference!

Thank you for being a part of our incredible journey to bring Jeenger to life! Please help us to make some noise about Jeenger campaign and tell your friends about us (you can use Indiegogo sharing tools in the top right corner of this page). Together we can make a difference!

story:
relax baby be cool

Established by Estonian-born mother and daughter creative duo, the unique, upcoming label fuses an assortment of colors and themes inspired by the hidden corners of the World.  The project is a  collaboration between textile laborers that go back generations, enthusiastic futurists and helping hands which prove to be instrumental in the overall craftsmanship that defines Relax Baby Be Cool. Tailor-made, using only high quality materials and mixing them with fabrics that carry in them stories and legends further contributes to the modern touch and exceptional quality that makes Relax Baby Be Cool what it is today.  

 

         

 The first Batik collection 'The Empire State of Mind' was designed using printed Indonesian Batik sarongs, that are locally worn in ceremonies as well as in every-day life. Made from 100% cotton with eye-catching colors and leather detailing, crafted with cool air, impressive attention to detail, and above all, passion.

Emphasizing the importance of the prints and the history behind them, all of the pieces are accompanied by the mythical tales portraying  the beliefs, the traditions and the way of life of the lost generations.

Beautiful, striking hues and atypical patterns that are accentuated through relaxed silhouettes, no-fuss cuts, and timeless clean Northern lines reflect the label’s aesthetics.

All collections are handmade, exclusive and limited due to a definite amount of each print and color.

           
  

 

“From the henna hands in the bright stalls of Jakarta, in the torn mochila over Singapore and Amsterdam, through the blue eyes of relentless seas with Estonian roots of knowledge and experience, Sparked from a situation, ironed with love, touched by the hands of a little magic, and pushed by the mountain.”

 

                    

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our aim is to find the gems from the clutter and give them a new life. 

With the incredible flight and unexpected success, we are also experiencing the constant need to grow and expand, and to keep up with our imagination. For that, we need more hands,     more heads and more support.

We are pushing our way to the map.

 

    

 

With a bit of help we can show our appreciation for our partners in the far corners of the world, keep making great fashion and continue to spread the word.

 

             

 

'relax baby be cool' strives to keep the local craftsmanship alive and supports the growth of new generation artists. Everything has a cost tho and as much as we would love to just give away all our creations we put great stress on fair trade and equal rights. 

We are looking for more great minds to support our project and share our views.

 

       

 

We want to keep the Batik collection alive by changing patterns and designs, but keeping the legends. Currently working on our new collection, with more fabulous memoirs and myths entwined in the materials we use. The additional couture as well as ready-to-wear future capsule collections will be combined with different exotic textiles and will consist of ageless, stand-out statement pieces that have a meaning and leave an impression. We are all about seeing and creating things a bit differently.

Future plans include generating more jobs in developing countries, highlighting the importance of fair trade, introducing more unacknowledged artists and maybe even opening our own concept store.

We dream big.

In exchange for the help, we would like to share with you our favorite pieces from our Batik collection for prices you can't find anywhere else and lifelong benefits that will live as long as 'relax baby be cool'.

For smaller contributions we have handmade jewellery and accessories all created by us and in collaboration with talented artists across the globe to have a meaningful gift for each and every one of our supporters

Chose your favorite perk and feel free to get in touch in case of any inquiries.

                                   Please refer to the sizing table to find your perfect fit.                                  https://www.relaxbabybecool.com/sizing

 

The Impact

After only a year of hard work, great adventures and incredible discoveries 'relax baby be cool' has made it's way to the world stage, having been selected amongst the 20 best new up'n'coming brands at Pure London expo 2017 and made our way to the pages of the most notable fashion magazines in Estonia and across the globe, (Harper's Bazaar UK, Fabulous Magazine UK, Cosmopolitan UK, Blanc UK, S Magazine UK, Nylon Magazine UK, Chic Geek UK, Sāde Est, Investeeri Est).'relax baby be cool' has attracted the interest of fashion and beauty bloggers and artists of different backgrounds nationally and internationally (Kate Nash, Sarah Stadler,  Geoff Kooper,  Zenja Fokin, The Ulfur Ulfur band and many more) and has a steady flow of new and repeat customers around the world. 

 

                     

 

Our products are currently available online on our website as well as in Estonian designer's boutiques in Estonia. We also have a special range for all the petite ladies available on the UK's nr. 1 petite fashion platform BombPetite. 

 

                 

 

 

       

    

Who we are

Liis Boode - Founder, Designer, Creative Director and everything in between.

With a childhood spent playing with rolls of fabric in a children's wear factory run by her parents, the free-minded wanderer spent 12 years travelling around the globe before returning to her roots. Having tried her hand in countless professions, crafting and fashion were always passions she was unable to let go. Now, as a young entrepreneur with an anything-is-possible attitude, partnering up with her mother, who is also her best friend, she wants to give back and contribute to preserving the generations long textile art and ancient traditions. 

Katrin Kiho - Co-Founder, constructor, co-designer and production manager.

Co-founder and designer of the biggest children's wear manufacturing company in Estonia in the 90's, she has over 30 years worth of experience in the textile business. With the knowledge of the ins and outs of large scale garment production, a life long dedication to creating and arts, and an eye for perfection, she is behind the process of giving life to all our products. Most of the time found with scissors in her hands, she has earned the name of Edward the Scissorhand in our collective.

 

         

                                                                                                                                                                                                     With the rest of the team made up of worldwide travelers, experienced tailors and seamstresses we have built a solid base for our enterprise.  We continue to grow and wish to expand further by engaging more international specialists and the best in the business from                                        around the globe.                                  

                                       

 

Based in a tiny country like Estonia, but with nothing less than global objectives, having been invited to countless expos and shows worldwide, the sky is the limit.

 

How you can be involved

 

Be a part of our legendary journey towards uniting cultures and countries, by wearing and flaunting the mythical fashion created to stop the disappearance of great art and great minds.

We would be happy and grateful for any kind of support, be that financial, moral or just sharing our project with your best friends. 

                                           We are on a mission to keeping the folklore alive                                                                        and making this world we live in just a bit cooler.

 

Very poetic, no?

 

 

How to Donate with No Perk?

If you'd like to contribute without perks, you can simply click on the 'Back It' button. You’ll be able to enter the amount you'd like to contribute, and choose your payment method.

Please note that if you select the "Back It" button, you will only be donating funds to the campaigner, in the amount you enter. In this case, you will not have claimed a perk. If you intend to claim a perk, please be sure you choose the perk to go along with the transaction, before you complete your payment. 

When will you receive your perk?

Receiving your perk(s) often takes time! Selecting a perk as a part of your contribution is not the same thing as buying something online. The estimated delivery of perks is mentioned, and if the forces of nature are with us, we might be able to surprise you faster than that!

Please contact us directly to find out the status of your perk.

How can you change your shipping information?

If you have already contributed and need to change your mailing address or phone number, you can do so on your Order Details page. Provided the perk hasn't been marked by us as "Fulfilled" or "Order Locked," you will be able to change the address and/or phone number associated with your contribution. For full instructions, please see: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/212528078-How-do-I-update-my-shipping-address-

If a perk has been marked by us as "Order Locked," you will not be able to change your address on Indiegogo. "Order Locked" means that  we have locked your order as we've started to work on it. In this case, please contact us if you would like to change the details of this order - including editing your shipping address, or to request a refund. 

How do I select my perk details (e.g. t-shirt size, color)?

If your perk asks for you to select an option, such as a shirt size or print name, please chose an option and contact us directly with your choice. In that case we can confirm it or offer another option if your first choice has been claimed, as each piece is very limited.

Can you change your perk?

Each contribution made is recorded as a separate contribution with a separate perk. If you would like to receive a new perk, you can do this in a separate contribution. If you'd like to upgrade your existing perk or select a different perk, please contact us. 

Can you claim multiple perks?

It's exciting to hear that you've found multiple perks you are interested in claiming! Please note, at this time, Indiegogo has no feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

Looking for a receipt or invoice for your transaction?

Indiegogo sends contribution confirmation emails to the email address used to make a contribution, for each successful transaction.

If you are looking for something more specific than this, please note perks are offers made and managed solely by Us. As such, Indiegogo does not provide receipts or invoices beyond the contribution confirmation email that you should have received after your transaction.

If you would like an official invoice or receipt for your transaction, please contact us, and we will include it in the package.
story_txt:
relax baby be cool
Established by Estonian-born mother and daughter creative duo, the unique, upcoming label fuses an assortment of colors and themes inspired by the hidden corners of the World.  The project is a  collaboration between textile laborers that go back generations, enthusiastic futurists and helping hands which prove to be instrumental in the overall craftsmanship that defines Relax Baby Be Cool. Tailor-made, using only high quality materials and mixing them with fabrics that carry in them stories and legends further contributes to the modern touch and exceptional quality that makes Relax Baby Be Cool what it is today.  
 

         
 The first Batik collection 'The Empire State of Mind' was designed using printed Indonesian Batik sarongs, that are locally worn in ceremonies as well as in every-day life. Made from 100% cotton with eye-catching colors and leather detailing, crafted with cool air, impressive attention to detail, and above all, passion.
Emphasizing the importance of the prints and the history behind them, all of the pieces are accompanied by the mythical tales portraying  the beliefs, the traditions and the way of life of the lost generations.
Beautiful, striking hues and atypical patterns that are accentuated through relaxed silhouettes, no-fuss cuts, and timeless clean Northern lines reflect the label’s aesthetics.
All collections are handmade, exclusive and limited due to a definite amount of each print and color.
             
 
“From the henna hands in the bright stalls of Jakarta, in the torn mochila over Singapore and Amsterdam, through the blue eyes of relentless seas with Estonian roots of knowledge and experience, Sparked from a situation, ironed with love, touched by the hands of a little magic, and pushed by the mountain.”
 
                    
 
What We Need & What You Get

Our aim is to find the gems from the clutter and give them a new life. 
With the incredible flight and unexpected success, we are also experiencing the constant need to grow and expand, and to keep up with our imagination. For that, we need more hands,     more heads and more support.
We are pushing our way to the map.
 
    
 
With a bit of help we can show our appreciation for our partners in the far corners of the world, keep making great fashion and continue to spread the word.
 
             
 
'relax baby be cool' strives to keep the local craftsmanship alive and supports the growth of new generation artists. Everything has a cost tho and as much as we would love to just give away all our creations we put great stress on fair trade and equal rights. 
We are looking for more great minds to support our project and share our views.
 
       
 
We want to keep the Batik collection alive by changing patterns and designs, but keeping the legends. story:
Short Summary

Hey! My name Is Olivier and I'm a 17 year old student. I've always dreamt on studying in the United States but as some of you may know, the tuition is very expensive and financial aid is rarely given to foreign students. I've decided that if I really wanted to achieve my goals, I would have to get out of my comfort zone and try to do things on my own!

After one month of thinking, researching, designing and e-mailing App designers, the project is finally on it's way to become a real thing! It only needs a last thing; funding!

What We Need & What You Get

After contacting several App design companies, I've found a trustworthy brazilian App Designer called Markezure (https://markezure.com/). We've agreed on a 15.000 R$ (4.050 US$) budget for the whole app design, If this project gets funded all the money will be used to pay the app designer and for marketing of the App. Regarding marketing, I have a relative that runs a e-marketing company (https://www.gamned.com/) and would help me promote the App if it ever got funded.

If the app works (and it will) all the revenue will be used to pay for my education!

The Impact

As I said, this whole project is a mean to achieve my dream. I'm a really hard working student and I dream on becoming and engineer. Besides my dream, by funding this project you would help me become independant at an early age so that I can focus on other projects in the future!

Risks & Challenges

The main risk of making an App is not getting enough visibility. As I said, I have a marketing plan, but if it's not enough I'll do my best to promote the brand by contacting other brands and friends that run  big Instagram accounts!

However, I know what type of clients would be interested in the App and I know how to reach them.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help me by sharing this idea with your friends! Besides, you can download the App once it's out! ;)

story:
Everything starts in 2018 with a classic motorcycle and the idea of ​​customize it to create an actual design that could match functionally and aesthetically the bikes in the actual market. From the beginning this project was a challenge, each step and new process were incredibly exciting.

During those months this project became the lifestyle I was looking for, BELMONT RECLAIM and the N 63º19' motorcycle were born. Once the bike was completely finished I was very surprised to see the interest it raised, it definitely was an eye-catcher. But I wanted to go further, I had found a lifestyle I was passionate about and I wanted to share it with as many people as possible developing affordable products that could transmit the essence of the brand, this was an even bigger challenge.

I am passionate about fashion and accessories that allow us to express ourselves and externalize our personality. Coincidentally, while I was looking for accessories to capture BELMONT character, my watch, a basic model that accompanied me everywhere during 6 years, almost an extension of my body, fell to the ground and broke. It was going to be very difficult to replace it. I spent some time mourning it until I decided to look for a replacement and at that moment I saw there was a good market opportunity:

That's when, together with Aaron Cuenca (CMO), we began to investigate the market in depth and the traditional watch companies and we discovered that the structural costs could be reduced in a significant way. It definitely was a good opportunity and I put myself to capture the essence of BELMONT.

I started to experiment and evaluate design processes, production processes, different suppliers and manufacturers and, finally, I found something that could really reach my expectations and I chose the 4 watch designs that would compose the first BELMONT watches collection inspired on the N 63 º19' motorcycle based on four watch designs, and here is one them.

We developed several samples until we finally found the perfect balance between design, materials and mechanics and still maintain low product costs!!

Once we got 100% sure of the quality of the samples we ordered a small batch of our new watch designs to ran a small market test and it worked pretty well, we almost ran out of stock very quick.

Now it's time to offer you the BELMONT ASPHALT CHRONO at INDIEGOGO!

 HOW TO PROCEED

1. Click Back this Project: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment won't be effective until the very end of this campaign.

3. Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

- Wristband adjustment tool included.

With your support you will help us to fund the first production batch and in return you will receive one of our watches with ground-braking design, great quality and an incredibly affordable price.

 

By giving us your support you will be directly participating in a revolution: eliminate the added middleman costs that currently increase the final cost.

We are a small team of true adventurers that love surf, motorbikes and hiking. 

The first step we took before taking the pencil was to establish some basic objectives, the foundations on which we would structure the BELMONT collection.

The next step was to develop the design. 

Once we got the concept we started the 3D modeling.

Then we created the 2D drawings and we send them to our manufacturing partner to validate the engineering and develop the prototypes.

During the samples development we defined the technical specifications of the ASPHALT CHRONO.

Finally we could set a complete timeline defining all the steps until our backers product reception.

We have invested months of work to define and verify that the company structure is the adequate. We have also developed a very good relationship with the manufacturer of our watches, a very professional partner with experience in the industry. We have also spent months developing samples to be sure of what kind of problems can appear in the future and we have prepared a quality control plan to prevent them.

We are prepared to deal with the product shipping since we have the logistic side of the structure under control thanks to Shipius, our logistic partner has work many years hand to hand with Amazon. We have experience in the online sales because our CMO is a powerful reference in the online sales strategy sector.

We are committed to keep our backers informed all the time during production with periodic updates of the process with images of the finished parts of the product, assembly processes, etc.

If at any time there is a setback during this process and we can not comply with the schedule, we ensure to keep our backers informed.

Our goal is to create a brand that could last over the time and we will do whatever it takes to keep our promise and deliver watches that exceed your expectations.

THANK YOU!!

story:
Meet our new and improved version of the best seller CODA wallet. It is 10mm smaller,  5mm thinner, has updated design and RFID protection! The wallet is made out of full grain Italian vegetable tanned leather which is more ECO-friendly than it's previous version.

The wallet has a main compartment for bills and 4 slots for cards (each can fit up to 3 cards if needed). 

Compact and minimalist on the outside and artistic on the inside. It was inspired by origami patterns and bionic world.

 

 

Both types of wallets are covered with a RFID protectional material inlay. This inlay is a specially engineered fabric that blocks RFID (Radio-Frequency Identification) waves which thieves can intercept and steal your personal information. The shielding efficiency is 99.9%! 

 

In the production of these wallets, we use Italian vegetable tanned leather which is known for it great quality. The process of vegetable tanning uses organic material and natural tannins derived from the barks, leaves and branches of trees and plants which makes it more organic and "healthy" comparing to chrome tanned leather. Natural components of tanning will keep color of leather stay natural and it will also let the leather tan with ages and give it's own character to the wallet that it's owner has.

 

The thickness of leather, only 1mm thick, is what gave us the ability to make a thin but at the same time strong and long lasting wallet.

An emty wallet is only 9mm thick.

 

Details: 

 

 We made the wallet in 2 variations:

CODA N - narrow, 3.1/4 inches (82mm) high, is recomended for USD, AUD, CAD

CODA W - wide, 92mm (3.3/4inches) high, is recomended for EUR, GBP

 

In addition we also made a compact card holder in the same style


 

It can fit over 8 cards or some cash if needed as well.

CODA N wallet with a cardholder

Shipping

There are 15 wallets (10 of CODA N and 5 of CODA W) that we can send to the United States to be delivered before Christmas. Please note that packages to other contries may not be delivered in time for Christmas.

*packages will not include plant decor

 

After the Kickstarter campaign, a survey will be sent where you will be able to provide your mailing address. We will start shipping all of the pre-Christmas orders at the 25th of November. All the rest will be shipped right after.

Usually, shipping takes from 2 weeks for Europe, from 3 weeks for USA and Canada, and from 4 weeks for Australia and other countries. Please note that because of the busy holiday season shipping might take more than that. 

 After the shipping we will send you the tracking number of your package.

story:
Short Summary

My Name is Andres, I am an entrepreneur looking build a new fashion line. I am originally from Costa Rica and studied Business Administration / Marketing. I created MLGS Brand as new e-commerce site to sell online different clothing brands, currently under production and development.

The goal is to start generating brand awareness and sells, so when we can generate revenue to complete the fabrication  and design process of our designs along the way

The campaign is dedicated to raise $1000 to cover some expenses in our current project. This contribution will help us continue our work.

What We Need

  • Funding needed: $1000 to cover:
    • Partially cover our suppliers in Europe & USA initial Monthly Fee down payment.
    • Cover of membership fee for the e-store next month.
    • Import cloth and material samples.
  • This financial Aid will lets us continue working by our own since we will be able to cover these financial fees that has slow us down this month.
  • We are just getting started but we are extra motivated to fulfill our dream.

The Impact

With your help we will be able to do the following:

By completing our fees with our approved suppliers, we will be able to import the products need it to start selling online. With this revenue expected we will be able to stand on our own for the following years we hope.  

By having our membership cover for the next month we will at peace knowing our sales channels are going to be live while the store is know by our clients.

By importing cloth and material samples, we can start designing our fashion mockups with an more integrated and goal oriented direction.   

Risks & Challenges

We know creating a successful new fashion brand is something hard to do, specially with so many designers out there whose work is excellent,  but we are determined to do it, whatever it takes. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not donate, please just share our campaign link.

We are determined to give back, so the first 10 donors with over 50$ will get a 30% discount promo code for their first order in our store.

https://mlgsbrand.com

The website is open to see.

story:
Through the Japanese background of one of the co-founders, Benkheim&Co was able to partner with Japanese manufacturers who provided them with high-quality movements. By combining reliable Seiko movements with precise German engineering, Benkheim&Co is able to offer luxury timepieces where excellent craftsmanship meets impeccable designs.


 


For the two founders, a luxury watch was always more than just a materialistic object which tells the time. For them, a luxury watch symbolizes reliability, precision, and performance - values that are firmly incorporated in the Benkheim brand.

Academic and professional achievements always played an important role for the two founders and after two years of dedication, countless days and after work nights, Benkheim&Co is proud to finally introduce the first Benkheim watch. A luxury chronograph exclusively designed for people who are on their path to success.

Benkheim&Co is convinced that performance is enhanced by confidence. Through its highly reliable chronographs with timeless designs, Benkheim&Co seeks to be a helping hand on people's path of achieving their goals. Whether it is academic, professional or athletic performance, Benkheim wants to support you in achieving your dreams.

Through its exclusive and classic design, a Benkheim luxury watch makes you feel confident and gets you a step closer to your goals and ambitions. 

 

 

Featured in 

 

When great things happen, people write about it. Leading blogs have written about the Benkheim watch, its timeless design and customer-oriented business concept. Amongst others: 

 


Design and concept

 

This is not your regular watch. The perpetual design of the Benkheim watch has been the result of a collaboration between the founders and a leading professional designer who together have dedicated countless hours to think through, adjust and ultimately deliver a majestic design. The Benkheim watch has been uniquely designed to emit a perpetual vibe of sky-high ambitions, determination, and success.

 

 

 

Materials

"Quality means doing it right when no one is looking" - Henry Ford

 

While most watchmakers lose the majority of their margins to expensive middle-men and unnecessary side-costs, Benkheim has decided to invest in superior materials. Due to this, Benkheim has managed to build its watch out of materials previously unavailable in this price range. Next to the manually hand-selected materials used in the watch dial (picture below), the leather strap is made out of high-quality genuine calf leather and includes quick release pins.

 

 


Where you come in

 

In order to make our dream come true, we will need €15 000. The amount raised will be used to cover all manufacturing, shipping and handling costs involved. 

By backing our campaign, you will be one of the first receiving the limited edition Benkheim watch which will come with a certificate of authenticity. Next to the exceptional and temporary campaign discount of 40% (on the 199€ retail price), you will also be one of the founding investors who have made this project possible! 

The first model which we are introducing is the Benkheim Silver Blue edition. However, we have already been designing two further watches and will be making them available directly within the scope of this campaign upon reaching certain funding milestones.

Upon raising more than €20K, we will thus be able to offer you the Benkheim Silver White Edition. If our campaign funding exceeds €30K, we will be able to offer our latest design as well: the Benkheim Gold Black Edition.

All three watches are shown in the picture below. Which one is your favorite? 

 

 

 


The Benkheim Timeline

 

 

 

 

Quality Controls 

 

To guarantee that our products comply with the highest quality standards, Benkheim uses comprehensive and strict test procedures. A Benkheim watch therefore undergoes multiple quality controls during the production process. All the components are thoroughly inspected before proceeding to assembly, while movements are subject to accuracy testing. Before the watch can be shipped to the customer, all our products undergo a final control covering both visual and functional aspects.

 

 

Warranty and 14-Day return policy

 

Your Benkheim watch has been manufactured under strict quality guidelines to ensure excellent quality. Nevertheless, your watch is covered with a guarantee against any manufacturing defects for a period of two years starting from the date of purchase. Within these two years, Benkheim offers free of charge repair or replacement. 

As we want to ensure the highest degree of satisfaction to our customers, we offer a full refund within 14-days of purchase. For this, the merchandise must be in original packaging, unused and accompanied by an original receipt.

 

 

Benkheim Claudel Silver Blue Edition. 

Pay particular attention to the Italian Genuine calf leather with quick release pins.

 

 

Opportunities lie at every corner. Dress accordingly.

 

 

Close-up view of the Benkheim watch. Notice the high-quality scratch-proof Sapphire-glass with anti-reflect finish.

 

 

Dark blue represents knowledge, power, integrity, and seriousness.

 

 

What are you waiting for?

Treat yourself to an exclusive and magnificent Benkheim watch or buy it as a gift for a loved one.

The temporary 40% campaign discount makes wrist luxury affordable.

story: Shoes for your feet that feel nice
story_txt: Shoes for your feet that feel nice

story:
We’re on a mission to leave the world cooler, cleaner and fairer than we found it. That's why we craft biodegradable t-shirts and singlets that make you look and feel great. 

Made from bamboo, all of our fibers are sustainably grown on plantations owned and run by local communities in Bali and Portugal. And for each Nooboo piece you buy, we plant one tree in our sustainable Nooboo Bamboo Forest in Indonesia. 

Wake up with a fresh dip in your wardrobe and let the tailored fit enhance your natural beauty. Nooboo fashion essentials are designed for superior performance, combining modern day style and everyday good vibes. 

 

Nooboo fashion essentials are good for you, the planet and the people we share it with. All you have to do to help is simply ordering a shirt. You cool. The earth cool. Everybody cool.

Explore the world leaving no trace. Nooboo 100% bamboo basics are 100% biodegradable.

Go natural, all the way. At least, we did—even with our dyes. The coloring takes up to two weeks and but hey! It looks and feels so good.

Nooboo bamboo is not only bursting with natural goodness, it is extremely durable too. It simply lasts longer and always remains in style.

For every Nooboo piece sold, we plant one tree in our sustainable Nooboo Bamboo Forest in Ubud, Indonesia.

Bamboo grows up to one millimeter per minute and once it’s chopped down, it simply regrows. This is why bamboo plantations use only a little soil.

Take a breath of fresh air. Bamboo generates more oxygen and removes more carbon dioxide from the air than trees.

Thanks to bamboo’s sustainable nature, we are saving 3,500 liters of water per shirt. That’s the same as having 100 showers, without missing one.

Who needs fertilizers? Nooboo bamboo gets all of its nutrients and energy from the soil.

Nooboo bamboo is naturally resistant against pests. All it needs to grow is water and a daily dose of tender loving care.

Wake up with a fresh dip in your wardrobe. Nooboo fashion essentials are designed to enhance your natural beauty.

Keep your cool, naturally.  Whether you need to perform for work or play, Nooboo bamboo keeps you cool when it’s hot—and hot when it’s cool.

Whatever the day brings, Nooboo bamboo draws moisture away from your skin into the fibers, keeping you dry and in style.

Exercise in any position, at any temperature. No sweat. Nooboo bamboo absorbs three times more than any cotton does.

Smell fresh, even when you’re not. Nooboo bamboo is naturally resistant against bacteria and therefore, leaves no odor.

Let nature give you a much-needed hug. Nooboo bamboo’s soft texture feels like a second skin. 

Yes, we did your laundry. Once. But only because bamboo tends to shrink after the very first wash and we wanted you to enjoy a seamless first fit.

Nooboo bamboo works naturally for all, bringing special benefits to those with sensitive skin and allergies.  

 Enjoy the sun safely. Nooboo bamboo basics prevent 95% of UV rays coming through.

Pack like a pro. Travel like a trendsetter. Nooboo bamboo lightweight t-shirts and singlets are easy to pack, and make you look great in an instant.

Comfort zone? What comfort zone? Nooboo bamboo fibers let air pass back and forth easily. Just step up your game, and stay cool.

Our plantations are owned and run by locals. That’s how we contribute to the development of sustainable communities in Bali and Portugal.

From our partners on the plantations to the people who do the stitching and coloring: we pay fair salaries throughout our supply chain. 

 

 

 

From Amsterdam:

David de Winter - Video Director

Frank Toonen - Senior Designer

Roos Smit - Copywriter

Frank August - Designer

From Italy:

Ted Mooyman - Marketing

Ellen Huizenga - Marketing

From Bali:

Nathalie Steines - Internship

Amar de Winter - Founder

Kirsty McKie - Videography

Nooboo is a young lifestyle brand pushing the boundaries of the established fashion industry. For us, it's all about change. We need to change the way clothes are made and resources are used. That's why we seek innovation. Not just to be cool. But for the planet. And the people we share it with.  

This is where you come in. We need your help to make the world of fashion cooler, cleaner and fairer. And the good news is: all you need to do is order a t-shirt and look great. Let's make change possible. Pioneer with us. Together, we can vote for a sustainable future of fashion—and look pretty damn cool while we're at it. 

 

FREE SHIPPING WHEN YOU BUY TWO PIECES OR MORE. 

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

If you wish to exchange your Noobo t-shirts for any reason, you can—within  30 days after receiving your order. All items must be unworn and unwashed. Please understand that the (two-way) shipping costs on returns are not covered. 

Feel free to reach out by leaving a comment here or via info@nooboo.nl. 

You give us the chance to create world's first 100% bamboo collection, and we can't wait to share this burst of natural fashion goodness with you. A special thanks goes out to everybody who has put their energy in bringing this project to life. Let's spread the good vibes: from Ubud to all of you making change possible. Cheers. 

Risks and challenges

We have been in the bamboo clothing business since 2016 and built a strong relationship with our suppliers. Therefore we can guarantee the highest quality fabrics and the purest natural dyes. They have been in business for 24 years and have optimised their production process extensively. 

We have been able to build a strong supply chain and we ship from Amsterdam and Singapore which is fast and reliable. Orders via our websites are shipped the same day with next day delivery in The Netherlands. We will implement our best practices during this Indiegogo campaign and we are confident they will be punctual. 

Transparency is key. If there is anything you should know, this will be communicated via the Indiegogo updates. We have produced two sample rounds already to eliminate unforeseen circumstances. If still any issues come up, we will handle them with care for you.

Thank you so much for your awesome support and being a Nooboo brand ambassador at this early stage. Because of you this project can come alive! 

Cheers, 
Team Nooboo

story:
VIXA Superspeed is a specially designed mechanical watch that pays tribute to the legendary racer Ayrton Senna and commemorates the upcoming 27th anniversary of Senna's untimely passing.

We incorporated elements of real racing cars into the design of VIXA Superspeed, inspired especially by the race cars driven by Senna, from his 1971 PORSCHE 917K to his 1988 McLaren MP4/4. The Superspeed is a memorial and celebration of a life lived at full speed.

Senna is gone, but his legend lives on.

 

Inspired by real cars, VIXA Superspeed incorporates multiple race car elements. Its curves and angles are reminiscent of a race car’s sleek lines and its craftsmanship and intricate mechanical movement speaks to its luxury quality. It looks fast even while standing still and it lets you feel the spirit of racing and the thrill of speed every time you wear it.

 

 

With different straps and bezels, VIXA offers watch lovers the chance to customize their own VIXA Superspeed. You can personalize your watch to suit any mood and every occasion. One watch that changes with your personal style whenever you choose.

 

 

 

VIXA Superspeed watch is carefully crafted with high quality components. The case is made from 316L stainless steel and is water resistant to 10 meters and can endure extreme temperatures and high-intensity pressure.

 

  •  Sapphire glass 

Sapphire glass is known for its clarity and hardness. It is one of the hardest substances on earth other than diamond. This means it is virtually scratchproof and perfectly clear, which is why we chose it to be VIXA's crystal.  

 

  • High-tech Strap

VIXA Superspeed straps are made of a high-tech material - fluorine rubber in the bottom layer and cowhide at the surface layer. This enables wrist comfort, flexibility and extreme durability at the same time. 

 

All straps are equipped with a quick-change system, such that you can easily change the strap in seconds. 

  • 316L Stainless Steel

316L Stainless Steel is a high grade anti corrosion material and it is also the industry standard for top quality luxury watches.

 

  •  Delicate Caliber Design 

Equipped with a Miyota mechanical movement with automatic winding, VIXA Superspeed is a robust, reliable, and precision time keeper.

 

 
 
 
 

In 1935, the VIXA brand was established in the small town of Pforzheim on the northern edge of the Black Forest in Germany. It is mainly responsible for the design and production of Air Force chronographs. After nearly a hundred years of development, it has formed a watchmaking culture with independent characteristics. In recent years, the VIXA brand has adhered to high-end watchmaking standards, while integrating product quality and product culture to form a unique product style, once again entering the public eye, and many watch lovers all over the world are vying for purchases. Currently, we are working on the commemorative series [ONE MAN X ONE MACHINE] to salute the endless legend.

Click here to visit our website: https://www.vixa1935.com/
story_txt:
VIXA Superspeed is a specially designed mechanical watch that pays tribute to the legendary racer Ayrton Senna and commemorates the upcoming 27th anniversary of Senna's untimely passing.
We incorporated elements of real racing cars into the design of VIXA Superspeed, inspired especially by the race cars driven by Senna, from his 1971 PORSCHE 917K to his 1988 McLaren MP4/4. The Superspeed is a memorial and celebration of a life lived at full speed.
Senna is gone, but his legend lives on.
 

 
 

 
Inspired by real cars, VIXA Superspeed incorporates multiple race car elements. Its curves and angles are reminiscent of a race car’s sleek lines and its craftsmanship and intricate mechanical movement speaks to its luxury quality. It looks fast even while standing still and it lets you feel the spirit of racing and the thrill of speed every time you wear it.
 

  
 
With different straps and bezels, VIXA offers watch lovers the chance to customize their own VIXA Superspeed. You can personalize your watch to suit any mood and every occasion. One watch that changes with your personal style whenever you choose.
 

 

 
 
 

 
VIXA Superspeed watch is carefully crafted with high quality components. The case is made from 316L stainless steel and is water resistant to 10 meters and can endure extreme temperatures and high-intensity pressure.
 

 

 
 Sapphire glass 
Sapphire glass is known for its clarity and hardness. It is one of the hardest substances on earth other than diamond. This means it is virtually scratchproof and perfectly clear, which is why we chose it to be VIXA's crystal.  
 

 
High-tech Strap
VIXA Superspeed straps are made of a high-tech material - fluorine rubber in the bottom layer and cowhide at the surface layer. This enables wrist comfort, flexibility and extreme durability at the same time. 
 

 
All straps are equipped with a quick-change system, such that you can easily change the strap in seconds. 

 

 
316L Stainless Steel
316L Stainless Steel is a high grade anti corrosion material and it is also the industry standard for top quality luxury watches.
 

 

 Delicate Caliber Design 
Equipped with a Miyota mechanical movement with automatic winding, VIXA Superspeed is a robust, reliable, and precision time keeper.
 

 
  
 

 
  
 

 
  
 

 
  
 
In 1935, the VIXA brand was established in the small town of Pforzheim on the northern edge of the Black Forest in Germany. It is mainly responsible for the design and production of Air Force chronographs. After nearly a hundred years of development, it has formed a watchmaking culture with independent characteristics. In recent years, the VIXA brand has adhered to high-end watchmaking standards, while integrating product quality and product culture to form a unique product style, once again entering the public eye, and many watch lovers all over the world are vying for purchases. Currently, we are working on the commemorative series [ONE MAN X ONE MACHINE] to salute the endless legend.

story:
Who & What

I'm Marco, an Italian Designer based in Berlin.
I like to design but also create my ideas, I like to think "how to" and follow all the work flow from A to Z. I like to see the work in progress, when an idea become a "product".

This campaign is about my new products: clocks screen printed on wood.
A simple but stylish idea, where modern design meets the timeless aesthetic of wood. With this work flow every watch is slightly different from all the others.
This is not a serial product. It's a handicraft product.

With your help I can start to produce them and start this business and you can have a piece of design with a really big discount.

What I Need & What You Get

To start I need your contribution to raise 5000 € so I can start with a large production and I can keep prices low.
This is not only Design, It's a craft production.

Consider the print, treatment and assembling, are all Made in Berlin so is a bit more expensive than other countries in the world, but I want to keep the production local.

Visit the website:
www.ours-watches.com

Visit the website:
www.ours-watches.com



Visit the website:

www.ours-watches.com



The Impact

Reach the goal with your contribution permit me to produce them locally.
Your contribution can let me start the production otherwise I couldn't do it without your help.
With a "large" production I can stay local (Berlin) and I can keep costs low. So can get a Design product at a low price.


Risks & Challenges

I have not only the design knowledge but also the know-how for printing, wood treatment, etc... in other words I will follow the production process from A to Z.

This is a "Fixed funding", so if the goal is not reached you will have your money back.

Help Me Make It Happen

You think it's cool but for any reason you can't contribute? 
Don't worry and thank you if you can spread out or share with your friends!

And last but not the least give me your opinion about these products, what you like and want you don't like. Thank you!

story:
Hey Guys

I am a young adult who has just entered the professional world and I have realized that between work, and well work, I have had no time to go out and embrace the arts and sciences I love. In college I was given the opportunity to go out and design and create many engineering and art projects. Armed with the universities CNC Mill and 3-D Printer, I was able to build numerous robots, create many 3-D printed models and even a few functional projects such as the box for one of my other passions, card games, as featured in my pitch photo. Once I graduated I lost access to the labs that allowed me to express myself and exercise these great skills, and that is why I am here.

3-D Printers, the Forge of Today

My goal for this campaign is to acquire the overhead to develop my own 3-D printing studio in my house so that I again have the means to practice the art that I became so adept at in college. I started by developing a business plan what will allow me to slowly begin using my skills to give back to the STEM community. This plan consists of three major parts:

  1. Develop a product that is in demand: lets face it 3-D printed stuff is cool, but what is even cooler is being able to have it customized and created before your eyes. Currently I am working on designs for several niche markets including: jewelry, gaming accessories, reproduction of archaeological findings from digital scans, and custom designed and manufactured robotics parts. In each of these fields I have been exploring options and needs of consumers and have determined that they each have potential. Additionally I have the support of a local artist, because lets face it, even the best engineers need a little help.
  2. Sell My product: I have been working with small local businesses to build relationships and trust that will lead to distribution of my products to a wider market. This includes a craft jewelry shop and a local game shop that would love to sell a range of customized and standard design products. In addition to regular retail orders, I would offer my services as a free lance artist and designer to do work on commissions. This would allow me to make one of a kind art you can hold.
  3. Give back: I have gained so much through my universities extracurricular activities and I feel that it is my responsibility to give back to the STEM community that has provided me with so much. The majority of the profits gained through this endeavor would then be donated to local STEM organizations that are educating our next generation of engineers and scientist. 

Goals

My goals for this campaign are as follows:

  • I want to acquire a Makergear M2 3D printer - $1,800.00
  • Software package for printer - $150.00
  • Filament to get Started - $100.00
 

The End Game

With these tools I will have the means to achieve my greater goals of embracing my artistic talent, creating amazing products that people will love, and giving back to the STEM community that has been instrumental to my success.

story:
ENGLISH BELOW

** ~ שלום חברות וחברים ~ **

ברוכות וברוכים הבאים לפרויקט גיוס  לקולקציה Be ~Live in Miracles

שמי נעמיקה , אמנית מרפאה ויוצרת

לפני שלוש שנים התחלתי את המותג 'נעמיקה מהרוח לחומר' יצרתי תכשיטים מסמלים שאני מתקשרת לגאומטריה מקודשת מכסף וזהב.

הסמלים החלו להגיע אלי בתרגול גאומנטיקה (ריפוי אדמה). למדתי איך להרגיש את ערוצי האנרגיה ( חשמל ) הקיימים בעולמות סבבינו -אדמה , מים , עצים וכו ...היה לי ברור שהם מיוחדים מעבר ליופיים.

בממוצע שנה אחריי שהייתי נחשפת לסמל הייתי רואה שהוא כבר קיים בתרבויות אזוטריות שונות כגון : קבלה , בודהיזם  , crop-fields, ...הבנתי שאני מתחברת לתודעה קולקטיבית , קוטפת סמלים ומורידה לארץ . התחלתי לחקור מתמטית, רגשית נפשית היסטורית ואמנותית את הסמלים על מנת להבין את המנגנון השלם...

כל סמל תומך בתהליך אחר נפשי רגשי...

האימפולס הראשוני שלי של חיפוש חקירה ויצירה עדיין קיים  - לעזור להרחיב את תודעת הלב של אנשים אנושות על מנת שיהיה לנו יותר טוב עם עצמנו - ובכך עם הפלנטה. בקיצור אהבה

 

BE-LIVE IN MIRACLES

על ה 12 סמלים חדשים שאני עובדת קרוב לשנתיים ~ חוקרת את המשמעות שלהם והשפעה רגשית נפשית יחד עם שמירת הקו העיצוב הנקי וייחודי - עדין ועצמתי. הסמלים היו שטוחים , תלת ממדים ומסתובבים ז"א מדולרים, טבעות עגילים ועוד הפתעות שיצוצו תוך כדי היצירה...

בהתרגשות נושאי הסמלים החדשים ו ה מ ה מ מ י ם :

ערך עצמי  ,  זרימה  ,  שפע  ,  זוגיות ותקשורת

רכות ונשיות   ,   פרח החיים   ,   זרע החיים

יציאה מהמבוך   ,   שבטיות   ,   הגנה

שלום פנימי ,  חיבור לחיות

את התכשיטים אני מכינה מכסף וזהב 14 ,כולם מגיעים עם שרשרת אורך 45-65 ס"מ, טבעות ( לפי מידה ) באריזה ייחודית של נעמיקה יחד עם קלף הסבר של איכות הסמל והוראות כיצד לטהר את התכשיט באופן קל ופשוט באנגלית ועברית .הסמלים מאפשרים לנו לשמוע את עצמנו ביתר בהירות . כל סמל תומך בתהליך מרגש אחר .

כרגע אין לי את כל המודלים החדשים על מנת לראות ולבחור - לכן ניתן לתמוך באופן כוללני בין סמלים שטוחים או נפוחים ואשלח לכם קטלוג אינטרנטי בסיום הפרויקט וכך תוכלו לבחור .

בסיום גיוס הפרויקט נישלח לכם\ן את כל הסמלים בקטלוג אינטרנטי שתוכלו לבחור בהתאם לתמיכה שלכם\ן בין שרשרת שטוחה או נפוחה\מודולרית\מטבע עם הטבעה .**

ולכן התמיכה נעשית בקטגוריות באופן כוללני- אפשר לרכוש שרשרת עם תליון :

שטוח- שזה כולל את כל השטוחים מקולקציה 1 +2 -( תמיכה בתמונה של תליון שטוח )

או

נפוח \מודולרי \ מטבע כסף עם צורה.מקולקציה 1+2 ( תמיכה בתמונה של תליון נפוח ) 

**מוזמנים ליצור קשר על מנת לעזור בהתלבטויות אם יש ** 

אני מזמינה אתכם\ן לקחת חלק בתהליך מחזק ומדהים ואף עתידני משו. בעזרת התמיכה שלכם בפרויקט נוכל להוציא יחד את הקולקציה השנייה

BE ~ LIVE IN MIRICALES

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

כפית ערבוב עם זרע החיים ! 

כפית מתוקה אשר תומכת בהכוונה של ברכת המים - אפשר לבחור בין בוחש לבין שרשרת שמגיע לכל כוס\ קנקן 

מגיעה בקופסה מעוצבת יחד עם קלף הסבר של הכפית . עשויה מכסף 925

 

התפתחנו לעולם הדפוס !!!

בתחום הנייר יש לנו מחברת פעולה למבוגרים גילאים 21+,  מחברת מהממת המאפשרת תהליך מעמיק עם עיפרון. למי שמוכנה להשתחרר מדפוסים עמוקים שאינם משרתים סמל השורש מאפשר להגיע לעומקים -עבדתי על המחברת הזו גם קרוב לשנתיים בדפים מפורטים ובעבודה נעימה להסתכלות מחודשת המאפשרת תמיכה בשחרור ושינוי דפוסים .

*~~~~~~~~~~~~* חבילת קלפי בהירות טארוט ~~~~~~~~~~~~* *

קלפים מסמלי נעמיקה צבעוניים ונעימים . משקפים לנו את דרכנו והכלים אשר יתמכו בכוחות הנדרשים.

הקלפים מדויקים להפליא מתאימים גם למטפלים וגם לשימוש אישי - מגיעים יחד עם מחברת פירושים של כל סמל - ואופן פריסה מומלצת.

הרבה עבודה מרגשת לפנינו ואני שמחה לעשות את זה יחד איתכם\ן

תודה על הזמן שהקדשתם פה והבחירה שלכם\ן לתמוך, להפיץ ולקדם את הפרויקט יחד איתי - אנחנו יחד יוצרות\ים מציאות חדשה המאפשרת ניסים ונפלאות

אנחנו השינוי -והשלום נמצא בתוכנו

באהבה והודיה עמוקה

* *  * ~ נעמיקה   ~ *  * *

קישור לעמוד פייסבוק Naamika spirit to matter @ נשמח לקבל לייק :) ושיתופים

https://www.facebook.com/#!/spiritualjewlery?fref=ts

תמונות של התליונים וקישור לחנות אינטרנטית קולקציה ראשונה והתגלגלות הלאה

חנות \ קטלוג אינטרנטי ETSY של קולקציה 1

 

 

 

WELCOME TO OUR SECOND HEALING JEWELRY COLLECTION

FINE JEWELRY OF STERLING SILVER AND 14K GOLD

 & BRAND NEW PRINT COLLECTION

 We are so excited to share with you our passion of empowering people with our healing tools made as beautiful  fine Jewelry !

**in the picture first collection : top left - Journey modular, Flower of the heart , Solar Plexus,( second collection prototype), Prosperity, Atom power, Heal~thy creation **

 

' BE~LIVE IN MIRICALES '

 is the name of Naamika's spirit to matter second jewelry collection. Having worked on it nearly two years they are just about ready and we are more excited than ever !   Beautiful & unique sacred geometric Naamika designs which support our awareness and consciousness in the beautiful form of divine jewelry in sterling silver 925 and 14k gold. ALL pendants are around the diameter size of 2.4 cm having an elegant yet powerfull effect. They each arrive with necklace length of your choice, an explanation scroll of symbol and how to cleanse you healing necklace. All are unisex, made of the finest natural materials and love! 

**in the picture first collection: Empress ring ( giving and receiving ) Source- finding the source of characteristic that serves no longer** 

 

My name is Naama and I am the designer and founder of Naamika spirit to matter

Five years ago I started practicing Geomancy, a way to feel & co-create with the earth consciousness . This means I can feel and heal energy lay lines within the earth , water, trees, people and more. With this technique I started receiving beautiful visions of sacred geometric symbols and signs in my mind, after a year or so I would see that these symbols already exist in the Kabala, Buddhism, Crop circles and so on ..this was super exciting realizing its a  UNITED CONSCIOUSNESS!! I researched each symbol on emotional and mathematical level as well as physical. I understood and experienced the meaning of each symbol. They all support a different precise personal growth process in a most magnificent away. These are Energy Enhancing Tools for Personal Growth !

Our First Jewelry collection 'OF THE EARTH' was made three years ago in a SUSCSSFULL ISRAELI CROWD FUNDING PROJECT and it has been amazing hearing and seeing the waves of effect in peoples life's. We were offered to sell them on Israelis national airline El-AL, covered in the Israeli Magazine 'WOMAN', and have over thousands of clients worldwide ! 

**in the picture first collection Flower of the Heart 2D & 3D - to open heart chakra / enhancing love frequency** 

 

HOW NAAMIKA'S SYMBOLS WORK 

Energy = Electricity

Sacred Geometry:  A precise mathematical equation when used correctly can create dimension of harmonious healing shapes and figures. Universal patterns of sacred geometry design everything in our reality. This mathematical proportion is also referred to as Phi, Golden ratio ,Fibonacci or God's equation since it is found in all of nature: the spiral of the shell, flower, wave as well as in our human face and bodily proportions. Since ancient times it has been used to build temples, pyramids , great architecture and art. This equation brings harmony to our mind, body and soul creating a strong energy effect within our system. 

 
 

 

 

Sterling silver and 14k gold are the best electric conductors and energy is electricity, with the combined shape of vision designed in perfect proportions and shapes they create maximum divine healing. The process is very natural in a soft and loving way, letting the energy of the symbol travel in your system to empower you to your inner self.

  When wearing Naamika's healing symbols you receive support in connection to self. Hearing and feeling your heart and mind clearer and better. This allows you to create meaning full changes in your life from within.

 We all go through the same human processes in different and various ways. We believe that when we love and understand our self better we can love and have greater compassion for the rest. These  EMPOWRING TOOLS  work by strengthening our energetic field in a precise way in a precise journey that is offered by the specific NAAMIKA sacred geometric form. You will feel more connected to yourself in a most loving, pleasant and natural way.

We are inviting you to join us and be a part of the second collection and enjoy a collaborators investment price of 15-20% OFF !

 

 In the picture there are models and NOT YET the finished designs they will modular as well as inflated rings and earrings !!

THE 13 NEW SYMBOLS TOPICS !!

COMMUNICATION & RELATIONSHIPS, SELF WORTH , MOVEMENT, TRIBE CONNECTION, INNER PEACE (hands of awarness-stainless steel) ,  THE SEED OF LIFE , FLOWER OF LIFE, FEMININTY, BALANCE, ANIMAL CONNECTION, CONNECTION TO HOME-BASE , ABUNDANCE , DIVINE PROTECTION..

First collection topics : OPENING THE HEART, INHANCING LOVE FREQUENCY, CLEARING TRUMAS,HEALTHY MIND AND CREATION, MOVEMENT IN PLACES THAT ARE FROZEN, INNER FERTILITY, FEMININ POWER, MASCILNE POWER, INNER POWER(ATOM POWER), CREATION WHEIR PLACES ARE FROZEN, EMPRESS ( Giving and reciving), INHANCING INNER LIGHT, IMPOWERING SOLAR PLEXUS, 

**in the picture modular creation of first collection **
 
CHOOSING YOUR SYMBOL ~ CONNECTING TO YOUR HEART

When people see the symbols they are ALWAYS drawn exactly to the one the serves their deep process. I believe  this is the outcome of true universal connection and subconscious wisdom. This connection makes it an easy process to choose your symbol since they speak so clearly ! As soon as we finish our successful crowd funding project we will send you an online catalog with all of Naamika's symbols and meaning. According to your perk of choice You will be able to choose your perfect  healing symbol -choose length of necklace from 18"22"26"/45cm 55cm 65cm. 

 See first collection : https://www.etsy.com/il-en/shop/Naamika?ref=search_shop_redirect

 

HEALING SYMBOLS PERKS SUBJECTS 

CHOOSING 2D OR 3D/MODULAR from all designs

FLAT PENDENT (2D) STERLING SILVER OR GOLD + NECKLACE 15-20% DISSCOUNT !!!

 STERLING SILVER $70  /  14K YELLOW GOLD $250

connecting to your heart , Inner fertility, Healthy mind FOR healthy creation ,Finding source of trauma ,Releasing of trauma, Inner atom power feminine, Inner atom power masculine, Women of within , Creating movement, Divine protection, Prosperity, Empress : giving and receiving, Self esteem, Flower of life ,Seed of life, Femininity and softness.

 

INFLATED PENDENT (3D)/ MODULER/SILVER COIN + NECKLACE 15-20% DISSCOUNT !

STERLING SILVER $96  / 14K YELLOW GOLD $375

Heart chakra - opening the heart uplift of love frequency -3D , Heal~thy creation , Solar flower , Journey , Relationships and communication - "stamped" silver coin, Creating a Base - "stamped" silver coin,Animal connection- "stamped " silver coin,Tribal - Thin silver coin ,Prosparity ,Seed of life , Flower of life 

***you can contact us for any question on how to choose your perk***

 WATER STIRRING SPOON with THE SEED OF LIFE!

 Made of sterling silver 925 it's a dream come true :) knowing how important it is to have clean water for our healthy mind, body & spirit. This unique water cleanser is made of the seed of life - a kabalistic sacred geometric form - holding the knowledge of the beginning of creation. Reminding the water of its primal atomic form and connection

It will arrive in a specially designed kit- arriving with a scroll explaining of its purpose as well as how to keep it cleansed thought usage..

 

 PRINT COLLECTION

A magnificent and beautiful ADULT COLORING BOOK of the Naamika source sign ,AT THE MOMENT IN FINAL DRAFT ! It is especially designed to support the process of trauma release and configuration. Made of over 40 pages coloring, pencil exercises and black to help release what is not needed anymore in your life. The Instructions are both in Hebrew and English . Made for persons of the age 21+. Will be printed in an antroposofic community of special need people. 

 

 ALL OF NAAMIKA'S HEALING SYMBOLS IN ONE DECK OF HEALING CARDS 

We have combined all the healing symbols into a clarifying deck of cards .AT THE MOMENT IN FINAL DRAFT !It is excellent for personal use as well as for therapy sessions . The deck will be finely designed and printed together with an explanation pamphlet of the different spreads and meaning of cards , We are just in love with them and are so excited to work on their final design and print, At the moment they are in major first steps and with your support we will be able to create them in FINE printed Naamika style and design

 

OUR CHALLANGES

What We Need to Finish our creation and how you can help ...

At the moment all of our new products and designs of jewelry as well as print are just about ready BUT not quite this is why we couldn't show all the new designs . We need your help and trust to create the PERFECT FINISHED MODELS  for all of our new and exciting consciousness tools ! With your trust and belive we will produce, create and design all of our products with top quality and love in Israel and hopefull Italy as well .

We want to get them ready for you and the world in a most perfect and divine way and we invite you come and be a part and join us  !

We estimate that within two-three months of reaching our goal all prototypes will be ready and shipped for all holidays :) 

We invite you to walk the path with us and support our project 

LET US TOGETHER CREATE THE CHANGE IN THE WORLD WE WANT TO HAVE & BE

MUCH LOVE 

NAAMIKA

story_txt:
ENGLISH BELOW** ~ שלום חברות וחברים ~ **ברוכות וברוכים הבאים לפרויקט גיוס  לקולקציה Be ~Live in Miraclesשמי נעמיקה , אמנית מרפאה ויוצרתלפני שלוש שנים התחלתי את המותג 'נעמיקה מהרוח לחומר' יצרתי תכשיטים מסמלים שאני מתקשרת לגאומטריה מקודשת מכסף וזהב.הסמלים החלו להגיע אלי בתרגול גאומנטיקה (ריפוי אדמה). למדתי איך להרגיש את ערוצי האנרגיה ( חשמל ) הקיימים בעולמות סבבינו -אדמה , מים , עצים וכו ...היה לי ברור שהם מיוחדים מעבר ליופיים.בממוצע שנה אחריי שהייתי נחשפת לסמל הייתי רואה שהוא כבר קיים בתרבויות אזוטריות שונות כגון : קבלה , בודהיזם  , crop-fields, ...הבנתי שאני מתחברת לתודעה קולקטיבית , קוטפת סמלים ומורידה לארץ . התחלתי לחקור מתמטית, רגשית נפשית היסטורית ואמנותית את הסמלים על מנת להבין את המנגנון השלם...כל סמל תומך בתהליך אחר נפשי רגשי...האימפולס הראשוני שלי של חיפוש חקירה ויצירה עדיין קיים  - לעזור להרחיב את תודעת הלב של אנשים אנושות על מנת שיהיה לנו יותר טוב עם עצמנו - ובכך עם הפלנטה. בקיצור אהבה BE-LIVE IN MIRACLESעל ה 12 סמלים חדשים שאני עובדת קרוב לשנתיים ~ חוקרת את המשמעות שלהם והשפעה רגשית נפשית יחד עם שמירת הקו העיצוב הנקי וייחודי - עדין ועצמתי. הסמלים היו שטוחים , תלת ממדים ומסתובבים ז"א מדולרים, טבעות עגילים ועוד הפתעות שיצוצו תוך כדי היצירה...בהתרגשות נושאי הסמלים החדשים ו ה מ ה מ מ י ם :ערך עצמי  ,  זרימה  ,  שפע  ,  זוגיות ותקשורתרכות ונשיות   ,   פרח החיים   ,   זרע החייםיציאה מהמבוך   ,   שבטיות   ,   הגנהשלום פנימי ,  חיבור לחיותאת התכשיטים אני מכינה מכסף וזהב 14 ,כולם מגיעים עם שרשרת אורך 45-65 ס"מ, טבעות ( לפי מידה ) באריזה ייחודית של נעמיקה יחד עם קלף הסבר של איכות הסמל והוראות כיצד לטהר את התכשיט באופן קל ופשוט באנגלית ועברית .הסמלים מאפשרים לנו לשמוע את עצמנו ביתר בהירות . כל סמל תומך בתהליך מרגש אחר .כרגע אין לי את כל המודלים החדשים על מנת לראות ולבחור - לכן ניתן לתמוך באופן כוללני בין סמלים שטוחים או נפוחים ואשלח לכם קטלוג אינטרנטי בסיום הפרויקט וכך תוכלו לבחור .בסיום גיוס הפרויקט נישלח לכם\ן את כל הסמלים בקטלוג אינטרנטי שתוכלו לבחור בהתאם לתמיכה שלכם\ן בין שרשרת שטוחה או נפוחה\מודולרית\מטבע עם הטבעה .**ולכן התמיכה נעשית בקטגוריות באופן כוללני- אפשר לרכוש שרשרת עם תליון :שטוח- שזה כולל את כל השטוחים מקולקציה 1 +2 -( תמיכה בתמונה של תליון שטוח )אונפוח \מודולרי \ מטבע כסף עם צורה.מקולקציה 1+2 ( תמיכה בתמונה של תליון נפוח ) **מוזמנים ליצור קשר על מנת לעזור בהתלבטויות אם יש ** אני מזמינה אתכם\ן לקחת חלק בתהליך מחזק ומדהים ואף עתידני משו. בעזרת התמיכה שלכם בפרויקט נוכל להוציא יחד את הקולקציה השנייהBE ~ LIVE IN MIRICALES ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~כפית ערבוב עם זרע החיים ! כפית מתוקה אשר תומכת בהכוונה של ברכת המים - אפשר לבחור בין בוחש לבין שרשרת שמגיע לכל כוס\ קנקן מגיעה בקופסה מעוצבת יחד עם קלף הסבר של הכפית . עשויה מכסף 925 התפתחנו לעולם הדפוס !!!בתחום הנייר יש לנו מחברת פעולה למבוגרים גילאים 21+,  מחברת מהממת המאפשרת תהליך מעמיק עם עיפרון. למי שמוכנה להשתחרר מדפוסים עמוקים שאינם משרתים סמל השורש מאפשר להגיע לעומקים -עבדתי על המחברת הזו גם קרוב לשנתיים בדפים מפורטים ובעבודה נעימה להסתכלות מחודשת המאפשרת תמיכה בשחרור ושינוי דפוסים .*~~~~~~~~~~~~* חבילת קלפי בהירות טארוט ~~~~~~~~~~~~* *קלפים מסמלי נעמיקה צבעוניים ונעימים . משקפים לנו את דרכנו והכלים אשר יתמכו בכוחות הנדרשים.הקלפים מדויקים להפליא מתאימים גם למטפלים וגם לשימוש אישי - מגיעים יחד עם מחברת פירושים של כל סמל - ואופן פריסה מומלצת.הרבה עבודה מרגשת לפנינו ואני שמחה לעשות את זה יחד איתכם\ןתודה על הזמן שהקדשתם פה והבחירה שלכם\ן לתמוך, להפיץ ולקדם את הפרויקט יחד איתי - אנחנו יחד יוצרות\ים מציאות חדשה המאפשרת ניסים ונפלאותאנחנו השינוי -והשלום נמצא בתוכנובאהבה והודיה עמוקה* *  * ~ נעמיקה   ~ *  * *קישור לעמוד פייסבוק Naamika spirit to matter @ נשמח לקבל לייק :) ושיתופיםhttps://www.facebook.com/#!/spiritualjewlery?fref=tsתמונות של התליונים וקישור לחנות אינטרנטית קולקציה ראשונה והתגלגלות הלאהחנות \ קטלוג אינטרנטי ETSY של קולקציה 1   WELCOME TO OUR SECOND HEALING JEWELRY COLLECTIONFINE JEWELRY OF STERLING SILVER AND 14K GOLD  & BRAND NEW PRINT COLLECTION We are so excited to share with you our passion of empowering people with our healing tools made as beautiful  fine Jewelry !**in the picture first collection : top left - Journey modular, Flower of the heart , Solar Plexus,( second collection prototype), Prosperity, Atom power, Heal~thy creation ** ' BE~LIVE IN MIRICALES ' is the name of Naamika's spirit to matter second jewelry collection. Having worked on it nearly two years they are just about ready and we are more excited than ever !   Beautiful & unique sacred geometric Naamika designs which support our awareness and consciousness in the beautiful form of divine jewelry in sterling silver 925 and 14k gold. ALL pendants are around the diameter size of 2.4 cm having an elegant yet powerfull effect. They each arrive with necklace length of your choice, an explanation scroll of symbol and how to cleanse you healing necklace. All are unisex, made of the finest natural materials and love! **in the picture first collection: Empress ring ( giving and receiving ) Source- finding the source of characteristic that serves no longer**  My name is Naama and I am the designer and founder of Naamika spirit to matterFive years ago I started practicing Geomancy, a way to feel & co-create with the earth consciousness . This means I can feel and heal energy lay lines within the earth , water, trees, people and more. With this technique I started receiving beautiful visions of sacred geometric symbols and signs in my mind, after a year or so I would see that these symbols already exist in the Kabala, Buddhism, Crop circles and so on ..this was super exciting realizing its a  UNITED CONSCIOUSNESS!! I researched each symbol on emotional and mathematical level as well as physical. I understood and experienced the meaning of each symbol. They all support a different precise personal growth process in a most magnificent away. These are Energy Enhancing Tools for Personal Growth !Our First Jewelry collection 'OF THE EARTH' was made three years ago in a SUSCSSFULL ISRAELI CROWD FUNDING PROJECT and it has been amazing hearing and seeing the waves of effect in peoples life's. We were offered to sell them on Israelis national airline El-AL, covered in the Israeli Magazine 'WOMAN', and have over thousands of clients worldwide ! **in the picture first collection Flower of the Heart 2D & 3D - to open heart chakra / enhancing love frequency**  HOW NAAMIKA'S SYMBOLS WORK Energy = ElectricitySacred Geometry:  A precise mathematical equation when used correctly can create dimension of harmonious healing shapes and figures. Universal patterns of sacred geometry design everything in our reality. This mathematical proportion is also referred to as Phi, Golden ratio ,Fibonacci or God's equation since it is found in all of nature: the spiral of the shell, flower, wave as well as in our human face and bodily proportions. Since ancient times it has been used to build temples, pyramids , great architecture and art. This equation brings harmony to our mind, body and soul creating a strong energy effect within our system.   
 
 Sterling silver and 14k gold are the best electric conductors and energy is electricity, with the combined shape of vision designed in perfect proportions and shapes they create maximum divine healing. The process is very natural in a soft and loving way, letting the energy of the symbol travel in your system to empower you to your inner self.  When wearing Naamika's healing symbols you receive support in connection to self. Hearing and feeling your heart and mind clearer and better. This allows you to create meaning full changes in your life from within. We all go through the same human processes in different and various ways. We believe that when we love and understand our self better we can love and have greater compassion for the rest. These  EMPOWRING TOOLS  work by strengthening our energetic field in a precise way in a precise journey that is offered by the specific NAAMIKA sacred geometric form. You will feel more connected to yourself in a most loving, pleasant and natural way.We are inviting you to join us and be a part of the second collection and enjoy a collaborators investment price of 15-20% OFF !  In the picture there are models and NOT YET the finished designs they will modular as well as inflated rings and earrings !!THE 13 NEW SYMBOLS TOPICS !!COMMUNICATION & RELATIONSHIPS, SELF WORTH , MOVEMENT, TRIBE CONNECTION, INNER PEACE (hands of awarness-stainless steel) ,  THE SEED OF LIFE , FLOWER OF LIFE, FEMININTY, BALANCE, ANIMAL CONNECTION, CONNECTION TO HOME-BASE , ABUNDANCE , DIVINE PROTECTION..First collection topics : OPENING THE HEART, INHANCING LOVE FREQUENCY, CLEARING TRUMAS,HEALTHY MIND AND CREATION, MOVEMENT IN PLACES THAT ARE FROZEN, INNER FERTILITY, FEMININ POWER, MASCILNE POWER, INNER POWER(ATOM POWER), CREATION WHEIR PLACES ARE FROZEN, EMPRESS ( Giving and reciving), INHANCING INNER LIGHT, IMPOWERING SOLAR PLEXUS, **in the picture modular creation of first collection ** CHOOSING YOUR SYMBOL ~ CONNECTING TO YOUR HEARTWhen people see the symbols they are ALWAYS drawn exactly to the one the serves their deep process.
