story: .

Seglinge Brand

Seglinge is a new watch brand coming from Finland, Europe. Seglinge wants to offer high quality and well designed watches with competetive prices. Our first watch model, Seglinge Benjamin chronograph, is designed really carefully without no compromises, because we wanted the watch to look great and wear perfectly. And we think that we did it, since our 40mm chronograph feels and looks really good on the wrist.

We work directly with a big watch manufacturer and we offer watches directly to the consumers, so you don't pay extra to the middleman. We use high quality Seiko watch movements and high quality watch parts, since we want to give value for the money to the consumers.

Our vision is to build a long lasting brand and expand the watch collection in the future. We use Indiegogo as a launch platform, since we want to launch the brand directly to the end consumers and therefore we can make these great launch offers too.

Seglinge name comes from small island, which is located in Åland archipelago between Finland mainland and Åland main island. Seglinge is a place where you can relax, enjoy the nice scandinavian summer and refreshing sea climate. There you can forget the busy city life for a moment and it's also a place, where you can create great designs, since you get really good spirit there. Seglinge - it's like a bliss.

 

Collection

One watch model, 5 different heads, over 35 options.

Seglinge Benjamin chronograph is one watch model with 5 different heads. With different leather straps, nylon straps and metal bracelets there's over 35 different options where to choose from. Check the collection and pick your favourite! Now you can get one extra leather or nylon strap free of charge (value up to 29€)!

Our chronograph is powered by Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement, which has a really smoothly sliding chronograph second hand. Watches are made with a great craftsmanship and we use high quality watch parts in our watches.

Our perks are introduced after all the watch models. Check them carefully to pick the right watch for you.

 

Seglinge Benjamin Chronograph Stainless Steel Black Dial

  • Ref. S1011-100
  • Dial: Black, applied silver hour indexes
  • Bracelet: Metal bracelet
  • Movement: Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement with 60 minute chronograph, two hands with 1/5 center chronograph second, small chronograph minute, small 24 hours indicator, date
  • Material: Stainless steel 316L
  • Glass: Domed mineral crystal
  • Water resistant: 100m
  • Size: Diameter width 40mm, length 47mm, height 12mm
  • Lug size: 20mm

 

Here you can see all the 8 different model variants available for the black dial stainless steel case version.

 

Seglinge Benjamin chronograph with metal bracelet ref. S1011-100

Seglinge Benjamin chronograph with brown leather strap ref. S1011-214

Seglinge Benjamin chronograph with black racing leather strap ref. S1011-201

 

Seglinge Benjamin Chronograph Stainless Steel

White "Panda" Dial

  • Ref. S1012-214
  • Dial: White ”panda”, applied silver hour indexes
  • Bracelet: Brown leather
  • Movement: Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement with 60 minute chronograph, two hands with 1/5 center chronograph second, small chronograph minute, small 24 hours indicator, date
  • Material: Stainless steel 316L
  • Glass: Domed mineral crystal
  • Water resistant: 100m
  • Size: Diameter width 40mm, length 47mm, height 12mm
  • Lug size: 20mm

 

Here you can see all the 8 different model variants available for the white ”panda” dial stainless steel case version.

Seglinge Benjamin steel chronograph with brown leather strap ref. S1012-214

 

Seglinge Benjamin steel chronograph with milanese mesh metal bracelet ref. S1012-110

Seglinge Benjamin steel chronograph with brown leather strap ref. S1012-214

 

Seglinge Benjamin Chronograph Stainless Steel Blue Dial

  • Ref. S1013-110
  • Dial: Blue, applied silver hour indexes
  • Bracelet: Milanese mesh metal bracelet
  • Movement: Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement with 60 minute chronograph, two hands with 1/5 center chronograph second, small chronograph minute, small 24 hours indicator, date
  • Material: Stainless steel 316L
  • Glass: Domed mineral crystal
  • Water resistant: 100m
  • Size: Diameter width 40mm, length 47mm, height 12mm
  • Lug size: 20mm

 

Here you can see all the 7 different model options available for the blue dial stainless steel case version.

 

Seglinge Benjamin steel chronograph with milanese mesh metal bracelet ref. S1013-110

Seglinge Benjamin steel chronograph with brown leather strap ref. S1013-214

Seglinge Benjamin steel chronograph with blue nylon strap ref. S1013-303

 

Seglinge Benjamin Chronograph Rose Gold PVD Black Dial

  • Ref. S1021-301

  • Bracelet: Black nylon strap

  • Material: Stainless steel 316L

  • Water resistant: 100m
  • Size: Diameter width 40mm, length 47mm, height 12mm

Seglinge Benjamin rose gold PVD chronograph with black nylon strap ref. S1021-301. This 40mm chronograph goes nicely to the womens wrist too.

 

Seglinge Benjamin Chronograph Black PVD Black Dial

 

  • Ref. S1041-111
  • Dial: Black, applied silver hour indexes
  • Bracelet: Black PVD milanese mesh metal bracelet
  • Movement: Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement with 60 minute chronograph, two hands with 1/5 center chronograph second, small chronograph minute, small 24 hours indicator, date

  • Dial: Black, applied silver hour indexes
  • Bracelet: Black PVD metal bracelet
  • Movement: Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement with 60 minute chronograph, two hands with 1/5 center chronograph second, small chronograph minute, small 24 hours indicator, date
  • Material: Stainless steel 316L
  • Glass: Domed mineral crystal
  • Water resistant: 100m
  • Size: Diameter width 40mm, length 47mm, height 12mm
  • Lug size: 20mm

 

Below you can see all the 8 different model options available for the black dial black PVD case version.

 

Seglinge Benjamin black PVD chronograph with black milanese mesh metal bracelet ref. S1041-111

'

Seglinge Benjamin black PVD chronograph with brown leather strap ref. S1041-214

Seglinge Benjamin black PVD chronograph with black nylon strap ref. S1041-303

 

Perks

You can see our perks on right hand side of the screen on desktop and on the front page on mobile devices. Perks are in US dollars and they are invoiced in US dollars, but we have put also the EUR prices to the pictures to help you. Please note, that the EUR price invoiced from your credit card will be a bit different, due to currency changes and possible credit card company commissions.

Perks are:

1. First is steel chronograph with leather strap. You can choose the dial colour (black, blue or white "panda") and leather strap colour by clicking the perk. Price is 199$ / 169€.

2. Second is steel chronograph with nylon strap. You can choose the dial colour (black, blue or white "panda") and nylon strap colour by clicking the perk. Price is 199$ / 169€.

3. Third is rose gold PVD or black PVD chronograph with nylon strap. You can choose the right watch and nylon strap colour by clicking the perk. Price is 219$ / 189€.

4. Fourth is steel chronograph with milanese mesh metal braclet. You can choose the dial colour (black, blue or white "panda") by clicking the perk. Price is 219$ / 189€.

5. Fifth is rose gold PVD or black PVD chronograph with black dial and leather strap. You can choose right watch and leather strap colour by clicking the perk. Price is 219$ / 189€.

6. Sixth is rose gold PVD or black PVD chronograph with black dial and black milanese mesh metal bracelet. You can choose right watch by clicking the perk. Price is 235$ / 199€.

7. Seventh is steel chrono with metal bracelet and black, blue or white dial. You can choose the dial colour by clicking the perk. Price is 235$ / 199€.

8. Eight is black PVD chrono with black PVD metal bracelet. Price is 249$ / 215€.

9. Ninth is a Special backers set. You can choose 3 different watches, just choose the models, dials and straps/bracelets after you have clicked the perk. Save up to 44% of the future retail price!

After you have made the payment, please send us an e-mail to seglingewatches@gmail.com and tell us which strap do you want free of charge. We'll ad this to your order.

 

Interchangeable straps

All our leather and nylon straps are interchangeable. All the straps have quick-release springbars, which means that you can easily change them without any tools in a couple of seconds.

Our milanese mesh metal bracelet is made from 0,9mm wire, which means that the bracelet is sturdy but also at the same time it feels really smooth and it fits really nicely on the wrist. Bracelet is easy and quick to adjust for the right length.

Metal bracelet is specially designed for this watch, so it has a perfectly fitting end pieces and it gives this chronograph a nice more masculine and strong look. The bracelet has 6 shortening links and there's also fine adjustment on the clasp. The clasp has a double security locking mechanism.

 

Case Back

Our chronograph has a screwed case back, since we want to ensure the 100m water resistance. The case back has also a clean design, because we want the clean look to continue also on the back side.

 

Watch Box

Seglinge watches will be delivered in a special box, which is designed especially to the Seglinge watches with our design team.


Guarantee

All Seglinge watches are covered by 2 years international guarantee.

 

Behind Seglinge Brand

My name is Sami Ovaskainen and I am a Finnish entrepreneur who’s behind the watch brand Seglinge. I've been working in a watch industry for my whole life and I've been always keen to create something by myself. Last fall I quit my daily job, because I wanted to make my dream come true. Now after 18 months of designing and developing the watch models, it's time to show to the world first models of the Seglinge watches and start a new chapter in a watch industry.

Seglinge brand started in a passion for a classical and good looking watches, which I want to offer in a affordable price category. In Christmas 2016 I started to design my own watch series and in 2017 I was developing the designs for the first Seglinge watch series, which is a classic chronograph watch with a modern touch. The series is now ready and it's called Benjamin. I wanted to give the watches a classical, timeless yet modern look and which you can easily modify from classical look to more sporty look by chancing the different straps and bracelets.

By backing this watch project, you'll help Seglinge watch brand to become alive. Benjamin chronograph is the first series and there's already sketches and ideas for the next watch models, bur first we need to get a good start for the brand. This is where our journey begins!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Seglinge watch project needs funding of 50 000$ to get this project alive. This amount is needed to make the first order from the watch factory including all the watch heads with different straps and bracelets. Also the funding goes to first order of the boxes, which we've designed especially to the Seglinge watches.

We are offering special perks to the backers. We have up to 44% discount on the watches and every watch will come with an extra canvas or leather strap. You can choose which extra leather or nylon strap do you want.

 

Delivery

After the campaign is over, we'll put everything together and place the order to our manufacturer. Estimated delivery time is now for the December 2018 and we'll make our everything, that we can supply the watches during the December.

Please note, that we offer free worldwide shipping for the watches!

 

Risks and challenges

In manufacturing, there's always a risk with the delivery time and that there comes some delay in supply chain. Our watch manufacturer has a long experience in watch manufacturing and they have a really good reputation. We will make our everything, that manufacturing and deliveries goes smoothly and that we can supply the watches on time to you.

 

Support Us On Social Media

If you like our watches, please remember to share it with your friends and help us to make Seglinge watch brand alive. You can use Indiegogo share tools for easy share with you friends and family. And don't forget to follow us on Facebook and Instagram. Thank you for your support!
story_txt:
Seglinge Brand
Seglinge is a new watch brand coming from Finland, Europe. Seglinge wants to offer high quality and well designed watches with competetive prices. Our first watch model, Seglinge Benjamin chronograph, is designed really carefully without no compromises, because we wanted the watch to look great and wear perfectly. And we think that we did it, since our 40mm chronograph feels and looks really good on the wrist.
We work directly with a big watch manufacturer and we offer watches directly to the consumers, so you don't pay extra to the middleman. We use high quality Seiko watch movements and high quality watch parts, since we want to give value for the money to the consumers.
Our vision is to build a long lasting brand and expand the watch collection in the future. We use Indiegogo as a launch platform, since we want to launch the brand directly to the end consumers and therefore we can make these great launch offers too.Seglinge name comes from small island, which is located in Åland archipelago between Finland mainland and Åland main island. Seglinge is a place where you can relax, enjoy the nice scandinavian summer and refreshing sea climate. There you can forget the busy city life for a moment and it's also a place, where you can create great designs, since you get really good spirit there. Seglinge - it's like a bliss.

 
Collection
One watch model, 5 different heads, over 35 options.
Seglinge Benjamin chronograph is one watch model with 5 different heads. With different leather straps, nylon straps and metal bracelets there's over 35 different options where to choose from. Check the collection and pick your favourite! Now you can get one extra leather or nylon strap free of charge (value up to 29€)!
Our chronograph is powered by Seiko VK64 meca-quartz movement, which has a really smoothly sliding chronograph second hand. story:
HOW IT STARTED

Jeremy is a videographer based in Singapore and has shot several watch adverts, approached by Jay, a long time friend who is in the luxury watch industry and both share great passion for watches. With the same believe that luxury watches currently in the market could be made more affordable, Norns Watches is created and decides to launch its first series Norns Avigate, an affordable luxury watch through Indiegogo.


BRAND NAME

Norns is a Norse mythological being who controls the destiny of gods and men. And that the 3 most prominent of Norns are Urðr (fate), Verðandi (present) and Skuld (future).

                                          

The name Norns was chosen for it symbolizes control and destiny and also the entities, Urðr (fate), Verðandi (present) and Skuld (future). It represents, what we at Norns Watches want to produce - a reliable watch, within your control for the present and future.


AFFORDABLE LUXURY

A luxurious, high quality mechanical automatic watch at an affordable price is no longer beyond reach, with your help, it is going to become a reality. 

The watch is made of premium grade material and parts comparable to Swiss watches, packaged with a great looking design. It truly embodies what we are set to deliver to you.

Norns first watch series; Avigate is made and designed to suit both female and male for every occasion.


MENTIONED BY


WHAT IS AN AUTOMATIC WATCH?

Norns Avigate is an automatic watch, requiring no batteries. The watch is powered by the motion of the wrist and no manual winding is needed. The energy is stored and created by the rotor,  a metal disc plate that spins with motion. This can only be achieved with precise engineering, workmanship and design.


MOVEMENT

The movement chosen to power the watch is a Miyota Automatic 8215 Japanese Movement. It is a workhorse that will last for decades and known to be comparable to Swiss ETA movement, but at a much affordable price. We’ve also positioned the circular date window to the 6 o’clock position, improving the aesthetics and design.


PROCESS

In order to find the perfect material for our watch, we did a thorough research on different materials used by big watch brands. We then made and went through many rounds of revisions before coming out with a design we are truly satisfied with, striking a perfect balance between quality and affordability.

We also managed to find a reputable watch manufacturer that is able to produce our desired watches in good quantity with quality assurance.


SPECIFICATIONS

Movement:  

Miyota Automatic 8215

Case:

316L Surgical Stainless Steel

Face:

Black/White Face With Date Window

Front:

Double Dome Sapphire Crystal

Back:

Sapphire Crystal Open Back

Strap:

20mm Brown/Black Italian Leather Nato Strap

Diameter:

Ø 43mm

Water Resistance:           

3 ATM/30 metres

Weight:

51 grams

Thickness:

14mm


MATERIAL

The watch is enclosed in a beautiful contoured 43mm sized 316L Surgical Stainless Steel case, the same material for most luxury watch cases. Machined from a block of solid steel, using CNC machineries for precision. The weight of the steel gives the watch a premium feel and hardness tough enough to last for decades.


The watch’s front uses sapphire crystal which is the hardest material after diamond, enhancing its scratch resistance. Also, because it is a double dome, there will be no magnifying effect, giving great clarity of view at every angle. The dome sapphire crystal and steel body seamlessly contours together exuding beauty at it's finest.


Sapphire crystal is used for the window at the back of the watch to prevent scratches while giving a glorious view of the intricate yet robust watch movement.


The crown is made to the right size for easy date and time calibration, even with gloves on. The Norns logo is also beautifully etched onto the crown, designed to make the watch distinctive at any angle.


STRAP SYSTEM

 The design of the lugs with spring bar still gives the option to change to third party 20mm sized straps of your choice easily.


PERKS

AVIGATE-01

Matte black PVD coated surgical steel case with fingerprint resistant coating.


20mm high quality Italian leather brown nato strap with black stainless steel rings.


AVIGATE-02

 Blue chrome hands on white face with surgical steel case.


20mm high quality Italian leather black nato strap with silver stainless steel rings.


PACKAGING

The packaging is not final and final packaging may differ. Quality will not be compromised when changes are made to the packaging, in fact we are aiming to make it better.

STRETCH GOALS

More details and pictures will be given once every stretch goal milestone is reached. So please help us spread the word to enjoy the upgrades!


TIMELINE

After the Indiegogo campaign ends, it takes up to two weeks to process the money raised and manufacturing will start thereafter.

Manufacturing of the watches will take up to 3 months to ensure good quality watches are being produced. Henceforth, we will definitely not rush the manufacturing process and compromise quality,

After manufacturing is done, watches will be shipped directly to our office and the mailing process will begin. It will take about two months from receiving of shipment to delivering watches to backers . We will update the delivery status frequently and will immediately inform backers if there are any delays.


WHAT WILL THE MONEY BE USED FOR?

The money raised will be used solely for manufacturing of the watches, packaging and shipping.  We will be transparent with the money received and keep backers updated, giving you a peace of mind.


WARRANTY

Watches will be covered with a manufacturer’s one year warranty & does not cover damages by users. The watch movement is covered under manufacturer's warranty as well. Watch that has defects in material or workmanship under normal use, will be repaired or replaced at the sole discretion of Norns Watches. Return shipping & handling fee may apply to every warranty service. 


PAYMENT

We are opting for the Fixed Funding structure and the structure only allows payment through the Paypal system. But, backers can still use the credit/debit card payment option provided by Paypal, without signing up for Paypal account.


RISK

Risks will be kept minimal. All orders are ready and will be sent to the manufacturer for production once the required goal is reached.

We are opting for fixed funding on Indiegogo. Funds raised will be used for manufacturing and if the project fails to reach the basic target, every cent will be refunded back to the backers by Indiegogo within a week.

The brand will continue to produce different series of watches in the near future if this project is funded successfully.


REACH US

norns.co

facebook.com/nornswatches

instagram.com/nornswatches

The packaging is not final and final packaging may differ. Quality will not be compromised when changes are made to the packaging, in fact we are aiming to make it better.





STRETCH GOALS





More details and pictures will be given once every stretch goal milestone is reached. So please help us spread the word to enjoy the upgrades!

TIMELINE



After the Indiegogo campaign ends, it takes up to two weeks to process the money raised and manufacturing will start thereafter.
Manufacturing of the watches will take up to 3 months to ensure good quality watches are being produced. Henceforth, we will definitely not rush the manufacturing process and compromise quality,
After manufacturing is done, watches will be shipped directly to our office and the mailing process will begin. It will take about two months from receiving of shipment to delivering watches to backers . We will update the delivery status frequently and will immediately inform backers if there are any delays.

WHAT WILL THE MONEY BE USED FOR?
The money raised will be used solely for manufacturing of the watches, packaging and shipping.  We will be transparent with the money received and keep backers updated, giving you a peace of mind.

WARRANTY
Watches will be covered with a manufacturer’s one year warranty & does not cover damages by users. The watch movement is covered under manufacturer's warranty as well. Watch that has defects in material or workmanship under normal use, will be repaired or replaced at the sole discretion of Norns Watches. Return shipping & handling fee may apply to every warranty service. 

PAYMENT



We are opting for the Fixed Funding structure and the structure only allows payment through the Paypal system. But, backers can still use the credit/debit card payment option provided by Paypal, without signing up for Paypal account.

RISK

Risks will be kept minimal. All orders are ready and
will be sent to the manufacturer for production once the required goal is reached.
We are opting for fixed funding on Indiegogo. Funds
raised will be used for manufacturing and if the project fails to reach the basic
target, every cent will be refunded back to the backers by Indiegogo within a week.
The brand will continue to produce different series
of watches in the near future if this project is funded successfully.

REACH US


norns.co
facebook.com/nornswatches
instagram.com/nornswatches

story:
The Beginning 

Rophata (pronounced as Gornata), stands for Top in Bulgarian. The brand signifies a beginning or something of importance; and to excel or to be in the lead in terms of rank. True to its brand beliefs, we dived into deep research to explore the intricacies of the watch world, determined to produce only the best of its kind.

The devoted dedication into making these pieces ensures that Rophata is a timeless classic that is built to last. Its flagship collection, луна (pronounced as Luna) which stands for Moon in Bulgarian, is made of 316L Carbon Stainless Steel as case material, making sure that there is strong corrosion resistance; while the dial window is of flat crystal Sapphire glass material, carefully chosen to withstand the test of time.

To add dashes of colours to your outfit, take your pick from 2 strap designs selection:

Rose Gold Case with Brown Saffiano Leather Strap

Silver Case with Black Saffiano Leather Strap 

 

Component , Material & Specification

An ETA 2824-2 Swiss Made Movement is the intended and favoured choice over mechanical movement and accompanied by the price tag raise, we hope to appeal to a more premium audiences as well as to cater to a style - conscious mass market. 

Swiss SuperLuminova BGW9

луна is created to be an elegant and sophisticated companion suited for the cosmopolitan world ,and such be an ultimate choice to an unforgettable watch piece experience.

 

Warranty

Every watch comes with one (1) year warranty against manufacturing defects. 

Warranty Exclusions
The warranty does not cover issues related to:

  • Cosmetic damage like  scratches or dents
  • Accidental damages 
  • User negligence 
  • Defects caused by normal wear and tear or otherwise due to the normal aging of the watch

 

If you like to reach us, feel free to email us at  rophatawatches@gmail.com and do follow us on Instagram @Rophata for updates as we embark on this timeless journey.

story:
. Introducing MASSIVE BLADE .

We focus on Accessible Premium BLADE

MASSIVE BLADE offers a brand new, professional and individual approach that allows you to customize parameters of your hockey blade to give more confidence on the ice. Parameters such as Blade profile (blade radius, radius pitch, radius of hollow), length, color, blade coating, hardness, blade height, initials (engraved to the blade), etc., can all be optimized for your game on MASSIVE BLADE. Our process from accepting your order, design optimization, manufacturing and delivery will give you higher quality, longer lasting blade for years of great hockey. Do not forget that MASSIVE BLADE exists for your most brilliant moment on the ice. We are a team of dedicated professionals, ready to do whatever it takes to max your hockey performance.


. Words from pros .



. MEET 'M' EDITION .



A / 'M' Edition Concept 

a : Signature Character


b : 'M' Edition Design


B / 'M' Blades 

Specification : CLASSIC BLADE 
  • Material : Stainless Steel
  • Blade Radius : 10'(inch)
  • Height : 20mm±0.1mm
  • Thickness : 2.8±0.02 ~ 2.9±0.02mm
  • Hardness : 56.5±0.5 HrC
  • Plating :  n/a 
  • Surface(Edge) Hardness : 200~450 HV
  • Coat Thickness : n/a 

Specification : COLOR BLADE 

  • Material : Stainless Steel
  • Blade Radius : 10'(inch)
  • Height : 20mm±0.1mm
  • Thickness : 2.8±0.02 ~ 2.9±0.02mm
  • Hardness : 56.5±0.5 HrC
  • Plating(only for colors) : Blue or Purple or GOLD Titanium coat
  • Surface(Edge) Hardness(blue&purple) : 200~450 HV
  • Surface(Edge) Hardness(gold) : 1500~3000 HV
  • Coat Thickness : 2.3±0.2μ


C / 'M' Hoodie 

  • Available color : Black, Navy, Gray
  • Oversize 'M' edition logo on center chest.
  • Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, hem.
  • Kangaroo pocket.
  • 100% Cotton.
  • Machine wash.
  • Small, Medium, Large, XLarge (see FAQ for detail sizes)

D / 'M' Snapback

  •  Available color : Black(white logo), Gray(red logo)
  • M edition logo embroidered front and side logo
  • 100% Cotton
  • One size fits most

. BLADE PROFILE CHART .



. All about MASSIVE BLADE .

A / How different coated blades


B / What's differ than others



. REWARDS .




. TIMELINE .


. TESTIMONIALS from pros .


. OUR STORY .

We are MASSIVE We make BLADE

Hello World!

In Fall 2013, MASSIVE BLADE began a research of the hockey blade. We were asked the reason why we are doing this. And we replied, "Because, I can and I love to play hockey" This has led to the very beginning of the technology that makes your sweat shine brighter. Thanks to the state-of-art design and measurement tools, cutting edge technology of the blade manufacture, MASSIVE BLADE created resistive, stronger and harder structure of the hockey blade. With the revolutionary individual approach to a hockey player needs, MASSIVE BLADE offer a unique chance to customize your blades and give you the best edge in your on ice performance.

Our passion for blades is rendered into MASSIVE BLADE

Our process from accepting your order, design optimization, manufacture process and delivery is more labor and cost intensive, but it gives you much higher quality, longer lasting, better blade for great hockey. Do not forget that MASSIVE BLADE exist for your most brilliant moment on the ice.



 . FAQ .

Q:  What Blade size should I order?

A: Skater & Goalie



Q:  What Hoody size should I order?

A: Our hoody sizes are all unisex. Women typically buy a size smaller than usual, while men generally buy the same size or one size larger. We’ve included the chart below to help you out.


Q:  I put in the wrong address/zipcode/tshirt size. What now?

A: We're happy to help with this!

Email us at contact@massiveblade.com


Q:  Are there any countries you don’t ship to?

A: We can ship anywhere in the world. 


Q:  How long are international shipping times?

A: International shipping times vary from country to country. Depending on your local customs inspection process, the shipping time can take anywhere from 5-14 business days. Some countries have more slow customs processes and can even take up to 30 business days. This is completely out of our control, as we cannot contact the customs office and ask them to speed it up - even though we'd love to do so!


Q:  How much are import taxes and how will they be paid?

A: Import taxes are charged on a country by country basis. Once your MASSIVE clears customs, you will be contacted by your local postal carrier to pay for the customs fees prior to final delivery.


Q:  Can I get a refund?

A: According to Indiegogo, contributions are non-refundable in their Terms of Use. However, upon the completion of the campaign, we will confirm your shipping address and your order to perform refunds on a case by case basis. We get it, sometimes life happens. Keep in mind that we can't perform refunds until the campaign is complete.


Q:  What if I have more questions?

A: We would love to hear from you. If you have questions related to the perks or any please feel free to email us at contact@massiveblade.com If you just have a general comment on the campaign please feel free to express yourself on our Indiegogo comment page.



TM & © 2016 MASSIVE BLADE INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

story:
People wear underwear mainly because it could insure privacy of genital and keep it healthy. Most of the men's underwear on the market use rubber band as waistband. Tight rubber band not only leaves mark on the skin, but it will also affect the sperm vitality. 

Only with perfect design and extraordinary manufacturing skills. Men can really enjoy their life while our underwear covering the most sensitive part of their body. FREEMAN underwear it does an excellent job in maintaining your health and privacy precisely meeting customer's need.

 

3D Nanofiber Technology

We implement 3D Nanofiber Technology,furthered with newly technology to improve air flow capacity around your private parts so that the sperm stay active under any situation.

 

This technology applies the perfect combination of special composite rubber and velvet instead of film. The complete integration of rubber and velvet into the fabric structure makes the product as soft as skin. We use rubber with superior anti-aging properties to improve the elasticity and resilience, which completely solves the problems of deformation caused by consumers’ improper wearing or improper washing method. Besides, the rubber will never fall off. This technology completely replaces the rubber band sewing and film adhesion. By avoiding the mark and the sense of oppression, it greatly enhances the comfortability.

 

 

 

 

 

 

U Space Capsule

The unique integrated design of crotch is more in line with male’s physiological characteristics, while increased U-shaped space brings absolute stretches and smooth function of the new underwear. Don't fold embarassed because it is over, not because itch and pain. All the advantages of our product generate from the combination of the soft and hard ware.

 

 

The sideseam and inner layer of integrated crotch part of FREEMAN underwear apply seamless technology, so it is both thin and comfortable. Bamboo fiber fabric is used in the inner layer. As a natural fiber, it is breathable and effective as antibacterial deodorant.

 

 

New Fabric

This is a very thin fabric that feels like silky soft and comfortable. It is also quick-drying, super absorbent and breathable.

 

 

While your temperature rising up caused by over exercise or your private part getting moist because long time siting, it will be according to the temperature of the body at the time, then starts to adjust to cooling or heating ventilation function at the same time. In order to appropriately balance to creat a comfortable effect.
 

 

Onesize

In order to fit the 3D Nanofiber Technology perfectly, we have increased the elasticity of fabric to provide onezise for 110-220 pounds people. We all know that exercise or weight loss will bring big changes to the size of buttocks easily, while FREEMAN underwear can reduce the embarrassment caused by of inappropriate size of underwear.

 

 

Colors & Styles

We are making the underwear in the boxer brief style in two colors: Jet Black and Peacock Blue, 

With FREEMAN underwear, you can enjoy whatever you like and leave the rest to us.

 

Our Story

We are DNL Team. FREEMAN underwear is the third product we developed. We've devoloped a ladies' underwear in 2015 and upgraded it in 2016. The product sales rather well both in China and overseas and Ladies love it very much. We don't make too many products, but whatever we do make screams quality and craftsmanship.

Our design philosophy is to integrate one or several new materials into the product by using new technology. We recommend seamless one-piece, oversize and 3D technology, and our products can certainly bring the ultimate comfort experience, create groundbreaking breakthrough and lead the new fashion trend.

story:
Go Buds offer the world’s best digital studio sound for people on the go. Go Buds provide a new level of Bluetooth technology, offering a solid, uninterrupted connection to multiple devices within a 12-yard radius of your device.

The touch technology and/or voice activation allows easy connection to calls using your cellphone, instant messaging on any electronic device as well as reliable connection to your
favorite music. Go Buds offer hands-free connections while exercising, working, or enjoying a lazy day at the beach.


Working Performance

With most Bluetooth earbuds on the market, the signal is not very steady and will easily cut off. And the working distance normally cannot reach to 10 meters. But we've worked hard to maintain both the quality of the connection and the maximum distance.

Hi Fi Sound

Our Bluetooth solution offers high quality and stable performance. We use Bluetooth V4 technology that supports noise cancelling and voice calling number functions.

Competitive Price

At the end of the day, quality matters, but still we wanted to offer a competitive consumer price that would rival other products in the marketplace. We’ve done that and more and know you'll enjoy the product.

Go Buds are guaranteed to fit in your ears without ever falling out thanks to our
patented earguard technology that holds your earbuds firmly yet comfortably in place.

Go Buds have an unbreakable Bluetooth connection within a 12-yard radius of your device. no other earbuds offer this level of guaranteed connectivity.

Go Buds’ charge lasts up to 48 hours. Warning lights let you know when your charge is low, so you’ll have plenty of notice when it’s time to recharge.
 

 

1. High definition audio technology
High definition studio quality digital sound, it sounds like a live concert in your head.

2. Built-in microphone
Built-in microphone for hands-free connectivity to multiple devices.

3. CVC6.0 noise cancellation technology
The highest-level noise cancellation technology on the planet. No other earbuds offer you studio quality sound like Go Buds.

4. Voice prompt in English
Voice prompts in English or to your device’s language settings.

5. IOS battery capacity display
48 hours of battery power with built in warning lights that let you know when it’s time to
recharge.

6. Multi-point function, can connect 2 mobile phones at the same time.
Connect multiple devices—your cellphone, tablet, laptop or music device—simultaneously using our state-of-the-art Bluetooth technology.

 

Although there are always risks and challenges with a new startup business, Go Buds has tried to mitigate those obstacles.

Go Buds design team has had years of experience in digital sound design,
production and technology and personally created the technical specifications for these breakthrough earbuds to the highest industry standards. 

Our manufacturing and materials consultant offers over ten years of experience in the
high-tech industry and has sourced components and manufacturing for many of the top names in the electronics industry.

Our manufacturer has produced millions of products for top names in the high-tech industry during the last decade and stands behind its work.

story:
To find the perfect comfort we had to find a fabric that was smooth, breathable and cool to the touch. Luckily after months of research and many failed prototypes, 7 different prototypes to be exact... we found the perfect design and fabric! 

We are excited to introduce the fabric MicroModal. This fabric is incredibly smooth, breathable and cool to the touch. This in a combination with the revolutionary U-Shape design on the front. The function of this design is to hold your package in place during your active day as well as cozy weekends. 

Both of these in a combination with our signature waistband that is by far the softest on the market has led us to one of the best and most comfortable underwear designs that you will ever wear. Drum roll, please... The Answer! 

You will find everything from fabric to design details under this headline. A quick overview is presented on the picture below. 

 

FABRIC
If you have tried and believe that the Modal fabric is comfortable, you are up for a treat! These bad boys are made from MicroModal, a skin friendly natural fiber made from sourced beech-wood. It is 3x softer than cotton unlike its older sibling Modal which is only twice as soft.* 

*The softness is measured according to the Kawabata method. Kyoto University, Japan. Cotton/Lenzing Modal 50/50 %.

 

GSM
With 180 GSM (180g/m2) you have one of the highest quality fabrics for underwear on the market, and while it’s thick and soft don’t forget that it is incredibly breathable and cool to the touch, which makes it the perfect choice of fabric for intimate wear.

 

TRIPLE STITCH
Beside your crazy late nights and stressful mornings the triple stitch attachment will be there to support you even when you’re a bit clumsy. 

 

WAISTBAND
The waistband fabric, something most companies don’t talk about is something that we value extremely high, simply because you should be informed about everything when it comes to something so intimate. We use a blend of polyamide, polyester & elastane which is incredibly soft, durable yet flexible. You will not feel it, only see it.

 

TAGLESS
Our underwear is tagless, but worry not! All the information you need is printed directly on the fabric in high quality.

THE BEST PART
You will look at your best in every situation!

"Nothing is sexier than a confident man with a smile!" - Every Youtube video about this topic.

 

As standard, you will have the red to choose, with our signature red waistband. However, if we reach our stretch goal of Stretch of $10000 we will add an second color and if we reach the stretch goal of  $15000 we will be able to add third colors, Further updates, and a poll will be posted once we reach our regular goal.  We are currently offering The answer in Black & Black and Blue & black without reaching our stretch goal. However, they are limited edition so act fast. 

The Black & Black and Blue & Black are label as Guaranteed shipping, if we don't reach our goal, we will contact you with a personal link and you will be able to purchase The Answer to campaign price from our website.

 

For the most accurate measure:

 • Take your favorite underwear and lay it as the picture below.  
 • Measure the waistband from one end to the other (A). 
 • Choose the size closest to yours.
 • Enjoy your new favorite underwear!

Our advise: If you're in between two sizes, we recommend you take the smaller size as the fabric and waistband is stretchy, and will adjust to your body like a second thin layer of skin. 

Pssst... If you don't have a favorite pair of underwear leave us a message with your waist measurement and we will gladly help you find your perfect fit! 

 

All early bird rewards are limited, to see availability check the right side of the campaign page, this is also where you choose your pledge tier. It is possible to customize your pledge, kindly let us know so that we can guide you to the right price.

We started with the designs and market analysis in the second quarter of 2016 and have been working up until the launch of this campaign. We are not planning on slowing down! Right after the shipping is done we will be building our website to get it e-commerce ready.

 

A 14-year-old boy who got diagnosed with Alopecia traveled to Turkey with his mother to meet a professor to potentially cure the disease. Sadly no cure were found, but the young boy found something much greater than a cure to his disease… he found a purpose.

The first time Alper Hafif layed eyes on Victoria’s Secret was in Turkey. An amazing feeling went through him when he walked into the store and then it hit him, why doesn’t a store like this exist for men? This was the beginning of an amazing journey which almost 9 years later led to Vin’s Answer – The male underwear equivalent.

The name is Everything: Alper had made a list of over 50 different names when he was in college, what wasn’t on the list was Vin’s Answer. One night when he was reflecting over what the Secret stood for he caught his parents having an argument. He listened to it and realized that his father didn’t get what his mom was trying to say, and he was making points that had nothing to do with what she was trying to tell him.

A few days later his friend had a similar argument with her boyfriend, at that moment it hit him! Women are a secret to men, the statement “Men are from Mars, Women are from Venus” was true. Still, all men are trying to make a point and give an answer every time. Answer it was! Now he just needed a name to complete the idea.

 

Looking for names that are manly Alper found Vincent, which means the conqueror it sounded good, but merging it together with Answer didn’t make a good name: Vincent’s Answer.
One night when he was watching an action movie with Vin Diesel in the leading role Alper got curious and looked up what Vin’s name really was, Vincent. He immediately tried Vin’s Answer. It had a nice tone, was easy to remember and was exactly what he wanted. He wrote it on a piece of paper and asked his mom who cannot speak English to say what was written, she pronounced it good enough! The name was perfect!

To sell the vision wasn’t the hard part, the hard part was to find a product that could reflect the vision. Alper Hafif got that product ready in 2017. He sold a total of 700 pairs of underwear before the production had started through Kickstarter.
A few months later the model and seller Martin Waesterberg and the marketers Jacob Olausson and Benjamin Banks Egbudiwe joined the VA team and is now on board to make a change!

 

The factory is ready to start the production within 1 email but before we can make that happen we need your help to reach the finish line. By making a pledge you will contribute to the birth of the brand Vin's Answer and all the products that may come with it. You will also receive your very own pair of VA underwear (depending on pledged amount) to both show off and get cozy in! 

Time and money are two very valuable things. If you cannot or don't want to help us by pledging but love our idea, it would mean a lot to us if you share this campaign with your friends and family, it could help us more than you think. We would like to take the opportunity and thank you for giving us the most valuable thing in life… your time!

Our guarantee to you is that this will be your go-to underwear. If the underwear doesn't fit you the way you had imagined, or if it develops any defects, we will exchange them within 30 days.*

*The backer may need to pay for the shipping depending on destination. 

Like & Follow us  

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

As we’re not factory owners, there’s always the risk of a factory closure or an inability to produce at our primary facility due to capacity issues. In the unlikely event of such an occurrence, Vin’s Answer will move production to another facility that we’ve already vetted. We could also face issues with our current material suppliers, but again, we have alternative suppliers should the need arise.

We have chosen not to use a fulfillment company, this way we have control over the delivery once the products are in our hands and can prevent any delay that may occur otherwise. We have been in online retailing for some time and have the knowledge and machinery needed to ship efficiently. In any case where the amount of backers exceeds our limits we have a fulfillment company who is ready to jump in. We’re confident that this will not be necessary, but we remain ready if the situation occurs.

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ 

Gallery 

 

Thank you!
story_txt:
To find the perfect comfort we had to find a fabric that was smooth, breathable and cool to the touch. Luckily after months of research and many failed prototypes, 7 different prototypes to be exact... we found the perfect design and fabric! 

We are excited to introduce the fabric MicroModal. This fabric is incredibly smooth, breathable and cool to the touch. This in a combination with the revolutionary U-Shape design on the front. The function of this design is to hold your package in place during your active day as well as cozy weekends. 

Both of these in a combination with our signature waistband that is by far the softest on the market has led us to one of the best and most comfortable underwear designs that you will ever wear. Drum roll, please... The Answer! 


You will find everything from fabric to design details under this headline. A quick overview is presented on the picture below. 

 
FABRICIf you have tried and believe that the Modal fabric is comfortable, you are up for a treat! These bad boys are made from MicroModal, a skin friendly natural fiber made from sourced beech-wood. It is 3x softer than cotton unlike its older sibling Modal which is only twice as soft.* 

*The softness is measured according to the Kawabata method. Kyoto University, Japan. Cotton/Lenzing Modal 50/50 %.
 
GSMWith 180 GSM (180g/m2) you have one of the highest quality fabrics for underwear on the market, and while it’s thick and soft don’t forget that it is incredibly breathable and cool to the touch, which makes it the perfect choice of fabric for intimate wear.

 
TRIPLE STITCHBeside your crazy late nights and stressful mornings the triple stitch attachment will be there to support you even when you’re a bit clumsy. 
 WAISTBANDThe waistband fabric, something most companies don’t talk about is something that we value extremely high, simply because you should be informed about everything when it comes to something so intimate. We use a blend of polyamide, polyester & elastane which is incredibly soft, durable yet flexible. You will not feel it, only see it. TAGLESSOur underwear is tagless, but worry not! story:
The smartwatch is the ultimate smartphone accessory. It can tell the time, of course, but it can also beam important notifications straight to your wrist and run native apps too. But, none of them actually helps us to be very closely connected; therefore, we thought about  HearMyBeat that would allow us to hear our beloved one's heartbeats on the go. 

As individuals as you are. Whether Rose Gold, Gold or stainless steel is your thing, also choose from a range of colours, straps and faces to compliment your wardrobe. Whether worn for work or the weekend, you'll always be able to express your style effortlessly.

This watch, with form and function in equal measure, is still retaining its character and identity. All elements have been refined to create a simple, visually balanced piece that offers a unique experience.  

The case is available in either raw stainless steel, rose gold or gold finish. Different surface finishing processes have been chosen for the three case options to make the very best of each colour. 

 

 

Features:

 

Measures heart rate: Using a custom heart rate sensor located on the back of the watch, you can measure your heart rate at any time and your beloved one can hear your heartbeats simultaneously. Using technology that provides tactile sensations in the form of vibrations to users, you can also send a friend your heartbeats. Yes, this is serious!

 

 

 

App Usage: One of the most exciting things about the HearMyBeat is its overall app functionality. That's what makes it such a powerful little tool.

Technical:                   ● Bluetooth 5 ● IPX5 Water Resistance ● Seamless Pairing.

✔️30 Days Battery Life ✔️ 150 M Water Resistance ✔️ Sapphire Glass  

✔️ Always-on Display ✔️ Light Weight

 

Strap: Leather 

Dimensions: 42  x 50mm

Lug width: 22mm

Thickness: 14.25mm

Weight: 75 - 80 Grams

Finish: Brushed Stainless steel

Warranty: 12 Months

 

 

 

A huge thank you to everyone who would like to support us on this journey and take the time to follow this campaign. It has been a challenging journey, but your support reminds us of the value of creativity and perseverance. We are super excited to see HearMyBeat grow, and to see a long-held dream come true. 

If we are successful with our funding, we will pledge to annually donate 1% of gross profit to environmental causes around the world.

story:
Traditionally worn as a gentleman's ring, we have carefully designed a signature signet ring that can be fully customized for Him or Her. The signet ring is a modern classic that can be styled for weddings, engagements or other milestone moments such as professional and academic achievements like graduations and promotions. It's the ideal piece for a family crest, monogram or to capture and commemorate a loved ones profile, a meaningful emblem or corporate logo.

 

OUR PRODUCT

We work solely with aircraft grade titanium (Ti 6Al-4V, Grade 5 alloy) because of its strength, durability and beauty - but also as an attractive and affordable alternative to white gold and platinum. Titanium offers endless design possibilities that will never tarnish.

Titanium is our core competence and medium. It inspires us every day. All of our titanium rings are made to order at our workshop in Montreal, Quebec (Canada). We believe in our material and craftsmanship - we will never import bulk product to offload cheaply. Our experience tells a story and we want your moment to be part of it. Our rings are made to last.

 

OUR PEOPLE

David, a Master Craftsman, has been designing and milling titanium rings for over 18 years. With a pioneering spirit, he helped build and manage the most prominent and successful titanium ring company currently in operation.

Now teaming up with his brother to build EdwardBrothersTitaniumRings.com, an online store that will revolutionize the way titanium rings are designed and marketed, the Edward Brothers are intent on building an interactive consumer site that will ultimately give guests the freedom to choose and design their own rings.

 

OUR GOAL

The aim of this Indiegogo campaign is to help the Edward Brothers raise much needed funds to complete the customization features of their consumer web site and to cover shop costs. These funds will be used to complete their vision and maintain their fully functional workshop.  Edward Brothers are open for business and need your help to remain operational - in an environment where they can ply their trade without prejudice, on an ethical platform, honorably, equitably and with a humbling respect for this craft.

 

We operate with the belief that everyone should be able to access popularly priced, fine titanium jewelry.  Once used by the world's leaders, monumental men and in important houses, the signet ring played an important role in business and daily life as a seal to authenticate official documents. Signet rings bore a distinctive marking such as a coat of arms, monogram or crest, easily identifying it to a particular family, club or organization.

From ancient times to today, signet rings offer a singular style and flair that Edward Brothers would like to popularize once again. Please support us on our journey, join our community and reward yourself by sharing our legacy with a one-of-a-kind signet ring where you too can start a family tradition.

 

OUR PERKS

We will take virtually any image and translate it to our freshly designed signet ring, exclusively on Indiegogo. 

1. Monogrammed Signet Ring

To thank you for backing us, we'll custom mill a monogrammed signet ring bearing three (3) alphabetic characters.  We offer a choice of two font styles for your personal monogram.

 

2. Customized Signet Ring

We will fully customize our signature ring with an image of your choosing. Images featured here are for inspiration only. We can work with you to create your very own style.

 

3. Custom Pendants

Have you joined the craze? Instinct, Mystic, Valor...we've got a collector's item for you. We'll customize a titanium medallion that can be worn around the neck or used as a key chain (1.25 in / 31.75 mm d) with an image of your choosing.

 

OUR GIFT TO YOU

To help you to further personalize your ring, we'll include free anodizing - an effect used to change the color of titanium. The colors obtained from our anodizing technique are similar to those found on an oil slick or soap bubble.  We can apply our anodizing colors into the engraved areas of your ring where the colors are better protected from wear and direct contact for a lasting hue.  You can choose from our spectrum below.

 

OUR SIZING

We know how important it is to get just the right fit, so we've taken the guesswork out for you. Download our easy to use ring sizer here:

https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0932/1898/fil...

story:
Eco-Transformations  Buffalo studio is a place to Re-Pair It, Re-Create It, Re-Forming our closets by Transforming that.... something old into something new.  We help you transform it (anything) while at the same time we help the planet to recover.  We listed design because we cross 4 tiers of Indiegogo; Design (as re-designers) - small business (as we host organic & artisan and US made products when we aren't taking care of repairs and alterations) - education (as we host sustainable and design interns and its our goal to pay these students always) and most importantly environment - because all we do is sustainable; having something to do with recycling something else and putting it to good use. 
We Tackle the Re-Creation of Your Wardrobe Favorites
If you hope to Re-Create your own wardrobe from your own favorites........continue scrolling - so you can see samples of what we do.........

Sonia - in Sea to Armani

This nautical treasure brought to you by transforming two men's polo shirts into a singular dress.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Nirosha in that LBD - Re-Done

That LBD was saved from a washing shrinkage by adding a diagonal geometric panel.  Re-ready for cocktails, dinner and dancing.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

We do what many have done for Centuries - we just do it in the Now.....
  •  Eco-Transformations Buffalo Studio offers a creative space for those re-creative transformations to happen.  Whether it be a repair or a full recreation that even the dog loves. This cushion had already been redone once.  Hidden deep in the flowers is a folded plastic covered cushion from the 40's? maybe it was the 50's.... I only know my grandmother had one similar.  So this cush......went blue.......and was seat tested my Murphy....

  • we can transform that piece that you love to wear into something new you love to wear now, even if it's for you and not the pup. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

    We share our space and debut other artists to our community.  Currently we host Ceramics by Alex, My Sisters Soap by Rebecca Geerken, Bluce upcycled guitar string jewelry by Brianna Luce, Wyno Glassware by Kelly Wynrough.  Everyone is either USA made, has a recycled component or has an organic base without parabens or phthalates - ((that is our soap Angel - Rebecca.))

  • B. Layne Creations, Eco-Transformations Buffalo studio resides - literally - in good company.  Overlooking revitalized beautiful Buffalo

    we are situated on the 5th floor of the newly renovated F.N. Burt Box Company- a building of our Buffalo's PanAm Expo Era. Our refurbished home is immediately conducive to our reuse platform.  We reside down the hall from another "Group of Companies" whose core services - no matter which entity one is inquiring about - focus on scrap metal, paper and plastic recycling, land reuse and clean up as well as achieving zero-landfill goals for themselves as well as for their clientele.  Without them we wouldn't have a home.


  • Your contribution will help establish an Eco-Transformations studio in every design school city.  That is our end game.  This eco-safe haven for re-creative transformative space gives interns the space they need to fulfill design or sustainability internship hours utilizing eco solutions for recycled materials, including but not limited to fashion or wares for the home.  This transformative zone engages each intern to embrace their own creative and sustainable re-created & recycled specialty niche. 
  • Where your eco-dollars go.........

Volume 2 will be mostly photographed in our new home - the historic PanAm era F.N. Burt's Box Company 

as well as Buffalo's surrounding historic spaces.  It's expensive to self publish however when the message is important - it is well worth it, with the help of one's army.   Or in this case, of our Buffalo location, one's herd.

We print every project locally on 100% Recycled Paper with soy based inks. Volume 2 is in contention to be printed by the Zenger Group of Tonawanda, NY.
Volume 2 local Printing/Binding Costs in Buffalo were quoted @ just about $80,000. (This is based on 500 Soft cover 500 hard cover books).  The more we print the less expensive it is.  Most printing costs are in the preparation of the printing plates.  (I saw everything in the process for Volume 1 - let me say - it is an intensive process.)
$15,000 is set for our graphic designer for layout finishing as well as illustrations Volume 2 illustrations as well as layout finishing. (Melita did all of our illustrations and our logo for Volume 1 and ...well...that Miss Melita Lewis - is more than amazing, so we need her back for Volume 2). 
$15,000 is set for Volume 2 photography.  Yes it's expensive - and that is a Buffalo rate - not L.A. or Paris.
$60,000 are reserved for annual operating costs of the Buffalo studio. Including paid internship hours, internship housing and meals-funding goes directly to the Eco-Transformations Intern Trust. Housing and meals if the students are not local. (We have current space for 2 interns per semester maximum, Fall and Spring semesters). 
$35,000 annual marketing reserve, postage and shipping  (the book runs 5 pounds and average shipping is $11.00USD @ best rate and everyone LOVES free shipping.)
$100,000 USD reserved for the selection of the next domestic Eco-Transformations Studio, manager, and internship costs. 
 City contenders are: Rochester, New York City, Providence, Cambridge, Boston, Saint Paul, Pasadena, Pittsburgh, Los Angeles, Atlanta, Cleveland, Chicago, Evanston, Oakland and Portland, Maine.  The next location will be chosen on that cities sustainable practices and commitment to its environment, community and students alike.  In the meantime we travel to your University to teach eco-workshops.

 

Here is what else is in the  up and coming future immediate future:

Risks & Challenges

  • The Eco-Transformations Studios were designed as a place where you can have that piece of clothing, shoe, furniture, or jewelry repaired or fully repaired or transformed, or learn how to DIY.  We support both platforms.  Some like to do those things - others have different hobbies or interests and need the help to get it done.  We are here for you - in either transformation process.
story_txt:
Eco-Transformations  Buffalo studio is a place to Re-Pair It, Re-Create It, Re-Forming our closets by Transforming that.... something old into something new.  We help you transform it (anything) while at the same time we help the planet to recover.  We listed design because we cross 4 tiers of Indiegogo; Design (as re-designers) - small business (as we host organic & artisan and US made products when we aren't taking care of repairs and alterations) - education (as we host sustainable and design interns and its our goal to pay these students always) and most importantly environment - because all we do is sustainable; having something to do with recycling something else and putting it to good use. We Tackle the Re-Creation of Your Wardrobe FavoritesIf you hope to Re-Create your own wardrobe from your own favorites........continue scrolling - so you can see samples of what we do.........

Sonia - in Sea to Armani


This nautical treasure brought to you by transforming two men's polo shirts into a singular dress.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Nirosha in that LBD - Re-Done

That LBD was saved from a washing shrinkage by adding a diagonal geometric panel.  Re-ready for cocktails, dinner and dancing.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - We do what many have done for Centuries - we just do it in the Now.....



 Eco-Transformations Buffalo Studio offers a creative space for those re-creative transformations to happen.  Whether it be a repair or a full recreation that even the dog loves. This cushion had already been redone once.  Hidden deep in the flowers is a folded plastic covered cushion from the 40's? maybe it was the 50's.... I only know my grandmother had one similar.  So this cush......went blue.......and was seat tested my Murphy....

 we can transform that piece that you love to wear into something new you love to wear now, even if it's for you and not the pup. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

We share our space and debut other artists to our community.  Currently we host Ceramics by Alex, My Sisters Soap by Rebecca Geerken, Bluce upcycled guitar string jewelry by Brianna Luce, Wyno Glassware by Kelly Wynrough.  Everyone is either USA made, has a recycled component or has an organic base without parabens or phthalates - ((that is our soap Angel - Rebecca.))




B. Layne Creations, Eco-Transformations Buffalo studio resides - literally - in good company.  Overlooking revitalized beautiful Buffalo we are situated on the 5th floor of the newly renovated F.N. Burt Box Company- a building of our Buffalo's PanAm Expo Era. Our refurbished home is immediately conducive to our reuse platform.  We reside down the hall from another "Group of Companies" whose core services - no matter which entity one is inquiring about - focus on scrap metal, paper and plastic recycling, land reuse and clean up as well as achieving zero-landfill goals for themselves as well as for their clientele.  Without them we wouldn't have a home.







Your contribution will help establish an Eco-Transformations studio in every design school city.  That is our end game.  This eco-safe haven for re-creative transformative space gives interns the space they need to fulfill design or sustainability internship hours utilizing eco solutions for recycled materials, including but not limited to fashion or wares for the home.  This transformative zone engages each intern to embrace their own creative and sustainable re-created & recycled specialty niche. 
Where your eco-dollars go.........


Volume 2 will be mostly photographed in our new home - the historic PanAm era F.N. Burt's Box Company as well as Buffalo's surrounding historic spaces.  It's expensive to self publish however when the message is important - it is well worth it, with the help of one's army.   Or in this case, of our Buffalo location, one's herd.

We print every project locally on 100% Recycled Paper with soy based inks. Volume 2 is in contention to be printed by the Zenger Group of Tonawanda, NY.
Volume 2 local Printing/Binding Costs in Buffalo were quoted @ just about $80,000. (This is based on 500 Soft cover 500 hard cover books).  The more we print the less expensive it is.  Most printing costs are in the preparation of the printing plates.  (I saw everything in the process for Volume 1 - let me say - it is an intensive process.)
$15,000 is set for our graphic designer for layout finishing as well as illustrations Volume 2 illustrations as well as layout finishing. (Melita did all of our illustrations and our logo for Volume 1 and ...well...that Miss Melita Lewis - is more than amazing, so we need her back for Volume 2). 
$15,000 is set for Volume 2 photography.  Yes it's expensive - and that is a Buffalo rate - not L.A. or Paris.
$60,000 are reserved for annual operating costs of the Buffalo studio. Including paid internship hours, internship housing and meals-funding goes directly to the Eco-Transformations Intern Trust. Housing and meals if the students are not local. (We have current space for 2 interns per semester maximum, Fall and Spring semesters). 
$35,000 annual marketing reserve, postage and shipping  (the book runs 5 pounds and average shipping is $11.00USD @ best rate and everyone LOVES free shipping.)

$100,000 USD reserved for the selection of the next domestic Eco-Transformations Studio, manager, and internship costs. 
 City contenders are: Rochester, New York City, Providence, Cambridge, Boston, Saint Paul, Pasadena, Pittsburgh, Los Angeles, Atlanta, Cleveland, Chicago, Evanston, Oakland and Portland, Maine.  The next location will be chosen on that cities sustainable practices and commitment to its environment, community and students alike.  In the meantime we travel to your University to teach eco-workshops. 

Here is what else is in the  up and coming future immediate future:

    Risks & Challenges
 The Eco-Transformations Studios were designed as a place where you can have that piece of clothing, shoe, furniture, or jewelry repaired or fully repaired or transformed, or learn how to DIY.  We support both platforms.  Some like to do those things - others have different hobbies or interests and need the help to get it done.  We are here for you - in either transformation process.

story:
What it is

T-RedSpider is an innovative system for controlled tree felling using the tree climbing technique; it minimizes the forces of movement and therefore ensures maximum safety during work. 

Why it was invented

We love nature and trees: unfortunately, sometimes they have to be removed and this must be done without damaging the other healthy trees and the surrounding buildings, without injuring people and, above all, minimizing operator risks.

 

Who invented it and for what

Invented and tested by an Italian treeclimber, it is designed for professionals, enabling them to work in an accurate controlled manner, saving time and improving safety. 

 

Quality in the field

T-RedSpider adapts to all situations: it allows you to work in tight spaces, on a slope, in gardens or parks, also near particularly fragile old buildings and historic monuments. T-RedSpider does not stress the tree it is fixed to. 

 

How it works

A special vice is attached to the tree and, by means of a pole and pulley, allows the cut piece to be lowered in a controlled manner, from beginning to end, minimizing the forces of movement; a cableway can also be created, anchored to and controlled directly by T-RedSpider. Reduction of the forces allows the use of lighter materials and significantly reduces wear, increasing overall savings. The work requires 2 operators: a treesclimber and a man on the ground. 

 

Production

It is made in Italy at Officine Bertoli – Conselve (PD), with high quality materials in compliance with the Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC. 

 

Use

T-RedSpider is designed for use by professionals, who must follow the instruction manual and comply with the safety regulations.  

 

Development Timeline

 

 

 

FAQs

Who was made it for?

T-RedSpider is designed for professional treeclimbers only.

What’s in the box?

  • One T-RedSpider
  • One pole 240 cm 
  • One ratcheting strap
  • One pulley Kong mod. Extraroll
  • Instruction and maintenance manual

Do you ship internationally?

Shipping to Europe costs  50$  and 25$ in Italy with your purchase. For the rest of the world please send an email. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes charged by the authorities in your country, which you will be responsible for when receiving the shipment.

When do you start shipping?

April 2017. Actual shipping dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The T-RedSpider team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

Warranty

T-RedSpider is covered by a two-year warranty. For use, please consult the instruction manual. The warranty will be forfeited if the equipment is used inappropriately.

story:
Before proceeding on reviewing Terranimalia's project, we kindly recommend reading
HERE first.

Overview

Expressing art:  with raw and contemporary wild allure through traditional innovative designs inspired solidly by nature and wildlife. 
The only personalized premium handmade eyewear collection with 100% UV protection for your eyes with Carl-Zeiss quality from a new fashion brand dedicated to Nature.

But first...Our story
By Peter, Panagiotis and Christine

 

Terranimalia Eyewear was founded three years ago as a startup in the UK by a team of fashion and nature enthusiasts. The goal was simple - to create an eyewear collection made with innovative frame designs utilized by premium renewable and sustainable materials (environmentally-friendly) with rich and fresh color tones inspired by nature. All these, embodied by a personalized experience through engraved frames representing solid standards thus offering back to our world.

We are motivated by the earth’s magnificent nature and its pure instincts. ORATIO RECTA Collection is a creative process, starting with the idea that utilizes materials and detailing ending up with the critical color selection and creation. Trend studies were conducted in specific fields of interest such as rare natural physical creations, endangered wildlife, and related art as well as fashion incarnated from across the globe. In short, this is how we produced the color palettes for our first collection and sunglasses designs. Innovation is all about uniqueness.


5 DESIGNS SHARING 7 NATURED-INSPIRED COLORS*
*Each frame will be available in 5 colors.

THE FRAMES

 





 

Just to make sure about your size you may take a look at these Detailed Guides (2 minutes process) : Here or Here

Feel free to visit us at :
www.terranimalia.com


 


Terranimalia Ltd.
97 London Road, Colchester
UK
CO3 9AN

 

Thank you !

story:
Andre Pierri story

We are young couple  who had a vision to create a brand that will set us apart from fellow designers in the fashion  industry. Our plan is to initially start with watches then expand to swimsuits, sunglasses , clothing and other various accessories all while keeping our products affordable for everyone. We have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish and different watch collection that everyone will love .

 

 

Our sketch of watch before Andre Pierri became a reality ! :-) 

 

 

 

Our main goal for Andre Pierri watch collection will focus on diversity and creating style that anyone can wear for any occasion. We ensure quality products that are made with consistency and durability in the materials and real lava stones that comes with each Andre Pierri watch !  

 

 Our first collection we offer comes in two colors , temporarily ! :-) Black for men and white for women , although we are already working hard on different colors and styles which will be available for purchase in couple of months :-)

 

We customize to fit you ! WHAT DOES IT MEAN ? To ensure that every watch will fit your wrist perfectly , we will ask you for measurements of your wrist with your purchase.

All of our backers will also receive 10% off of future orders - you will receive your coupon with your order :-) 

Our watches are also backed with a 2 year warranty ! If you are unsatisfied , send it back and we will handle the rest for you .

 

 

 

Watch specification :

Case material : Stainles steel 316L

Case diameter : Men - 40mm

                             Women - 36mm

Dial window material : Crystal mineral glass 

Movement :  Japanese MIYOTA 

Waterproof:  3 ATM 

Band material : Real lava stones

Display : Analog 

 

We are working hard to make our dream and passion  a reality and appreciate all support from backers in this community ! We will make sure to spread the word in different ways in order to reach our funding goal and if you could do something as simple as sharing about us on your page or just telling your friend , it can really go a long way :-) 

 

Risk and Challenges 

 

The challenges for Andre Pierri will be getting the word out on Indiegogo especially with so many other great products out there , but once we will reach our funding goal we will make sure to keep our word on timeline promised and we will also make sure to keep audience in the loop of how things are going with production.  We have been dealing with our manufacturer for a long time now and have a confidence in them so we really look forward to start this journey with you and start building a brand that we hope will leave a mark in the world :-)
