story:
VISIT OUR WEBSITE

www.winnerwatchesofficial.com

 

IMPORTANT: TWO WINNER WATCHES PERK BACKERS

For those who chose the "TWO Winner Watches" perk we need you to send us a quick email so we can get your watch choices.  Please fill this pre-made email template out very carefully with the correct information.  Please only fill out once. Thank You!  

Here is the link:

store@winnerwatchesofficial.com

What are Winner Watches?

Our team sought out to create Winner Watches because of our passion for watches and desire to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands.  We got frustrated paying hundreds of pounds for name brand watches, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.  We have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish looking watch collection that we know everyone will love.

When designing this watch collection, we made sure of THREE details:

1) A unique watch that stands out from all other watches and make sure to catch the eyes of anyone passing by.

2) The highest quality materials.

3) Offering the watches at a price less than half what our competitor's cost.

Winner Watches Comes with a satisfaction GUARANTEE!

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first year, we would like for you to send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

1) The life of the battery 

2) Wear and tear and ageing (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the colour and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 

3) Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

Where is Winner Watches expected to go?

We want a full line of different types and styled watches that stay at an AFFORDABLE cost. So join with us on this journey and be apart of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond, a synergy with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality.  We are excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for us.

Who is the team and how did it all start?

Started by young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts sought to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands. We have been obsessed with watches our entire life and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand watches. So now we're doing it ourselves. We started as close friends, and are now hoping to become business partners. 

Watch Specifications:

Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 45 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Band Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Band Width: 20 mm
Clasp: Folding buckle
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Movement: Dandong Mechanical Movement 

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with a friend. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just sharing this page to your Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top of the page.

If funded, how will you fulfil the orders?

We've tweaked the initial prototype, finalised our design, purchased the models and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! We have experience with shipping software and thermal printers which should make for a very smooth process. 

Risks and challenges

The challenges for Winner Watches will be getting the word out, and convincing people to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them.

 

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them. Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

story:
We are back on Indiegogo once again. After a couple of successful campaigns that has provided backers and fans more than thousands of sunglasses, we felt that it was time to dive into a world that daily is increasing in both popularity and importance. 

We have set out to give you more than your average pair of blue light glasses. With more than 25 pairs of different models, colors and features, our new collection of fashionable blue light & computer glasses is an addition that is going to take you one step further into a digital world.

We are Zerpico, and we want you to be the first ones to get your hands on our new computer glasses with photocromic lenses - the only pair of glasses you will ever need. 

 

 

Everywhere we look these days we see a computer or a screen of some sort. As we become more and more dependent on devices that radiate harmful blue rays, more people notice that their eyes become strained and irritated after a long day.  The results of staring at a computer screen without proper eye protection can lead to symptoms like blurred vision, red eyes or computer vision syndrome are also associated with an extended use of devices that radiates blue light.

Many people in the world today tend to spend almost nine hours a day in front of digital devices. Children from very young ages is now depending on devices to keep them busy and are considered to be great tools of learning and development. And since all these devices radiate blue light, the light can be very harmful when you are exposed to it for too long.

 

 

Symptoms from to much blue light exposure can be:

  • eye strain
  • dry eyes
  • blurred vision
  • double vision
  • neck strain
  • dizzyness
  • unhealthy sleep patterns
  • headaches or migraines
  • mental fatigue
  • physical fatigue

 

Blue light makes the muscles in your eyes work harder to process what you see. That is why your eyes feel more relaxed when you read from paper instead of reading from a screen. When you use a computer or other screens you blink much less. It's not too hard to realize that this leads to your eyes getting much more dry than what is recommended. 

Exposure to blue light can also make it much harder to maintain a healthy sleep pattern. This can have a huge effect on your ability to perform at a high level and may even contribute to permanent eye damage in the long run.

 

 

So why do we choose to launch new products on Indiegogo?

First off, we started our brand by presenting our first major new product on crowdfunding. The platform is a great way to present an idea that needs help to bring to life and to gain fans in a brands starting phase.

As our first campaign succeeded, we realized just how powerful the process is, how we were able to test the idea of a prototype and get a feeling of how much interest there would be in such a prototype. 

Today, it's more about giving our fans and new backers a change to get their hands of our new product first, before it's released on our website. And also giving them the new product for a ridiculously lower price!

 

Photocromic lenses?

In photocromic lenses there are millions of molecules embedded that undergo a chemical process when they are exposed to the UV rays that exist in sunlight. The molecules begin to change shape and their new structure is makes it possible to absorb some of the visible light. This absorption of visible light causes the lenses to turn darker and improve vision while protecting from harmful UV radiation. 

When the lenses are brought back from the exposure of sun light, the process is reversed and the lenses turn back to it's original transparent state.

Computer glasses are specifically made to help prevent eye strain that comes from being exposed to blue light and to make it easier to look at screens for a longer period of time. The anti-reflective coating also reduces the glare and light that is emitted from devices with screens. 

Glare reduction, an increase in contrast, and being able to look at a screen for longer periods of time are some of the benefits that come with using anti blue light glasses. They also makes the vision clearer, which helps to prevent back and neck strain.

A game changer for streamers and developers

The best way to protect your eyes in this modern world may be computer glasses. To be able to block light that causes damage with just a pair of glasses is a great way to help gamers and developers to remain focused and being able to perform at a high level throughout their day. 

Today, more and more people are making themselves a living in front of a screen. The world of gaming, streaming, social media influencers and programmers has exploded in the recent years, and it's only fair that the tools that is available for them to function at the level that is necessary, is matched in a proper way.

 

By backing our new campaign you will be the first ones to get your hands on a pair of glasses that not only will keep you protected from harmful blue light, the lenses will also turn darker when leaving your computer or TV and step out in the sun. 

Our Anti Blue light glasses will help you to:

  • improve your sleep patterns
  • reduce eye strain
  • have less strain in back and neck
  • reduce glare from digital screens
  • stay focused longer
  • see enhanced colors and contrast
  • enjoy sunny days without worrying about harmful UV rays

 

Our new collection of computer glasses / gaming glasses will help you maintain your focus, and prevent your eyes from getting too much blue light exposure so that you can maintain your focus on work, studies, gaming or even enjoy the sunshine outside. This huge new collection has more than 25 models and by backing our project you can get your hands on at least one of them for hardly any money at all. 

Remember, all models come with either blue light/photocromic lenses or yellow gaming lenses. Choose the type of lenses when pledging.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

While our models differs in shape, colors and sizes, all of our glasses come with the same functions. All of our blue light glasses are made with the same high quality, hyper extendable hinges that makes them fit most head types as they make the temples much more flexible.

 

Perks

To read more about the different perks you can choose from, head to the top right of the campaign. For all perks besides the "Special thanks", the perk also comes with a microfiber pouch for your glasses and a polishing cloth for cleaning the lenses. All glasses comes with an exclusive foldable PU leather box that keeps your new blue light glasses well protected when not being used. 

Many gamers find yellow lenses the better choice as they are believed to provide greater clarity. As they tend to make objects appear sharper they are a great asset when it comes to details and quick transitions of games. 

 

Stretch goals

We wouldn't be were we are if it wasn't for you. To show you our appreciation we will offer additional choices if we reach our set out stretch goals.  The last stretch goal remain locked until we reach the second one. What we can reveal is that it will be something that will be awarded all backers for free, that pledges for any of our blue light glasses. 

Together we stand strong.

 

 

Timeline

While unseen obstacles may occur, we will do our very best to keep to the timeline provided.

story:
The new STROND brand is inspired by the classic beauty of 1930's aviation, and allows the owner to fall in love with a wonderful era of design.

 

LIMITED EDITION 

We got our inspiration from the classic instrument panels of the WORLD FAMOUS Douglas DC-3 aeroplane made famous over over the last 80 years, and in films such as "Raiders of the lost Arc" and flown by James Bond in the film "Quantum of Solace" !

So, apart from the renowned workhorse movement being the Seiko NH 35A and classic British vintage design, we have used the material form an original DC-3 aeroplane to make the metal tags which you see on the dial.  

So for watch enthusiasts & aviation lovers we are giving people the opportunity to wear a piece of history. Each watch will be made with a metal tag in the 6 hour position made from the wing of a 1940s DC-3, with the plane identification number NC - 16007 engraved onto the tag itself !

So, we really need your support to bring this project to life !

 

CLASSIC VINTAGE STYLING  ! 

 

 

WEAR THE HISTORY ! 

 

The very tag on your new DC-3 timepiece is made from the very wing of a 1940s DC-3 taken from the top part of the plane wing !

 

Brushed Stainless Steel Case

 

We feel that it is nice to be wearing a piece of history and hope you can support us in bring this project to life, as there will be more classic designs and even more utilising of classic 1930's - 1940's vintage aircraft in our timepieces ! 

Classic styling, with a generous 42mm case, automatic 24 JEWEL movement, all stainless steel , sapphire glass and comes with a vintage Italian leather strap & a vintage canvas strap !

STROND DC-3 model with vintage calfskin leather strap

 

DC-3 model with vintage calfskin leather strap 

 

 

 

DC-3 model with canvas strap  

 

DC-3 model with vintage canvas strap 

 

We shall be using the C3 super luminous coating on the hands, that way your watch is going to shine much brighter and much longer than the traditional luminous coating. 

 

 How it works......Ultra-violet radiation in daylight and in some artificial light sources adds energy to the electrons in strontium aluminate pigment, which then slowly releases it in the form of photons (light) over the course of the next few hours.

The NH35A is a high accuracy automatic movement from Seiko,  which gives you a  watch that can truly go anywhere, one that is well-engineered, well-designed, and well-priced. It will require much less maintenance and will fail at much lower rates compared to any Swiss movement. Due to its relatively lower beat rate (6 beats per second), it will also last longer without servicing. The NH35A is also popular enough that any spare parts will be available for several decades. But most importantly, it can keep time just as well any entry-level Swiss mechanical.  

Know the world over as a "workhorse" it has powered millions of watches from hundreds of companies for decades.

The NH35A movement

 

The thought, detail and passion that went into the design of the DC-3 is what makes this watch stand out.

Firstly the concept drawings  for the new STROND range were created.

 

 

 

 

 

CAD images (computer designed images) were created and used as a reference for the prototypes.

The above images are CAD images and were used in conjunction with the technical drawing to make the 2 prototypes. The above images are CAD images and were used in conjunction with the technical drawings to make the 2 prototypes.

 

 

The dial as well as the hands takes their inspiration form the DC-3 instrument panel, and is what makes the dial on this particular timepiece very aesthetically  pleasing, with a larger than normal date window. And of course, the original 1930's airplane skin used to make the dial tag makes this watch stand out !

 

 

Anti glare reflection.... 

The sapphire glass front also benefits from a AR (anti reflection) coating, which is a really useful feature, and together with the super luminous hands makes for great look.

 

 Your new STROND timepiece comes with 2 lovely vintage watch straps 

* ONE:  A vintage calfskin leather strap with:

* Quick release spring bar

* Rivets on both pieces of the strap

* High quality roller style buckle 

TWO: A vintage cotton canvas strap 

* Reminiscent of the cotton canvas straps of the 1930's 

* High quality roller style buckle 

* Riveted eyelets 

Canvas strap with leather loops, metal eyelets & a fitting roller type buckle

 

 

 

Technical Specification 

*  Seiko  NH35A automatic movement. 24 jewels, 21.600 bph, date, hacking seconds. 

* Size: Ø 42MM (not including the crown), thickness: 12MM, lug to lug = 49MM.

* Jewels: 24

 * All  stainless steel: grade 316L

*  Power Reserve: more than 41 hours

*  Sapphire glass: (scratch proof) back and front.

 * Water resistant: 20 ATM / 200 meters.

 * Strap width: 22MM.

*  Strap 1: vintage calf skin leather (with quick release spring bar)

*  Strap 2: vintage cotton canvas (with quick release spring bar)

 * Hacking?: Yes

*  Hand-Windable?: Yes (both automatic and windable )

*  Limited Edition:  Limited to only 930 pieces

 So you are getting a lot of bang for you buck..........

 

 

 

 

Presentation Box

Your new STROND timepiece comes in a superb leather effect snap shut presentation box. There is a holder for your "certificate of presentation" on the inner top part of the presentation box !   

 

 One of the longest-used airliners ever, the Douglas DC-3 nears 80 years in the air as an aviation icon.

​The Douglas DC-3 is universally recognised as the greatest airplane of its time, some would argue that it is the greatest of all time……..

The Douglas Aircraft Company built the "Douglas Commercial 3" and was based on the 1933/34 Douglas DC-1 and DC-2.  Design work began in 1934 and he DC-3 debuted in the mid-1930's as an aviation rock star.

THE FIRST FLIGHT December 17, 1935, was a sunny but cool afternoon in Santa Monica, California. The holidays were coming and spirits were high in the Douglas Aircraft Company. It was another ordinary day at Clover Field, a big polished propeller caught the sun’s light as it began to turn.

 

Slowly it revolved and then a belch of blue-white smoke appeared. The engine roared into life, and the propeller was lost in its own motion. A second propeller came to life. For a few minutes, the engines roared and then the plane began to move forward.

With its two powerful propeller engines it revolutionised the travel industry by cutting typical coast-to-coast flight time across the United States from 25 hours to just 18.

​Pilots, both military and civilian, loved the DC-3. It took off easily, cruised comfortably at 185 mph at 10,000 feet, and had a ceiling of 23,200 feet and a low stalling speed (67 mph). Pilots said it landed itself, and it had a cruising range of 1,500–2,100 miles.

When production of the DC-3 ended in 1945, more than 13,000 of them had been built. The DC-3’s ease of handling and maintenance, its facility at taking off and landing on short runways, and its remarkable reliability combined to keep it flying in many regions of the world into the 21st century.

 

 

James Bond 007 flies the Gooney Bird 2008, a Gooney Bird helped James Bond get out of a jam........Fans of the Bond film "Quantum of Solace," may recall actor Daniel Craig in the cockpit of a beat-up DC-3 fighting off a Marchetti plane......see the video clip below.

https://youtu.be/NZqbvJ-IBx8

 

Indiana Jones flies the DC-3

Back in the 1980s, a DC-3 served another movie franchise hero. In "Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade," Indy flies from New York to Newfoundland to the Azores and Europe on his quest for the Holy Grail.

 

Our partnered manufacturer follows strict procedures to ensure the quality of the watches they produce. Generally, those procedures can be divided into three parts: Technical Control Check, Quality Assurance Check and Final Quality Check.

 

 

 

 

 

Watch designer Terrence Ray has been designing timepieces for a number of years and has worked in joint collaborations and designs with a number of watchmakers. Terrence was the designer for the Aston Martin tourbillon, designed as timepiece to celebrate the release of the new Aston Martin Valkyrie super car and presented to the design director of Aston Martin himself at their headquarters in Gaydon, Warwickshire.

Passionate about watches, Terrence Ray from a very early age had a keen interest in timepieces and at the age of just ten travelled half way across London on his own, taking 2 bus rides in order to purchase his first timepiece, and form that moment on Terrence became a bit of a collector of unique timepieces. So it goes without saying that Terrence later on in life became interested in Horology and subsequently gravitated towards designing watches himself.

Terrence Ray has now launched the new vintage STROND brand, with the release of the eagerly anticipated DC-3 Series.

 

For supporting us in bringing our brand to life ALL BACKERS will become "founder members" of STROND and will gain access into the departure lounge on our website which will give you access to all future releases at a good discount price !

You will also be able to purchase any of our future accessories, such as a forthcoming new strap which will be made of 1940's vintage aircraft seat belt material and one new strap made of 1940's parachute material. 

We rally do appreciate you help in bringing this exciting new brand to life and hope to have you as one of our loyal followers for many years. So please share our campaign on social media with your friend and family. Not only will you get a great looking timepiece and be wearing a piece of history, but you become one of our founder members !

story:
Ferro & Co. Watches

 

Creating quality unique watches with nostalgic characteristic and beauty at its core.

All AGL 2.0 series will be brightened in the dark by LumiNova BGW9.    

If you are a watch enthusiast and know about lumes, then you definitely know what BGW9 is.

 

Ferro & Company was established by 2 brothers in Vancouver Canada in 2014 with a simple vision: creating quality unique watches with nostalgic characteristics and beauty at its core. Hence, we create exceptional vintage style watches that take you back in time and have no similarities to other brands.

 

                                        Quartz Chrono Caliber 5021 Series

                            Fighter Propeller on the Case Back of Automatic Watches.
 

 

We have updated our project page with PVD Rose Gold case watches. Now you are able to change the color of the case to Rose Gold  as an add on for US$35

 AS SEEN ON

 

The  Collections

We take our watches seriously and make sure that the best quality movements and parts are used, thus,  we  chose 4 everlasting movements that work like a tank and keep time accurate without breaking your bank : Swiss Chronograph Quartz Ronda Caliber 5021, Japan Automatic Miyota Calibers 8217  and  9015 as well as the famous Swiss Automatic ETA 2824.

Each series is limited to 1945 pieces. That is the year the WW2 ended.

Ronda Caliber 5021 Chronograph Quartz

 

The Ronda Quartz Chrono graph Caliber 5021 is a Swiss movement with a very long battery life with 2 sub-dials featuring 1/1 seconds and 30 minute counts. 

                    Caliber 5021 Chronograph Quartz Black with White Ring
 

                  Caliber 5021 Chronograph Quartz Black with Black Ring

                Caliber 5021 Chronograph Quartz Blue with White Ring
 

You will also have the option to get the watches in Rose Gold PVD coated, in Add-On section when making your pledge:

 

                         Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on  


  

                              Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on  

 

 PLAY

 PLAY

 

 

8217 Series are packed with automatic Miyota caliber 8217 with a single 24 Hour sub-dial at 9 O'clock position, with a unique curved date at 3 O'clock position. 

The 8217 Series  movement rotor is decorated to resemble the body WW2 planes and the back case has a metal propeller decoration fixed to it to capture the over all look of the vintage war planes.

 

You will also have the option to get the watches in Rose Gold PVD coated, in Add-On section when making your pledge:

                              Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on

                               Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on


 

The Miyota Automatic Caliber 9015 is the mechanism of choice for high-end  watches. It's an everlasting workhorse that is accurate and lasts for a very long time.

The 9015 Series  movement rotors are also decorated to resemble the body WW2 planes and the back case has a metal propeller decoration fixed to it to capture the over all look of the vintage war planes.

 

You will also have the option to get the watches in Rose Gold PVD coated, in Add-On section when making your pledge:

Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on

 PLAY

                             SWISS AUTOMATIC ETA 2824 SERIES

The 25 jewel ETA 2824-2 decorated movement will keep your time accurate for a very long time. This is one of the most popular movement and is widely used in Swiss Brand Watches due to it's reliability and accuracy.

 

 

You will also have the option to get the watches in Rose Gold PVD coated, in Add-On section when making your pledge:

                               Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on

Rose Gold Case - Option Available on any watch as add on

 AGL 2.0 - Limited Edition Vintage Style Pilot Watches 

The AGL 2.0 is inspired by the most iconic fighter planes in history - Super Marine Spitfire, and Mustang P-51 which capture the bravery of WWII pilots that fought their battles in these fighter planes.  Made to withstand the test of time yet elegant enough to impress in formal situations.

 The Japan Automatic Miyota Caliber 9015 and 8217 models come decorated with a rotor and a back case that resembles the propellers and the body panels of WWII fighter planes.

Back case of Automatic Calibers 9015 & 8217 Series

The Swiss Quartz Chronograph Ronda caliber 5021 models with dual sub-dials are equipped with embossed back cases resembling the historic aircrafts.

No matter the situation, AGL 2.0 is always the right choice for men that want to project confidence and bravery.

 

ANATOMY

At Ferro & Company, we take no shortcuts. There's no substitute for quality craftsmanship and premium materials. AGL 2.0 watches are made exclusively from the highest-grade materials. 316L stainless steel cases, Italian fine leather straps, and scratch-resistant Sapphire crystals are included in all our watches.

 

The Case, Crown & Crystal:

 

All AGL 2.0 designs are vintage and pristine. Made from the highest-grade 316L stainless steel brushed finish case and equipped with a precision-machined large onion style push-down crown that conveys the vintage style of the watches.

The watches also come with a double domed scratch-resistant sapphire crystal with an anti-reflective coating. 

                                            CHRONOGRAPH PILOT WATCH

Sapphire crystals revolutionized the watch industry. Reserved for the finest watches, you can forget about scratched glass. Made to withstand the most extreme conditions. All AGL 2.0 come with durable crystals that make our watches almost indestructible.

 

The Straps

There's leather, and then there's Italian leather. Made on centuries of tradition and craftsmanship, only the finest Italian leather is good enough for AGL 2.0. watches.

Leather straps are equipped with a stainless-steel pin buckle with the F logo embossed for authenticity.

The leather straps include a quick-release feature, which makes it super easy to remove or swap the straps anytime you want. All you have to do is pull the pin. 

 

 Don't be afraid in the dark!

If you are a watch enthusiast and know about lumes, then you definitely know what BGW9 is.

All AGL 2.0 series will be brightened in the dark by LumiNova BGW9.

BGW9 is the most popular lume as they are naturally white  during the day and get super bright in the dark and last for a very long time. They are also one of the most expensive lumes in the industry.

 

DIMENSIONS & SPECS:

                     SWISS CHRONOGRAPH QUARTZ CALIBER 5021 DIMENSIONS

42 mm brushed stainless steel case

Chronograph Functions: 1/1 Second & 30 Min sub-dials

Date at 6 O'Clock

Double domed sapphire crystal with Anti-reflective coating

Precision machined dials

Italian leather straps with pin buckle

22 mm wire style lugs

Swiss Ronda Quartz 5021 Chronograph movement

Decorated back case 

10 ATM water resistant

BGW9 Lume

Screw down large onion style crown with embossed logo

                               JAPAN AUTOMATIC CALIBER 8217 DIMENSIONS

 

42 mm brushed stainless steel case

Double domed sapphire crystal with Anti-reflective coating

Precision machined dials with curved date window

Italian leather straps with pin buckle

 22 mm wire style lugs

Japan Automatic Miyota 8217 movement with decorated rotor

24 Hour Sub-Dial at 9 O'clock position

Decorated back case with see through glass

10 ATM water resistant

BGW9 Lume

Screw down large onion style crown with embossed logo

42 mm brushed stainless steel case

Double domed sapphire crystal with Anti-reflective coating

Precision machined dials with curved date window

Italian leather straps with pin buckle

22 mm wire style lugs

SWISS Automatics ETA 2824 / Japan Automatic Miyota 9015 movement with decorated rotors

Decorated back case with see through glass

10 ATM water resistant

BGW9 Lume

Screw down large onion style crown with embossed logo

 

The Movements

Swiss Caliber ETA 2824 Automatic Movement

The ETA caliber 2824 is one of the most well-known and most recognized movements in the watch industry. It has been in production since 1982 , has 25 jewels with 36 hours of power reserve.  ETA 2824 movement will keep your time  accurate for a very long time.

Miyota Caliber 9015 Automatic

The Miyota 9015 is a mechanical movement mechanism that features automatic winding, hand winding, date, and three central hands. The power reserve is over 42 hours, and it beats at 28.800 bph (beats per hour).

The Miyota 9015 is the mechanism of choice for high-end micro-brand watches. It's an everlasting workhorse that is accurate and lasts for a very long time.

Miyota Caliber 8217 Automatic

Miyota 8217 is a robust mechanism with 21 jewels and a 40-hour power reserve. The movement has 21.600 bph (beats per hour). The 8217 also has a 24-Hour sub-dial function at the 9 o'clock position.

 

Swiss Ronda 5021

The Swiss Made 5021 caliber by Ronda is a workhorse movement that never stops. It features a chronograph (1/1 seconds and 30-minute sub-dials) and a date window at the 6 o'clock position. The Ronda 5021 has a battery life of 54 months!

AD-ONS

We are also offering some sweet Ad-ons when you make a pledge. 

Leather Zulu Straps: US$ 25 each or 3 for US$59

Please note that all watches already come with leather straps. The Zulu straps  shown below can be purchased as an additional strap in the Ad-on section of rewards. 

Parachute Style Straps Add-Ons

$CAN 25 each or all 3 for CAN$59 for all 3 Straps!

 

 

Warranty

Back us with peace of mind. On top of getting these watches at great prices, each watch is also backed by a 2 Year International Warranty.

Time Frame

-July 2020 - Jan 2021: Porotype and test phase

-March 2021: Kickstarter Live

-April : Tooling phase

-May : Production phase

-July: Quality Control phase 

-September: Shipping to backers

 

Our past campaigns show that we know what we’re doing. The designs and tech drawings are ready. Prototyping and testing are done. The initial feedback we received from our customers is outstanding.

All we need to turn the prototypes into products is your help. We need to meet our factory’s minimum quantity requirements. And this is only going to be possible with your support.

By making a pledge, you will receive a high-quality Ferro & Company fighter plane watch at a special Kickstarter price.

We’re giving you the chance to look and feel like a WWII fighter pilot.

 

Are you ready to show your bravery?

Make a pledge today.

Thank You

Thank you for taking your time to view this project. We hope that you are as passionate as we are about Ferro & Co. watches. We’re always available if you have any questions. Don’t be shy and reach out to us.

 

Make a pledge today if you want to receive a well crafted fighter pilot watch.


 

Risks and challenges

For over 5 years, we have worked with a very reputable watch manufacturer that is mainly focused on manufacturing luxurious quality watches. Our communications have always been smooth and fast as they have many professional technicians available. We have set the delivery time to September of 2021 to ensure that all backers will receive their watches on time as promised. This delivery date will enable us to overcome any problems that might occur during manufacturing or delivery. To ensure that every watch is created to standard and delivered in time, we will be maintaining constant contact with the factory during the entire process of production. No matter what, we will update our backers during production.

story:
Hi all,

I am Isabella Zanconato, 35 years old, a normal person that works in a Banks and that, during the isolation two months period due to COVID 19, I started thinking to create something that could embrace the sustainability and diversity matters. We are living in the same Planet that we have to respect and I think that doing sport with sustainable and really comfortable clothes will be have a plus value. Since May 2020 I started approaching PADEL (is a racket sport similar to tennis) and due to the lack of nice and comfortable and sustainable sport clothes I decided to build up and develop an eco-sustainable sports brand, 100% made in Italy (design and manufacturing). The additional plus value are the fabrics because they are made with ECONYL sewing thread, regenerated from pre and post consumer waste materials such as fishing nets, carpet fluff, rigid tulle, etc; materials that reached the end of their life cycle and which, instead of being disposed in a landfill, are recovered and regenerated through a complex physico-chemical breakdown process. At the launch of the project I would like to focus mainly on Women who want to play sports with the feeling of having a second skin without the annoying sensation of tight clothes. With the project I will create suitable outfit for all types of bodies because everyone has the right to play sports and feeling comfortable and confident. We are all beautiful in our different bodies.

Hi all,
I am Isabella Zanconato, 35 years old, a normal person that works in a Banks and that, during the isolation two months period due to COVID 19, I started thinking to create something that could embrace the sustainability and diversity matters. We are living in the same Planet that we have to respect and I think that doing sport with sustainable and really comfortable clothes will be have a plus value. Since May 2020 I started approaching PADEL (is a racket sport similar to tennis) and due to the lack of nice and comfortable and sustainable sport clothes I decided to build up and develop an eco-sustainable sports brand, 100% made in Italy (design and manufacturing). The additional plus value are the fabrics because they are made with ECONYL sewing thread, regenerated from pre and post consumer waste materials such as fishing nets, carpet fluff, rigid tulle, etc; materials that reached the end of their life cycle and which, instead of being disposed in a landfill, are recovered and regenerated through a complex physico-chemical breakdown process. At the launch of the project I would like to focus mainly on Women who want to play sports with the feeling of having a second skin without the annoying sensation of tight clothes. With the project I will create suitable outfit for all types of bodies because everyone has the right to play sports and feeling comfortable and confident. We are all beautiful in our different bodies.

story:
Your new smart safety-wearable.

With Crewbands, we developed an easy-to-use system that alerts instantly in case of an emergency and shows vital information for the rescue operation on the screens of connected phones (no cell signal required). Our hardware will support the search and rescue operation, even help to prevent it.

Crewbands are solar powered, improve both the connection quality to the app as well as the working range and are equipped with a smart water sensor. The technical design and circuit board have been optimised for energy efficiency, connection stability and daily use.

When spending your day on a boat, preferably in the sun, you might not want to constantly be reminded of possible mishaps. This is why we tried to minimise the size of the Crewband and keep it light. You will be agile and free, but always safe - this is our premise.

We also wanted to create a device that can be worn 24/7, without first having to attach it to your safety vest or jacket. The energy efficiency we achieved allows for up to 2 days of complete darkness, after which you might want to charge your Crewbands using any light source available to you - even a lamp will suffice.

Want to try the system first?

Our apps are free of charge, so you can download and try them out any time. If you want to test the system first, simply connect to your fitness tracker or smartwatch. That's right, you can also use them as safety wristband. Of course, the connection stability and range will depend on the hardware you use, and we cannot speak for how good it will be.

There is a solution for this as well, your very own Crewband.

The start of Team Crewbands.

After thorough testing in rivers, lakes and the sea, we decided to talk to professional sailors and fellow developers. Their feedback encouraged us to proceed and make this product real.

During the Vienna Race of the Austrian Sailboat Racing Series, we showed the prototype to sailing professionals and enthusiasts. They did not only like our product, but also our presentation - especially the part where they got to throw one of us in the water constantly.

As we are ocean enthusiasts, we had to tip our hat to one of the great oceanographers. We mean this quite literally, which is why we wear red beanies - which you can purchase as well, check out our rewards.

You made our day and helped fund the project!

Help us to grow even bigger and get your Crewband with the special Kickstarter discount!

                                       

Prototypes

 

Timeline 

Risks and challenges

We have been working on Crewbands for over a year and developed the key parts such as the electronic, watertight wristband and Android (available) and iOS app (awaiting approval any day now). The founding team are experts in their field and know the necessary steps to bring Crewbands to the market.

To gain more real life experience with the quality and reliability of a Crewband, the next step is to conduct a big test round with sailing experts over several month in different conditions. This may lead to insights that make changes to the current version necessary.

However, we know that life is not always fully predictable and there might be unforeseen troubles waiting for us on the road to mass production. We have a great network of industry partners and other startups that have manufactured products before. We will further leverage this network to ensure we can bring our Crewbands to life and into your hands.

The main challenges we see are:

Bluetooth Range: 
To prevent false alarms, a good bluetooth connection reliability is key. We will put a lot of effort into optimising the connection range in specialised laboratories to ensure a good user experience.

Watertightness: 
Packing so much technology in so little space at this price point challenges our goal to make each Crewband safe to dive with up to 10m. We put a lot of effort into assuring you will anyway be able to wear the Crewbands 24/7, even if you dive for the anchor.

Certifications 
To sell Crewbands in Europe, North America and other selected regions, we need to comply, amongst others, with CE and FCC certifications. This process is complex and can potentially require more time than expected.

With your help we can and will make it happen!

We will further leverage this network to ensure we can bring our Crewbands to life and into your hands.The main challenges we see are:Bluetooth Range: To prevent false alarms, a good bluetooth connection reliability is key. We will put a lot of effort into optimising the connection range in specialised laboratories to ensure a good user experience.Watertightness: Packing so much technology in so little space at this price point challenges our goal to make each Crewband safe to dive with up to 10m. We put a lot of effort into assuring you will anyway be able to wear the Crewbands 24/7, even if you dive for the anchor.Certifications To sell Crewbands in Europe, North America and other selected regions, we need to comply, amongst others, with CE and FCC certifications. This process is complex and can potentially require more time than expected.With your help we can and will make it happen!

story:
OUR HISTORY AND STORY

Kwame Baah Brand's founder, George Kwame Baah, grew up in Ghana under impoverished conditions. He was blessed to make it to the USA as an adult, where he attended university and got a job as an engineer. Whenever he visited his family in Ghana, his desire grew to find a sustainable avenue to help raise them out of poverty. Recollecting his childhood experience of making his own shoes from recycled tires, he was inspired to begin a shoe company. His vision was to design shoes and employ men and women in Ghana to handcraft them for the US market. Thus, in 2011, Kwame Baah Brand was founded with the mission to provide sustainable, economically just employment for skilled artisans in Ghana. We blend contemporary designs with traditional fabrics from Ghana, producing quality handcrafted footwear and accessories that are comfortable, stylish, durable, and affordable. We source all our leather from US suppliers and Italy. 

 

Kwame Baah trains artisans from George's hometown, Akim-Oda, and nearby regions to make sandals and accessories following George's own designs. Currently we have eleven artisans that handcraft our designs at our workshop in Ghana. The living wage that this job provides for our employees has enabled them to improve their lives in significant ways. Many have been able to provide their children with quality education, and some have rebuilt marriage relationships that had been eroding due to financial hardship. 

We need to produce closed-toe footwear to allow continuous operation throughout the year. Your support in helping us to obtain the remaining mold and last will help continue this life-improving ministry. We are grateful to all those who will contribute to this campaign, enabling us to keep lifting people out of poverty in Ghana.  

 

 

 

 

 

All leather high cut sneakers, with two side zippers that allow easy slip on. The hand braided leather adds a decorative yet earthy touch. These handcrafted sneakers come with a double memory foam footbed that makes them great for lots of walking and standing. 

"Customer-Kevin said, I have these in black. These are a great men’s sneaker. I love the zipper. The shoe has a nice woven basket pattern where shoe laces are normally located. Slip them on, zip up and out the door. I also wear them with no socks. It’s been so far so good. I plan on eventually ordering a brown pair" 

 

The vegan collection, featuring colorful kente woven and two elastic band, with double memory foam footbed. This kente woven sneaker keeps your foot comfy and secure.

"Customer Sean from New-York said Amazing comfy stylish sneakers" and "Tamara from Dothan said Just bought my hot pink and yellow sneakers. They are so comfortable. Lots of cushioning for long walks. They are stylish and very well constructed".

 

All leather low cut sneakers, with two side elastic band allow easy slip on. The hand braided leather adds a decorative yet earthy touch. These handcrafted sneakers come with a double memory foam footbed that makes them great for lots of walking and standing. 

"Customer Mary said I love these shoes. I purchased them to complete my uniform and felt these were a perfect addition to look presentable for my clients".

 

 

About our fabric- Kente waving process:

Kente is an Akan word meaning basket, but the Akan also refer to the material as “nwentoma,” meaning woven cloth. Kente is made by weaving cotton thread in a loom. The material is itself a remarkable product of art and engineering as well as a significant part of Ghana’s history and culture. Kente is very expensive cloth and for many centuries it was mainly worn by royalty. The cost is mainly due to the intricate process of weaving, which takes much time and human energy. A strip of Kente cloth (similar to the width and length of a graduation stole sash) could take an entire day’s work by the most skilled craftsman! The way Kente cloth is woven and the types of patterns that are created are both wonders to behold. 

 

Often, stories, ideas, or proverbs are expressed through the Kente cloth.Every color has meaning, so the way they are used in various patterns, sometimes in combination with the Adinkra symbols, work together to express a specific idea, often with multiple layers of meaning. Below are some of the meanings associated with many of the common colors in Kente cloth;

black: maturation, intensified spiritual energy

blue: peacefulness, harmony and love

green: vegetation, planting, harvesting, growth, spiritual renewal

gold: royalty, wealth, high status, glory, spiritual purity

grey: healing and cleansing rituals; associated with ash

maroon: the color of mother earth; associated with healing

pink: assoc. with the female essence of life; a mild, gentle aspect of red

purple: assoc. with feminine aspects of life; usually worn by women

red: political and spiritual moods

silver: serenity, purity, joy; associated with the moon

white: purification, sanctification rites and festive occasions

yellow: preciousness, royalty, wealth, fertility, beaut

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Every project has risks. Most risks can be mitigated with careful planning, collaboration, experience, and communication. Others are just out of your control to prevent. We have endeavored to assess potential risks and be as prepared as possible to overcome any obstacles. The Kwame Baah Team includes people who have successfully managed complex engineering projects that were high risk.

GENERAL - As part of the risk management analysis for this project, we have limited some rewards based on our production capacity. We cannot control all risks, however, we can control how we communicate them to you. Part of being a backer for Kwame Baah means that you have a front row seat for the making and delivering these amazing shoes. Therefore, we will be transparent with all our backers on any unforeseen issue that comes up. We plan to keep you updated every step of the way!

SHIPPING - We have carefully chosen our shipping partners in an effort to ensure on time delivery of products to all our backers.

QUALITY - We handcraft all of our designs with the highest quality in mind. When an item is handcrafted rather than factory made, there is the potential for discrepancies. Therefore, we have set up a system of quality control inspections that minimize discrepancies.

MATERIALS - Since the kente cloth is handwoven in an intricate and varied pattern, the colors and patterns may vary slightly from shoe to shoe.

story:
They're Back…and They're Better!

Rubber inner tubes. As kids, we loved them. We spent hours playing with them. But where are they now? They’ve all but disappeared, and no one has looked to improve upon them. Today’s cheap, plastic vinyl tubes lack durability, are hard to inflate, and seldom last more than a few hours before they burst. Most are very toxic, are a huge waste of money, and continue to pile up in our landfills.

And so, entrepreneurs Scott McCrindle and Steve Miller bring you the Übertüb (pronounced Ubertube). It’s the classic rubber inner tube - reinvented, re-engineered, and re-designed for you and your family. Our patent-pending, recessed valve system makes rapid inflation and deflation a snap. Take it anywhere and pack it up with ease in the quick-dry mesh storage sack! It’s extremely durable, so you’ll never have to worry about it bursting or the seams coming apart.

And for the first time ever, you can have a rubber Übertüb in color! We’ve worked with leading engineers to develop a durable colored rubber. This brings a whole new level of awesomeness and fun to the Übertüb! Re-discover this simple, awesome, and timeless toy with your friends and family!

And For a Short Time, Get An Übertüb At Wholesale Pricing!

By contributing your support, you can be one of the very first to get an Übertüb. This is a limited-time opportunity to own this, award-winning, innovative, and ground-breaking product at a huge discount over retail pricing. We are making the medium size available first, and the other two sizes will be available as stretch goals once we've met our initial target - more on this later.

Proceeds from the campaign will help us complete the final work required to get these tubes off the assembly line–injection moulds and tooling, materials research and development, quality and safety testing, legal and regulatory compliance work, and retail/e-commerce packaging design.

What Makes the Übertüb Different From The Plastic Vinyl Inflatables?

We‘ve re-thought the classic rubber inner tube we all know and love in a multitude of different ways. Finally, an end to low-quality inflatable outdoor products that leave us all feeling deflated.

Easy to Inflate and Deflate

We’ve designed a valve system that allows you to use just about whatever you have on hand to inflate your tube. A gas station air pump, your portable air compressor, a foot/hand pump, or even our easy-to-use manual inflation tool will quickly do the trick. A check valve keeps all the air inside your Übertüb while you screw on the convenient cap that locks all the parts in place.

You will never again have to struggle to deflate your tube. Just unscrew the valve assembly and all the air rushes out, allowing you to quickly roll up your Übertüb, or fold it flat. A 42” tube deflates in mere seconds so you’ll be off and ready to go. Your old inner tube sure didn’t do that!

Durable and Dependable

Constructed using industrial-strength butyl rubber, your Übertüb is ready for just about any punishment that you or your kids can dish out. We’ve tried all kinds of ways to destroy it and the Übertüb just keeps coming back for more abuse. Every part of the product is designed and crafted with quality in mind. These are built to last–just like the old days.

Multiple Color Choices

The old carbon-black tubes were pretty darn good, but they looked a bit drab. Not anymore! The Übertüb is available in several colors of rubber. We’ve worked with leading rubber compounding companies to produce a UV-stable, durable, and safe recreation-specific colored material. Now you can have it both ways–real rubber and your favorite color, too.

Convenient Storage and Portability

With no trapped air inside, your Übertüb slides easily into the included quick-dry mesh bag and it’s ready for next time. Its small packed size makes it a breeze to toss into a suitcase, load in a trunk, or stow it wherever you want. Storing and transporting your Übertüb just became a whole lot more convenient.

Safer, More Comfortable Valve

At long last – a tube with a valve that doesn’t jab you while you’re swimming or sliding down a snow-covered hill. The entire valve assembly is flush and contoured with the inside surface of the Übertüb. And it looks really slick to boot. What’s not to love?

Multi-Season Fun

Why pack away your Übertüb when it gets cold outside? Many of us remember hurtling ourselves down the snow-covered hills, bouncing harmlessly off jumps and bumps. Get your kids (young and old) outside in the winter to enjoy some healthy outdoor play.

Personalize or Repair

Make your Übertüb your very own. With a variety of instant-stick rubber patches in a variety of shapes, colors, and sizes, your tube will be one-of-a-kind. And while we have every confidence in our product’s durability, if you do somehow manage to spring a leak, simply fix it. Why throw away what can easily be made new again?

Recyclable

Designing for the environment is a key Übertüb company value. Every step of the manufacturing process has been designed to have a minimal impact on the environment. We even offer a replacement warranty…so if you ever find a way to destroy your Übertüb, we’ll take it back, and reprocess the rubber to produce new products. We are always thinking of ways to leave things a little better than we found them. And that means re-thinking how we build our product so that we remove waste from the equation.

Core Company Values

Übertüb is committed to business practices and operations that are sustainable by nature in terms of their social, environmental, and economic impacts. We believe that the long-term health of a business entity requires that all of these factors remain in balance, such that the contributions of the corporation extend beyond the manufacture of quality physical products.

Our corporation is founded on the idea that providing quality recreational equipment to kids young and old helps to promote wellness and happiness. We also have plans to establish or work with agencies that help encourage people to become more active and to get outside.

Risks & Challenges

We have worked very hard to line up quality manufacturers and suppliers to build the Übertüb. But bringing even the simplest of products to market is not without its challenges. We’ve gone to great lengths to anticipate any potential hiccups with the design and development of the Übertüb, and we are committed to resolving every challenge that comes our way.

The following is a list of some of the work that remains to be done–and work that we will be able to complete with the proceeds from this campaign, should we succeed.

ENGINEERING

  • Design and production of injection moulds
  • Development of equipment and procedures to affix the valve assembly to the inflatable substrate
  • Design and evaluation of special thermoplastics to withstand high temperatures and pressures involved with tube fabrication

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

  • Utility patent pending covering novel aspects of valve functionality and construction
  • Industrial design patent pending covering aesthetic arrangement of recessed valve and inflatable ring bladder

MANUFACTURING

  • Ongoing assessment of a number of possible manufacturing partners

DISTRIBUTION

  • Continuing evaluation of the possible engagement with distribution partners for retail and e-commerce fulfillment

COST OF GOODS

  • Work continues to secure sources for quality raw materials, components, and packaging

MATERIALS

  • R&D is in progress to determine final compounding formulation to satisfy product safety and performance requirements

BRANDING

  • Trademark application is being processed for the brand name
  • Wordmark and logo have been submitted to the USPTO for registration

PACKAGE DESIGN

  • We are continuing to investigate ways to produce attractive and functional packaging materials for both retail and e-commerce applications

REGULATORY

  • A third-party will need to be engaged to certify compliance with applicable North American, International, and European toy safety standards (like EN 71).

Our Commitment

To sum up, we’ve already made tremendous progress toward bringing this great product to market. We’ve absorbed the costs that we’ve needed to in order to get this far, but to truly put the gears into motion, we now need the support of the crowd-funding community. The remaining work outlined above and other related tasks will all incur significant upfront and ongoing costs.

Thank you for your support and please know that we are fully committed to making this fantastic product a reality!

story:
Why lug around a purse AND a range bag?

Simplify your life with just one bag that is durable enough to handle all your range gear and fashionable enough to carry every day!


NORB-C (No Ordinary Range Bag - Compact)


With your help and support, the NORB-C, will be headed to production.  The NORB-C is the newest range bag in the OffHand Gear series, and on this indiegogo page you will find details about NORB-C and exclusive rewards for your support.  For more information on the original NORB or other OffHand Gear products, please visit the website at www.OffHandGear.com.   



NORB-C has been on the design table for the last year. With prototyping now done, I am ready to add it to the line up and create a NORB series of bags. The original NORB ( No Ordinary Range Bag ) has been on the market for over a year and has been thoroughly tested and reviewed.  The NORB range bag is considered a unique, innovative product for female gun enthusiasts, and NORB-C will bring a smaller, more everyday option to the series.

NORB-C is the next step in creating an entire line of bags and gear designed completely around the needs and comfort of women.


Casual shooters and professionals alike use, abuse and love the original NORB. After months of consistent use I have received emails from ladies about how impressed they are with the durability and functionality of NORB.  The same thought out design and materials will be used in the making of NORB-C. 

  • 500 denier Cordura fabric from Kryptek Outdoor Group is water resistant 
  • Signature bungee strap
  • Brushed nickel metal hardware
  • Water resistant zippers
  • Built in range pads using SlipNot or tricot fabrics
  • Heavy duty Velcro
  • Military grade sewing
  • Made in the USA

Women of all sizes and shape have found the bungee strap one of the most loved things about NORB. If you have ever worn a range bag with a shoulder strap, you have probably experienced the frustration of it sliding off. This is where I started with the NORB series design. I wanted a strap that was thin enough to sit "in" your shoulder, much like a bra strap, comfortable either cross body or side carry, durable enough to handle and distribute the weight of all the gear, taking stress off your body while walking. Viola - the bungee strap was born and once you try it I think you too will be pleased with the result.

The NORB (No Ordinary Range Bag) series is designed around the busy lifestyle of women with jobs, kids, errands, training and range time. The NORB original bag stays slim while having room for a wallet, touch up makeup, hair ties, phone and of course all your range gear; magazines, ammo, eye and ear protection and even your cleaning kit!! 

No, there isn't room for the kitchen sink, but who needs one of those at the range?

Use it for the range or everyday... 

let the NORB series fit your busy lifestyle!


While the NORB-C is designed to hold less than its big sister - it still has plenty of room for your pistol (full size or compact), ammo, extra magazines, eye protection, phone, credit cards, keys, personal items, makeup bag & even a small tablet.



Is it a range bag or a concealed carry bag?  

Why not both?  There are many women who carry the NORB original daily. The concept behind the NORB series was to create a bag that made range time for women easier while also being less obvious. Although conceal carry handbags look great, they typically can't handle the weight of all your range gear. With the NORB series, you get the best of both worlds: durable enough for all your gear AND stylish enough to be your every day conceal carry bag, too. 




The perks in this Indiegogo campaign include the ability to choose which NORB is best for you.  If you are looking for a range bag that fits all your gear into one bag then NORB is the bag for you. If you are looking for something smaller for those quick trips, the NORB-C is the perfect choice.         

Your lifestyle. Your Range Bag.


Hello, my name is Sandi and I am the owner/designer of the OffHand Gear brand of products. When I started this journey 3 years ago, it was with a strong desire to bring new, innovative women's products to the firearms industry. Not just pink colors on men's products, but actually designed to fit us women and our lifestyles. I started the company by designing three fun, USA made ladies t-shirts. Since then, I have expanded the brand to include quite a few more t-shirts, the NORB series and a selection of AR15 hand guards. In the future, I look forward to bringing you more products that are currently in design/development stage. I hope you, the supporters, enjoy the brand, continue to use my products and above all else, find OffHand Gear makes your training easier, more frequent and even fun!





My suppliers and sewing partners are some of the best in the business and I have a solid working relationship with them. With NORB-C being the second bag in the series,  I do not foresee any issues with the delivery timeline.

I look forward to shipping your order and hearing how NORB has changed the way you feel about range bags. 

Thank you!

Sandi

Owner/Designer 

www.OffHandGear.com

_____________________________

NORB & NORB-C are trademarks of OffHand Gear

Special thanks to professional shooters TacTissy, Michelle Jean & to One Shot Industries, The Z Spot & Baxley Fine Photography

_____________________________

NEW REWARD ADDED 5.30.15

1 - Dopesett Tee

_____________________________

NEW REWARD ADDED 5.29.15

1 - 556 Tee by One Shot Industries + 2 - PVC patches from The Z Spot
story_txt:
Why lug around a purse AND a range bag?
Simplify your life with just one bag that is durable enough to handle all your range gear and fashionable enough to carry every day!



NORB-C (No Ordinary Range Bag - Compact)

 With your help and support, the NORB-C, will be headed to production.  The NORB-C is the newest range bag in the OffHand Gear series, and on this indiegogo page you will find details about NORB-C and exclusive rewards for your support.  For more information on the original NORB or other OffHand Gear products, please visit the website at www.OffHandGear.com.   



NORB-C has been on the design table for the last year. With prototyping now done, I am ready to add it to the line up and create a NORB series of bags. The original NORB ( No Ordinary Range Bag ) has been on the market for over a year and has been thoroughly tested and reviewed.  The NORB range bag is considered a unique, innovative product for female gun enthusiasts, and NORB-C will bring a smaller, more everyday option to the series.


NORB-C is the next step in creating an entire line of bags and gear designed completely around the needs and comfort of women.Casual shooters and professionals alike use, abuse and love the original NORB. After months of consistent use I have received emails from ladies about how impressed they are with the durability and functionality of NORB.  The same thought out design and materials will be used in the making of NORB-C. 


500 denier Cordura fabric from Kryptek Outdoor Group is water resistant 
Signature bungee strap
Brushed nickel metal hardware
Water resistant zippers
Built in range pads using SlipNot or tricot fabrics
Heavy duty Velcro
Military grade sewing
Made in the USA


 American made products for women that make self-protection and training easier and more comfortable.


 


Women of all sizes and shape have found the bungee strap one of the most loved things about NORB. If you have ever worn a range bag with a shoulder strap, you have probably experienced the frustration of it sliding off. This is where I started with the NORB series design. I wanted a strap that was thin enough to sit "in" your shoulder, much like a bra strap, comfortable either cross body or side carry, durable enough to handle and distribute the weight of all the gear, taking stress off your body while walking. Viola - the bungee strap was born and once you try it I think you too will be pleased with the result.





The NORB (No Ordinary Range Bag) series is designed around the busy lifestyle of women with jobs, kids, errands, training and range time. The NORB original bag stays slim while having room for a wallet, touch up makeup, hair ties, phone and of course all your range gear; magazines, ammo, eye and ear protection and even your cleaning kit!! 
No, there isn't room for the kitchen sink, but who needs one of those at the range?




Use it for the range or everyday... 
let the NORB series fit your busy lifestyle!

While the NORB-C is designed to hold less than its big sister - it still has plenty of room for your pistol (full size or compact), ammo, extra magazines, eye protection, phone, credit cards, keys, personal items, makeup bag & even a small tablet.










Is it a range bag or a concealed carry bag?  
Why not both?  There are many women who carry the NORB original daily. The concept behind the NORB series was to create a bag that made range time for women easier while also being less obvious. Although conceal carry handbags look great, they typically can't handle the weight of all your range gear. With the NORB series, you get the best of both worlds: durable enough for all your gear AND stylish enough to be your every day conceal carry bag, too. 








The perks in this Indiegogo campaign include the ability to choose which NORB is best for you.  If you are looking for a range bag that fits all your gear into one bag then NORB is the bag for you. If you are looking for something smaller for those quick trips, the NORB-C is the perfect choice.         
Your lifestyle. Your Range Bag.




The goal of $6700 on this project will provide all the materials and labor necessary for the first production run of NORB-C in the standard Kryptek Typhon fabric.  If and when the goal is exceeded, backers will receive an exclusive look at fabric choices and have the ability to vote on which fabric will be added to the series.




Once additional fabrics are voted on and added to the project, backers choosing the NORB-C reward level will have the choice between the standard Kryptek Typhon or the additional fabric choice(s) for their reward. 




Hello, my name is Sandi and I am the owner/designer of the OffHand Gear brand of products.  When I started this journey 3 years ago, it was with a strong desire to bring new, innovative women's products to the firearms industry. Not just pink colors on men's products, but actually designed to fit us women and our lifestyles. I started the company by designing three fun, USA made ladies t-shirts. Since then, I have expanded the brand to include quite a few more t-shirts, the NORB series and a selection of AR15 hand guards. In the future, I look forward to bringing you more products that are currently in design/development stage.  I hope you, the supporters, enjoy the brand, continue to use my products and above all else, find OffHand Gear makes your training easier, more frequent and even fun!







My suppliers and sewing partners are some of the best in the business and I have a solid working relationship with them. With NORB-C being the second bag in the series,  I do not foresee any issues with the delivery timeline.
I look forward to shipping your order and hearing how NORB has changed the way you feel about range bags. 
Thank you!
Sandi
Owner/Designer

story:
MySunBag, an innovative solution for easy shade on the beach. Carries all your belongings and a foldable beach umbrella, all wrapped in a stylish colourful bag. 
Take the inside bag out and use MySunBag as a reliable and  a practical solution to stabilize a beach umbrella on the beach. 



Only few steps to set it up:

IT'S NEVER BEEN EASIER TO GET SHADE WHEN AND WHERE YOU WANT IT


Some fun facts about MySunBag


· You can set up MySunBag anywhere on the beach

· Be environmentally friendly everyday by replacing the plastic bag, with the inner        bag of MySunBag at the gym or the market

· MySunBag weights 0.34 KG (0.75Lbs). And 1.8 KG (3.88Lbs) with MyParella inside

· Comfortable and stylish, easy to setup and easy to carry






How it all began

In September 2014, my friends and I went camping for a weekend at the beach and tried to set up a beach umbrella that kept on falling. We took a fabric bag and filled it with sand, using it as a strong base to anchor the beach umbrella. It worked! And inspired me to develop and design a multi-purpose bag. 


The Design Process

The development process was fun and full of excitement. I sought to create a light, a durable product that is stable in a strong wind. 

In December 2014, Helek studio (textile design experts) and I started working together by testing three models of potential designs for MySunBag. 

The best design was made of a strong fabric with a rounded base which gave stability. It was able to hold a beach umbrella pole at various angles with a minimum amount of sand. 

In early 2015 we conducted field tests on the beach to test the bag's strength, using large and small beach umbrella adjustments to withstand strong winds.

By mid-2015 we had the final prototype. Meanwhile we concentrated on customizing the perfect beach umbrella which we named MyParella, to fit into

MySunBag & with a special hook to secure it we are ready to go!

MyParella 




MyParella together with MySunBag make a portable sun-shade kit.  
Turning your day at the beach into an enjoyable and protected experience. 


Available now in three colors:


Red  


Yellow


Baby Blue


Reaching above 5,000 backers we select 3 different color Play

Choosing color will be at the end of the campaign!



· Just take MySunBag and go!




FAQ

1. When can I choose the color of MySunBag?

We will send out a survey during the campaign in which you can select your color. If you've purchased more than one MySunBag, you can choose different colors! 
However MyParella comes in white only. 

2. When will I receive MySunBag Original?

We can guarantee the first delivery to be shipped by mid-July.

3. How do I fill MySunBag with sand?

The double layered lining inside functions as a shovel, making it easy to fill the bag with sand. Spread it on the ground and collect the sand by pulling the lining up.

4. How do I empty MySunBag from the sand in the end of use?

Easy! Turn MySunBag upside down, grab the handle at the base of the bag and tip out the sand.

5. What is MyParella?

MyParella is a beach umbrella with a pole divided in to 3 parts. We nicknamed it MyParella (combining parasol and a beach umbrella).

6. Does MySunBag work with all beach umbrella size?

Yes, *all types of beach umbrellas up to 2m diameter will stand and hold, but only Myparella will be secured in a strong wind. Hang the handles of MySunBag on the hook, attached to Myparella pole.

*Make sure to take the tip at the end of the pole out. 

7. Can I play with the kids, lean or sit on MySunBag when it full with sand?

Yes. Sure you can!

8. What kind of material is MySunBag made of?

MySunBag is made from D600, a durable polyester fabric that is commonly used in the military industry. The inner bag is a 100% polyester.

9. Can I wash MySunBag using a laundry machine? 
Of course! The inner bag is easy to wash. But as for MySunBag a few grain of sand will dry the day after and you can tip them off easily again anytime. We don’t recommend machine wash to wash out sand. 

10. Can you ship international?

Yes, we can ship worldwide.

11. Can I become a distributor?

Yes.  Please send us a private message and we will get back to you. 

12. Do you have a patent?

Yes. MySunBag is trademarked and registered design in: Australia, Europe and Israel and soon pending registration in the US. We will protect our Patents / brands / images / retailers / resellers to the fullest extent of the law.


Risks & Challenges

MySunBag is the first product in a series of exciting beach accessories. This is our 1st Crowdfunding campaign and by demand we will Springboard a family of colorful and functional products under the brand name "creationb" to use anywhere and anytime.

Along the process of development of creating MySunBag we have realized it cannot be MySunBag without its MyParella.

Our challenge is to deliver up to 10,000 units of MySunBag kit before the end of July 2016, without delay.

That's the only risk really.  

We believe that everyone should have their own stylish portable shade 

Thank You!

story:
When women have their period one of the biggest concerns is lack of protection during times of heavy flow. We sought to change that by having a product that is reliable for absorbing liquid, making it leak-proof, while have no side effects on the body.

 

To maximize comfort we selected pure cotton fabrics as the foundation for our Pinky Panty period underwear. Our Panty features soft cotton texture and absorbent, leak-proof materials to keep you protected through even the heaviest periods. You can also use it with any additional sanitary products you prefer.

Whether you are lying down, standing, sitting, or even running, Pinky Panty will protect against leaks during any and all activities.

Upon receiving funding, we would like to produce our products in large quantities while being able to give our backers a special price.

If our funding goals are reached successfully on time, starting in May 2018 our products will begin to be shipped to our fist backers.

We are shipping our fine products globally to reach all women around the world.

If you like our project, please share it on your social media, get the perks, and support us by donating for more perfect products.

 

 

 

Share our campaign with your friends.

Contact Us

Press: info@6119.mn;

How many perks can I choose from?

Please check the Perk section for more details. After you purchase a perk from Indiegogo.

When I can receive my order?    

We wlll be shipped out by the end May 2018. In the meantime, we will keep you updated on our progress and your order's expected delivery date. For shipment inquires please contact info@6119.mn

Where does Pinky Panty ship?    

Due to limited fulfillment capabilities, Pinky Panty can only be shipped to 35 territories worldwide. These territories include Austria, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Macau, Malaysia, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Russia, Singapore, Spain, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, United Kingdom, U.A.E, and the United States.

When do we start shipping?    

We begin shipping by the end of May 2018. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you’ve placed your order. The 6119 team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

Why order now?    

We are offering a discount on all pre-orders of Pinky Panty in return for your support.

Change of address?    

If you need to update your address, please contact our customer service team: info@6119mn.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?    

Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; pinky has no control over these charges.
