story:
COMPLETE THIS SURVEY IF YOU CHOSE THE PERK TO RECIEVE TWO WATCHES -------------------------------->https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/V7CY2FG

*Drop a comment with the Country or State you are from. At the end of the campaign we are going to select TWO people who comment to win a second watch for free! (1 random, 1 for the furthest order)

MIND THE GAP WATCHES was started by me, entrepreneur and watch lover Ryan Twomey. I was fed up with constantly seeing minimalist watches that had unoriginal dressy/ luxury designs, low quality materials, and excessive retail mark-ups. I wanted a watch built to match the casual/laid back sense of style that I and so many others enjoy. So, I set out to build Mind the Gap watches with 4 things in mind: 

  1. Casual appeal FIRST then professional
  2. High quality materials/movement 
  3. Fairly priced (half of what our competitors cost)
  4. Contemporary, urban design

Mind The Gap watches are built for the people who would rather kick back with some friends and order a pizza than go to a nice dinner. Our watches boast a texture on their faces similar to that of the grip tape on a skateboard giving it an urban, familiar feel. The bracelets have shoestring aglets on the end to compliment the urban style of the watches. The name pays homage to the the London underground which is the inspiration behind the brand. The unique style sets itself apart from other minimalist watches. The price is unbeatable and the quality is unmatched. 

Even though our watches and bracelets are crafted to be casual, they still will look great in a professional and even classy setting when you need them to. (scroll down to see all the styles)

We have purchased the molds, solidified our designs, and received our samples. Now, all we need to do is start manufacturing, which is where you come in! We have been in contact with the manufacturer for months and have created a strong relationship. Once we raise enough to cover the initial manufacturing order we will be able to bring these watches to life for you! We are offering 10 different watch variations just so we can make sure we have a style you can enjoy. All the while you take on zero risk. If we do not reach our goal we will refund all money to all of our awesome backers!

We have everything ready and the only missing piece we have left is you! We are prepared to fulfill all of our orders on time. We have a history with shipping in bulk from other businesses and we will be able to get these watches sent out effectively and efficiently!

RETAIL PRICE: $75 | EARLY BIRD PRICE: $55, Savings: $20-$85 (27%) |INDIEGOGO PRICE: $65, Savings: $10-$30 (15%)

Did I mention.... FREE DOMESTIC SHIPPING?

Four face designs:

  • MTG(001) - Black 
  • MTG(002) - White 
  • MTG(003) - Red 
  • MTG(004) - Grey

Three band types

  • Tan genuine leather
  • Black genuine leather
  • Black solid stainless steel

 

 

BRACELETS

 

If you are unfamiliar with what a "perk" is or how Indiegogo works, please check out this link!

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles... Basically, you are placing a pre-order for the watch and once I receive enough pre-orders, I will be able to fund the initial production order and you will get your watch, if I don't reach my goal you get your money back!

You might be thinking to yourself, How can we afford to sell $120 watches for $55?

Well. Basically by being honest, not greedy, and selling a product for a value of what it's actually worth rather than it's perceived worth. There is nothing proprietary about our methods; we just wanted to save you as much as possible. Also, having a single owner helps too!

We are going to work hard to continue this in the future by nixing things like expensive ad campaigns so we can consistently deliver our product at an affordable price.

We remove unnecessary mark-ups which sometimes can be upwards of 1000%!

In keeping with our philosophy for quality and affordable prices, we negotiated hard with our suppliers to make sure we get the best possible prices for all the materials and parts we use in our watches. We then passed these cost savings directly to you, our Indiegogo supporter! 

 

  1. Built to look casual first then professional.
  2. Urban minimalist design
  3. European inspiration
  4. Fair value price
  5. Case diameter is the perfect size built to fit any size wrist (40mm)
  6. Unique bracelet accent piece

There are many things that separate us from the competition but those are just a few! We have created the perfect blend of affordability and quality. 

  • Case Material: 316 low carbon, surgical grade stainless steel with Ion Plating
  • Case diameter: 40mm 
  • Face diameter: 34mm
  • Bezel width: 3mm
  • Band Material: 316L solid stainless steel or Genuine leather
  • Band width: 20mm
  • Buckle width: 25mm
  • Buckle material: 316L surgical grade solid stainless steel
  • Window material: hardened crystal mineral glass
  • Movement: Precision Japanese Quartz Miyota 2115
  • Water resistance: 5ATM (swimming, showers and light water use)

Japanese quartz watches are equipped with innovative and powerful features. Overall, Japanese quartz watches are known for accuracy and precision. In fact, they were used as the official timekeeper in many Olympic events.

Because they don’t have as many mechanical-moving parts, quartz watches last (almost) forever and require no maintenance (other than changing the battery every 3-5 years).

We are also so confident in our watches that we are proud to offer a two year manufacturer warranty!

Easy pull pin release makes switching out bands a breeze, even the stainless steel!

I created this brand to help the people like me express their true style with a fashionable casual watch. The principles that this brand is built on are to be honest, transparent and to give a fair price to everyone. We will never increase our prices just to increase our profits. We didn't only do this for us. We did this for you because we understand. We put every penny we had into starting this company, into the research and development, designs, and plenty of samples making sure it would be perfect for you. 

 We hope we did a good enough job! If not, please let us know how we can improve. We will be happy to answer any questions you may have!

The Impact

Most of the proceeds from this campaign will go into creating a whole line of quality, popularly priced watches. Your money will make it possible for young professionals to look good and make impressions on people during the most financially vulnerable time in their lives.

Along with this, if we raise

  • $15,000-20,000 --> 10% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the Wounded Warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.
  • $20,001-50,000 --> 15% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the Wounded Warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.
  • $50,001-$100,000--> 25% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the Wounded Warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.
  • >$100,001--> 50% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the wounded warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.

We are a company that believes in helping others when we can, so we are going to take advantage of this opportunity and not only help save you money but also improve the lives of our military men, women and their families around the country.

Risks & Challenges

Every company has obstacles to overcome and even though we are such a young company, we still have our fair share. One obstacle is the wait time. It takes 30 days for the production order to be finished so the sooner we raise the funds, the sooner we can place the order and the sooner you will get your watch! Our main obstacle, though, is the funding needed to cover the initial minimum order which is why we have come to Indiegogo! We will place the order as soon as possible so we can get your watches shipped to your door on time!

Also we will need your help to keep the momentum going once the campaign ends so we can keep providing these watches to the people who need them!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but you want to support us, share us with your friends and family to get the word out! Any little contribution works; even if it's you just telling one friend, we would be forever grateful! We need as many people as possible to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. We want you to BE A REBEL with Mind The Gap Watches and set yourself apart from the crowd.

Indiegogo makes it easy to share this campaign with their intuitive share tools!

Thank you so much from the whole team here at Mind the Gap Watches and we hope to see you back for updates over the next month!

 

Check us out on our social media below!
story_txt:
COMPLETE THIS SURVEY IF YOU CHOSE THE PERK TO RECIEVE TWO WATCHES -------------------------------->https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/V7CY2FG
*Drop a comment with the Country or State you are from. At the end of the campaign we are going to select TWO people who comment to win a second watch for free! (1 random, 1 for the furthest order)
MIND THE GAP WATCHES was started by me, entrepreneur and watch lover Ryan Twomey. I was fed up with constantly seeing minimalist watches that had unoriginal dressy/ luxury designs, low quality materials, and excessive retail mark-ups. I wanted a watch built to match the casual/laid back sense of style that I and so many others enjoy. So, I set out to build Mind the Gap watches with 4 things in mind: 

Casual appeal FIRST then professional
High quality materials/movement 
Fairly priced (half of what our competitors cost)
Contemporary, urban design



Mind The Gap watches are built for the people who would rather kick back with some friends and order a pizza than go to a nice dinner. Our watches boast a texture on their faces similar to that of the grip tape on a skateboard giving it an urban, familiar feel. The bracelets have shoestring aglets on the end to compliment the urban style of the watches. The name pays homage to the the London underground which is the inspiration behind the brand. The unique style sets itself apart from other minimalist watches. The price is unbeatable and the quality is unmatched. 
Even though our watches and bracelets are crafted to be casual, they still will look great in a professional and even classy setting when you need them to. (scroll down to see all the styles)



We have purchased the molds, solidified our designs, and received our samples. Now, all we need to do is start manufacturing, which is where you come in! We have been in contact with the manufacturer for months and have created a strong relationship. Once we raise enough to cover the initial manufacturing order we will be able to bring these watches to life for you! We are offering 10 different watch variations just so we can make sure we have a style you can enjoy. All the while you take on zero risk. If we do not reach our goal we will refund all money to all of our awesome backers!
We have everything ready and the only missing piece we have left is you! We are prepared to fulfill all of our orders on time. We have a history with shipping in bulk from other businesses and we will be able to get these watches sent out effectively and efficiently!

RETAIL PRICE: $75 | EARLY BIRD PRICE: $55, Savings: $20-$85 (27%) |INDIEGOGO PRICE: $65, Savings: $10-$30 (15%)
Did I mention.... FREE DOMESTIC SHIPPING?
Four face designs: 

MTG(001) - Black 
MTG(002) - White 
MTG(003) - Red 
MTG(004) - Grey

Three band types

Tan genuine leather
Black genuine leather
Black solid stainless steel











 
 
BRACELETS

 
If you are unfamiliar with what a "perk" is or how Indiegogo works, please check out this link!
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles... Basically, you are placing a pre-order for the watch and once I receive enough pre-orders, I will be able to fund the initial production order and you will get your watch, if I don't reach my goal you get your money back!

You might be thinking to yourself, How can we afford to sell $120 watches for $55?
Well. Basically by being honest, not greedy, and selling a product for a value of what it's actually worth rather than it's perceived worth. There is nothing proprietary about our methods; we just wanted to save you as much as possible. Also, having a single owner helps too!
We are going to work hard to continue this in the future by nixing things like expensive ad campaigns so we can consistently deliver our product at an affordable price.
We remove unnecessary mark-ups which sometimes can be upwards of 1000%!

In keeping with our philosophy for quality and affordable prices, we negotiated hard with our suppliers to make sure we get the best possible prices for all the materials and parts we use in our watches. We then passed these cost savings directly to you, our Indiegogo supporter! 




 


Built to look casual first then professional.
Urban minimalist design
European inspiration
Fair value price
Case diameter is the perfect size built to fit any size wrist (40mm)
Unique bracelet accent piece

There are many things that separate us from the competition but those are just a few! We have created the perfect blend of affordability and quality. 


Case Material: 316 low carbon, surgical grade stainless steel with Ion Plating
Case diameter: 40mm 
Face diameter: 34mm
Bezel width: 3mm
Band Material: 316L solid stainless steel or Genuine leather
Band width: 20mm
Buckle width: 25mm
Buckle material: 316L surgical grade solid stainless steel
Window material: hardened crystal mineral glass
Movement: Precision Japanese Quartz Miyota 2115
Water resistance: 5ATM (swimming, showers and light water use)

Japanese quartz watches are equipped with innovative and powerful features. Overall, Japanese quartz watches are known for accuracy and precision. In fact, they were used as the official timekeeper in many Olympic events.
Because they don’t have as many mechanical-moving parts, quartz watches last (almost) forever and require no maintenance (other than changing the battery every 3-5 years).
We are also so confident in our watches that we are proud to offer a two year manufacturer warranty!

Easy pull pin release makes switching out bands a breeze, even the stainless steel!




I created this brand to help the people like me express their true style with a fashionable casual watch. The principles that this brand is built on are to be honest, transparent and to give a fair price to everyone. We will never increase our prices just to increase our profits. We didn't only do this for us. We did this for you because we understand. We put every penny we had into starting this company, into the research and development, designs, and plenty of samples making sure it would be perfect for you. 
 We hope we did a good enough job! If not, please let us know how we can improve. We will be happy to answer any questions you may have!

The Impact
Most of the proceeds from this campaign will go into creating a whole line of quality, popularly priced watches. Your money will make it possible for young professionals to look good and make impressions on people during the most financially vulnerable time in their lives.
Along with this, if we raise

$15,000-20,000 --> 10% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the Wounded Warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.
$20,001-50,000 --> 15% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the Wounded Warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.
$50,001-$100,000--> 25% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the Wounded Warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.
>$100,001--> 50% of all the proceeds from the bracelets will be donated to the wounded warrior foundation and to programs that help with the rehabilitation of our troops.

We are a company that believes in helping others when we can, so we are going to take advantage of this opportunity and not only help save you money but also improve the lives of our military men, women and their families around the country.

Risks & Challenges
Every company has obstacles to overcome and even though we are such a young company, we still have our fair share. One obstacle is the wait time. It takes 30 days for the production order to be finished so the sooner we raise the funds, the sooner we can place the order and the sooner you will get your watch! Our main obstacle, though, is the funding needed to cover the initial minimum order which is why we have come to Indiegogo! We will place the order as soon as possible so we can get your watches shipped to your door on time!
Also we will need your help to keep the momentum going once the campaign ends so we can keep providing these watches to the people who need them!

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute but you want to support us, share us with your friends and family to get the word out! Any little contribution works; even if it's you just telling one friend, we would be forever grateful! We need as many people as possible to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. We want you to BE A REBEL with Mind The Gap Watches and set yourself apart from the crowd.
Indiegogo makes it easy to share this campaign with their intuitive share tools!
Thank you so much from the whole team here at Mind the Gap Watches and we hope to see you back for updates over the next month! Check us out on our social media below!

story:
Why We Started This Company

We started Trax Supply Co. with a mission. To create a brand of apparel that helps both the consumer AND the environment. You shouldn't have to make sacrifices on either end, and we're here to prove that.

We live in a time now where companies thrive in a "fast fashion" industry of cheap clothes and huge amounts of waste, leading to huge pollution for the environment. In the United States alone it's estimated that we throw away over 15 MILLION POUNDS of clothing each year. Not to mention the huge amounts of water used and carbon emitted during the manufacturing process.

Trax Supply Co. aims to answer the call for quality without the sacrifice of eco-friendly. Everything from our fabrics (organic cotton, recycled polyester, and Merino Wool) to the ink we use (discharge, a water-based ink meaning no PVC plastics in our dying processes) to the box that ships to your door (a lovely 100% recycled kraft paper)

 

Why We Started This Campaign

Which brings us to our Indiegogo campaign, and how you can help make that message a greater reality. We are launching our MerinoWear Collection through this campaign. These shirts are incredibly well fit for any environment or occasion, be it at the gym or on the road.

But being a small start-up, we don't have the budget for beginning inventory. This is where you come in. On top of being able to help us launch, you will also be given a substantial discount, getting our titular MerinoWear Shirts for $15 compared to their retail of $25 (some companies get away with charging $70 for these shirts. How, we don't know.)

 

What is the Merino Collection?

Our Merino Wool shirts are designed to keep you cool and comfortable in any environment. Merino Wool has amazing moisture-wicking properties that come in handy on hot summer days, as it pulls the sweat off of your body to evaporate, while it's temperature regulating means you keep in body heat during colder days. This makes it a perfect fabric for odor-resistance and incredibly useful for those looking to handle any weather. Our Canadian-manufactured Merino Wool is sustainably sourced and at the end of its long life, the fabric is biodegradable which leaves less of a hassle on the environment!

The current collection of Merino Wool shirts features our Unisex Short Sleeve, Women's Short Sleeve, and Unisex Long Sleeve.

 

Other Fabrics We Use

We also produce two other blends for our products. Our Graphic Tees and Sweatshirts are an eco-Blend, made up of 50% RECYCLED polyester, 37% ORGANIC cotton, and 17% rayon. Our Tank Tops are a unique yet useful Bamboo-Blend, made up of 70% viscose bamboo and 30% ORGANIC cotton. The Bamboo-Blend is naturally moisture-wicking, much like our MerinoWear fabric, and will keep you cool on any adventure.

These two fabrics are not only comfortable and a higher quality than most common/mainstream fabrics, but they are more environmentally friendly and sustainably sourced!

 

 

The Fun(d) Stuff

Simply put, we will be using the funds from this campaign for a number of things. Including:

  • Beginning inventory - to be able to sell our shirts to the masses post-campaign. This includes colors, designs, and other apparel options.
  • Equipment - The incredibly interesting details that will stream-line our process. This includes a label printer, folding racks, and other miscellaneous equipment.
  • Delivery materials - We have designed our shipping to not only keep our eco-friendly message, but to make delivery day that much more enjoyable.
  • Overhead - Though incredibly small in comparison to what most companies have, we still have expenses such as our online store.
  • Perks: Last, but certainly not least, the funds we raise will of course be used to fulfill the perks you choose!

Of course there is always the chance that we are completely blown away by the campaign and how much we raise, in which case the funds will go towards expanding our apparel lines (with potential for 100% Organic Cotton clothing and furthering of our eco-blend collections).

 

Perks

The question everyone has is, "Yeah but what can I get!?"

The Kind Package

  • 1 x Thank You Postcard

The Casual Adventure Package:

  • 1 x MerinoWear Short Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x Thank You Postcard

The Cool and Comfy Package:

  • 1 x MerinoWear Short Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Tee
  • 1 x Thank You Postcard

The Casual Adventure Package:

  • 1 x MerinoWear Short Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x MerinoWear Long Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Tee
  • 1 x Thank You Postcard
  • 1 x Sticker Package
    • Two 2 x 3" circular stickers, a 5" x 2" rectangular sticker, and  an 11.5" x 3" bumper sticker

The Shirt Stacks Package:

  • 1 x MerinoWear Short Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x MerinoWear Long Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Tee
  • 1 x Thank You Postcard
  • 1 x Sticker Package (4 pk.)

 

The New Wardrobe Package

  • 2 x MerinoWear Short Sleeve Shirt
  • 2 x MerinoWear Long Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Tee
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Sweatshirt
  • 1 x Bamboo-Blend Graphic Tank
  • 1 x Thank You Postcard
  • 1 x Sticker Package (4 pk.)

The Collaboration Package

  • 2 x MerinoWear Short Sleeve Shirt
  • 2 x MerinoWear Long Sleeve Shirt
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Tee
  • 1 x eco-Blend Graphic Sweatshirt
  • 1 x Bamboo-Blend Graphic Tank
  • 1 x Thank You Postcard
  • 1 x Sticker Package (4 pk.)
  • 1 x Shirt Collaboration*

 

* Please note that some restrictions apply with this item. We cannot allow adult/offensive language to be used in the design/name, and ask that only those who are seriously interested about designing a shirt that fits our message purchase this perk. We look forward to collaborating and creating an enjoyable experience.

 

The Impact - Eco-Friendly, Wallet-Friendly

The textile and apparel industry is the second biggest contributor to waste and pollution. Not to mention the plastics, water waste, and other environmentally harmful chemicals that go in to the production of these clothes. That is why eco-blends and sustainable sourced/crafted apparel is the future of the clothing industry. We embody our message through our products and processes, and eliminating the waste and harmful compounds of today's garments while raising the bar for consumer quality is how Trax Supply Co. aims to set a precedent for the clothing industry.

 

Risks & Challenges

As we said before, being an incredibly small company means we cannot right now afford the large investment of starting inventory and equipment. With your contributions though, these beginning challenges will be overcome and we can establish an inventory and purchase the necessary equipment to run daily operations fluidly and efficiently!

 

Other Ways to Help Us

Regardless of if you can or can't purchase one of our perks, we still are incredibly thankful for any amount of help you can give us! Whether it's SHARING our campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc., or simply getting the word out about our brand by word of mouth, we appreciate any bit of help! By giving us any bit of support, you show us that our message matters!

We truly hope you believe in our mission as much as we do, enough to help us grow and expand and further our efforts to creating eco-friendly, quality apparel.

story:
Comfort you trust

The EVERGREEN Shirt was designed to improve the traditional dress shirt’s elasticity and breathability without compromising its classic characteristics. The front of the shirt and the sleeves are composed of 98% premium cotton that will stay soft on your skin. (Click on photos to see them up close)

 

Getting things done

Remember being constrained by movement when you wore a shirt? Not anymore! In addition to the soft element of our carefully selected cotton fabric, the EVERGREEN Shirt is very elastic. You will not lose your flexibility. Go ahead, do gymnastics in it.

 

Keeping your cool

The back panel of the shirt is made with 100% linen. Why linen? The weave of linen fabric allows more airflow and the structure of linen prevents the cloth from clinging to your skin. This composition is the first of its kind – by using linen on the back and cotton on the front, we are able to retain the classic look of the dress shirt while improving its breathability.

 

Quality in details

We believe quality in the details should not be overlooked. We use Mother of Pearl buttons – made from the inner layer of pearl oysters to bring out more shine and depth of color than regular plastic buttons. They are harder and more resistant to heat than plastic buttons.

 

Fitting and Measurements


 

(Eco)Smart casual

The ORIGIN Chino is designed to complement the EVERGREEN Shirt. The unique fabric is composed of 52% linen 46% cotton and 2% Spandex to give it the same natural, breathable, and flexible traits as our shirt. Dress smart; be smart.

 

Fashion featuring function

The fabric used on our ORIGIN Chino is treated with Ultra-EverShield® coating to keep you shielded while maintaining the natural breathability of the fabric. The weather can be unpredictable. The treated chinos repel water and dirt – it will be prepared for the rainy days. Never deal with the embarrassment of soaked pants.

 

Watching your back

The left rear pocket is closed by a zipper to ensure loose change are kept safe from falling out. Above is a pocket lip that conceals the zipper when closed up. The right rear pocket is locked by a button(nut shell button) for easy access.

 

Classic Colors

ORIGIN Chino comes in two classic colors, navy blue and khaki. 

*Click to enlarge. Color has a slight variance under different lighting conditions

Fitting and Measurements

 

We finish off with our signature pocket square. The full linen burlap piece gives the cloth a unique color pattern and texture. The fresh apple green color echos our emphasis of nature and natural materials. This piece is perfect to bring a hint of subtle accent in your overall outfit.

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the retail price for our apparel?

You can find our collection on our e-commerce store. The retail prices (USD) are as follows:

  • EVERGREEN Shirt at $100
  • ORIGIN Chino at $170
  • Linen Pocket Square at $35

How much is shipping?

We don't want our backers to have to worry about shipping. We have you covered – FREE Worldwide Shipping for all our backers!

How do I choose my color and size?

At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey to all our backers. You will be able to submit your color, size, and delivery address.

Do you have other apparel in your collection?

We have begun designs to expand our line of collection. Sign up to our newsletter on our e-commerce store to get the newest updates.

How should the garment be washed?

Our garments are built tough. You can use regular machine wash and dry.

What if I want to buy in larger quantity?

Send us an email to info@cyclical-store.com and we will be in touch.

If you have any questions, use the "Ask a question" or leave us your comment.

Visit our website for more details: www.cyclical-store.com

We have you covered – FREE Worldwide Shipping for all our backers!How do I choose my color and size?At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey to all our backers. You will be able to submit your color, size, and delivery address.Do you have other apparel in your collection?We have begun designs to expand our line of collection. Sign up to our newsletter on our e-commerce store to get the newest updates.How should the garment be washed?Our garments are built tough. You can use regular machine wash and dry.What if I want to buy in larger quantity?Send us an email to info@cyclical-store.com and we will be in touch.If you have any questions, use the "Ask a question" or leave us your comment.Visit our website for more details: www.cyclical-store.com

story:
Why Haven Watches?

The idea for Haven was born out of a passion for watches combined with the desire to make a difference in the world.  All great watch brands have a unique story to tell and stand for something more than just the time on your wrist.  We believe looking great and feeling great shouldn't be mutually exclusive. We truly appreciate your support in making this dream a reality. Join our growing Instagram community  https://www.instagram.com/havenwatches/

Introducing The Beacon by Haven Watches

We created our first design, The Beacon, as a symbol of the Haven brand identity. It is available in three different options:

  1.  Rose Gold Case with Black Dial and Tan Croco Leather Strap
  2.  Silver Case with Blue Dial and Brown Croco Letaher Strap
  3.  Black Case with Black Dial and Black Smooth Leather Strap

Watch Specifications:

  • 316L Stainless Steel Case
  • 40mm Case Diameter
  • 20mm Strap Width
  • 6mm Crown 
  • Water Resistant to 3 ATM / 30 Meters
  • Miyota GM10 Genuine Japanese Quartz Movement with Date
  • Signature Haven Caseback  

Your support and contributions allow us to bring you high quality timepieces from top suppliers. 

The Impact

A portion of the profits from Haven Watches will go directly to organizations such as The National Coalition for the Homeless and Feeding America. These organizations believe that affordable housing, sufficient food and the chance to work for a living wage are fundamental rights for everyone. As a supporter of Haven we will keep you updated with our progress including how your support is directly creating someone else's #timeforbetter. Think of it as paying it forward while receiving a stylish watch to show your support. 

Once we reach our fundraising goal the production lead time for our watches will take around 30-45 days depending on the final quantity. We will personally ship the first batch of orders to you, our Haven supporters! Let's start something.

story:
A CLASSIC CHRONOGRAPH REBORN

Inspired by the chronographs of the 70s where racing and the smell of burning asphalt was a staple. These watches were easily distinguishable from other vintage models. A glance at the owner’s wrist was enough to see the model he was wearing. Many classics were made during this period, and it is time to bring them back with a modern twist.

 

 

THE PANDA AND REVERSE PANDA 

We are pulling out something that has worked and was coveted by many in years gone by. As a matter of fact, it never went out of style. The Panda and Reverse Panda dials are icons in their own right. 

 

 

 

 

 

WHAT WE BELIEVE IN :

 

AFFORDABILITY: Under $200 on Indiegogo. Delivering directly to the customer, we pass the savings to you with radical transparency in a quality watch. 

 

PRACTICALITY: A precise, handmade watch good enough for everyday use. Functional and wearable in all situations.

 

DESIGN: Beautifully crafted for timelessness in a vintage design. No funky shapes or colors. Just a classic timepiece.

 

 

 

WHY A CHRONOGRAPH?

We wanted to create a classic racing chronograph watch that captures the elegance and speed of a racing champion. The Ranomo Chronograph embodies the soul and adrenaline rush of conquering impossible speeds.

 

 

Providing affordable watches with quality is what Monsieur Watches aim for with each series. Ranomo is coined with two words in mind "Racing and Monochrome". The bold, classic and rounded features symbolise racing around bends on a track. The monochromatic look is characterised by the black and white choice of dials in this iconic series. The Panda and Reverse Panda dials will always make one take a second look, and that's exactly what we want to emulate with our rendition of a classic.

 

 

 

 

RANOMO CHRONOGRAPH REVERSE PANDA (Japanese Miyota 0S21) features a date function at the 6 o'clock position. The hour and minute hands are illumed and finished with a mirror polish.

 

RANOMO CHRONOGRAPH PANDA (Japanese Miyota 0S21) features a date function at the 6 o'clock position. The hour and minute hands are illumed and finished with a mirror polish. 

 

 

A symmetrical watch is the key design feature we wanted. We etched our trademark "M" on the crown to remind us that the watches we create are for the true gentleman. Every detail is essential. With a 10mm thick case, we made sure we got the size of the buttons right. With soft push reflex buttons and a crown with a 90 degree catch, you can be sure setting of the time and usage of the stopwatch function will be precise and accurate. 

 

 

We fitted a K1 Dome glass that is sapphire coated to reflect light out of the case and to give clarity to the details when you view it from any angle. Looking at the outer rail indexes, the glass perfectly reflects the numerals in all their sharpness.

 

 

 

 

Early Design Iterations and Drawings: 

 

Video of the Ranomo Chronograph ST1901 Reverse Panda first prototype:

 

 

 

*We are only offering the MIYOTA 0S21 quartz movement for this campaign.

 

 

 

 

 Case Diameter: 38 mm Case 

 Thickness: 10 mm 

 Band Material: Genuine Italian Leather Band  

 Band Width: 20 mm 

 Total Weight: 40 g 

 Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel

 Back Plate: Engraved Steel

 Buckle: Standard Brushed Buckle 

 Buckle Material: Stainless Steel 

 Dial Window Material: K1 Domed Sapphire Coated 

 Display: Chronograph 

 Movement: Japanese Miyota 0S21

 Date Function: Yes 

 Seconds Function: Yes 

 Water Resistant: 5 ATM / 50 Meters

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PACKAGING:

 

 

 

PLACING AN ORDER

1. Do you have any stock/physical stores?

We sell through crowdfunding platforms and on our website. We will look to find partners and distributors in the future. If you are interested to help spread the products we create. For more information, drop us an email at contact@monsieurfranceco.com 

2. What payment methods do you accept?

We accept credit/debit cards on our webpage through a secure checkout. We accept Visa, Mastercard etc. We also accept PayPal. 

3. What currency are your prices in?

Prices are in SGD for this campaign when you pledge. 

 

FUNCTIONS OF THE WATCH 

1. What are the functions of the push-buttons on a chronograph?

The push buttons serve to start or stop the function, and to reset the chronograph. Generally, the push button at 2 o’clock is to start and stop the chronograph function. The push button at the 4 o'clock is to reset the counter.

2. What is the difference between the Miyota OS21 and Seagull ST1901 movement?

The difference between these two movements is the way in which the movement is built and its functions. The Seagull ST1901 is a mechanical movement which requires manual winding to operate and will have a reserve of 42 hours when fully wound. The Miyota OS21 is a reliable Japanese Quartz movement that runs on a battery and would last an average of 5 years before you have to change it out. 

3. What should I do to ensure that my watch continues to provide excellent service for many years?

All our watches are well built and go through a quality check process.

 

Shocks: Whether thermal or other, avoid them.

Crown: Push it in fully to ensure that no water enters the mechanism when submerged.

Cleaning: For leather bands, it is advisable to keep it out of the water and change it out for a silicone or rubber strap when going for a dip.

Temperatures: avoid extreme temperatures (above 60'C, or 140F, below 0'C, or 32F) or extreme temperature changes.

 

 

DELIVERY

Can you ship to my country?

We ship internationally! Once you order our timepiece, it will find its way to you.

When will my order be dispatched?

We will ship out once the campaign is done. We have instocks now and waiting to be shipped!

I’m an international customer, will my watch be safe in transit?

Yes, all of our watches are sent in protective cases that fit snugly around the watch packaging and are tough enough to withstand transportation.

All of our shipping options are fully insured so if the watch suffers damage in transit or does not arrive then we will replace it free of charge.

 

Risks & Challenges

Though this is our second campaign, we are still pushing ourselves in experimenting and producing quality timepieces. Through this period, we have experienced many setbacks due to manufacturing process and delivery. We have now partnered and working very closely with one the best manufacturers to produce a high-quality watch at the fraction of the price.

We strive to create a product that not only of good craftsmanship but appealing to classic watch lovers. We have made sure that every watch is carefully inspected and tested before distribution. We would love to answer any questions backers might have. Monsieur believes that customer relations are of the top priority to build a strong relationship with our valued backers.

story:
The Minder alerts you and others if you are standing too close when out in public. It helps to enforce and train social distancing skills for people getting out into public who have a hard time remembering to keep a safe distance from others, such as people with dementia. 

Just put it on and turn it on.

The Minder is simple to use. It senses when you are closer than 6 feet (2m) to someone and gives a gentle reminder to keep a safe distance. No phone needed.

Easily swap between the lanyard and clip. You have options on how to wear it.

The Minder uses a state of the art infrared distance sensor to track when something is in front of you. It can see changes of distance smaller than one inch (about 1cm) and works well in most environments including sunlight.

Don’t worry, The Minder is not the annoyer. It ignores when you are using your phone, standing closer than 3 feet (1m) to other things, or if someone is just walking by you.

If you need to get close something but don’t want to turn off The Minder, just wave your hand to pause notifications. 

 

We have been working on The Minder for months and are ready with a production design and to produce it locally in the USA. One thing we have learned during the pandemic is that the manufacturing supply chain for making most consumer products does not work well during times like this. When launching new products, you need to be at a factory to check things as they come off the production line to insure quality. On the other hand, we need jobs here. When developing The Minder we looked at all of the different technologies to scale The Minder quickly and locally but keep the costs competitive.

Developing The Minder

The idea for The Minder started out as a wearable to help you know when you are touching your face, but we saw that more people were interested in something to help enforce good social distancing when in public. 

First we hacked together a working prototype to test the parts we wanted to use and get it tested out.

After that we developed a design for the circuit and the board layout.

Had a batch of PCBs (printed circuit boards) made to do a small run of that. 

From there we focused on the casing design and making it good for manufacturing.

 

 

Normally we would send this design to manufacturers overseas to get quotes for production costs, but, pandemic. Instead, we are taking this opportunity to build up local manufacturing using technology that fits creating small factories that can make tens of thousands of things a month. 

Making The Minder

The Minder will be the first product from Good Robot. We are establishing our manufacturing system that is both scalable and allows for flexible production. At the core of our manufacturing are two basic technologies: Resin 3D Printing and Open Source PCBA equipment.

Casing (A.K.A. The Pretty) 

The resin printing which uses UV cured urethane based resins gives us very precise output without using injection molding. This means we can improve the design and quickly iterate the casings using the same materials and processes as the final product without any lead time. We can have different colors, test new features, and even make one-off customized plastic with your name or your cat’s photo on it. 

These are some of the tests we’ve done with different colors. We think we can create most colors with the right pigments. We will be having you all help us pick out the best few for this production.

Electronics (A.K.A. The Guts and Brain)

This is a clip from assembling the final pre-production boards by hand. Those little black dots in the white strips are the chips to put on the boards. Making boards this way is acceptable for small runs up to 100 a week, but there is a better way to make more.

Here come the Robots...

If the resin printing allows us to produce pretty and functional casings as we need them, the Open Source Pick and Place technology will allow us to iterate hardware like software. Pick and Place machines are used to Pick up the small chips that go on the circuit boards inside of electronic products and Place them accurately where they need to go. 

Scale down to scale up.

The typical PCBA (PCB Assembly) line uses large and expensive machines. We match up smaller Pick and Place machines and ovens based on Open Source hardware and software. This gives us control over size, cost, and maintainability of our production equipment.

We can scale our production capacity to the demand without hitting big jumps in our costs and with a more agile development and manufacturing process.

Bringing it all together, modular manufacturing.

We think that local production of small to medium batches of products is the way to go. We've recently seen examples of what happens with expensive and proprietary manufacturing equipment when factory technicians are unable to travel to repair it in person. We avoid this by creating modular production cells using commodity or open source hardware. We built it so we can easily service it. It also reduces the first costs to set up a factory and the cost of growing production capacity.

This means that creating new products is less expensive by reducing the sunk costs of starting production and reducing the time of having products in hand. 

Producing products on demand avoids the largest risks of managing a hardware company: inventory and lead times. Software now iterates quickly, making small changes constantly. Companies like Tesla have gone a step further, iterating hardware by enabling constant design improvements introduced at the production level. We bring the same approach to consumer electronics, getting products to market faster and at smaller batch volumes using local production while being cost competitive. We plan to start here in Georgia and will grow geographically, bringing jobs to people across the country and globally while making things needed by their neighbors not someone halfway across the world. 

How many jobs can you help create? Roughly for every 1000 units we sell a month, it will create a full time job within Good Robot. That isn't something you get when buying from a traditional retailer that sells mostly imported products. 

Team

Good Robot was founded by Jon Buford, an industry veteran in consumer products and industrial automation. He found himself in his home town in Georgia, USA when the COVID-19 hit. Using his mechanical and electronics design skills, he developed The Minder with the help of friends and family both there and abroad. 

Risks and Challenges

The biggest risk and challenge right now is just the general uncertainty we are all dealing with. The team is doing everything to stay healthy. We've created a supply chain we control very closely and have options for alternate suppliers for most anything. We are keeping the operations small, but we will design the production facilities and systems to make social distancing part of the process as we grow. None of us really know how the current situation will come out, but we are taking all precautions we can to avoid unnecessary risks. 

On the other hand, we have reduced the normal production startup risk that is part of hardware products by developing the product to the production stage using the same methods and materials as the final manufacturing. This avoids the big jump found when transitioning from prototype to production. We designed our production to be modular to make it possible to ramp up to almost any volume needed within months with a gradual increase in production equipment and workers that grows together. By eliminating the geographic jump, we have avoided the traditional back and forth and inevitable misunderstandings and time to resolve those that are part of traditional manufacturing.

The targets of 100 units in September and 1000 units in October are ones we can hit with our existing equipment and team. We do feel that we have put enough testing in to grow our manufacturing resources over that time to support orders that we are able to get from this campaign and deliver them by December. 

Thank you very much for taking the time to read through the campaign. Please help support keeping people safer and to create jobs by funding a perk or sharing with your friends and family about The Minder. 

Special thanks goes out to Solidworks for giving us free seats as part of their Entrepreneur program and to Arrow for doing their certification review and the free chips and support that comes with being a Arrow Certified campaign.

We've created a supply chain we control very closely and have options for alternate suppliers for most anything. We are keeping the operations small, but we will design the production facilities and systems to make social distancing part of the process as we grow. None of us really know how the current situation will come out, but we are taking all precautions we can to avoid unnecessary risks. 
On the other hand, we have reduced the normal production startup risk that is part of hardware products by developing the product to the production stage using the same methods and materials as the final manufacturing. This avoids the big jump found when transitioning from prototype to production. We designed our production to be modular to make it possible to ramp up to almost any volume needed within months with a gradual increase in production equipment and workers that grows together. By eliminating the geographic jump, we have avoided the traditional back and forth and inevitable misunderstandings and time to resolve those that are part of traditional manufacturing.
The targets of 100 units in September and 1000 units in October are ones we can hit with our existing equipment and team. We do feel that we have put enough testing in to grow our manufacturing resources over that time to support orders that we are able to get from this campaign and deliver them by December. 
Thank you very much for taking the time to read through the campaign. Please help support keeping people safer and to create jobs by funding a perk or sharing with your friends and family about The Minder. 
Special thanks goes out to Solidworks for giving us free seats as part of their Entrepreneur program and to Arrow for doing their certification review and the free chips and support that comes with being a Arrow Certified campaign.

story:
Do you like comfortable clothing that also looks good? I do, so I made some Thai fisherman pants that I could wear around town without looking like I walked out of a massage.

 

I

 

The Story

I primarily sell longyi (also known as sarong, lungi, pareo) through my brand Longyi Brothers. The pants were a perfect stylistic fit with the brand and customers loved them! Unfortunately making each pair to customer measurements took a lot of time and resources up from my young business.

Since I stopped offering them, people have been asking me "When will the pants be back?"

Many a sleepless night had me tossing and turning, tormented by the anguished cries of people longing to get in my pants. I needed help. Here is where you come in dear reader:

Thy contribution shall enable the creation of a small run of these humble yet wonderful, reversible denim wrap pants, enabling not only yourself to have a pair, but others too.

 

The Pants

Here are the features

6 oz denim

1 pocket per side (1 on light side, 1 on dark side)

1 Removable belt

3 belt loops per side

Wide waist that wraps to fit a range of sizes

Jacquard (woven) square pattern

Colour fast

Machine wash and iron as you would any cotton

 

 

 

 

Price Breakdown

I need enough money to buy a roll of material and pay my tailors to turn that fabric into pants.

My goal of 1340 USD will produce 40 pairs of pants.

A roll of 92 yards of fabric will cost around 6000 THB or 192 USD. One pair of pants will take 2.25 yards to make, costing around 5.30 USD in fabric.

Each pair of pants will cost me 200 THB in tailoring around 6.40 USD to make, 255 USD total.

Then there are transport costs, non-tailoring labour costs and platform fees. Put all those together and a pair of pants will cost me around 400 THB or 12.85 USD .

For supporting me at this stage I offer them to you at a special price below the retail price I will eventually sell them for. (Regular retail clothing markups begin at 4.2 x cost) 

With the profit I will buy another roll of fabric and produce another run of pants to be sold over the summer at my retail price of 51.50 USD.

That's it. You help me and I send you some comfortable, stylish South East Asian wrap pants :)

The pants will be shipped out in April 2019.

 

 
 

Production

 
 

Bangkok is a city where you can still sometimes catch people wearing traditional clothes. I work with a longstanding, independent tailor shop. The experience and precision of the tailors ensure that my clothes are quality.

I avoid using plastic or unnecessary materials from production to delivery. Nor do I make cheap, disposable, fad clothing. I make garments that I believe in and hope you will wear and enjoy for years.

story:
Echo Sport

 

Meet the Echo Sport, the world’s first pair of smart glasses that are designed with the athlete in mind.

 

 

Our Product

Our product the  "Echo Sport" combines the best features of our predecessors such, high-fidelity bone-conduction Audio, Wire-free Bluetooth transmission and hands-free control scheme along with an elegantly simple control-scheme to create a truly ground-breaking product. 

Our Mission

 

 

 

Our product promotes a healthy lifestyle by allowing a full range of outdoor activities thanks to our tight fitting design. Anything from a leisurely walk to a game of rugby is possible while wearing an Echo Sport

 

Features

Our product comes with many unique features perfectly tailored to enjoying being no matter if it's a leisurely walk or an intense, contact sport 

 

 

 

 

 

Bluetooth 4.0: Listen to your music and audio without any audio skipping with the Echo Sport high-quality Bluetooth board with a range  of 10M

 

 

 

Long-lasting Batteries: Our product comes equipped with a 225 Mah battery that allows it to remain active for five hours without charging.

High-Fidelity Bone Conduction Speakers: The Echo Sport feature Dual-Bone conduction speakers that transmit the audio directly to the Ear Drums, bypassing the ear canals

Light-weight: Our product weighs only 45 grams, the perfect weight for any pair of sunglasses

How It Works

 

 

Pledge Rewards

 

 

Unboxing and How to Use Video

 

 

 

 

Timeline

                                       

Specs Table

 

Initial Designs

We initially focused on making a design for a more lifestyle-oriented market. However, we later realised the implications of the technology and how it can make cycling and running much safer. So we, as athletes, became committed to making a product that was focused on allowing fellow athletes to listen to their favourite music for motivation, but in the meanwhile ensuring their safety. Below are some of our first designs -

 

 

                                          

 

 

 

                                         

 

 

     The Team

 

 

Working sketch

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

$100,000: Including another Pair of Lenses

 

$200,000: Include Stickers

 

$300,000: Include Shirts

 

$400,000: Include 3rd Pair of Lenses

 

$500,000: Personalised  Box

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

We have experienced our share of hardship and problems during our formative period ranging from simple arguments over the price of lunch all the way to the destruction of prototypes. Our biggest risk, however, is a Sun Bear.

Envision Tech's sworn enemy since our founding when one of them squished our prototype. We have taken measures to ensure that they never hinder our company ever again, but we feel obligated to warn you of this risk. It is now company policy to minimize contact between bears and our products

On a more serious note we, like all companies face significant risk and we can not guarantee that we will be a success. We promise however to make a wholehearted, full-on commitment towards giving you what we have promised and if we fail we promise to redistribute all left-over funds back to you.

story:
Meet Motobit Sentinel - a wearable device that informs you about dangers while motorcycling without the need to take your eyes off the road.

 

Motobit Sentinel is your smartest motorcycle companion, packed with features to enhance your riding experience and safety while on the road. A multi-functional tool that keeps you informed so you can focus on riding without being distracted!

No matter if you are going for a quick ride or you are planning a tour over several days, Motobit Sentinel is always there to join you and provides you valuable riding and road information with strong vibrations so you do not need to take your eyes off the road.

Motobit Sentinel provides various information about what's ahead of you. Ranging from radar controls, road and traffic information, or sudden weather changes: there is a lot of useful information to benefit from while riding. You decide what to get informed!

 

With the support of Motobit you can challenge ALL the roads: Stay safe and get notified if you are approaching a curve too fast based on YOUR PERSONAL riding behavior!

How can Motobit Sentinel know how I ride my motorcycle you ask?

Our algorithms analyze the data provided by the sensors of Motobit Sentinel and your smartphone to understand how you usually approach curves! Approaching speed, cornering speed, lean angle, braking deceleration and road geometry are just some of the information used to determine your personal riding behavior.

A single tour with curvy roads provides all needed information for Motobit to define YOUR PERSONAL riding behavior. Your profile will grow with you and gets more accurate the more you ride!

Combine YOUR PERSONAL riding behavior with a detailed road database and you get an expert motorcycle riding companion always with you.

 

Never be surprised of challenging curves and unknown road sections: Moments like “This was a close one!” are a thing of the past!

 

Motobit Sentinel does not only increase your riding safety,  but it also helps to AVOID fines too: set a personal speed limit tolerance for each road type and get notified if you exceed it.


It is easy to overlook a speed limit, but Motobit Sentinel has got you covered!

If something unexpected happens, you can alert your emergency contacts with a simple touch of the easy-to-reach button on Motobit Sentinel.

A text message with your position will be sent to your emergency contacts, that can come to help you or alert the rescue forces so that you can get support as soon as possible.

With Motobit Sentinel you can be sure to never lose your friends while riding in a group!

Connect several Motobit Sentinel devices and define a maximal distance. As soon as one of your group members exceeds this distance, other motorcyclists of the group will be informed.

Do you know that every time that you take your eyes away from the road to check your dashboard, smartphone, or navigation system you are riding blind for almost 2 seconds? At 90 kph this is equal to riding blindfolded for around half a football field!

For this reason, Motobit Sentinel is designed to inform you through powerful vibrations, so that you can keep your eyes on the road while riding.

If you are wondering if your smartwatch can do the same, forget it! We have developed dozens of prototypes and found a solution that is powerful enough to be perceived no matter which motorcycle you ride!

Do you have tight racing gloves or are used to wear a watch or a bracelet while riding?

Do not worry: Motobit Sentinel is designed to be used in many positions, with a strap, a clip, or as it is: Simply put Motobit Sentinel in your jacket pocket, attach it to your trousers' belt or kidney belt and continue to enjoy riding with maximum comfort while Motobit Sentinel is watching your back!

Accompanying the Motobit Sentinel is the Motobit app.

Connect Motobit Sentinel to your smartphone with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology built-in the device to have access to all its features and much more.

In the Motobit app, you can find a resume of your rides with a detailed analysis made possible by our advanced algorithms, ready to be shared with your friends or other motorcyclists.

Moreover, through the Motobit app, you will have the possibility to update the software of Motobit Sentinel to receive also future features.

If you are still asking yourself why you should choose Motobit Sentinel instead of using or combining different tools such as a smartwatch or a navigation device?

Check out how Motobit Sentinel stands out in comparison with other devices, that are commonly used by motorcyclists.

We designed Motobit Sentinel with one goal: TO IMPROVE YOUR SAFETY while motorcycling.

It does not matter which motorbike you ride or for how long you have been on the road, Motobit Sentinel will watch your back during all your future rides.

 

Motobit Sentinel will come with an interchangeable silicone strap using a 22mm quick-release mechanism as well as a detachable clip for maximum comfort. For charging purposes, a USB cable using a magnetic connector also comes in the box. That's all you need to getup and running!

 

We are passionate motorcyclists, just like you.

As much as we love motorcycling, we realized how dangerous it can be.

Intending to improve motorcycle safety for everyone, we founded motobit GmbH.

Since the start of this project, a lot of things happened: we got incubated in Science Park Graz, one of the most important high-tech startup incubators in Austria, and received public support for our research work from both FFG and AWS, two of the biggest nation-wide research funding institutions.

We found new motivated team members who share our passion.

We hit the road a lot on our Ducati Scrambler and Kawasaki ER-6n to test both the Motobit app and Motobit Sentinel (and had a lot of fun doing it).

We made a lot of new friends that helped us to bring Motobit Sentinel a step further with their suggestions and feedback.

It was a long journey that glued us together even stronger to become motorcyclists to make motorcycle riding safer!

Ride safe,

Alessio & Nick

As being motorcyclists ourselves, we know what a risk is.

This is our first crowdfunding campaign but we are working on Motobit Sentinel for more than two years and have already taken many measures to mitigate risks.


We have already found a European manufacturing partner for Motobit Sentinel as well as a logistic partner for fulfilling the shipment of the perks.


Moreover, we have already developed an Android version of the Motobit app, that is available in the countries of Austria, Germany, and Italy and can count of more than 2000 active users.


We are committed to the highest standards of excellence in safety and transparency alike. We will keep backers updated at every step of the way, and in case any changes, delays, or other incidences occur; we will inform our backers immediately and honestly.

 

 

We have different communication channels open for every backer or any person who is interested in our safety solution. You can always contact us here on Indiegogo or get in contact through our socials and of course via mail at info@getmotobit.com.

story:
Wristelite™ wearable wrist support. It is made of light neoprene fabric, with an inside filled with ergonomic and supportive memory or latex foam.

This wrist support promotes comfort while typing on the computer keyboard, scrolling with the computer mouse, writing by hand, and reading.

 

 

Wristelite™ provides elevation, comfort, and support when worn at the wrist. It makes scrolling with the computer mouse or typing on the keyboard-less stressful and helps to reduce the risk of Carpal Tunnel Syndrome.

Wristelite™ makes reading and writing more enjoyable. It provides a steady resting place for the hands of avid readers and frequent writers. Using Wristelite™ when reading and writing reduces eventual fatigue of the hand.

 

 

Wristelite™ is ideal for relaxation. Its soft memory foam filling provides extra support when resting your hands on an armrest. It helps promote good posture by placing your arms at a 90-degree angle. Why not wear this wrist support while watching a game or enjoying the company of friends and family!

Wristelite™ can highly benefit those who play pool, video games, do hand sewing, work on a factory assembly line, and musicians who play the piano or the drums.

 

It is made of light neoprene fabric, with an inside filled with ergonomic and supportive memory or latex foam.

 

This wrist support promotes comfort while typing on the computer keyboard, scrolling with the computer mouse, writing by hand, and reading.

 

Beyond just function with its sleek design. Wristelite™ is a wearable fashion accessory, yet equally functions as an office supply.

 

Comes in various colors: black, blue, purple, pink, red, green, and orange.

 

Features a soft elastic band that adapts to your Wristelite™ circumference. The band runs through a neoprene cushion to prevent chafing. Its streamlined design conforms to the contour of the hand and wrist.

Wristelite™ pillow base makes it easy to take it anywhere. It fits in your backpack, handbag, or purse. The current model comes in a small portable size of 3″ and available in a circle and square shape.


Wristelite™ is the world’s first and only wrist support that’s usable in dual modes:

 

(1) Mobile–By applying its adjustable band over the wrist, it moves with your hand as you type.

(2) Stationery–With its band tucked underneath, Wristelite™ becomes a traditional free-standing wrist rest.

 

Its comfortable wristband is easily worn or removed from the wrist in one swipe

 

 

We are currently in negotiations with manufacturers. After analyzing the cost of production and packaging. The product will be sold in pairs, in red, blue, black, green, orange, purple, and pink. We are looking to raise $7,500 to manufacture 1,000 pieces of this wrist rest. 

 

 

  • Jose T, NYC

“Due to daily use of my PC, working my home-based business online, I tend to have discomfort on my right wrist. I learned about the wrist support tool from WRISTELITE from a very good friend of mine. He told me about the benefits of the technology that’s being used to make this product so unique and worth the money to invest in. I wasn’t convinced until I actually bought it and tried it for myself. And I have to “write” (say)… while I’m using it at this moment… what a relief!”

 

  • Georges J, Switzerland

“It’s comforting for computer users to know that wristelite would be beneficial in minimizing carpal-tunnel syndrome as well as tendonitis. This should be the primary focus of the info on the other site. Good day to you and your staff sir.”

 

  • Bruce W, NYC

“Hello, I host a talk show here in New York City. We like your product. We’d like to talk about it on the show. We may even want to give out multiple quantities of them to viewers as giveaways. Please let us know if you’re interested in working together on this.”

 

 

As with most crowdfunding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowdfunding experience. If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop

 

 

In addition to supporting this project with your donation, you can also show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.

 

 

NOTE

Wristelite.com does not make any medical claim as to cure or prevent Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or other repetitive motion injuries. In as much as this product has been proven to elevate and stabilize the hand during use. It is no substitution for proper seat height and back positioning on the part of the user. Moreover, if the user already suffers from a moderate to the severe case of Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or any similar conditions, it strongly recommended to seek the services of a professional physician.

Using Wristelite™ when reading and writing reduces eventual fatigue of the hand.  Wristelite™ is ideal for relaxation. Its soft memory foam filling provides extra support when resting your hands on an armrest. It helps promote good posture by placing your arms at a 90-degree angle. Why not wear this wrist support while watching a game or enjoying the company of friends and family!Wristelite™ can highly benefit those who play pool, video games, do hand sewing, work on a factory assembly line, and musicians who play the piano or the drums. It is made of light neoprene fabric, with an inside filled with ergonomic and supportive memory or latex foam. This wrist support promotes comfort while typing on the computer keyboard, scrolling with the computer mouse, writing by hand, and reading. Beyond just function with its sleek design. Wristelite™ is a wearable fashion accessory, yet equally functions as an office supply. Comes in various colors: black, blue, purple, pink, red, green, and orange. Features a soft elastic band that adapts to your Wristelite™ circumference. The band runs through a neoprene cushion to prevent chafing. Its streamlined design conforms to the contour of the hand and wrist.Wristelite™ pillow base makes it easy to take it anywhere. It fits in your backpack, handbag, or purse. The current model comes in a small portable size of 3″ and available in a circle and square shape.Wristelite™ is the world’s first and only wrist support that’s usable in dual modes: (1) Mobile–By applying its adjustable band over the wrist, it moves with your hand as you type.(2) Stationery–With its band tucked underneath, Wristelite™ becomes a traditional free-standing wrist rest. Its comfortable wristband is easily worn or removed from the wrist in one swipe  We are currently in negotiations with manufacturers. After analyzing the cost of production and packaging. The product will be sold in pairs, in red, blue, black, green, orange, purple, and pink. We are looking to raise $7,500 to manufacture 1,000 pieces of this wrist rest.   Jose T, NYC“Due to daily use of my PC, working my home-based business online, I tend to have discomfort on my right wrist. I learned about the wrist support tool from WRISTELITE from a very good friend of mine. He told me about the benefits of the technology that’s being used to make this product so unique and worth the money to invest in. I wasn’t convinced until I actually bought it and tried it for myself. And I have to “write” (say)… while I’m using it at this moment… what a relief!” Georges J, Switzerland“It’s comforting for computer users to know that wristelite would be beneficial in minimizing carpal-tunnel syndrome as well as tendonitis. This should be the primary focus of the info on the other site. Good day to you and your staff sir.” Bruce W, NYC“Hello, I host a talk show here in New York City. We like your product. We’d like to talk about it on the show. We may even want to give out multiple quantities of them to viewers as giveaways. Please let us know if you’re interested in working together on this.”  As with most crowdfunding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowdfunding experience. If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop  In addition to supporting this project with your donation, you can also show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.  NOTEWristelite.com does not make any medical claim as to cure or prevent Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or other repetitive motion injuries. In as much as this product has been proven to elevate and stabilize the hand during use. It is no substitution for proper seat height and back positioning on the part of the user. Moreover, if the user already suffers from a moderate to the severe case of Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or any similar conditions, it strongly recommended to seek the services of a professional physician.

story:
Short Summary

Hi I'm Hugo Moreno a software engineer who recently got into the trend of using A.I for various purposes. It occurred to me that maybe A.I could be used to translate sign language after I saw a YouTuber go through a rather odd experience in a McDonald's drive through:  I thought that it wasn't really inclusive but I had to think bigger.

The fact is there is a lot of people, around 5% of the worlds population, that are hard of hearing, so I though of a device that will help them communicate not just in one scenario but everywhere, like a universal translator, for all deaf people, and help reach towards a society that's more inclusive.

Imagine if you can be the founding stone that brought something of value, not just another device, but a life-changing-wearable that sparked hope and inclusiveness into the world, to be rewarded in kind knowing you helped millions and brought awareness while making this planet a better place to live for a huge minority!

What We Need & What You Get

Ok, so,  how much exactly do we need?  We estimated that about 5000 dollars in order to build the prototype, if that sounds a lot let me explain exactly why that amount:

First things first, the suppliers: this device will use a dedicated mobile CPU from a smartphone supplier, as you can tell by now (you may ask why don't we just release an app?) the software will run differently depending on the hardware its run into, that means we had to contact several suppliers of mobile CPU's that can help us, so that everyone gets the best experience possible, equally, and flagship phones are pretty robust at running this sort of applications, but not everyone has a cutting edge flagship phone, so we are trying to make it accessible by using these components for an specific function.

It will also need cameras: yeap, again the ones you will usually found in a smartphone! Now you won't exactly take video whit this device,  so high resolution shouldn't be an issue right? Well yes and no, while we don't exactly need the best resolution,  we do need variable focal distances lenses, so that it can run detection at short and medium distances and still translate.

Also research and development: creating any device takes a lot of money not just creating it but receiving the parts, the manufacturers won't let you buy just one or two! They require a bulk order: if you order a few pieces from china, most likely they will sell you 50 at the time, minimum order. Again that's for one component, imagine one that is around 60-80 dollars, and you have to buy 100, you can see how things starts to add up the cost of research and development.

We want to be fully transparent with what we receive from you, so every order of components will have a screenshot of the amount spent on it.

Now what would you receive from funding a prototype? you may ask, why not just wait till you can buy it later?, well you get to be the one who actually make this happen, and we intend to reward you fully for it.

We want to keep things simple, for helping us realize our vision and help mankind, we want to offer you a discount coupon up to 40% ,depending on your contribution amount,  for the final product, also no matter your contribution, if you want to buy it, your version will be a limited edition with a special logo engraved on the device with your name on it. 

A special accessory pack that has the wrist straps and neodymium magnetic holder will also be included in the "Champion of the People" supporter gift pack.

The logo shows a sound wave with a negated symbol all single lined to form a face, and a hand displaying the "thank you" gesture in sign language.

This is  a design for the magnetic holster, it will detach from the back and be able to stick to any metal surface, we designed it this way so that the 4 points attachment will never create a sag effect on your shirt, all while being compact and not noticeable that your wearing it in your shirt, apart from the weight of course, and the separation improves possible thermal dissipation issues (we are obsessed with thermals!) between the device and your skin isolating you from prolonged use heat, like any electronic device would.

we will also ship you with a couple of NATO style wrist straps in the pack

We really hope to reach our funding goals, but even if we don't, we will figure out how to reach the maximum level of completion possible with the amount given

The Impact

The main differentiating factor is the flexibility this product bring to the end user, since you can use it anywhere or with anything, a deaf person can easily communicate at the airport, or at a restaurant for example

If you think of it, look at how hard it would be if you try to express yourself without sound in any environment and you will see that its in the simplest of scenarios that this device will make the real impact, whether is at a bank or simply asking for help

Sign language requires both hands (with a few exception of gestures) so having a device that can be set everywhere comfortably, allows for ease of operation, also it can be used in conjunction with other devices like your phone, your laptop, or any device that accepts voice as an input, like an Amazon Echo

Risks & Challenges

We can resume our challenges in two ways the software side and the hardware side

From the software point of view, training such a large dataset takes time but we can find ways to speed up the process more efficiently, without loosing quality of detection, such challenges are already on the way of being worked on

From the hardware side, the main challenge is getting the parts from the suppliers, and after that setting up a Research and development team to integrate every piece into a fully functional prototype

The main risk lies within budget constraints that limits the user experience, and possible hardware limitations for such a demanding task, universal translators exist, but gestures are way more difficult, that's why we need the right hardware and the fastest and lightest software possible to make it work, so far we have proven it to work, finding if its scalable to thousands of gestures we still need to find out, but even then, if we found a bottleneck we can engineer a solution, that's the risk with innovation, the good thing is that is precisely on these bottlenecks that ingenious solutions are found and a breakthrough happens, "necessity is the mother of all inventions"

Other Ways You Can Help

So you have reach this far and we already like you for it, thanks for taking your time to hear us, if you want to contribute but you don't have the money to do so, maybe you can help us by bringing awareness that we exist and we are trying to make a difference,  share it with someone that may like the idea and contribute, help comes in many forms, and we accept all of them, remember to use the Indiegogo share tools, and once again thank you for time ;)

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
