story:
BaBusty

B.a; acronym for Breast Augmentation 

Busty; adjective (of a woman) having large breasts

 

 

Hey Guys!

The idea for BaBusty came about when I had my breast augmentation 2 years ago. Friends who had had the procedure asked me what size I was getting, I told them "pretty big",

 

"You won't get bras to fit!" was the overwhelming response.

 

And it was true, bra shopping after my procedure was depressing.

I am size 12E (34E) and I was told in the store "we only have nanna in that size", and another lovely lady in a different store tried to sell me a maternity bra!

 

You see the thing is, size 8-14 women don't typically come with large breasts. And the large cup sizes are only available in the colours, black, white and granny floral ... sigh!

There is a definite gap in the market. and with 316,000 new breast augmentation every year in the USA, its a fast growing market!

 

Over the past 18 months I have been building a large social media following,  and am a member of many Ba forums.

 

The branding and website has been done by a really cool company in the Phillipines!

 

I plan to advertise on the forum with 130k members, as well as sponsored ads on social media, cross promotion and paid SEO and CRO digital marketing.

I will continually test and measure marketing results to get it right!!

We've secured a Penthouse magazine deal, supplying lingerie to a Penthouse model. So excited to have BaBusty associated with a Brand like Penthouse!

 

I've started looking at boutique lingerie stores for future stockists, with the view to approaching commercial department stores in the future.

We have hundreds of women signed up to the website for when we launch. www.babusty.com

 

I've invested a lot of time and money into this project. It has taken twice as long, and cost twice as much as anticipated. I have skin in the game and I'm committed to making it work!

I need to raise capital for final payment, shipping and landing costs, marketing and other miscellaneous expenses!

 

Timeline-

I've been working on design and samples for 12 months. I'm extremely happy with the end result. The bras are well made, comfortable and look great!

I've paid 60% deposit for the pre production and the mass production to begin.

The final samples have arrived, all 26, in various styles and colours.

Then once the final sample has been approved-

Mass production 30 days

Photography

Website goes live

Pre Sale commence

Social media pre launch campaign commence.

Expecting to launch July 2017.

 

Where are the funds going?

85% is going toward the final payment for mass production, shipping, GST & landing costs.

15% to advertising and marketing, photography, funding fees, launch and insurances.

 

I hope you will join me on this journey and be a part of bringing the Babusty brand to life!

And get behind a business that benefits so many women in need of a decent bra!!

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help! Help me get the word out and make some noise about the campaign, you can do so by using the indiegogo share tools!

If you prefer to simply back the project, or to make a donation click "Back It"

 

TIA

Monica.

story:
multi-function wristband for GoPro lover
We wanted to create some high quality accessories to accommodate your GoPro: somethings that you can bring with you to the city, travelling, and on all of your adventures. So the conception of the highly useful wristband was brought to life. It offers two ways for users to wear GoPro cameras on the wrist for instant access while traveling or engaging in activities. 


Media coverage

designboom     

backers community     

kickstarter project reviews

crowdfunding reviews


Why you need it?

hybrid strap is the perfect addition to your GoPro. It can be used for a variety of  situations. First of all, it is comfortable and convenient to bring with you to everywhere and capture immediately

While existing wristbands are not flexible enough for some action like selfie... hybrid strap can quickly unlock and use it as a safety hand strap! 



More flexible to take great photos & videos!

Unlock both sides to become a camera stand

Details


hybrid strap is compact, stylish, and highly useful in action photography



Compact buckle with matte finishing


Elastic strap with two different textures


Elastic material with large range of size adjustment. Fits wrists from 140 - 210 mm



*Prototype by 3D printing for illustrate the concept only. The finishing of actual product will be meticulous


Comparison with existing solutions

Unlike many wristband straps, hybrid strap can quickly unlock so that it can be used as a safety hand strap. It allows users to place their GoPro in a variety of positions to quickly facilitate the capture of on-the-go photos in almost any situation with ease.  Users can quickly shift back and forth between camera positions for the greatest flexibility in photography. Just like the gesture of how we use other camera!


Timeline of Project

After a few months of intensive prototyping, we have arrived at a finalised form/function that we satisfied with. Our prototype is fully functional, and we’re ready to move on to the next step. With a successful demand at indiegogo, we will rapidly move to manufacturing plans and delivery


Stretch Goals

We will come up with awesome additional bonuses as we progress through the campaign


Who we are?

 

We are informalhour, a startup company based in Hong Kong. Informal hour means the moment of relaxation. We hope our designs are easy to use, and even help you to solve some little problems of daily life. We can ensure our products are made with the best quality in mind as we would not offer a product that we would not use ourselves


Why we need your funding?

By FUNDING our campaign, we will be able to proceed with the actual manufacturing process of hybrid strap, which will require a minimum quantity to achieve the best lowest cost for you. We would also require funding for the final stage of manufacturing, tooling and packaging costs. To make our campaign a success, we need your support and contribution


Why funding us?

If you are interested in our design, please FUND us now as we would need to keep the momentum going. We are sure that you will love it more when you get a real one! Every dollar counts and we will really appreciate all your support to bring hybrid strap to reality.

Become a backer! Our manufacturer is ready to start the production at the end of the campaign. Your support is the final step before we can bring hybrid strap into your hands

*GoPro not included


Where does your money go?

We just want to bring hybrid strap to reality so nearly 99% of the money we will collect will be used to making the product themselves. It will cover the tooling, unit price and packaging cost


Other ways you can help

Follow us on social media and sharing our campaign to friends you think might be interested. Let us know if you're connected to any bloggers or press who might be interested to our design


Risks and Challenges

We have dedicated countless of hours working together with our experienced manufacturer, trying to mitigate as much risks in all aspects of the product. Durability is the most important factor in this project. We must guarantee the safety of your GoPro when using our product. After many times of trial and error, we finally pass the tensile test by using double stitch line and cross stitch line on the hand strap. Most of the technical issues has been solved and we are confident that we will be able to deliver as per our projected plan. We will keep things transparent and inform our supporters of any hurdles/delay along the way


FAQ

What is the compatibility of hybrid strap?

Whether you have a GoPro 3, 3+, 4, or 4 SESSION, you can attach it to hybrid strap and start your adventure. It just works!

Can I buy the hybrid strap after the campaign?

Unfortunately, hybrid strap will never be available for sale if our campaign is not success...

When will I receive hybrid strap?

We have worked hard on shortening the production lead-time . Therefore, we will be able to deliver the hybrid strap to you from Early 2016!

Do you ship everywhere? How much does it cost?

All price including shipping fee, wherever you are! No extra shipping cost required

How can I know the progress after the campaign?

Please follow us on Facebook / Google+ as we will keep updating the manufacturing progress


Shipping addresses and perks

After the campaign is over, we will be sending surveys via backerkit where you can fill out your necessary information such as your shipping address and perk options. In case you want more of our products, you will also be able to add-on additional perks

Contact us!

Any question? comments? Please do not hesitate to reach us at any time by email at informalhour@gmail.com

 We are informalhour, a startup company based in Hong Kong. Informal hour means the moment of relaxation. We hope our designs are easy to use, and even help you to solve some little problems of daily life. We can ensure our products are made 
with the best quality in mind as we would not offer a product that we 
would not use ourselves

Why we need your funding?
By FUNDING our campaign, we will be able to proceed with the actual manufacturing process of hybrid strap, which will require a minimum quantity to achieve the best lowest cost for you. We would also require funding for the final stage of manufacturing, tooling and packaging costs. To make our campaign a success, we need your support and contribution

Why funding us?If you are interested in our design, please FUND us now as we would need to keep the momentum going. We are sure that you will love it more when you get a real one! Every dollar counts and we will really appreciate all your support to bring hybrid strap to reality.Become a backer! Our manufacturer is ready to start the production at the end of the campaign. Your support is the final step before we can bring hybrid strap into your hands



*GoPro not included

Where does your money go?
We just want to bring hybrid strap to reality so nearly 99% of the money we will collect will be used to making the product themselves. It will cover the tooling, unit price and packaging cost




Other ways you can help
Follow us on social media and sharing our campaign to friends you think might be interested. Let us know if you're connected to any bloggers or press who might be interested to our design
Risks and Challenges




We have dedicated countless of hours working together with our experienced manufacturer, trying to mitigate as much risks in all aspects of the product. Durability is the most important factor in this project. We must guarantee the safety of your GoPro when using our product. After many times of trial and error, we finally pass the tensile test by using double stitch line and cross stitch line on the hand strap. Most of the technical issues has been solved and we are confident that we will be able to deliver as per our projected plan. We will keep things transparent and inform our supporters of any hurdles/delay along the way
FAQ
What is the compatibility of hybrid strap?Whether you have a GoPro 3, 3+, 4, or 4 SESSION, you can attach it to hybrid strap and start your adventure. It just works!

Can I buy the hybrid strap after the campaign?
Unfortunately, hybrid strap will never be available for sale if our campaign is not success...
When will I receive hybrid strap?
We have worked hard on shortening the production lead-time . Therefore, we will be able to deliver the hybrid strap to you from Early 2016!
Do you ship everywhere? How much does it cost?
All price including shipping fee, wherever you are! No extra shipping cost required
How can I know the progress after the campaign?
Please follow us on Facebook / Google+ as we will keep updating the manufacturing progress
Shipping addresses and perks
After the campaign is over, we will be sending surveys via 
backerkit where you can fill out your necessary information such as your
 shipping address and perk options. In case you want more of our 
products, you will also be able to add-on additional perks

Contact us!
Any question? comments? Please do not hesitate to reach us at any time by email at informalhour@gmail.com

story:
PeerAmid NFC Watch

The PeerAmid NFC Watch is exactly what it sounds like. An NFC Watch. NFC is short for Near Field Communication. With an NFC enabled device, such as a smartphone, you can program your watch to do what ever you want.

The NFC Watch can transfer information, store URLs, and even unlock you home door.

The watch features a bright LED display. The watch utilizes a simple one touch design. To view the time, all you have to do is press lightly on the screen. With another press you can view the date. The NFC Watch also incorporates an NTAG213 chip, instead of the older NTAG203 to provide a better scan and faster data transfer.

The watch has completely interchangeable parts. You can change the body from a plastic to a stainless steel body. Also, it is compatible with most 22mm watch bands.

What Can It Do?

It can store information such as:

  • Your business card
  • Web Addresses
  • Building addresses
  • Phone numbers
  • and plain text

It can also be used to share

  • Business Cards
  • Web addresses
  • Wifi information
  • Bluetooth information
  • Phone numbers
  • Locations
  • And plain text
You can also use your watch as:
  • A key to Unlock your NFC enabled door
  • A self promotion device
  • A key to unlock your phone 
  • And More!
Perks and Stretch Goals

Stretch Goals
  1. $1500: ($25+) Free NFC TAGS, ($60+) Extra Nylon Strap
More TBA!

Perks:

  • $15 - Nylon Watch Strap
  • $25 - Silicone NFC Watch 
  • $30 - Leather Watch Strap
  • $60 - Plastic NFC Watch
  • $120 - Stainless Steel NFC Watch
  • $260 - Brass NFC Watch
  • $850 - Silver NFC Watch
  • $5,700 - 14k Gold NFC Watch
  • $5,700 - 14k White Gold NFC Watch
  • $5,700 - 14k Rose Gold NFC Watch
  • $7,600 - 18k Gold NFC Watch
  • $16,500 - Platinum NFC Watch

The Value

The NFC Watch allows customers to customize their watch to their liking. 
You're always able to upgrade and replace parts on your watch.
You can replace the watch body with a more expensive or cheaper material to fit your needs.
You are also able to replace the watch band to better fit your needs... and your wrist!

Risks and Challenges

Risks:

There are very minimal risks. If you were to purchase a watch, it is guaranteed that you'll receive one. Why? Because, though it is slow, we can already manufacture these watches.

Challenges:

Production speed: We don't know if our production rate could keep up with potential demand.

Also, with not enough funding, manufacturing speed and may not allow us to stock up on our product after our campaign.

FAQs (Sorted A-Z)

Q: Does It Work With My Smartphone?

A: Currently, Apple has incorporated NFC capabilities into their devices but restrict the usage to their Apple pay feature. There are cases and add-ons to make iPhones compatible.

Many newer android phones, windows phone, and more are now NFC enabled. We've tested these watches with the Samsung Note 2 and 4 and Samsung Galaxy S5.

Q: How Durable Is The Watch?

A: Here is an EXTREME TORTURE TEST

Q: Is it water resistant?

A: It not meant to withstand more than splashes.

In the Torture Test, we found that when submerged in water, it will stop working but when it dries off then it'll work again

Q: What is the operating distance?

A: Near Field Communication means that you need to be close to a device. It depends on the device. Approx 2-5cm
Q: What is the thickness?

A: 7.7mm - 9.3mm Depending on the model. The watch is much thinner than most watches.

story:
Hi, this is Syzygy outdoor gear. We are a Hong Kong based company which aim to develop hi-tech outdoor gear with aesthetic and simplicity. Electricity is the fuel of most of the hi-tech gear (even some low tech) . So for our first project, we designed the Apollo 45L to solve the power source problem first. 

We found that more and more outdoor gears apply usb charging. Those stuff run out of battery quickly and so do your powerbank too. But you can't just bring many powerbanks, what can we do? The only solution is to found out a sustainable energy source to recharge you device! 

In fact, solar power is the most convenient power source to get electricity to charge up your gears outdoor, compare to any other sustainable source. Therefor, we are presenting you the Apollo 45L. 




Why Apollo 45L?

The Apollo 45L is your portable power generate backpack with 6W and 1A output. The Apollo 45L do not comes with a powerbank because who don't have a powerbank? And the other reason is once the powerbanks run out of battery, they become dead weights. It is enough for charging most kind of your device or portable powerbank. They will never become dead weights. No matter you are in an wild adventure, a casual hike or just biking to work, the Apollo 45L guarantee you a sustainable power source. 





               -  Thin Film Solar Panel  -

      The solar panel is covered by a thin layer of PET film. It makes the panel bendable and water-proof. The solar panel provides you 6W and 1A output that                                supports any mobile electric devices charge with usb.


- X-Pac™ laminated fabric -

X-PAC fabric is a ripstop nylon textile laminated with steel wire. It gives lightweight, durable and water-proof performance.


- Multi-Purpose Compartment -

How often do you feel your bag does not fulfill the needs of your belongings and purposes. Or the bag just does not give you the amount of space you need? We designed a multi-purpose compartment system that can help you storage the gears and belongings.

A dry bag is sewn on the top portion of the backpack and a full size space for versatile usage. The main compartment enable easy access to the content of the backpack. A laptop or reservoir slot at the back of the backpack covered by a layer of foam cushioning. Two side slots for you tiny personal belongings.

  


                                                      1. Internal Dry Bag

You can put all the belongings that you want to keep dry inside.



  

2. Protective Laptop or Reservoir Slot

A layer of 6 mm protective foam for your computer or your reservoir.


                                         3. Top compartment for large items

  Large items like a basketball, a helmet, or any bulky equipment can fit in the top                                                                        compartment.



                                                  4. Internal Side Pockets 

      There are internal side pockets on the both sides. You can see the items inside                                                              through the mesh pockets. 



                                                    5. Side Stretch Pocket

This pocket is made of elastic tricot fabric which can support a bottle of drinks or                                                                    some other small stuff.



                                         6. Hangloops for Trekking Poles 

        You can attach a pair of trekking poles or some other stick like items on the                                                                   hangloops of both sides.



                                             7. Quick Assess Top Pocket

   The top pocket is designed for small items that you often use. For example, head                                                 lamp, keys, maps or earphones, etc. 


 8. Emergency Whistle  

Small whistle attached on the zipper of the top pocket would be useful for emergency situation.



9. Charging Zone

There is a usb charging cable connected to the solar panel in the side pocket on the left. You can reach your charging phone while you do not need to take off your backpack. 





  1. How is the efficiency of Syzygy Apollo 45 backpack solar panel?

    The efficiency of the solar panel depends on the weather you use. 

  2. Is the white Syzygy Apollo 45 backpack gets dirty easily?

    The X-pac fabric that we use on the backpack is easy to clean.

  3. Can it be used for diving or submersible?

    No, the backpack is rain and weather resistance but not design for submersible.
  4. Do Syzygy backpack come with warranty?

    Syzygy Apollo 45L has 2-year warranty. 

  5. Is the price listed include tax and duties?

    All price listed is shown without value added tax, the VAT and other taxes will be collected in your country according to laws in the country to which the goods are shipped and will be paid by the customer upon receiving the goods.

story:
MAIL BEACON is a smart, affordable device that helps you manage your physical mailbox.



This user-friendly device and mobile application notifies you and reports the state of your mailbox (sender, number of items, parcels, dimensions, delivery time and date).

       

       This is the first Bluetooth Beacon for everyone!



We all have a mail box, and Mail Beacon is the first smart gadget to manage it (in house, flat or office). You and your friends and family will love the convenience, so it’s a great gadget and gift.

The Mail Beacon is perfect for older or disabled folks for whom getting to the mailbox can be difficult. This way they don’t make the walk for nothing.

It’s also ideal for people whose house is far from their mailbox. It can save them a walk ‘all the way to the mailbox’ just to find it empty.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mail Beacons are compatible with any phone supporting Bluetooth version 4.0, also called Bluetooth Low Energy or Bluetooth Smart™.

 

 

 

Bluetooth Low Energy devices require a direct connection in a short range (up to 500 m). Therefore, to extend the range to worldwide, some kind of smart hub is needed, which costs more. We looked to small community behavior for inspiration for a solution.

Sometimes we ask for help from our neighbors. In the case of smart networking, your neighbor’s phone can forward Mail Beacon status update to you. Just take a look:

 

 

If you’ll be away from home, you can ask a friend to install the app too. His phone can connect to the Internet and forward your status updates to you.

 


The device waits for any action inside the mailbox. Then it scans each inserted item.
We can't explain all details, because we're still considering to patent this technology.



Thanks to the several optical detectors, the device can define the dimensions, count the number of letters or parcels, and see the sender. It even analyzes the content look to sort “spam” content.  Like e-mail, spam filters don’t always work well, but Mail Beacon can tell with 99% accuracy whether the inserted item is spam or not.

 

 

The device should be placed to see the biggest area as possible (usually on top of the post box in a central place).  In some cases, it can reduce Bluetooth range, but we added an RF socket for an external flexible antenna to gain radio range if needed. The external antenna should be stuck on the outer part of the mailbox or close to the some hole. The range is highly dependent on the environment and the phone used as well.


It is really tiny (25x25x8mm) device; almost invisible. A waterproof enclosure protects the electronic circuits and keeps the device ready for a long time.

 

 

When Robert first came up with the idea of Mail Beacon, he wanted to create easy and user –friendly app with sense of humor, and that’s how we built it. Basic setup is to pair the device with the app. You can adjust your notifications, “spam” filter, and sharing settings.

 

 

 

 


The first $15,000 will help us to obtain enough money to be able to get Mail Beacon ready for production. Obviously, larger amounts allow us to produce more devices at rates much lower than future retail prices. That is why any contribution is quite important. Take a look on the expenses graph.

 

 

 

 

Currently we have iOS and Android applications almost ready, but they need testing on different devices.


We have selected electronics components and almost finished firmware. Thanks to the DFU wireless mode, when we provide a new feature, you will need to allow firmware updating. We will start shipping in the latter part of October. Thanks to our previous “AmbiVision” project, we have a trusted and fast manufacturer selected. They are capable of making about 1000 Beacons within 2 weeks (awesome, right?). Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates on this page or our social media.

 

 

Everywhere. Free priority shipping for all backers regardless of the destination by DHL or USPS. The single kit includes a Mail Beacon device with battery, manual, and warranty card with a 1-year period.

 



Get one more for free if 10 of your friends contribute to at least 1 perks of Main Beacon, you will get one additional Mail Beacon for free. There is no limit.

Here is how you refer a friend: 

1. Make sure you're logged in (check your name on top of the Indiegogo page)
2. Copy the link of the page (it includes a number; this is your personal ID)
3. Send this link to your friend.

That's it. If your friend uses that link to back the project (which includes your ID) we can attribute the contribution to your referral.

 


Our team has already created AmbiVision, which raised $113k, and was delivered on time. We are providing nice support. We are young and experienced in project development. Mail Beacon has no risk to become a scam project. We would love to deliver another great product that reached people all over the world. We have already checked the international certifications for devices to make sure that the product is safe and legally ready for distribution.

 

 

Robert Jaszczyk  is the project founder. He came up with the idea while waiting for an important HMRC letter (the UK equivalent of the IRS). He is responsible for the hardware and software design. He always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.

Robert Mielnik is the software engineer who likes to invent and test new things. He is an experienced developer of mobile, games, and other desktop applications.

Izabela Tereszkiewicz is the designer  and manufacturing expert. A graduate University of Economy, she controls all the manufacturing processes from the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics and as well as the enclosure design.

 

The Campaign has become possible thanks to a lot of other people:

Victoria Kozakiewicz

Margaret Ostrowska

Kinga Kaczmarek

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Email support at mailbeacon@lab-team.com

MAIL BEACON official website:  http://mailbeacon.tech

 


Q: Is there any monthly fee?
No. The only expense is the Mail Beacon device.

Q: Can I use the app for more than 1 device?
Yes, you can use more devices i.e.: for house, office, grandpa box, etc.

Q: Do I need to get external antenna?
If you have fully metal post box, Bluetooth Low Energy range is not enough.  In this case it is better to get an external antenna for each Mail Beacon separately.

Q: Does the Main Beacon need any maintenance?
Depending on environmental conditions, we recommend to clean the camera lens every 6 months.  You will be notified if clearing is needed.

Q: Does the app affect to Smartphone battery usage?
Yes, but it is not noticeable.  Your Smartphone needs to discover Main Beacon periodically. It takes some amount of energy. However, scanning is enabled only if you are near the mail box.  Thanks to this trick, we can reduce your battery usage.

Q: Are there any Bluetooth device density limits in small communities?
No, each device has unique ID, so there is no problem.

There is no limit.Here is how you refer a friend: 1. Make sure you're logged in (check your name on top of the Indiegogo page)2. Copy the link of the page (it includes a number; this is your personal ID)3. Send this link to your friend.That's it. If your friend uses that link to back the project (which includes your ID) we can attribute the contribution to your referral. Our team has already created AmbiVision, which raised $113k, and was delivered on time. We are providing nice support. We are young and experienced in project development. Mail Beacon has no risk to become a scam project. We would love to deliver another great product that reached people all over the world. We have already checked the international certifications for devices to make sure that the product is safe and legally ready for distribution.  Robert Jaszczyk  is the project founder. He came up with the idea while waiting for an important HMRC letter (the UK equivalent of the IRS). He is responsible for the hardware and software design. He always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.Robert Mielnik is the software engineer who likes to invent and test new things. He is an experienced developer of mobile, games, and other desktop applications.Izabela Tereszkiewicz is the designer  and manufacturing expert. A graduate University of Economy, she controls all the manufacturing processes from the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics and as well as the enclosure design. The Campaign has become possible thanks to a lot of other people:Victoria KozakiewiczMargaret OstrowskaKinga KaczmarekPlease let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!Email support at mailbeacon@lab-team.comMAIL BEACON official website:  http://mailbeacon.tech Q: Is there any monthly fee?No. The only expense is the Mail Beacon device.Q: Can I use the app for more than 1 device?Yes, you can use more devices i.e.: for house, office, grandpa box, etc.Q: Do I need to get external antenna?If you have fully metal post box, Bluetooth Low Energy range is not enough.  In this case it is better to get an external antenna for each Mail Beacon separately.Q: Does the Main Beacon need any maintenance?Depending on environmental conditions, we recommend to clean the camera lens every 6 months.  You will be notified if clearing is needed.Q: Does the app affect to Smartphone battery usage?Yes, but it is not noticeable.  Your Smartphone needs to discover Main Beacon periodically. It takes some amount of energy. However, scanning is enabled only if you are near the mail box.  Thanks to this trick, we can reduce your battery usage.Q: Are there any Bluetooth device density limits in small communities?No, each device has unique ID, so there is no problem.

story:
Ecocouch is an ecofriendly  sofa couch made from fabric and 100 empty plastic bottles. all  Bottles are regular 1.5L plastic soft drink bottles used as the sofa's skeleton.

Its ecofriendly as it uses empty bottles rather than throwing them away , its cheap  , very lite – a completed single couch will weigh about 9 kg only.

It can be used in leaving rooms , students apartments , single flats and more.

You can have a great fashionable furnished leaving room for a very reasonable amount of money , easy to move use and carry and support the environment at the same time.

The whole couch fits into a small carry-on bag as can be seen on the attached photos. Once brought to its desired location the fabric is spread and empty plastic bootless (with caps) are inserted into the pre made slots in the couch creating its skeleton and shape. Than all that needs to be done is close the zipper and…you have a couch.

It takes no more the 20 minutes to insert 98 bottles (in this current single model) into the ecocouch and that’s it , it's done.

Now all you have to do is lay back , and relax knowing you just saved allot of money and made sure that 98 plastic bottles won't harm the environment as they are right…under you.

The inventor and developer of Ecocouch is a young passionate entrepreneur named Idan Levi. Idan leaves in a small desert town in the southern part of Israel called Arad. Against all odds Idan and his wife opened a Sewing workshop making special bags and tactical items.  Idan , age 36 worked for many years with the Bedouin population , the authentic habitants of the desert, Idan also served as a nature Reserve marshal. Gaya, age 40 ,has made a  variety of managerial positions in the hotel industry. For the last 10 years they leave in the Negev desert , in the city of Arad razing 5 children.  Both are desert people , environment lovers , believe in maintaining and saving environmental resources of nature.



As an ecofriendly community leaving on limited desert's resources and guarding its surroundings , Idan came up with the idea of the Ecocouch that is both clean , green , ecofriendly and reduces pollution of the surroundings .

The prototype is already made. In order to make it better , to produce few dozens of items and to support it with basic marketing activities , the tem need help and your kind support. If we raise that amount of money we can make this dream come true. Make the planet a better and cleaner one for all , help educate kids how  not to throw away thing but rather re-use it , and help this small Sewing workshop survive and maybe become a center of ecofriendly products somewhere in the heart of the desert , not too far from mount Sinai. We believe that if it is eco Fun , than the chances of it being truly ecofriendly are much greater. So help us make this Eco-Fun-friendly Ecocouch. It's for the benefit of All.

story:
So, what's the story?

While I was born and brought up in India, I went to a small liberal-arts college in upstate New York for my undergraduate education. Though my time in the States was not quite like my favorite teenage Hollywood film of the time, American Pie, I had an absolutely amazing time and made some lifelong friends. Several of my friends would visit India each year and end up going to Jaipur. My guy friends would often out-shop my gal friends, buying many block-printed shirts from tiny stores and artisan villages, where they were available for affordable prices. They would then flaunt these spicy shirts over the weekend, when we were grilling and chilling, tailgating or Sunday-fundaying.

 

 

Therefore, during my time in America I gained a deep appreciation for Indian textiles as I saw how fabrics such as gingham, madras, seersucker and others, with roots in India, had found their way to clothing brands such as Vineyard Vines and Chubbies, that were popular amongst my friends.

 

 

In the Western World, hand-made textiles from India tend to be quite expensive and are reserved for expensive fashion labels. However, through Mangrove Supply, we aim to flood the mass market with insanely cool, hand crafted Indian fabrics in the form of vibrant weekend-wear so you can have access to the real deal. It’s impossible not to have a great time wearing these shirts, we dare you to try.

 

 

What are we raising $$$ for?

69% of the funds will go towards inventory, 14% towards marketing and the rest towards accountant and legal fees. 

Our unique perks you ask?

The Shirts! While we aim to retail at $50, we are providing you with exclusive and early-bird discounts through Indiegogo, just in time for the summer.

What are the shirts made of?

The shirts are made of 100% premium quality, light, soft and ultra breathable cotton.

The Team?

We got a really big team, they need some really big rings, they need some really nice things (Mangrove Supply shirts...) Check out our Instagram and Facebook for updates on what the team is up to.

Risks & Challenges

As you guys can see, we have created prototypes and figured out the process from start to finish.  After all, we are working with artisans who have been doing this for 4 or 5, nay 6 or 7 generations ;) Our preparation should allow for a smooth production and fulfillment process. 

The only risk we can see coming up is that occasionally, and because the printing process for these shirts involves the usage of natural dyes (that are good for the environment), the shirts can bleed during the first wash or two in the dryer. However, we are currently working on a solution for the same and will keep you updated through this process. 

As a backer, you can rest assured that we will do the best we can to fulfill your orders in a timely fashion. And because we believe in transparency in everything we do, expect frequent updates on our campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

We highly encourage you to follow are social media handles for some images of the shirts, us having fun, and also for some engaging content (we're funny some times). 

https://instagram.com/mangrovesupply/

https://www.facebook.com/mangrovesupply/

FAQs

What about the pattern and size for my shirt?

Don't worry, you will get to choose the pattern and size through a survey that we will send you. 

When will I get my shirt?

Since we want to perfect the product you are contributing towards, we aim to have the shirts to you by the end of August so you have time to spice it up before winter. 

What's the timeline look like?

Uhmm, by this time you might have figured out that we're bootstrapping and didn't have access to a graphic designer to create a cool infographic to show our timeline. So instead, here it is:

1. Launch: April 19

2. End: May 24

3. Print fabrics: By June 11

4. Create Shirts: By June 30

5. Package: By August 10

6. Ship: By August 12

Is it acceptable to put pineapple on our za?

Hmmm, since we don't want to alienate anyone, we will leave this one unanswered.

story:
Introduction

Making necessary trips during quarantine can be fun. That's why we augmented surgical-grade protective face masks with fashionable designs.

 

There used to be two types of masks for adults:

  • Stylish and comfortable masks
  • Certified protective masks

 

Now, there is no need to choose. You can keep yourself and your loved ones protected from viruses (including COVID-19), bacteria, dust, and smog with our stylish and comfortable certified face masks. All ten designs are included in each box to impress your family, friends, and shopkeepers every day!

 

We need your support to make it happen! Order 5 boxes or more today to help the project.


Let's spread the fun, not the virus! Scroll down for FAQs.

 

The Product

We print our designs on high-quality surgical-grade masks. Whatever the mood, be sure – you are protected! We pack five masks of each design in every box, so you can choose the most suitable option for any occasion.

 

The Prototypes

 

The Print Material Sample

 

 

The Designs

 

Wearing masks is recommended by WHO

WHO is the World Health Organization, a division of the United Nations. The organization recommends that people worldwide wear a protective mask when they are feeling sick, or suspect that people nearby are sick.

 
Symptoms of the currently widespread coronavirus may take up to 28 days to surface in an infected person. That is why it is recommended to always wear a face mask when interacting with other people.

 

The Science

Surgical-grade 3-ply masks are known to be the best and easiest form of prevention of airborne diseases. This kind of masks was first used by surgeons back in the 1960s. All modern doctors still use it as an effective measure for disease prevention.
 
A 3-layer mask is made up of melt-blown polymer material that is placed between non-woven fabric. The melt-blown material filters microbes from entering or exiting the mask. The mask comfortably covers everything from the top of your nose to the bottom of your chin, making it nearly impossible for viruses and bacteria to pass through.

 

Projected Timeline

March 2020: Concept & Design

April 2020: Indiegogo Crowdfunding Starts

May/June 2020: Production

June/July 2020: Shipping

 

FDA & CE Certified

 

We are Great Twins

Reach out to our Mastermind, Jacky Teo, with any questions.
tcl@greattwins.com.sg

WhatsApp: +65 93621153

WeChat ID: jtcl3511

 

Great Twins is a design, production, and distribution company for collectible toys and high-end premium merchandise. We also serve as a consultant in building ideas from scratch to a unique finished product.

 
Made up of a dynamic team of creative and adventurous souls, featuring a diverse talent pool from various fields of expertise, we conceptualize, manufacture and distribute authentic high-quality collectible/designer toys (including vinyl figures, action figures, poly-resin/fiberglass statues, plush toys, etc.) and unique premium designer lifestyle merchandise.
 
We aim to take the lead internationally for the genre of products we design and produce.
 
With our global network of retailers, we have a toy and merchandise distribution arm that helps potential brand market, wholesale, and distribution of products. Bringing the best product to our customers is our utmost priority.
 
From transforming raw ideas into great products, starting from concept development through various stages of processing, production, packaging, and distribution of final products, Great Twins is the ideal place to help clients (government organizations, corporations, or private individuals) make their collectibles and toy-dreams become reality.

 

Help us take this project to market and get your stylish masks as soon as June 2020!

story:
AMERICAN WATCH STORY

     The last US watch factory was shut down in 1968. We want to change that! We are bringing back something classic, a true blast from the past. Only this time we have upgraded it and redesigned it into a product the 21st century is ready for. Our mission is to regain the glory of the world’s number one watchmakers!

     We welcome you with open arms into the unique experience of watchmaking! As a proud member of the American Watchmakers-Clockmakers Institute, we have invested all our blood, sweat, and tears to make something special just for you. With the highest quality and standards set, we promise you a one-of-a-kind design -MAXTORY EXTREME- for the people who help this dream come true.     

     You are a part of our success story. Once you take the step to come forward and help us, you will get a platinum membership, which gives you an exclusive right to own watches that have not yet been released to the public.  That’s not all. We will also give you a 15% lifetime discount on all our watches as our most devoted members.  The funds we raise will be used to help jump-start the watchmaking business.

    You will be honored in history as one of the people who have helped the American watch production rise to the world number one again. We will honor you with a special page dedicated to our investors and backers, as the people who believe in American watchmaking. Thank you and see you at the grand opening.

MAXTORY An American Watch Company

Ready for extreme!
 
MAXTORY EXTREME FIRE LOGO REVEAL

REAL CARBON FIBER DIAL

ITALIAN LEATHER BAND

IN DARK ILLUMINATING WATCH HANDS(SWISS SUPER-LUMINOVA)

OPEN BACK

story:
Let me introduce the Halocline by Iconic Timepieces

PSA: As sometimes happens with Microbrand Watches, The official name of this dive watch from Iconic Timepieces has been changed from Hampton Bay to Halocline. Iconic Timepieces made this change to limit market confusion as well as provide a better over all name to fit what this diver is all about. 
 

These watches are already complete and only need to be assem

The images in this campaign will show the original name on the prototypes and we will provide drawings of the watch with all the updated changes.

The Halocline Dive Watch will come in 4 unique color ways 

Quality at a Higher Standard

Specifications:

43mm 316L Marine Grade Stainless Steel Case

13mm case height

49mm lug-to-lug - wears more like a 40mm diameter watch making this very versatile for a wide range of wrist sizes while keeping a lot of presence

22mm between lugs

AR Coated Sapphire Crystal

Sellita SW200-1 Automatic Swiss Movement

316L Solid Marine Grade Stainless Steel H-Link with taper from 22mm at the lugs to 18mm at the clasp

Swiss Super Luminova BGW9 (Glows Blue) fully reverse lumed 120 click uni-directional rotating Sapphire Bezel

Swiss Super Luminova on Hands, markers, and bezel. Currently C3, changing to bgw9.

7.5mm Screw Down Crown with logo accent

Screw Down Solid Caseback

200 Meters / 660 Feet Water Resistance Rating.

Milled Diver's Clasp with logo accent

1 year manufacturer defect warranty

Final 2D drawings of the Halocline Dive Watch

The Vibrant Blue prototype.

The Journey to the Iconic Halocline Dive Watch

I began this journey as an enthusiast with a dream! Most of us thumb through Facebook groups and other forums looking at watches for hours. Then spending several more hours researching the watches that we have seen in the many posts we viewed. As enthusiasts we always look at these watches and think of what we would do different had we designed that watch. And if you are like myself, you might also have a sketch pad with hundreds or maybe even thousands of watch sketches. This is where you could say Iconic Timepieces was born. A very rough birth as you can see, but this was the beginning!

As you can see, the Halocline went through many transformations before landing on the final design.

Being a member of the Microbrand Watch Community, I wanted to get the community involved. I wanted to include them on the design process. So I began posting this very rough sketch on Facebook and asking the community for their feedback. At this point the Halocline began to transform into what it is today. We went through many design aspects as well as colorways and hand options. I took all the suggestions and created enough to send out for prototypes. We even went through a few name changes before settling on the Hampton Bay. We landed on Hampton Bay because Hampton is my middle name, and Bay because it is a classy looking dive watch design. We thought we had the final name in place as you can see on the prototypes and we went with Hampton Bay, however, we decided to change the name once again to avoid any issues in the future from other brands that have used the name Hampton Bay on their watches. After all Iconic Timepieces is all about bringing the market something unique, so the model name should be unique as well. We landed on Halocline because of the beauty of seeing the layers transition from crystal clear to foggy and dense, much like the dials fading from solid colors to the icy white in the center. In the end we feel this name better suits this unique timepiece. 

The Prototypes Arrive

Best of the Best

I wanted to share this experience with my follow watch enthusiasts because most of us don't get to see all the moving parts on the back end. It is very easy to criticize watch designs when you don't know all that goes into bringing a watch from concept to reality. This is where the real work begins. From finding the right manufacturing and supply chains to communicating your concept to having your prototypes come out correctly. I will say that being a community member and knowing what the consumer and myself see as quality does give Iconic Timepieces an advatage because quality and price point are key factors in bringing this dream to the market.  

Swimming a crystal clear Halocline 

Halocline

Halocline, vertical zone in the oceanic water column in which salinity changes rapidly with depth, located below the well-mixed, uniformly saline surface water layer. Especially well developed haloclines occur in the Atlantic ocean, in which salinities may decrease by several parts per thousand from the base of the surface layer to depths of about one kilometre (3,300 feet). In higher latitudinal areas of the North Pacific in which solar heating of the surface waters is low and rainfall is abundant, salinities increase markedly with depth through the halocline layer. Pycnoclines, or layers through which water density increases rapidly with depth, accompany such haloclines inasmuch as density varies directly with total salt content.


A dense Halocline layer resembling fog on top of a lake.

These are changes being made to the production watches: 

The IT logo will be a stainless steel applied logo and centered correctly.

Changing the bracelet to an H-Link bracelet with a taper from 22mm at the lugs to 18mm at the clasp.

Upgrading the clasp to a better quality and longer clasp with more micro adjustments.

The wording “Automatic 200meters” will be reconfigured for better visibility and balance.

Changing the lume from C3 to bgw9 and making stronger for longevity.

Hands will be changed to a thicker set for better legibility. (See render and SeaFoam Green prototype.)

The name of the watch has changed from Hampton Bay to Halocline.

Now the Halocline Dive Watch will come with a color match nylon NATO strap.

Upgraded quality bracelet and clasp

Photo Credit to Anders Törmä from AChickenWristDelight

Photo Credit to Anders Törmä from AChickenWristDelight

I have always been a fan of the Sellita SW200-1, making it a clear and obvious choice for the Halocline Dive Watch

The Sellita SW200-1 is the main competitor to ETA’s 2824-2 workhorse. It has been updated from SW200 to SW200-1.

Many reputable watch companies are using this movement as an alternative to the ETA mechanism due to it being more economical and readily available.

A real pillar of Swiss watchmaking, the SW200-1 is precise, reliable and robust. The SW200-1 is versatile too and, thanks in particular to its many versions and small complications, is well able to equip all types of watches, from the most sports-orientated to the most elegant.


Specs

Frequency - 28800

26 Jewels

38 hour power reserve

Complications - Date, hours, minutes, seconds

Changing the Lume to BGW9 Swiss Super Luminova for the production watches

Product and Packaging Info:

Halocline Dive Watch choice of color

Extra Nylon Nato Strap

Travel Case

Link Tool

Sticker

Warranty card and instructions

Members of the community wearing the prototypes:

.


i
Security in Reputation 

One of the main concerns with backing Kickstarter campaigns is the fear of the creator not keeping their end of the deal. Also the lack of communication between Creators and Backers. Being a member of the community for the past few years, and working on several other projects in the industry, I have built a reputation by making myself available 24/7. I have always responded as quickly as possible to any comment or concern from the community and stuck with any issues until they were resolved. I will do the same with this project, all comments will get a response within 24 hours, and any issue that may come up during production will be announced with full transparency.

The flared out lugs offer a unique taper that flows with the other design elements on the watch.


The Halocline is a balance of Quality and Design!

The community has grown tired of seeing the same designs come out time after time, so Iconic Timepieces decided to try something different!

THE FIRST HANDS ON REVIEW FROM: 

 https://youtu.be/2nK5I9ZQi20

 

 Testimonials

"Its just damn cool!" ~Wade Russon - Watchin~

"I am severely impressed!" ~Andrew - MyWatchAddiction~

"I like the sweep of the second hand, it's real smooth!" ~Ty Brown - My Watch Lifestyle~

"Really neat, unique looking Diver from Iconic Timepieces" ~Aron Dunlap - OFD Watch Channel~

“Ivan from Iconic Timepieces has made a very unique, fresh, tough and original watch, a diver that has a lot of distinctiveness and attitude, making it one of the easiest to recognize amongst others. In a world full of similarity and simplicity, it’s very refreshing to see such a strong design, packed with delicious details.” ~Anders Törmä - Achickenwristdelight~

What We Need & What You Get

We began on Kickstarter and in the middle of the campaign the pandemic caused me to lose over half of my backers. 

Then a company that placed a 100 unit order backed out at the last minute.

  • So in order to complete this project I need to raise the $32,000 that the company never paid.
  • The watches are all done except assembly so delivery will be fast
  • All the funds will go towards paying off the manufacturer and duties plus shipping.
story_txt:
Let me introduce the Halocline by Iconic Timepieces
PSA: As sometimes happens with Microbrand Watches, The official name of this dive watch from Iconic Timepieces has been changed from Hampton Bay to Halocline. Iconic Timepieces made this change to limit market confusion as well as provide a better over all name to fit what this diver is all about.  
These watches are already complete and only need to be assem
The images in this campaign will show the original name on the prototypes and we will provide drawings of the watch with all the updated changes.

The Halocline Dive Watch will come in 4 unique color ways 
Quality at a Higher Standard
Specifications:
43mm 316L Marine Grade Stainless Steel Case
13mm case height
49mm lug-to-lug - wears more like a 40mm diameter watch making this very versatile for a wide range of wrist sizes while keeping a lot of presence
22mm between lugs
AR Coated Sapphire Crystal
Sellita SW200-1 Automatic Swiss Movement
316L Solid Marine Grade Stainless Steel H-Link with taper from 22mm at the lugs to 18mm at the clasp
Swiss Super Luminova BGW9 (Glows Blue) fully reverse lumed 120 click uni-directional rotating Sapphire Bezel
Swiss Super Luminova on Hands, markers, and bezel. Currently C3, changing to bgw9.
7.5mm Screw Down Crown with logo accent
Screw Down Solid Caseback
200 Meters / 660 Feet Water Resistance Rating.
Milled Diver's Clasp with logo accent
1 year manufacturer defect warranty
Final 2D drawings of the Halocline Dive Watch
The Vibrant Blue prototype.
The Journey to the Iconic Halocline Dive Watch
I began this journey as an enthusiast with a dream! Most of us thumb through Facebook groups and other forums looking at watches for hours. Then spending several more hours researching the watches that we have seen in the many posts we viewed. As enthusiasts we always look at these watches and think of what we would do different had we designed that watch. And if you are like myself, you might also have a sketch pad with hundreds or maybe even thousands of watch sketches. This is where you could say Iconic Timepieces was born. A very rough birth as you can see, but this was the beginning!
As you can see, the Halocline went through many transformations before landing on the final design.

Being a member of the Microbrand Watch Community, I wanted to get the community involved. I wanted to include them on the design process. So I began posting this very rough sketch on Facebook and asking the community for their feedback. At this point the Halocline began to transform into what it is today. We went through many design aspects as well as colorways and hand options. I took all the suggestions and created enough to send out for prototypes. We even went through a few name changes before settling on the Hampton Bay. We landed on Hampton Bay because Hampton is my middle name, and Bay because it is a classy looking dive watch design. We thought we had the final name in place as you can see on the prototypes and we went with Hampton Bay, however, we decided to change the name once again to avoid any issues in the future from other brands that have used the name Hampton Bay on their watches. After all Iconic Timepieces is all about bringing the market something unique, so the model name should be unique as well. We landed on Halocline because of the beauty of seeing the layers transition from crystal clear to foggy and dense, much like the dials fading from solid colors to the icy white in the center. In the end we feel this name better suits this unique timepiece. 
The Prototypes Arrive

Best of the Best
I wanted to share this experience with my follow watch enthusiasts because most of us don't get to see all the moving parts on the back end. It is very easy to criticize watch designs when you don't know all that goes into bringing a watch from concept to reality. This is where the real work begins. From finding the right manufacturing and supply chains to communicating your concept to having your prototypes come out correctly. I will say that being a community member and knowing what the consumer and myself see as quality does give Iconic Timepieces an advatage because quality and price point are key factors in bringing this dream to the market.  
Swimming a crystal clear Halocline 
Halocline
Halocline, vertical zone in the oceanic water column in which salinity changes rapidly with depth, located below the well-mixed, uniformly saline surface water layer. Especially well developed haloclines occur in the Atlantic ocean, in which salinities may decrease by several parts per thousand from the base of the surface layer to depths of about one kilometre (3,300 feet). In higher latitudinal areas of the North Pacific in which solar heating of the surface waters is low and rainfall is abundant, salinities increase markedly with depth through the halocline layer. Pycnoclines, or layers through which water density increases rapidly with depth, accompany such haloclines inasmuch as density varies directly with total salt content.
A dense Halocline layer resembling fog on top of a lake.
These are changes being made to the production watches: 
The IT logo will be a stainless steel applied logo and centered correctly.
Changing the bracelet to an H-Link bracelet with a taper from 22mm at the lugs to 18mm at the clasp.
Upgrading the clasp to a better quality and longer clasp with more micro adjustments.
The wording “Automatic 200meters” will be reconfigured for better visibility and balance.
Changing the lume from C3 to bgw9 and making stronger for longevity.
Hands will be changed to a thicker set for better legibility. (See render and SeaFoam Green prototype.)
The name of the watch has changed from Hampton Bay to Halocline.
Now the Halocline Dive Watch will come with a color match nylon NATO strap.
Upgraded quality bracelet and clasp

Photo Credit to Anders Törmä from AChickenWristDelight

Photo Credit to Anders Törmä from AChickenWristDelight

A real pillar of Swiss watchmaking, the SW200-1 is precise, reliable and robust. The SW200-1 is versatile too and, thanks in particular to its many versions and small complications, is well able to equip all types of watches, from the most sports-orientated to the most elegant.

story:
At Homeless Shelters, New Clothing Is In Extremely High Demand

This fact is the driving force behind Bombas. We exist to help support the homeless community, and to bring awareness to an under-publicized problem in the United States.

 

45,617,484

Items Donated

Bombas was founded on the philosophy of donating to those in need, but has evolved to go deeper into the community. The more clothing items we sell, the more we donate. As we grow, our giving and community efforts will continue to grow right alongside us. One purchased = one donated.

Designed For Donation

Working closely with our giving partners, we donate clothing that meets the needs of people who don’t have the luxury of putting on clean clothes every day.

story:
Inspired by the magnificent classic diver watches of the 60’s and 70’s, Tempore Lux watches has journeyed into the past and united tradition with the most modern of timepiece technologies.

Now, after 3 years of meticulous design, we are ready to present our premiere collection of watches: the VINTAGE ONE.

 

 

The VINTAGE ONE is a robust diver watch that is waterproof to 300m (1,000ft) depth. Its 44mm brushed solid steel 316L case features a unidirectional ceramic bezel and sapphire crystal with AR COATING anti-reflection treatment. The hands, hour markers and bezel markers are filled with Superluminova BGW9.

 

 

The VINTAGE ONE comes in two versions: 

  •  V ONE series with a Seiko Premium Mechanical SII NE15 automatic mechanism
  •  V ONE CHRONOGRAPH series with a Premium Chronograph VK64 Meca-Quartzmechanism (also from Seiko)

 

 

 

 

 

My name is David Ramirez and I am totally passionate about watches.

I am particularly obsessed by vintage watches: made with the very best materials and with almost magically constructed automatic mechanisms, unfortunately these works of art have also always had a correspondingly high price, only within reach of a small, privileged group of people.

During my long career in the watchmaking sector, I kept thinking that there had to be some way to share my passion and create a high quality “vintage” watch at a more affordable price. Finally, when I’d discovered all the ingredients to make it happen, Tempore Lux watches was born, with a clear objective to offer timepieces of the highest quality at a fair price.

 

 

 

 

 

“But David, how can you create a high quality watch at such an affordable price?”

 

 

Quite simply: by employing direct distribution, going from the brand straight to the final customer. By eliminating all the (expensive) middlemen, we realize huge savings for you, our customers. In this way, we can offer you a high quality watch at a much lower price.

 

 

 

 

After an extensive search I found the perfect graphic design team and we started creating the first sketches.

 

 

Finding a factory that could guarantee the quality we wanted was not an easy task either, but finally, after rejecting several companies, we found a manufacturer in Hong Kong that provided us with the high quality that we demanded and we started to manufacture the first prototypes.

 

 

 

 

 

Primary to Tempore Lux is ensuring an extremely high quality in every aspect of its timepieces. It is why we have taken as much time and effort as necessary to select exclusive components of the highest quality for each of our watches. 

 

 

The case is 316L stainless steel brushed surgical grade, the standard of high-end swiss watch brands.

The ceramic bezel is of an exceptional quality, extraordinarily hard and resistant to scratches. This will keep your watch looking like new for years, avoiding the horrible micro scratches that you get with metallic bevels. 

 

 

The Crystal is made of Sapphire with anti-reflection treatment AR COATING, practically unbreakable and resistant to scratches.

For the luminescence of our watches we have chosen the highest grade of the famous Swiss brand RC Tritec. Its Super-Luminova BGW9 is the preferred choice by the manufacturers of high-end diver watches, due to its great visibility in the dark and its characteristic blue tone. In our watches, BGW9 is incorporated in the hands, hour markes and in the bezel.

 

 

 

The V ONE and V ONE CHRONOGRAPH share the same case and dimensions:

 

The back casing is fastened with six screws for the V ONE and threaded for the V ONE CHRONOGRAPH.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The true nature of a watch is what is inside: the mechanism is the heart that gives life to these magnificent machines. And when it comes to the internal aspects of a watch, there are no better pedigrees than the Swiss or Japanese movements.

 

 

After much study and debate, we concluded that the SEIKO/TMI brand mechanisms offered the high quality, precision and durability that we required. More affordable than comparable Swiss movements, the SEIKO/TMI mechanisms also had a price-point that still met our goal of creating high quality watches at an fair price. 

 

For the V ONE series we opted for the Premium Mechanical Sll NE15: 

 

 

The SEIKO SII NE15 is a high-performance automatic movement that has more than 50 hours of power reserve at 21,600 vibrations per hour (3Hz), 24 rubies and also supports manual load.

 

For the V ONE CHRONOGRAPH series the Premium Chronograph Sll VK64 Meca Quartz:

 

 

The SEIKO VK64 is a hybrid mechanism between quartz and mechanical, with two different modules working together. The hour and minute functions (it has no seconds hand) are controlled by a quartz precision movement, while the chronograph functions are performed by a mechanical module; in this way, it works like an automatic chronograph mechanism.

 

 

 

 

For the V ONE series the Swiss Automatic SELLITA caliber SW200-1:

 

A  real pillar of Swiss watchmaking, the SW200-1 is precise, reliable and  robust. The SW200-1 is well able to equip all types  of watches, from the most sports-orientated to the most elegant.

 

For the V ONE CHRONOGRAPH series the Swiss Automatic Chronograph SELLITA caliber SW510-BH:

 

The  SW510 BH is the «bicompax» version of the SW500. The SW510 therefore offers a traditional chronograph layout. Quick setting of the date is activated via the crown.

 

 

Details of the V ONE dial:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tempore Lux straps and bracelets are made from the highest quality materials, providing both elegance and durability.  

 

 

Three options are offered: 

 

316L stainless steel bracelet MESH (Milanese) with double safety folding clasp, solid and elegant.

 

 

 

High quality Italian leather strap with buckle closure in 316L steel, the preferred choice for luxury watch brands.

 

 

 

High quality rubber strap with buckle closure in 316L steel, the rubber straps are the most used in Swiss watchmaking for theirs excellent quality.

 

 

With your Tempore Lux watch you can choose between an Italian leather strap, a steel mesh bracelet or a black rubber strap, but you can also buy additional pieces. 

 

 

Our leather straps and rubber straps have a quick-change system, allowing you to change straps in seconds with just one finger. Effortlessly change the style of your watch at any time!

 

 

 

 

 

V ONE SERIE WITH SEIKO NE15 AND SELLITA SW200 SOLD!

 

LAST PIECES WITH SEIKO NH35A AVAILABLE!

 

The V One is an Automatic diver watch with form and details that evoke the classic watches of the 60s and 70s, while sporting the very latest in technological components.

Its tested 300M / 30ATM / 1.000ft water resistance ensures its place as a high performance diver watch that will be useful both for scuba diving and for day-to-day wear. A tough yet remarkably elegant watch that is sure to capture people’s attention.

 

 

 

 

 

 

V ONE CHRONOGRAPH SERIE WITH SELLITA SW510 SOLD!

 

 

The V One Chronograph series continues the VINTAGE ONE saga, adding a Meca-quartz chronograph hybrid module with two subdials in purest Vintage style.

The V One Chronograph’s solid steel construction, together with a unique combination of colors, results in the ultimate sporty and sophisticated look.

 

 

We are so convinced of the quality of our Tempore Lux watches that we offer a 3 year international warranty against any manufacturing defect.

 

 

 

NEW DESIGNS AVAILABLE TO PRE-ORDER!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your Tempore Lux watch is delivered in a luxury black wood box including a free tool to change bracelets.

 

I am as excited as you are about your Tempore Lux watch, so to get your exclusive timepiece to you as quickly as possible, all shipments will be express.

¡Free shipping to European Union countries!

 

 

 

 

 

Traditionally, designing, manufacturing and marketing a high quality watch like the V ONE would require sums of money and risks that were beyond the reach of an artisan team like ours.

Thanks to crowdfunding, we now have the opportunity to perfect and fine-tune our product. With the support and collaboration of hundreds or thousands of people like yourselves, it is possible to bring a product of love like this to market.

With your backing we can make our dreams – and yours – a reality! 

 

 

V One Chrono 01 Black / V One 01 Black

 

V One Chrono 02 Blue / V One 02 Blue

 

V One Chrono 03 Pvd Black / V One 03 Pvd Black

 

V One 01 Black with leather strap

 

V One 02 Blue with leather strap

 

V One 03 Pvd Black with mesh bracelet

 

V One 01 Black with mesh bracelet 

 

V One 02 Blue with mesh bracelet

 

V One 03 Pvd Black with mesh bracelet

 

V One Chrono 01 Black with leather strap

 

V One Chrono 02 Blue with leather strap

 

V One Chrono 03 Pvd Black with leather strap

 

Italian Leather Strap

 

Mesh Bracelet with closed deployant clasp 

 

Mesh Bracelet with opened deployant clasp 

 

Caseback

story:
MORE THAN JUST HEADPHONES

IMAGINE A WORLD WHERE:

  • Every purchase you make directly improves someone's life…
  • Non-profits are just as important as for-profits... 
  • The biggest fashion statement is a social statement…


Reveal was founded with a mission to design products that reveal organizations making a difference.  Our new Headphone Collection connects you to your music and the causes you care about such as hunger, AIDS, education, reforestation and clean water.

Here at Reveal, we are a team of idealistic, product design and manufacturing experts who love music and have a mission beyond producing the next product that everyone will simply "consume".   

By supporting Reveal, you are supporting not only these cool headphones, but the idea of changing the way people give back.   With your help, we can keep innovating cool products in the audio space and design the next generation of earphones and speakers that are inspired by great causes.    


5 COLORS, 5 CAUSES, 5 AMAZING NON-PROFITS


 

783 million people worldwide do not have access to clean, drinkable water, and 1 out of every 5 deaths of children under 5 is due to a water-related disease.  Water For People has the goal of complete water coverage for every family, every school, and every clinic. For every pair of blue headphones pledged, you provide 2 weeks of clean water for a family.


     

76% of children with AIDS are not receiving the treatment needed to survive.  Keep a Child Alive believes that every child has the right to health care. For every pair of red headphones pledged, you provide 5 days of medicine and care to a child with AIDS. 


             

34 million children suffer from acute malnutrition worldwide. Action Against Hunger is committed to ending hunger by feeding those in need in over 40 countries.  For every pair of orange  headphones pledged, you provide 5 days of therapeutic food for a malnourished child.

  

              

12-15 million hectares of forest are lost every year (36 football fields per minute).  American Forests has battled this by planting more than 46 million trees worldwide since 1990.  Every time a tree is planted, our environment improves and the air is cleaner.  For every pair of green headphones pledged, you plant FIVE trees.


           

773 million people worldwide are illiterate.  Room to Read promotes literacy and gender equality in education by building schools, establishing libraries, publishing children’s books, and training educators.  For every pair of black headphones pledged, you provide 5 books for children in Asia & Africa.


WHY HEADPHONES FOR CHARITY?

               

In today's digitally connected world - chic, high performance headphones are not just an audio device, but also a fashion accessory people do not leave home without.  Reveal Headphones are an effortless way to express your personal style AND show solidarity with a cause you believe in.


We see a big void in the audio and technology industry of products that give back.  We love audio and technology accessories, but feel that there is a great opportunity to change the industry that we work in.

Our team members have helped many major brands and retailers produce audio products, but this time we're excited to be making them for you and the causes you care about.  Rest assured, our years of expertise allows you to get the best quality product while raising money for some of the top rated non-profits around.

Each eye-catching color headphone has been matched to a specific cause and metric that will be carried out by the charity.  See how YOU will be making a difference by pledging today:


BRING ON THE PERKS!


When you join us in changing the world by pledging for one or more headphones, you'll receive the following perks:

Crowdfunding with Indiegogo allows us to maximize the amount of donation to the nonprofits in comparison with selling in brick and mortar retail stores.  Yes, that's right.  More goes to the nonprofit and the people in need.  More reason to act right now!  

Our vision of cool audio products making the world a better place will become a reality with your support spreading the word on Indiegogo today.


REVEAL NOISE ISOLATION PERFORMANCE HEADPHONES


These badboys have been developed with fashion and performance in mind.  Here are just a few key specs that make these your next perfect pair of headphones:


  • Dynamic Stereo Sound
  • Compatible With All Devices 
  • Lightweight Design Ideal for Everyday Wear 
  • Rubberized Soft Touch Cable and Housing 
  • Sealed in-ear Construction Design to Block Out External Noise
  • Flat Chord Helps Prevent Tangling
  • Extra Earbud Cushions (multiple sizes included)


OUR SCHEDULE


We have had plenty of high demands from big box retailers and major brands to produce the best possible product with on-time delivery.  So rest assured, we will do the same for you:

PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD & SHARE!

We are allocating a very small part of your pledge towards our marketing budget for this project, because we want the money to go where it is best used – our partner charities.

That means we can use every ounce of help we can get from you and anyone you know.  Please contribute or if that is not possible, you can still help us by sharing it with others via Facebook, Twitter, Email, Smoke Signals, or however you want!

WHO WE ARE


Reveal's founder, Terry Omata, is from Seattle, WA. He developed a passion for social responsibility when he took his first job with the non-profit organization, Teach for America. There he taught and coached kids from all walk of life. Helping children reach their full potential was one of his most rewarding experiences and helped shape the way he looks at the world around us.

After teaching, Terry was offered the exciting chance to get involved in a career in consumer electronics.  For the last decade, he and his team members have designed, developed, and helped produce audio accessories for some of the largest retailers and brands around the globe. 

So why are we doing this?  After watching countless products roll off the assembly line, we realized there was a genuine need for an audio brand that was more than just specs and functionality; a brand that would help bring enjoyment to listeners, and also help changes lives.


Risks & Challenges


We’ve been a part of the crowdfunding contributing side before and believe us: we understand that putting your hard earned money toward a crowdfunded venture can be “risky.” 

But rest assured, manufacturing and delivering quality earphones is our expertise and we've been doing it for years for other major brands and retailers.  And we've thoroughly vetted all our non-profit partners, making sure that your pledges go to helping people and our planet.

Everything from manufacturing to fulfillment is in line and ready for us to hit GO!  So let’s get this project funded and start changing lives.

FAQ

How do I choose which cause I want to support?

     - At the end of the campaign we will be sending out a survey.  At that time you will be able to pick which cause(s)/color(s) you would like to receive.

When will my headphones be delivered?

     - We will be shipping out all orders (international and domestic) starting the first couple weeks of May, 2015.  There is definitely potential for earlier delivery, but this is a very conservative timeframe.

Do you ship internationally? If so, what is the cost?

     - Absolutely we do!  Please add $10 to your order for international shipping by following these steps:  After you select a perk you will be taken to the contribute page.  On the contribute page please choose an additional gift in the amount of $10 and then continue on with your pledge.  That's it!

Don’t see your question answered here? 

     - No problem, shoot us an email at: hello@revealshop.com
