story:
Nia Naomi J. Whats the story?

  •  As a preacher’s kid in Hampton Roads, Virginia; I had dreams of creating clothes, preaching the gospel, and oddly-being a rapper. Overall, my heart’s desire was to help people present the best version of themselves and from the early age of 10, I began living a very colorful, faith centered lifestyle that propelled me to become more purpose oriented than anything else. Furthermore, the message that I’ll be spreading forever stems from Joshua 1:9 " Didn't I command you to be bold and courageous?" 

  • It’s hard growing up in a "urban" area and your wildest dream isn't to be a defense attorney, doctor, or obtain the typical government job. Mine was to combine color, culture, and faith to impact the lives of people across the Globe. From the age of 10, I created sketch, after mock-up, after business plan. I struggled with moving forward because I thought that I was too young or unable to really make an impact in my surroundings through fashion. Now as a blogger, international spoken word champion(poet), and college freshman double majoring in fashion design & business marketing, I began to ask God to take my hands and amplify my purpose on this earth. Then Audacieux was born three months in to my first semester at Radford University. 

What does "Aduacieux" mean? How do you pronounce it?

Audacieux = aw- dese- u 

 

  • This French Word "Audacieux" meaning bold, courageous, daring, which is why I thought that Joshua 1:9 would be the perfect scripture to describe it.  I believe that in this life, the height of your success depends on the risk taking factor of faith and action. To keep you encouraged, devoted, and energized, I am producing a Lifestyle-Faith based brand that will establish "Eclectic Sophistication" in your everyday life. 

  • By donating to "The Audacieux Brand"  You will be sewing into the production of this Lifestyle Faith Based Brand.  Think of this as your culturally sound "Work & Play" Clothing including Athleisure and Urban Apparel appropriate for every setting. These will be the pieces that can help you build up your wardrobe as well as your confidence. The first collection will introduce a yearly theme that will awaken the Audacieux in you. 
  • Behind the Brand, I'd like to open up a Campaign titled "My ˈbädē/ My Time" raising awareness on sexual violence on marginalized communities. With 64,000 Black Women Missing since 2010, and increase on Domestic Violence in Virginia, and increase in Sex Trafficking on the East Coast, there is a demand to protect young girls and young boys. I want to inform and impact the lives of young people by providing information, donating the proceeds to shelters and safe houses for victims of domestic and sexual violence, and giving you a constant reminder in your closet. 

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What I Need & What You Get

  • I will be raising 1,500 Dollars to launch in hopes of Launching in July or August of 2017. This will go to the Production of the first collection and to producing a Showroom Experiance to showcase this line of apparel in Hampton Roads, VA.
  • If I do not reach the entire goal, the money will continue to go in to the apparel line and will be available for Purchase on ONLYNIANAOMI.COM

The Impact & History

  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one). Before Fashion, I have a history engaging youth activism and fine arts. Through that experience I was able to win an international poetry competition where my team was able to perform poems with themes like sexual violence, rape culture, masculinity, and the prison industrial complex system. check out some videos of the Hampton Roads Youth Poetry Team here 
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SGN-OI7wwK4&amp...
 
  •  Beyond this, I was able to organize and host my first Girls conference long with Old Dominion University, NAACP entitled "Radiant" where my messages to young ladies ages 13-18  was to "be your own kind of beautiful". 
  • This project is valuable to the world in a sense where we can restore modesty and raise awareness through faith and fashion.

Whats the hard part??

  • As a college student, My only struggle is financially supporting this project. I knew that I wasn't going to be able to complete this project on my own. However, Managing and producing beyond this funding process should be smooth sailing. Even if the donations don't roll in, I will continue to save and support the vision!

How can I Support Audacieux Brand?  

  • If you cant donate but you still want to support the Brand & The Campaign MAKE SOME NOISE !
  • Please SHARE THIS STORY with your social media outlets! Use the #MyBadeMyTime hashtag when speaking on the Campaign Against Sexual Violence. Use the #TABRAND Hashtag when speaking about the Audacieux Brand!  Also, Check out my blog site to stay updated on the production and progress! https://www.onlynianaomi.com/ Make sure using the indiegogo sharing tools!

Through that experience I was able to win an international poetry competition where my team was able to perform poems with themes like sexual violence, rape culture, masculinity, and the prison industrial complex system. check out some videos of the Hampton Roads Youth Poetry Team here

This project is valuable to the world in a sense where we can restore modesty and raise awareness through faith and fashion.


Whats the hard part??

However, Managing and producing beyond this funding process should be smooth sailing. Even if the donations don't roll in, I will continue to save and support the vision!

How can I Support Audacieux Brand?  

If you cant donate but you still want to support the Brand & The Campaign MAKE SOME NOISE !
Please SHARE THIS STORY with your social media outlets! Use the #MyBadeMyTime hashtag when speaking on the Campaign Against Sexual Violence. story:
Hi everybody, thank you for taking the time to read more about the Maternity Dream Sleepwear story.... 

My name is Michael Bastarache and I am the founder and developer of the sleepwear. My background is quite simple. I've always had a creative flair and an entrepreneurial spirit. When my wife voiced her issues with the C shaped maternity pillow she was using during her second pregnancy I had a "light bulb" moment and that's where the sleepwear idea was born.

My true intention for coming up with the idea was to help all mothers to be around the world really get the most out of each and every night's sleep. I understand this is an issue that mothers to be have struggled with for a long time. I want to give full merit to traditional maternity pillows but with our very own proprietary foam panel design the issues that have existed for so long have been addressed.

TESTIMONIALS:

Ms. Alyssia Donovan (5 months pregnant):

“I slept great with the top to be honest. I love it. Mainly because it kept me from sleeping on my stomach, which you're not supposed to do when pregnant. So it kept me from waking up throughout the night.”

Ms. Shelby Steeves (7.5 months pregnant):

"I loved everything about the top!! It really helped me get a great night’s sleep!"

I knew the key to the perfect supportive design would be to modify the shape of the wedge pillow so that it would contour on the inside to perfectly fit the curvature of the belly going down to the waist. In addition to occupying the void space between the bottom of the belly and the hip bone; as it would fit if the mother to be were in a standing position with a cubic outer shape. The proprietary foam panels I developed are slightly smaller and slightly more firm than the average wedge pillow. The maternity yoga top, with the large oversized pockets, hold the panels in place so there's very little adjustment required, it takes up less space and it generates less heat than those large, oversized maternity pillows.

So what we are offering as a perk is a discounted price on the sleepwear from $119.00 to $89.00 CANADIAN CURRENCY ($89.00 to &67.00 US CURRENCY) for all who make a minimum contribution of $67.00 USD to the campaign. Once your contribution is made you will receive your very own sleepwear! Of course, the idea is to help all women who are planning their pregnancy in advance. Our estimated manufacturing timeline is 8-10 months. The size of all women planning to use the sleepwear would be based on the size you would be prior to pregnancy. Please message us at maternitydreamsleepwear@gmail.com with your size once you have contributed. If you discover that you are carrying multiple babies please message us and we will be happy to send you a different size based on your waist size at 6 months. Feel free to visit our website as well at www.mdsleepwear.com

Our campaign funding target is $100,000 and the following is the breakdown of where the money is needed (CANADIAN CURRENCY): 2,000 yoga tops at $16 per top=$32,000; 4 sets of foam casting tools=$20,000; 2,000 sets of foam panels at $6.50 per set=$13,000; estimated cost of shipping 1,493 units individually=$45,364; estimated Indiegogo fees=$13,000 with a grand total equalling $123,364 and the remaining balance going to marketing and facility expenses.

On behalf of myself and the Maternity Dream Sleepwear team I want to express our deepest gratitude for your support. Please share our campaign with any of your family or friends who are planning their pregnancy. Also feel free to submit any questions you may have on our website and we'll do our very best to answer each and every one of them as soon as we can.

story:
Following up on the previous technologies out there, we wanted to create a tool that would enhance workout benefits - more energy, lower adipose (fat) tissue and an increase of the lipolytic activity. We worked tirelessly to introduce you TrimX the world’s first fat spot reduction wearable technology clinically proven to allow you to gain control over your body.

Simply put, TrimX is your tool for trimming while exercising because sometimes training 2-3 times a week is just not enough to get rid of the stubborn fat. In fact, as we age, some areas accumulate fat which becomes harder to lose. Over the last 12 years, we elaborated, analysed, tested, retested, and proved with 4 clinical trials that fat spot can be reduce with electric activity. It doesn't require a high volume of energy to activates your lipolytic activity, As a matter of fact, after 15-25 min (more or less) that's when you start to experience fat loss when exercising. The only thing you need with TrimX to make it work is gel pads that allows you, at the same time, to targets the stubborn fat  zones you want to get rid of.

 

 
We've presented the technology to few medias out there, because like most of you, they weren't convince that it had proven results or that it just works.
Read their comments below to know what they really thought afterwards. 
 
On the other hand, we know those mentions aren't enough. Clearly, you need more proof and so did we, because we are soooo used to being told that there isn't a miracle tool for effective fat-burning.  It's absolutely TRUE! There's isn't, none, nada! What is real and working is EXERCISING! That's how we developed TrimX, as a tool to incorporate in your daily workout routine to -only- maximise fat loss. Read: lipolytic activity. 
 
Below 
-
You can listen to our testers from the 4th clinical trial.
p.s. Don't trust us, listen for yourself!
 

So our mission with TrimX, was to empower people to re-gain control over their body. Why are we saying re-gain? Well because life, work, kids, friends can quickly take all of our time, which gives you limited time to train. This means that when you do, it better be at it's best.

More effective, more results, and more powerful!

 

TrimX uses non-invasive gel pads to send very-low electric current into targeted fat zones. 

1. Does it hurt?

- No, in fact you barely feel it when you're not working out, so when you do you don't feel anything at all. 

2. Are the gel pads reusable?

- Of course you can use each of them up to 20 times, even more if you put the spray on it. (included in the box)

3. After how many days-weeks should I start seeing results?

- Results from the clinical trials showed that you start really noticing a difference after 5 weeks and then it's a little like a snowball, it keeps on increasing over time. Some men even lost more than 3 inches in less than 10 weeks.

 

Here's a little video explaining how it works. Quite simple indeed. 
 

When exercising, our body tends to go get the energy directly from the most available zones. Unfortunately those, aren't usually the ones we wish to get rid of. This effect causes a problematic that is the accumulation the fat in the abdomen, the hips and the thighs. Overall that's usually the waist area. So when you train, the solicited zones are the ones where the gel pads are on.  

 

We are very proud to have worked with the awesome team at Tak Design for the development of all prototypes of our pioneering fitness wearable. Together with our strong network of cooperation partners we created the first TrimX. 

 

Regulatory Clearance

The TrimX™ is classified as a medical device and must have regulatory clearance prior to its commercialisation.

The company has successfully completed the safety and compliance testing of the TrimX™ medical device, as well as secured its ISO-13485 licence for manufacturing/commercialisation of the TrimX™. 

Health Canada has also approved TrimX and similar processes will soon be initiated in the USA, Europe, and other key territories around the globe. Successful Clinical Trials TrimX™ incorporates the same technology as Adipotronics™. Both have been subjected to a series of clinical trials to achieve two things: 1) to identify the type of transcutaneous electrical current which provides the best results for targeted fat loss; and 2) to demonstrate the efficacy of the technology itself.

The most compelling results were obtained following a 10-week, triple-blind, placebo-controlled study. Tests showed that after 10 weeks the group of volunteers who were subject to EFS (electrical fat stimulation) via the TrimX™ lost 466% more fat on their targeted areas than those in the non-stimulated group.

In addition, the results demonstrated that both groups lost the same amount of overall fat. This is important, as TrimX™ does not promise a greater reduction in total fat than normal exercise. Instead, our technology is intended to increase fat loss on the targeted areas where the gel pads are applied.

Further tests have also been conducted to establish that the technology is safe and these will be used for regulatory purposes.

Safety

EFS is a proven and hazard-free technology, widely supported by many studies. In fact it has its origins in medicine. Our product has been vetted by Health Canada and their USA and Europe equivalent will soon do likewise. We always make sure our products comply with the highest quality and safety standards and are therefore completely safe to use.

Delivery

The delivery of the products in Canada, USA, Australia, South Korea and Europe is planned to start in June 2017. International shipments will take place after the appropriate clearance from the relevant government certifications has been received, e.g. early backers from the US who support us will only be able to receive the TrimX™ after we attain 510(k) clearance from the FDA. Although we are confident that we are well-prepared to handle the respective processes, we cannot eliminate the risk of delays due to compliance issues.

Supply Chain Risks

TrimX™ is complex and involves many parts. While we have dedicated team members covering sourcing and the supply chain, delays may occur if we face longer than expected lead times in the delivery of parts.

story:
Now on Kickstarter!


We have refunded all backers and relaunched on Kickstarter. 


Check us out here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/331573032/the-worlds-best-childproof-bin?ref=1gh75z


Let's make parenting a little easier with Mother May I? - Childproof Bins.

The world's best childproof bins



Our mission:
Our mission is to reduce the time parents spend cleaning up disasters so they can spend more time being the parents they want to be and doing the things they WANT to do. 
If you have kids, you know those sweethearts can be messy! If you take just one minute of "me time" you will return to find them coloring on walls, painting with Vaseline, or simply dumping out toys all over the house. As a mother of four young kids I've been there! I am still there. :) 

We have a revolutionary, patent-pending product. We've tested prototypes. We've lined up the manufacturing. Now we just need your support to help fund the first production run.

Mother May I bins are unique because they are easy for adults to open, but not for kids.


Our childproof bins are a great way to control access to things like markers, scissors, detergent pods, or treats. You can even use them for toys to keep them organized, limiting the mess to one bin at a time.

There is nothing like this on the market today. Crazy, huh?


How it works...

Our patent pending product requires two adult-sized hands to open. The buttons on the lid are spaced further apart than what a child-sized hand can reach. Even if a child uses two hands to press two of the buttons, the other set of buttons will keep the lid secure.

Mother May I bins give you control well beyond other childproofing products on the market.

Toy Storage

It is time to rethink toy storage and organization. 
  • Traditional toy bins don't keep toys organized. It might take 30 minutes to organize toys into separate bins and 30 seconds to undo it all!  
  • Many of us resort to boxing up toys and storing them out of sight where they may as well be thrown away. 
  • Or we just give up on organization and throw everything into one large toy chest. Good luck finding Mr. Potato Head's arms or Barbie's clothes. 

Our childproof bins let you keep toys organized and available without giving up on a clean house.


Markers, Crayons, Scissors etc.

Childproof bins are the best way to keep crayons, markers and pencils off your walls and in your control.


Detergent pods

"Calls to poison control centers increased 17% from 2013-2014... More than 22,000 children, mostly under age 3, were exposed to laundry packets" - Laundry packet poisonings increase in kids - CNN April 2016.

Doctors strongly suggest parents keep these products out of the reach of children.  Our bins are the perfect addition to your childproofing safety plan.


TV remotes

OK kids, who took the remote? Seriously, where is the remote? You have 15 chew toys, why do you always go for the remote!?


Product Specs

Fogged texture with clear windows


Bins fit perfectly on most book shelves and two stacked bins will fit perfectly in 11" cube shelves.

story:
nipi brings beauty and practicality to coolers. Over 3 years of designing, testing and prototyping has resulted in the revolutionary worlds strongest mobile cooler. Crafted by an experienced team of product designers and engineers, nipi is powered by record breaking solar technology. Its ultra mobile, rugged smart design is built to last you for life, meaning nipi could be the last cooler you will ever need to buy.








nipi redesigned the way cooler wheels are made. We believe cooler wheels should be tough, built for all terrains, but also smooth and silent. Their design was inspired by motocross bikes, which are built for a world that isn’t flat. The end result is a cooler that can follow you in virtually any terrain.



We believe a cooler is something you should only need to buy once in your life. There is nothing worse than your cooler falling apart on a trip! Worse than this, using throwaway coolers is damaging our planet. nipi is built from marine grade materials and rotomolded making it the strongest mobile smart cooler on earth! It’s body is so strong, even a grizzly is no match!



Solar technology has come a long way in recent years. Unfortunately, not all solar cells deliver what you expect. nipi’s rugged weather proof solar panels take solar power to new limits. They are the highest efficiency cells in the world, meaning nipi’s record breaking solar technology will keep almost all portable devices powered up. Even on a cloudy day.



The most important job of any cooler is to keep things cold. nipi’s rotomolded body is not only tough, it also insulates in a way regular coolers don’t. nipi is so good at keeping cold, it can hold ice for a whopping 6 days without using any power! The magic all happens with nipi’s insulated body and lid.



There is a crazy amount of different coolers, solar panels and wheels available on the market ranging in quality and price. It can be a very confusing space. We have used the best of the best with nipi, and delivered this with exceptional value. If you were to purchase nipi’s equivalent components separately, you would pay up to $379 for a 50qt rotomolded cooler, $255 for a solar kit of the same quality and $159 for a wheel kit for that rotomolded cooler. With nipi your saving up to a whopping $314 = and $598 off when you preorder on indiegogo!






Does nipi need battery power to keep it cold?
nipi will keep ice frozen for 6 days without any power. It does this with it's double insulated lid and thick insulated walls.

How durable is nipi?
nipi is constructed from the highest quality materials and put through a process which is designed to make nipi a rugged, almost military grade piece of equipment. nipi and nipi's solar panel casing can with stand extreme weather conditions as well as withstand every day wear and tear on the back of trucks, on beaches or simply in your back yard with someone sitting on it. Essentially, nipi is made to last you for life!

How big is nipi's storage space?
The cold storage area is 50 quarts (47 litres) which holds approximately 70 cans. The dry storage is designed to store up to 3 solar panels as well as valuables such as wallets, phones, keys etc.

Can nipi just be charged via solar?
nipi can be charged via solar, mains or car.

Can nipi be charged in countries with a voltage different to the US?
Yes, nipi can be charged worldwide.

story:
About this project

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other heated jackets are available, but they look like something a substitute gym teacher might wear. That's why our team of engineers and designers spent months developing the 2Degree Jacket's advanced electronics and heating technology and styling it to look smart. 

 

The resulting product delivers the ideal combination of smart and good-looking: The sleek 2Degree Jacket links to the user's iPhone or Android mobile device to automatically maintain its temperature.

 

Be warm and look good at the same time. Get on board early with 2Degree by helping us bring this product to the market.

 

 

 

 

 

A jacket that looks great on the town or at the office
We collaborated with one of the top fashion schools in the country to combine our sophisticated thermal control technology with the latest fashion trends to produce a jacket that looks as great as it functions. 2Degree keeps you warm on the inside and hot on the outside.

 

         

 

 

 

2Degree Jacket Color Options:

 

 

 

 

 

Fabric: Light weight, waterproof, premium faux leather designed for apparel and accessories. Available in S, M, L, XL and XXL sizes for men and women.

Advanced heating that works like graphene, but on steroids
We worked with GrafTech International, a global graphite technology company, to develop our patent-pending heating system that marries the best in flexible, breathable and rugged technology with superior heat distribution. 

The electronics are undetectable to the user. The combination provides an unprecedented user experience of controlled, uniform warmth without the bulk and hotspots of other heated garment options.
 

 

 

 

2Degree features the most advanced control system ever used in a heated garment. It dynamically controls power to deliver a precise heating level. All of this is made possible by a powerful microprocessor paired with Bluetooth® connectivity.
The jacket monitors internal jacket temperature, external temperature, and the weather for optimal user comfort. Advanced algorithms determine the level of heating needed.
 

 

 

 

 

Advanced battery technology delivers all-day power for the jacket and your phone via a USB charging port. These batteries are distributed throughout the jacket, becoming almost invisible to the wearer. Most importantly, charging takes place via our patent-pending hanger and does not require the battery to be removed: you simply hang the jacket, and it charges.

 

 

 

       

 

 

                                           

 

 

 

Knowledge gives us the warm fuzzies
What's not to love about an intelligent jacket that keeps you warm and toasty all over? 

For those who may be teetering on the edge of like and love, we've put together some frequently-asked-questions about the 2Degree Jacket and our answers to them.

Q: How long will it keep me warm?
A: Users can expect from the 2Degree Jacket:
- 2 hours at the maximum setting
- 3-8 hours during temperature regulation (depending on outside temperature and user setting)
- 10+ hours at lowest setting

Q: What is the temperature range for the 2Degree Jacket?
A: Our jacket has been tested down into the 30s (that's degrees Fahrenheit). We continue to collect data and refine the final design for optimal comfort in the first release. 

Q: This jacket won’t work for me on the ski slope/construction site/North Pole.
A: First, that wasn’t a question. Second, we designed the 2Degree Jacket with fashion in mind. Fall through spring, it's perfect for getting around town in style, such as shopping, dining al fresco or walking to work. The 2Degree Jacket is not designed for industrial or sub-zero applications; however, we're pretty sure it's going to be on everyone's holiday wish list, so we'll make sure the big guy at the North Pole gets the heads up.  

Q: What if my phone is taken by aliens?
A: Really? Aliens? Luckily for you, your jacket can still work without your phone, just not in "temperature control mode." The 2Degree Jacket can be adjusted manually to a low or high heat setting. You're on your own with regards to smart phone hostage negotiations with Martians. Maybe give them a 2Degree Jacket in exchange?

Q: When do I select my reward jacket gender, size and color choice?
A: At the conclusion of the successful Indiegogo campaign, you will be contacted with details and instructions regarding your selection.

 

 

 

 

 

Deanna Burwell

 

With over fifteen years of experience as an engineer, inventor and developer, Deanna is passionate about turning great ideas into products of premium quality and experience.  In her spare time, Deanna enjoys spending time with her family or indulging one of her hobbies which include painting, martial arts, composing music and gardening.

 

Marty Smalc

 

 

Marty has 30+ years of experience in developing cutting edge consumer and industrial products and has a dozen US patents to his name.  For the last decade, he has concentrated on creating passive thermal solutions to cool all the high tech devices that you use today, like smart phones, tablets, laptops and TVs.  In his off time, Marty likes to cycle and swim.

 

Prerna Suri

 

From a very young age, Prerna designed and conceptualized ideas into form.   She has dual B.A. degrees in Fashion Design and Merchandising and is pursuing an M.A. from The Fashion School at Kent State University.  Prerna has worked in export and corporate houses, both in the US and overseas and possesses superb technical skills and versatility.   A Research Assistant at Kent State’s TechStyleLAB, she specializes there in 3D scanning and printing, digital printing, and wearables technology.

 

Sarah Tao

 

A student at Kent State University pursuing an M.A. in Fashion, Sarah has a passion for marketing research and analysis.  Sarah was top seller for a luxury fashion store and founder of the Toastmasters Club at her B.S. Marketing alma mater, Case Western Reserve University.  Sarah spent her early life in China.  Now living in the US, in her spare time she enjoys travelling and loves reading bible at home with her cat, Cali.

 

Craig Butrick

 

With his background in embedded control systems, Craig specializes in making the impossible into reality.  Playing with electronics from a small age, he was lucky enough to turn his passion into a career.  Craig spends his weekends playing tournament paintball (mid-dorito, if you are curious).

 

Will Sauer

 
With over 10 years of Marketing Communications experience spanning multiple industries, Will truly understands how to bring innovations to market and communicate them effectively.  Will holds a Master of Business Administration degree from Baldwin Wallace University.  In his spare time, Will enjoys playing basketball, fishing, woodworking, and spending time with his family and friends.
 
PJ Moore
 

With a 15 year career in in procurement, sourcing, supply chain and project management, PJ’s involvement in a project begins at its initial concept & prototype phase all the way through mass production.  PJ holds a Bachelor’s in Management and Information Technology from Kent State University. In his free time he enjoys pugs, CrossFit & trail running and is currently training for his third 100 mile ultra-marathon.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

www.instagram.com/prometheus_tec

 

 

 

 

 

www.twitter.com/prometheus_tec

 

 

 

 

 

www.facebook.com/CLEPrometheusTechnologies

 

 

 

 

 

www.prometheustechnologies.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

theteam@prometheustechnologies.com

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Transitioning from prototyping to full manufacturing and ensuring that we can maintain a cost-point with economies of scale while maintaining domestic manufacturing and supply.

We have domestic (US) manufacturers engaged for all steps of the production and do not expect any significant adjustments to costs. Back-up plan is engagement of international manufacturers as-needed.

About this project       Other heated jackets are available, but they look like something a substitute gym teacher might wear. That's why our team of engineers and designers spent months developing the 2Degree Jacket's advanced electronics and heating technology and styling it to look smart.  The resulting product delivers the ideal combination of smart and good-looking: The sleek 2Degree Jacket links to the user's iPhone or Android mobile device to automatically maintain its temperature. Be warm and look good at the same time. Get on board early with 2Degree by helping us bring this product to the market.     A jacket that looks great on the town or at the officeWe collaborated with one of the top fashion schools in the country to combine our sophisticated thermal control technology with the latest fashion trends to produce a jacket that looks as great as it functions. 2Degree keeps you warm on the inside and hot on the outside.             2Degree Jacket Color Options:     Fabric: Light weight, waterproof, premium faux leather designed for apparel and accessories. Available in S, M, L, XL and XXL sizes for men and women. Advanced heating that works like graphene, but on steroidsWe worked with GrafTech International, a global graphite technology company, to develop our patent-pending heating system that marries the best in flexible, breathable and rugged technology with superior heat distribution. The electronics are undetectable to the user. The combination provides an unprecedented user experience of controlled, uniform warmth without the bulk and hotspots of other heated garment options.                         2Degree features the most advanced control system ever used in a heated garment. It dynamically controls power to deliver a precise heating level. All of this is made possible by a powerful microprocessor paired with Bluetooth® connectivity.The jacket monitors internal jacket temperature, external temperature, and the weather for optimal user comfort. Advanced algorithms determine the level of heating needed.     Advanced battery technology delivers all-day power for the jacket and your phone via a USB charging port. These batteries are distributed throughout the jacket, becoming almost invisible to the wearer. Most importantly, charging takes place via our patent-pending hanger and does not require the battery to be removed: you simply hang the jacket, and it charges.          
 




 

                                            
 

 


 
Knowledge gives us the warm fuzziesWhat's not to love about an intelligent jacket that keeps you warm and toasty all over? 
For those who may be teetering on the edge of like and love, we've put together some frequently-asked-questions about the 2Degree Jacket and our answers to them.
Q: How long will it keep me warm?A: Users can expect from the 2Degree Jacket:- 2 hours at the maximum setting- 3-8 hours during temperature regulation (depending on outside temperature and user setting)- 10+ hours at lowest setting
Q: What is the temperature range for the 2Degree Jacket?A: Our jacket has been tested down into the 30s (that's degrees Fahrenheit). We continue to collect data and refine the final design for optimal comfort in the first release. 
Q: This jacket won’t work for me on the ski slope/construction site/North Pole.A: First, that wasn’t a question. Second, we designed the 2Degree Jacket with fashion in mind. Fall through spring, it's perfect for getting around town in style, such as shopping, dining al fresco or walking to work. The 2Degree Jacket is not designed for industrial or sub-zero applications; however, we're pretty sure it's going to be on everyone's holiday wish list, so we'll make sure the big guy at the North Pole gets the heads up.  
Q: What if my phone is taken by aliens?A: Really? Aliens? Luckily for you, your jacket can still work without your phone, just not in "temperature control mode." The 2Degree Jacket can be adjusted manually to a low or high heat setting. You're on your own with regards to smart phone hostage negotiations with Martians. Maybe give them a 2Degree Jacket in exchange?
Q: When do I select my reward jacket gender, size and color choice?A: At the conclusion of the successful Indiegogo campaign, you will be contacted with details and instructions regarding your selection.
     Deanna Burwell With over fifteen years of experience as an engineer, inventor and developer, Deanna is passionate about turning great ideas into products of premium quality and experience.  In her spare time, Deanna enjoys spending time with her family or indulging one of her hobbies which include painting, martial arts, composing music and gardening. Marty Smalc  Marty has 30+ years of experience in developing cutting edge consumer and industrial products and has a dozen US patents to his name.  For the last decade, he has concentrated on creating passive thermal solutions to cool all the high tech devices that you use today, like smart phones, tablets, laptops and TVs.  In his off time, Marty likes to cycle and swim. Prerna Suri From a very young age, Prerna designed and conceptualized ideas into form.   She has dual B.A. degrees in Fashion Design and Merchandising and is pursuing an M.A. from The Fashion School at Kent State University.  Prerna has worked in export and corporate houses, both in the US and overseas and possesses superb technical skills and versatility.   A Research Assistant at Kent State’s TechStyleLAB, she specializes there in 3D scanning and printing, digital printing, and wearables technology. Sarah Tao A student at Kent State University pursuing an M.A. in Fashion, Sarah has a passion for marketing research and analysis.  Sarah was top seller for a luxury fashion store and founder of the Toastmasters Club at her B.S. Marketing alma mater, Case Western Reserve University.  Sarah spent her early life in China.  Now living in the US, in her spare time she enjoys travelling and loves reading bible at home with her cat, Cali. Craig Butrick With his background in embedded control systems, Craig specializes in making the impossible into reality.  Playing with electronics from a small age, he was lucky enough to turn his passion into a career.  Craig spends his weekends playing tournament paintball (mid-dorito, if you are curious). Will Sauer With over 10 years of Marketing Communications experience spanning multiple industries, Will truly understands how to bring innovations to market and communicate them effectively.  Will holds a Master of Business Administration degree from Baldwin Wallace University.  In his spare time, Will enjoys playing basketball, fishing, woodworking, and spending time with his family and friends. PJ Moore 

With a 15 year career in in procurement, sourcing, supply chain and project management, PJ’s involvement in a project begins at its initial concept & prototype phase all the way through mass production.  PJ holds a Bachelor’s in Management and Information Technology from Kent State University. In his free time he enjoys pugs, CrossFit & trail running and is currently training for his third 100 mile ultra-marathon.
        www.instagram.com/prometheus_tec     www.twitter.com/prometheus_tec     www.facebook.com/CLEPrometheusTechnologies     www.prometheustechnologies.com       theteam@prometheustechnologies.com   Risks and challengesTransitioning from prototyping to full manufacturing and ensuring that we can maintain a cost-point with economies of scale while maintaining domestic manufacturing and supply.We have domestic (US) manufacturers engaged for all steps of the production and do not expect any significant adjustments to costs. Back-up plan is engagement of international manufacturers as-needed.

story:
Who We Are:

Hello! My name is Taylor, I'm a Sophomore at Bethune Cookman University and the CEO of BlackButterfly! My freshman year I was introduced to the world of lashes through a former strip enthusiast in my science class. Prior to meeting her I had never worn lash extensions however, after weeks of convincing me, I decided to try them on and was hooked immediately! I loved how these longer lashes completed my "No Makeup" look, framed my eyes naturally, and ultimately gave me more confidence.

The more I glued, pulled, and crimped my falsies; I couldn't help but notice that my real lashes were suffering. Because of this, I was now wearing strips as a necessity rather than an accessory. Deciding to stop this cycle of synthetic codependency, I spent months researching and developing the perfect growth serum for your natural lashes, so not only with you stop spending your money on products that deface your natural beauty, but with BlackButterfly you will also be able to add to your confidence with or without makeup!

What We Need & What You Get

The company's official launch is Sep. 7th, 2017. However, products have been sold online for price testing and consumer reactions. The money funded from my campaign will go towards research and development, marketing, web design, new products, packaging, trademarks, and patents. These necessities are listed in order of importance which means as my funds grow, this list will shrink!

The Impact

My mission is to aid in giving complete confidence to women no matter how "done up" or "dressed down" she is! 

Risks & Challenges

Although no one has had any complaints within our three test rounds, to prevent allergic reactions, the majority of the funds will go towards product testing and research and development in order to keep the risk factor low and safety high. The biggest challenge BlackButterfly faces, is its marketing which is why the second largest portion of my campaign fund will be focused around getting my my brand more established on social media.

Other Ways You Can Help

For those lash enthusiasts who can not contribute financially, no worries! Spreading the BlackButterfly movement helps just as much. Follow us on Instagram @BlackButterflyLashserum and look out for our pre-sale Aug. 31st- Sep. 6th!

story:
Technology can quickly get boring. Waveworks, a small technology startup of Southern California, has created Diamodo Bracelet- an example of artistic style and technology combined around a special design. Thanks to its Bluetooth device inside, Diamodo bracelet can pair up with your android or IOS devices, and with the app you and loved ones can text each other, share pictures and send pings to each other through blinking of a precious stone in the bracelet. Loved ones not only feel cool about receiving these flashing pings from you, they can also assign a shine pattern to every specific contact such that they know that it was you! The illumination of the bracelet center stone notifies you with any pings from your Diamodo app contacts.  

One can get notifications not only from your contacts but also from the social media applications on your phone. Your bracelet illuminates differently if someone calls you or text you. You can assign shine patterns for these applications that you already have in your phone such that even when your phone is away you can be warned.

Diamodo bracelet does not require a regular charger- just throw it in its special jewelry box and it charges automatically through wireless charging technology. Thanks to Its waterproof feature- it can be worn while washing dishes or even taking a shower. It is size adjustable, hence can easily fit various wrist sizes.

Out of all; the best value in the piece is its handcrafting by various artists. People are even surprised to see us gifting away such an artistic piece for our launch campaigns! Diamodo is a unique piece of art with alloy plated sterling silver and a natural precious stone that would attract a lot of attention around the wearer...

story:
Team LytPak

Hi we are a team of 2 college students from Texas A&M University. 
Co-Founders: Christopher Rech (Mechanical Engineering)
Co-Founder: Harman Chawla (Mechanical & Manufacturing Engineering Tech)
As engineering students a lot of times we like to think about problems we all face in our day today lives, and how we can step up and help to make the community better. As college students we all own backpacks as they are an extreme necessity in our lives, but the current designs are rather underwhelming. Backpack technology has stagnated over the past years, as most designs are highly redundant and don't offer unique features. We believe that with our model we can offer the market something unique, innovative and really useful. 

tinyurl.com/jbxcu49

Our Needs

We believe that with just $500 we can develop a fully functional prototype for our product design. It will inlcude the following features:

 Wall Mounting Mechanism

Fold-able Table

Electroluminescent look achieved through LED Tape

Power Bank for charging your laptop/cell phones on the go. 


The Impact

The Lytpack is not just a concept; it’s a design that’s ready to be built and marketed to individuals. For 500 dollars, we’ll be able to create a fully-functional prototype to show to investors. Ultimately, Lytpack has the potential to capitalize on the rapid growth of the backpack industry by being a valuable, innovative and marketable consumer product.

Risks & Challenges

Our backpack design is extremely unique, which is why while developing this prototype we might face some engineering challenges. But here at #Team Lytpak our co-founders have a strong engineering background and have our college engineering/technical faculty and resources on our side to help us face these challenges. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand everyone can't fund our project, but there are other ways to help. 
You can always vote for our design entry for the U-Ignite Competition and help us bring our idea to life. 

tinyurl.com/jbxcu49

story:
The Cuckoo clock has a long history, and the traditional cuckoo clock has existed since the early 1900's. People have adored the cuckoo clock's style for more than 100 years, but no one has made it as a wrist watch, until now!

Now watch maker SeaHope has partnered with a Japanese Toy factory, combining precision technology to create the First Wearable "Cuckoo Watch"!

With amazing technology, making a thumb sized remote control robot (smaller than 35mm high) and utilizing special micro technology for this project, The Cuckoo Watch is a product no other watch factory has attempted to make, in the history of watch making.

Support this first effort to produce this cute and unique Watch! (Check out our perks!)





Details

This clock is made for wearing! 

It may not be the traditional Cuckoo, but this modern, stylish watch brings back all the things that made Cuckoo one of the cutest time keepers of all time!



 

Features of the Cuckoo Watch!

  1 Alarm ~ The Cuckoo chimes, popping out and in - like the old school traditional   clock!

  2 Hourly chime - Cuckoo chimes once, pops out and back in

  3 Night time mode / Cuckoo sleeps from Midnight to 7AM  (saves battery life)

  4  Dual time: shown by analog hands and mini-digital display

  5  Calendar function

  6  12/24 hours time (on LCD display)

  7 Up to 3ATM water resistance





Materials

  Japan analog quartz movement

  LCD Display

  Brass case

  SS caseback

  Strap ~ Your choice: Mesh metal strap or Leather strap


Proto type

We have made one prototype based on our first design which is: 45mm x 35mm x 12mm.  Our factory has the capable technology to make the cute little Cuckoo mechanism, and place it with precision into the watch body ~ Carefully crafted for function and stylish design!


Experience

We at SEAHOPE, have over 18 years experience of producing unique, cool and stylish watches. 

We have already released many unique LED watches, LCD watches (see photos). We think that the Cuckoo Watch will be one of our best, most unique watches, and you can be part of this cute mini-revolution!



Production Schedule 

Below is the schedule for our First production run.



Planned Delivery will be November 2015.

Development

We need your help to start mass production. On the success of the campaign, we will send you updates on the first production and your perks!  We will also post on this page, as well as our website.





Warrantee

Th Cuckoo Watch has 1 year warrantee.  

Note on Repairs:

You can mail the watch to our office in Japan for repairs if needed. Contact us for more details and the procedure/timing.



REWARDS/PERKS
